title: Service Desk Manager
description:
Job Title: Service Desk Manager
Location: Work from Home
Reports to: General Manager
Type: Full-Time
Job Summary:
The Service Desk Manager is responsible for leading and managing the service desk team to deliver high-quality IT support services.
This role involves reviewing and understanding existing processes, refining or building new processes, implementing them, and digitising these processes using appropriate tools like Zoho Desk.
Additionally, the Service Desk Manager will actively participate in addressing service requests, managing tickets, handling escalations, and ensuring overall service desk efficiency.
The ideal candidate will have prior experience in establishing service desks, preferably in a startup or MSP environment, and will be instrumental in driving both proactive and reactive IT support functions.
Qualifications:
Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in IT service desk management, with proven experience in building or refining service desks, preferably in a startup or MSP environment.
Technical Knowledge: Strong understanding of IT service management (ITSM) frameworks, including experience with tools like Zoho Desk, and familiarity with proactive monitoring tools (e.g., Fortinet).
Leadership: Demonstrated leadership skills with the ability to inspire and manage a team to deliver exceptional service.
Process Development: Experience in developing and implementing IT service desk processes, with a focus on both proactive and reactive support.
Communication: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with a variety of stakeholders.
Certifications: ITIL certification or similar is highly desirable.
Key Responsibilities:
Process Review & Development:
Review and Analyse: Examine all existing service desk processes to gain a thorough understanding of current practices and areas for improvement.
Process Refinement/Creation: Refine existing processes or develop new, comprehensive processes that align with industry best practices and the organization’s objectives.
High-Level Function Understanding: Ensure a clear definition of the service desk's role, focusing on its proactive (monitoring and management of devices) and reactive (customer call response) responsibilities.
Proactive Monitoring & Management:
Proactive Tool Implementation: Lead the implementation of a proactive monitoring tool for network devices, such as Fortinet, ensuring it integrates smoothly with existing systems.
Monitoring Strategy: Develop and enforce a proactive monitoring strategy that minimises downtime and anticipates potential issues before they impact customers.
Reactive Support Management:
Incident Management: Oversee the handling of customer calls and incidents, ensuring timely and effective resolution according to SLA agreements.
Escalation Procedures: Establish and maintain clear escalation procedures to address complex or critical issues efficiently.
Ticket Management: Actively participate in the service desk's daily operations by addressing service requests, managing tickets, and handling escalations as needed.
Customer Interaction: Engage directly with customers to resolve high-priority issues, ensuring a positive customer experience.
Process Implementation & Training:
Process Rollout: Once processes are finalised, lead their implementation across the service desk team.
Training: Develop and deliver training programs to ensure all service desk staff are proficient in the new processes and tools.
Continuous Improvement: Create a feedback loop to regularly assess and improve the effectiveness of the implemented processes.
Process Digitisation:
Tool Integration: Digitise and integrate service desk processes using Zoho Desk, ensuring seamless workflow automation and efficient ticket management.
Reporting & Analytics: Set up dashboards and reporting tools within Zoho Desk to track KPIs and service desk performance metrics.
Service Desk Excellence:
Customer Satisfaction: Monitor customer satisfaction levels, identifying areas for improvement and implementing strategies to enhance service delivery.
Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and manage the service desk team, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work environment.
Vendor & Stakeholder Management: Work closely with vendors, clients, and internal stakeholders to ensure alignment with the organisation’s goals.
Key Deliverables:
Comprehensive review and documentation of all existing service desk processes.
Refined or newly developed processes for the service desk, focusing on proactive and reactive functions.
Successful rollout and integration of a proactive monitoring tool for network devices.
Active involvement in day-to-day service desk operations, including managing tickets and handling escalations.
Training and implementation of new processes across the service desk team.
Full digitisation of processes using Zoho Desk, including automated workflows and reporting capabilities.
Achieving measurable improvements in customer satisfaction and service desk efficiency.
How to Apply:
Please email your CV to both emails below
Anne Acero Upgrade to see actual info
Maria Lapa Upgrade to see actual info

title: Public Relations Virtual Assistant
description:
Weekly Schedule:
- Assistant shall perform their duties on Mondays - Fridays
- ~25 hours per week, preferably within the times of 9 am - 5 pm EST (flexible depending on activations and assignments per week).
- Assistant shall meet deadlines outlined and be flexible on hours, especially for urgent/timely tasks.
- As a consultant, you are responsible for tracking your hours. If hours become unreasonable (i.e., consistently servicing 30+ hours per week with the exception of the first 2 weeks you are onboarding/training to our processes), assistant must feel comfortable in communicating and flagging this to account leads, so scope of work can be reasonably adjusted and negotiated as needed.
Responsibilities:
- Daily Correspondence with GAPR team: Complete general administrative tasks and other organizational duties as assigned. Available for internal team calls as needed. End of week status updates via slack (very casual) summarizing work for the week and forward action for the following week.
- Team communications: Communicate effectively and timely with GAPR team about status of all tasks, which includes daily correspondence via slack.
- Press monitoring, clipping and reporting: Google/muckrack searches & setting up alerts for client mentions, competitor mentions, client coverage opportunities, etc.; track media coverage and create press clippings to present to clients.
- Auditing, media list building & maintenance: Lead support on updating master media lists and competitor/seasonal auditing; inclusive of finding editors for future pitching, monitoring media moves, and media contact research through Muckrack.
- Client media trackers: Managing and maintaining all client media trackers which includes: inputting sample requests, action items, media feedback, press hits, awards, and more.
- Product sample management: Coordinating media requests with client from beginning to end, which includes inputting sample requests, sharing tracking numbers with media, staying cognizant and on top of timely deadlines for requests.
- Client call agendas and email updates: support on setting up client agendas ahead of call/email update schedule.
Misc. research as needed - Examples include researching into seasonal moments relevant ot PR pitching, pricing and inquiries for external resources, investigating events & trade shows, etc.
Core Competencies + Qualifications:
- Required proficiency in Google Workspace (Google Drive, Google Docs, Google Sheets, Gmail), Slack, and Muckrack
- Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment
- Able to work productively with teams virtually
- Strong written and verbal communication skills; detail-oriented and well-organized
- Effective time management skills and the ability to reprioritize and meet deadlines
- Understanding of PR and marketing concepts and practices
- Willingness to follow industry trends and current methods
- An analytical mind with attention to detail; can present new learnings and systems to increase productivity and efficiency of teams.
- Experience with other PR software such as Cision, Meltwater, etc., a plus
- Collaborative, inquisitive, and flexible with a desire for continued learning.
Disclaimer: This job description may not be inclusive of all assigned duties, responsibilities, or aspects of the job described, and may be amended at any time at the sole discretion of the Employer.

title: Client Care Support
description:
We’re in the business of changing people’s lives. Our products are educational and change-orientated. They’re intended to help our clients get a very specific result and we’re committed to helping people get the results that matter most to them.

We deliver our products online through membership websites and through live events that we stream throughout Australia, New Zealand, and the United States.

We’re a tight, energetic team. We’re full of energy and we love getting the job done FAST so we need a very special human to join our team.

We need a full-time Client Care specialist to join our team on a rotating night shift roster to help us care for our new clients and general delivery support work.

What You'll Do...

===Key Responsibilities===
• Actively handle a high volume of outbound care and booking calls for coaches, emails, social media page/group conversations, and requests
• Proactively initiate follow-up calls
• Effectively liaise with internal stakeholders to ensure customers' needs are met in a timely and professional manner
• Deal with customer issues, investigate issues, and resolve them in a prompt manner
• Liaise with internal teams to resolve and deliver solutions
• Support Live Events and Training
• Proactively work to and exceed individual KPI targets

===Ideal Candidate Will Be===
• Detail-orientated. You're also probably a little obsessive around details. You love schedules and you love getting stuff done on time.
• Customer-focused. You love, love, love talking to customers and being on the phone! You could do it all day! You have genuine empathy and want the best outcome for them
• Super-organized. You'll need to be—because you will be working with different teams, and each has its own set of outcomes.
• Outcome-driven. Failing or missing deadlines kills you on the inside (you feel terrible when things don't happen for you).
• Flexible and versatile. You are open to taking on different roles and responsibilities
• You want to be part of a team that wins! You love winning, you love creating, and you love producing great results.
• Making a difference matters to you. Living a life of insignificance destroys you inside. You want to play a bigger game.

===Skills and Experience===
• Must have Customer Service and night shift experience
• Strong attention to detail with demonstrated problem-solving skill
• Must have excellent written and spoken communication skills
• Faster learner who can pick up new ideas, conduct proofs of concept/value and propose a path forward
• Can juggle and gain agreement on the diverse needs and priorities of business stakeholders
• A true team player who can work well independently

** Desktop PC requirements:
- 1Ghz-2Ghz processor
- 6GB of RAM
- Virus and spyware protection software and a working firewall.
- Software programs that may be required include Microsoft Office (Microsoft Word and Excel), and/or Adobe Acrobat reader.
- Preferably Fiber internet connection- a reliable and fast internet connection is important.
- You have at least 10 Mbps of download speed and 1 Mbps of upload speed of dedicated internet bandwidth for each person working from home.
- Good Audio

===Benefits & Culture===
-Work from Home.
-A culture of inclusivity, passion, hard work, and high performance.
-40 hours per week, primarily Monday to Friday, with flexibility to manage your schedule for a balanced work and personal life.
-Bi-weekly Salary sent directly to your bank account


If the description above resonates with you, send us your (1) resume and (2) a 1-minute video to hr@consciouseducationcompany.com and in the subject line write: YOUR NEXT CLIENT CARE SUPPORT!

Make sure to send the complete requirements and give access to links/files you submitted upon application.

title: Data Analyst & Analytics Dashboard Specialist
description:
Data Analyst & Analytics Dashboard Specialist

Job description: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1f9mx54hupns1D4_6FOZ6eIUd0wqY2DiQ9b9x-NKqc_E/edit?usp=sharing 

The Role
We're seeking a talented and driven Data Analyst & Analytics Dashboard Specialist to join our team. In this role, you'll be instrumental in creating and managing comprehensive analytics systems for our clients, enabling data-driven decision-making and strategy optimization.

To start, we’re working with one client’s product launch: https://join.obws.com/ 
You will help us track conversion rates on this sales page, along with conversion rates from emails and social media posts (we’re using tools like Braze and Kartra so you’ll need to get data from these platforms). 

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain a centralized analytics dashboard that integrates data from multiple sources
Set up and manage Google Analytics for client websites, ensuring proper tracking of key metrics and conversions
Analyze and report on website conversion rates, identifying areas for improvement and optimization
Monitor and analyze conversion rates within Kartra, providing insights to improve sales funnel performance
Work with client's email marketing system (Braze) to track and analyze email conversion rates and campaign effectiveness
Conduct analysis on the correlation between social media engagement and sales results
Develop and implement data collection and analysis methodologies to support business objectives
Create regular reports and presentations to communicate insights and recommendations to the team and clients
Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to identify key performance indicators (KPIs) and develop strategies to improve them
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data analytics and visualization

Required Qualifications
Degree or certifications in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field
3+ years of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or a similar role
Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, or Google Data Studio)
Strong skills in SQL and experience with database management
Experience with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager
Familiarity with email marketing analytics and CRM systems
Knowledge of social media analytics and their impact on business metrics
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with Kartra and Braze analytics
Knowledge of statistical analysis and A/B testing methodologies
Familiarity with digital marketing concepts and metrics

About Us
KN Digital Marketing is a dynamic partner for ambitious experts, speakers, consultants, and CEOs aiming to secure high-value contracts and amplify their impact. We specialize in elevating our clients' expertise through strategic marketing, compelling copywriting, and customized sales systems. We're now looking to expand our capabilities in data analytics to provide even more value to our clients.

About You
You are passionate about data and its power to drive business decisions
You have a curious mind and enjoy uncovering insights from complex datasets
You are a self-starter who can work independently and as part of a team
You have excellent time management skills and can handle multiple projects simultaneously
You are adaptable and eager to learn new tools and technologies as needed

Work Commitment
Part time ~10 hours/week

How to Apply
To apply for this position, please email your application to kristen@knoelledigital.com with the subject line "Data Analyst & Analytics Dashboard Specialist Application". Include the following:
A 3-5 minute introduction video answering the following questions:
What's your name, where do you live, and why are you interested in this role?
What experiences make you a good fit for this data-focused position?
Can you share an example of a data analysis project you've worked on and the impact it had?

If you have any, please provide examples or case studies of dashboards or analytics reports you've created (with sensitive information removed)

If selected to move forward, are you open to completing a paid test assignment that will take no more than 6 hours?
Join our team and be part of a mission to empower experts to make a bigger impact in their fields through data-driven insights and strategies!

title: ConvertKit Specialist
description:
We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled ConvertKit Specialist to join our team remotely. In this role, you will take full ownership of our email marketing efforts, driving engagement, improving conversion rates, and ensuring that all communications align with our strategic goals. You will be responsible for managing every aspect of ConvertKit, from campaign management and automation to advanced segmentation, template design, and analytics.
Key Responsibilities:
1) Email Campaign Management:
1a: Develop, execute, and optimize email marketing campaigns using ConvertKit.
1b: Manage subscriber lists, segments, and tags to ensure targeted and effective communication.

2) Advanced Automation & Segmentation:
2a) Design and implement complex automation workflows using conditional logic and behavior-based triggers.
2b) Create dynamic segmentation strategies to deliver personalized content to specific subscriber groups.

3) Newsletter Template Design:
3a) Design and develop custom, responsive newsletter templates using HTML/CSS and ConvertKit’s design tools.
3b) Ensure all templates are visually appealing, mobile-optimized, and aligned with our brand standards.

4) Landing Page & Form Creation:
4a) Create and optimize landing pages and forms within ConvertKit to capture leads and drive conversions.
4b) Conduct A/B testing on landing pages and forms to continuously improve performance.

5) Analytics & Reporting:
5a) Set up custom reporting dashboards and analyze key metrics to track the success of email campaigns.
5b) Provide actionable insights and recommendations for ongoing optimization and improvement.

6) Deliverability & Compliance:
6a) Implement best practices to maximize email deliverability, including managing DKIM, SPF, and DMARC settings.
6b) Maintain list hygiene and ensure compliance with email regulations to reduce bounce rates and improve engagement.
Integrations & API Management:

7) Manage integrations between ConvertKit and other marketing tools, including CRM systems, eCommerce platforms, and webinar software.
7a) Utilize ConvertKit’s API for custom integrations and advanced data management.
7b) Subscriber Journey & Funnel Development:

8) Design and implement detailed subscriber journeys that guide leads through the sales funnel, from initial contact to conversion and beyond.
8a) Develop and optimize sales funnels within ConvertKit to support our business growth goals.
8b) Qualifications:

Experience:
* At least 3 years of experience working with ConvertKit or a similar email marketing platform.
* Proven ability to manage complex email marketing campaigns and automations.

Skills:
* Proficiency in HTML/CSS for email template design.
* Strong understanding of email marketing best practices, including deliverability, segmentation, and list management.
* Excellent analytical skills with a data-driven approach to optimizing email performance.
* Familiarity with API usage and integrating ConvertKit with other tools and platforms.

Soft Skills:
* Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within a remote team.
* Highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of managing multiple projects simultaneously.
* Self-motivated and proactive in taking initiative to achieve results.

Benefits:
* Competitive salary based on experience.
* Flexible working hours with the opportunity to work remotely.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Collaborative and supportive team environment.

How to Apply:
If you are a ConvertKit expert passionate about driving results through email marketing and eager to make an impact in a dynamic organization, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, a cover letter detailing your experience with ConvertKit, and examples of your past work

title: Investment Analyst (Remote-Based)
description:
About Us:

OneEnergy Partners was formed to pursue middle market acquisition and development opportunities in the North American energy space by combining best-in-class investing and operating expertise. OneEnergy Partners, LLC, formed in late 2015, assembled, developed and divested of a ~12,000 net acre leasehold position and a ~5,000 net royalty acre mineral/override position in the Northern Delaware Basin. OneEnergy Partners II Holdings, LLC, formed in early 2019, is currently focused on identifying, accumulating and developing conventional and unconventional oil and gas assets across several major North American oil and natural gas plays.

Job Summary:

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Investment Analyst to join our dynamic team. As an Investment Analyst, you will be responsible for conducting research and analysis to evaluate potential investment opportunities across multiple industries. You will work directly with the Partners of the company to identify, assess, and execute investment opportunities. This is a unique opportunity to work directly with and learn from senior investment professionals. Your analysis will focus on a detailed evaluation of market trends, industry dynamics, and other relevant data to provide insights and recommendations on investment decisions.

Job Description:

Financial Analysis:

Conduct thorough financial analysis of companies, industries, and market trends to identify potential investment opportunities.
Evaluate financial statements, performance metrics, and key performance indicators to assess potential investments' financial health and stability.
Research and Due Diligence:

Stay abreast of economic, market, and industry developments to inform investment strategies.
Perform comprehensive due diligence on potential investments, including company visits, management interviews, and industry research.
Modeling and Valuation:

Build and maintain complex financial models to assess the intrinsic value of potential investments.
Utilize various valuation techniques, such as discounted cash flow (DCF), comparable company analysis (CCA), and precedent transactions.
Risk Management:

Identify and assess risks associated with potential investments, working collaboratively with the risk management team to develop effective risk mitigation strategies.
Reporting and Communication:

Prepare detailed and insightful investment reports and presentations for internal and external stakeholders.
Communicate investment recommendations, insights, and risks to the investment team and clients.
Collaboration:

Work closely with the Partners to share insights, discuss potential opportunities, and collectively make informed decisions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including risk management and compliance, to ensure alignment with organizational goals.
Advisory Support:

Provide support and analysis for the development and implementation of investment strategies.
Stay informed about market trends and industry best practices to contribute to strategic decision-making.
Continuous Learning:

Stay abreast of advancements in financial markets, investment strategies, and industry regulations.
Attend relevant conferences, workshops, and training sessions to enhance professional knowledge.

Qualifications:


Bachelor's degree in finance, economics, accounting, or related field. MBA or CFA designation preferred
Must have a background in economics, finance, or actuary work
5 - 7 years of proven experience as an Investment Analyst or similar role in the financial industry
Strong analytical, quantitative, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
Effective communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
Strategic thinking and the ability to make well-informed, data-driven decisions.

title: GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist
description:
Job Title: GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist
Company: National Personal Training Academy (NPTA) & Fit Integrated Wellness
Location: Remote (Preferably based in Davao City)
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: Competitive, based on experience
About Us:
The National Personal Training Academy (NPTA) is a leading e-commerce educational business specializing in fitness certifications and professional development. Our mission is to empower, train, and lead the next generation of fitness professionals through innovative education and community support. We also own and operate Fit Integrated Wellness, a state-of-the-art wellness facility with locations in Vancouver and Edmonton, offering comprehensive fitness and wellness services.
We are seeking a GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist to join our team and help us streamline our operations across both NPTA and Fit Integrated Wellness. Your role will be crucial in building automation systems, managing integrations, and optimizing workflows to enhance our marketing and client engagement efforts.
Position Overview:
As a GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist, you will design, implement, and assist in managing marketing automation workflows, CRM configurations, and sales pipelines across both NPTA and Fit Integrated Wellness. You will work closely with our operations teams to create seamless customer experiences, automate processes, and drive conversions.
Key Responsibilities:
GoHighLevel Setup & Optimization: Configure GoHighLevel CRM for both NPTA and Fit Integrated Wellness, ensuring smooth operation across all client touchpoints.
Marketing Automation: Develop and implement automated email and SMS marketing campaigns, lead nurturing sequences, and client follow-ups to increase engagement and sales.
Integration Management: Connect GoHighLevel with third-party platforms such as Zapier, Stripe, and Google Analytics to streamline data flow and enhance operational efficiency.
Sales Funnel Development: Build and optimize lead generation funnels and landing pages to attract and convert prospective students and clients.
Custom Workflows: Create workflows to automate various internal processes, from client onboarding to course enrollment and appointment scheduling.
Client & Team Collaboration: Work with our teams to understand business needs and translate them into efficient GoHighLevel solutions that drive growth.
Data & Analytics Reporting: Set up dashboards and reports to monitor KPIs, customer journeys, and campaign performance.
Support & Maintenance: Troubleshoot issues, ensure system reliability, and keep up-to-date with GoHighLevel updates and best practices.
Key Requirements:
Proven experience as a GoHighLevel Developer, Marketing Automation Specialist, or CRM Expert.
Strong understanding of GoHighLevel workflows, marketing automation, and sales funnel development.
Proficiency in integrating GoHighLevel with third-party platforms like Zapier, Stripe, and social media channels.
Ability to manage multi-location CRM configurations (NPTA's e-commerce focus and Fit Integrated Wellness’s brick-and-mortar needs).
Experience in fitness, wellness, or education industries is a plus.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects with tight deadlines.
Bonus: Experience with email marketing platforms, performance tracking, and data analysis.
Core Values:
At NPTA and Fit Integrated Wellness, we believe in:
Empowerment: Helping clients and students achieve personal and professional growth.
Innovation: Providing cutting-edge fitness education and wellness services.
Community: Fostering a supportive, inclusive environment where everyone thrives.
Teamwork: Working together to exceed goals and support each other’s success.
What We Offer:
Flexible Work Environment: Work remotely with flexibility.
Growth Opportunities: Be part of a fast-growing company with plenty of opportunities for career advancement.
Collaborative Culture: Join a talented team that values innovation, community, and making a positive impact in the fitness and wellness industry.
Professional Development: Access to ongoing training and resources to help you stay ahead in the field.
How to Apply:
To apply, please send your resume, a cover letter, and examples of previous GoHighLevel projects or automation workflows to Upgrade to see actual info look forward to having you on board to help us shape the future of fitness and wellness!

title: IT Operations Manager
description:
Company Overview:
Your IT Department is an Australian based MSP company, providing cloud-based IT services to small - medium businesses across Australia. We are committed to delivering excellent technical services to our clients and we are looking for an enthusiastic, forward-thinking Operations Manager to join our fun and friendly team in a full-time, long-term capacity.

I. ROLE DESCRIPTION
The Operations Manager is responsible for overseeing the delivery of IT services to clients, ensuring that 
the service level agreements are upheld, and customer satisfaction is high. The Operations Manager also 
manages the staff, budget, and resources of the technology services team, and coordinates the activities of 
the commercial, operations and technical teams.

This position is managed by and reports to the Director (DIR).

II. RESPONSIBILITIES & DUTIES
Key Responsibilities and duties are as follows.
• Manage the day-to-day operations of the technology services delivery team, acting as the technical 
authority for the team.
• Scheduling, assigning, and monitoring tasks for the technology services delivery team, providing 
feedback and coaching as required.
• Ensure that the IT services are delivered according to the service level agreements, quality 
standards, and best practices.
• Communicate with clients regularly, and handle any issues, complaints, or requests in a timely and 
professional manner.
• Develop and implement policies, procedures, and processes to improve the efficiency, effectiveness, 
and quality of the service delivery.
• Analyse and report on the performance, metrics, and trends of the service delivery, and identify 
areas for improvement or innovation.
• Manage the resources, and inventory of the service delivery team, and ensure that the costs are 
within the allocated limits.
• Coordinate with the sales, technical, and HR departments to ensure alignment and collaboration on 
the service delivery goals and objectives.
• Assist with training and development of the service delivery staff and foster a positive and 
productive work environment.
• Stay updated on the latest IT trends, technologies, and best practices, and ensure that the service 
delivery team has the necessary skills and tools.
• Ensure compliance with the company policies, standards, and regulations, and maintain the security 
and confidentiality of the client data and information.

III. RELEVANT QUALIFICATIONS
The following qualifications are considered as a minimum requirement for this role.
• Bachelor's degree in IT, computer science, engineering, or related field.
• Microsoft Certifications relevant to M365 and Azure administration
• 3CX Certification
• ITIL Certification

IV. SKILLS & EXPERIENCE
The following skills & experience are considered as a minimum requirement for this role
• Minimum ten years of experience in IT service delivery and team supervision, preferably in a 
managed service provider environment with a AU/NZ/UK/US/CAN based organization.
• Proven leadership, management, and communication skills.
• Strong knowledge of IT service delivery methodologies, frameworks, and best practices, such as 
ITIL, COBIT, or relevant ISO standards.
• Proficient in IT service management tools, such as RMM, ticketing and project management 
systems.
• Excellent knowledge of current IT best practices
• Ability to work under pressure, multitask, and prioritize effectively.
• Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and decision-making skills.
• Customer-oriented, quality-focused, and results-driven attitude.
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
• Familiar with current technologies, such as Microsoft 365, Microsoft Azure, IT Security, VOIP 
systems, Cloud-based collaboration & sharing services, AI platforms.
• Experience leading a successful team and consistently motivating and delivering results through 
others.
• Strong leadership and interpersonal skills.
• Experience of working in remote technical support environments, both independently and as 
part of a team.
• High level of written & spoken English

V. WORKING HOURS
This will be a full-time long-term position with opportunities for self and career development.
The working hours are from (8am - 5pm AWST) with 1 hour break from 12 pm to 1 pm, from Monday to Friday. 

VI. Location
WFA - Work from anywhere

VII. Equipment & Setup
- YITD Supplied.
• Virtual PC hosted in Australia.
• Software required to perform the tasks.
- Contractor Supplied.
• Stable internet & power connections.
• Desktop PC or laptop running a current Windows or Mac operating system.
• Good quality webcam.
• Good quality headset & microphone.
• Quiet, distraction-free workspace.

If you are interested in this position and meet the criteria listed above, kindly fill out the form:

https://forms.office.com/r/x1JjaENGiS


Please note that we will only consider applications from candidates that hold some of the relevant skills and experience listed above. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Amazon Graphic Designer
description:
At MONEGASQUE, we bring elegance and sparkle to every table. With our exquisite range of luster dust, we empower our customers to elevate their culinary creations, transforming meals into captivating experiences. Join us in our journey as our next Amazon Graphic Designer to inspire beauty and creativity in every dish.

What Success Looks Like:
Success for an Amazon Graphic Designer at MONEGASQUE is defined by their ability to effectively balance Delivery versus Demand and Requests, ensuring that over 95% of design projects are completed on time and in line with product development needs. They will achieve a high Satisfaction Rate from the Product Manager, reflecting their proficiency in meeting design specifications and contributing to product strategy. A key marker of their success will be an observable increase in Click-Through Rate (CTR) and Conversion Rate (CVR) for Amazon listings and ads featuring their designs, aiming for an improvement of 10%. This role combines artistic innovation with strategic thinking, directly impacting our brand's presence and sales performance on Amazon.

ONE THING:
Create compelling and effective visual designs for our Amazon listings and ads that significantly enhance user engagement and drive an increase in Conversion Rate and Click-Through Rate, while aligning seamlessly with our brand's identity and vision.

Scorecard 

Achieve 95% On-Time Delivery Rate for design projects in line with demand and requests.
Maintain a 90% Satisfaction Rate from the Product Manager.
Aim for a 10% increase in conversion rates on listings with new designs.
Aim for a 10% increase in Click-Through Rate (CTR) for ads with newly designed visuals.
Maintain a View per Visitor rate of 2 on the Store Page.
Achieve 99.5% compliance with Amazon’s image requirements.
Keep the rate of design revisions due to errors below 5%.
Introduce at least 2 new creative design initiatives per quarter.

Primary Objectives 

Enhance the visual appeal and effectiveness of Amazon product listings and ads to achieve a minimum of 10% increase in both Conversion Rate and Click-Through Rate. This includes regularly reviewing and updating existing visuals to align with customer preferences and Amazon guidelines.
Ensure all designs across Amazon listings and marketing materials consistently reflect and enhance the MONEGASQUE brand identity. Simultaneously, introduce innovative design elements or campaigns quarterly to keep the visual content fresh and engaging for customers.
Regular Work Activities 80%:

Regular Design Creation and Updates: Continuously create and update product images and graphics for Amazon listings to keep them fresh, visually appealing, and compliant with Amazon’s guidelines.
Adapting Designs to Holidays and Events: Proactively adjust listings and store designs to align with upcoming holidays and events, ensuring timely relevance and customer engagement.
Proactive Design Enhancements: When not working on specific requests, actively seek out opportunities to improve existing designs, ensuring that the visual presentation is always at its best.
Ongoing A/B Testing of Designs: Consistently conduct A/B testing for various design elements across product listings to determine the most effective visuals, aiming for continuous improvement in engagement and conversion rates.
Feedback Implementation and Design Refinement: Regularly incorporate feedback from customer reviews, product managers, and performance metrics to refine and optimize designs.
Monitoring Design Performance: Keep track of design performance in terms of Click-Through Rate (CTR) and Conversion Rate (CVR), making data-driven adjustments as necessary.
Asset Management and Organization: Efficiently manage and organize a library of design assets, including images, templates, and graphics.
Brand Consistency Checks: Conduct regular reviews of all listings to ensure consistency with the brand's visual identity and messaging.
As Needed Activities:
Special Design Projects as Requested by Leadership: Undertake specific design initiatives or projects as directed by the leadership team. This may include branding projects, seasonal promotional campaigns, or experimental design concepts for testing new strategies.

Mandatory Meetings:
Weekly One-on-One Meeting.

Key Skills:

Creative Excellence
Strong Visual Communication Skills
Analytical Mindset
A/B Testing and Performance Analysis
Adaptability and Flexibility
Collaborative Spirit
Proactive Learning Attitude
Results-Driven Approach
Detail-Oriented
Effective Communication
Creativity and Innovation
Independence in a fast-paced environment
High level of personal accountability
Ownership mindset

To formally apply for this position, please complete the following form: https://forms.gle/PcwzAfhacV2gbyi67

Upon completion of the form, send a copy of your resume to contact@monegasquellc.com with "I'm Designer Material" as the subject line of the email.

title: Amazon Advertising Manager (PPC)
description:
At Sales Bite LLC, we believe that every brand has the potential to reach new heights. We’re not just a marketing agency—we're a team of passionate Amazon sellers who know the platform inside and out. Our mission is to empower brands through cutting-edge advertising strategies and digital marketing solutions that drive success. We understand the challenges Amazon brands face, and we’re here to navigate them together. At Sales Bite, you’ll be part of a collaborative environment where your growth is as important as the results we deliver for our clients. Join us as our next Amazon Advertising (PPC) Manager, and let’s take on the Amazon marketplace, one campaign at a time.

Success for an Amazon PPC Manager at Sales Bite LLC is defined by their ability to optimize ad spending strategically, ensuring that at least 85% of TACoS/ACoS goals are met or exceeded across all accounts. They will ensure that at least 65% of total ad spend is directed towards better-converting ASINs, targets, placements, and campaign types, demonstrating a deep understanding of Amazon’s advertising ecosystem.

Timely and effective optimizations will be a hallmark of their role. They must implement at least one major optimization per account per week and achieve a 90% success rate in hitting these targets. Their commitment to deadlines will be evident, with 90% of tasks completed on time, reflecting their proficiency in managing multiple campaigns efficiently.

A key indicator of their success will be maintaining ad spend waste below 5%, which shows their expertise in maximizing ROI and minimizing unnecessary costs. This role is pivotal in driving the profitability and growth of our client’s brands on Amazon through precision-targeted advertising and strategic budget management.

ONE THING: Execute data-driven PPC strategies that consistently achieve or exceed TACoS/ACoS goals, maximize ad efficiency, and drive substantial growth for our clients' Amazon businesses while ensuring ad spend waste remains below 5%.

KPI:

Maintain target Account/Product level — TACoS/ACoS goals — 85% on target minimum.
Ensure a minimum of 65% of total Ad spend is allocated to better converting ASINs, targets, placements, campaign types, etc.
At least one «major» optimization per account/week — 90% on target minimum.
Complete given tasks within given deadlines — 90% on target minimum.
Maintain less than 5? spend waste.

1. Primary Objectives 20% BIG ROCKS:

Optimize Advertising Campaigns for Performance: Strategically enhance and optimize PPC campaigns to ensure they meet or exceed the target Account/Product level TACoS/ACoS goals, with a minimum of 85% on target. This includes continuous refinement of targeting, bidding, and budget allocation to drive a minimum 10% improvement in overall campaign performance.
Maximize ROI through Strategic Ad Spend Allocation: Ensure that at least 65% of total ad spend is directed towards the highest-converting ASINs, keywords, and placements, thus maximizing ROI and minimizing wasted spend to under 5%.
Drive Category Growth: Align PPC strategies with broader category goals, collaborating closely with the product manager to drive organic sales growth and improve category performance.
Weekly KPI Reporting: Consistently track and report on all key performance indicators, providing clear insights into campaign performance and areas for improvement weekly.
Implement Automation and Efficiency Improvements: Research and implement advanced PPC automation tools and strategies to enhance campaign efficiency and scalability, staying ahead of industry trends.

2. Regular Work Activities 80%:

Campaign Management and Optimization: Manage daily PPC operations, including keyword research, bid adjustments, and budget allocation. Ensure campaigns are continuously optimized for maximum performance, targeting the most relevant and high-performing keywords.
Keyword Research and Negative Targeting: Conduct in-depth keyword research regularly to identify high-converting keywords and implement negative keywords to eliminate waste and improve ad relevance.
Performance Analysis and Reporting: Analyze campaign performance data, including TACoS, ACoS, CTR, and CVR, to identify trends and opportunities. Use these insights to refine strategies and drive continuous improvement.
Sponsored Brands and Sponsored Videos Optimization: Collaborate with the creative team to ensure that ad copy and visuals for Sponsored Brands and Sponsored Videos are aligned with campaign objectives and brand identity. Regularly test new creative elements and video formats to assess their impact on CTR and conversion rates, optimizing for the best performance.
Budget Management: Proactively manage PPC budgets across all campaigns, ensuring that spending is allocated efficiently and that campaigns remain within budget limits.
Competitor Analysis: Monitor competitor activity within the Amazon marketplace, identifying potential threats and opportunities to refine strategies and maintain a competitive edge.
Stay Updated with Industry Trends: Continuously educate yourself on the latest trends, tools, and changes in Amazon’s advertising platform, ensuring strategies remain cutting-edge and compliant with platform policies.
Automation Implementation: Research and integrate tools that improve efficiency and scalability to identify opportunities to streamline campaign management.
Weekly Reporting and Strategy Adjustment: Provide detailed weekly reports on campaign performance, KPIs, and any necessary adjustments to strategy. Collaborate with the category team to ensure alignment with broader business goals.
Client Communication and Collaboration: Maintain regular communication with clients, providing updates on campaign performance, insights, and recommendations for improvement.

3 Key Skills

Advanced Analytical Expertise: Demonstrates a strong ability to interpret and leverage data to optimize Amazon PPC campaigns, focusing on improving KPIs such as TACoS, ACoS, CTR, and conversion rates.
Strategic Advertising Insight: Proactively identifies and implements effective PPC strategies to maximize ad spend efficiency, including keyword research, campaign structuring, and placement optimization.
Automation Proficiency: Experience with automation tools and scripts to increase campaign management efficiency and accuracy.
Adaptability and Flexibility: Quickly adjust strategies in response to Amazon’s platform changes, market trends, and competitive landscape.
Collaboration and Communication: Effectively collaborates with product managers, creative teams, and leadership to ensure alignment of PPC strategies with overall business objectives.
Results-Oriented Mindset: Focused on delivering measurable improvements in advertising performance, with a strong understanding of how PPC strategies drive business growth.
Technical Acumen: Proficiency in tools like Excel, Python, SQL, and PowerBI for data analysis and campaign optimization, along with knowledge of Amazon-specific tools like Data Dive.
Detail-Oriented Approach: Ensures all campaigns are meticulously set up and monitored, with a keen eye on budget management and ad spending.
Continuous Learning: Stays updated with the latest trends and innovations in digital marketing and Amazon’s advertising platform.
Detail-Oriented: Vigilant attention to detail, ensuring that all designs meet quality standards and Amazon’s specific requirements.

4 Role Requirements

3+ years of experience, specifically in Amazon PPC management, with a proven track record of improving campaign performance, reducing ad spend waste, and driving sales growth.
Deep understanding of Amazon’s advertising platform, including Sponsored Products, Brands, and Display ads.
Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, Python, SQL, or similar, with the ability to manipulate and analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights.
Experience with automation tools for PPC campaign management, such as bulk operations in Amazon Ads, third-party tools like Data Dive, Adlabs or H10
Advanced knowledge of keyword research tools and strategies.
A Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Data Science, or a related field is preferred, though relevant experience can substitute formal education.
Excellent communication skills, capable of clearly conveying complex data-driven insights and strategic recommendations to stakeholders at all levels.
Collaborative mindset with experience working closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, creative teams, and leadership, to align PPC efforts with broader business objectives.
Proven ability to develop and execute PPC strategies that align with business goals, demonstrating a solid understanding of market dynamics, customer behavior, and competitive landscape.
Data-driven decision-making skills, with the ability to balance creative and analytical approaches to PPC management.
Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in Amazon advertising, including changes in the platform, new ad types, and evolving customer behaviors.
Experience in e-commerce, particularly in Amazon’s marketplace, with a clear understanding of how PPC fits into the broader sales and marketing strategy.
Ability to adapt quickly to changing circumstances, including shifts in Amazon’s advertising algorithms, competitive pressures, and market opportunities.
Flexibility in working hours to support global collaboration as needed, particularly in a remote work environment.
High level of personal accountability for campaign performance, focusing on continuous improvement and achieving measurable results.
Detail-oriented and organized, focusing on ensuring campaigns are set up correctly, monitored regularly, and optimized for performance.


To apply, complete the form at https://forms.gle/TQMyaSQHZcmqu3R7A and send your resume with «Onlinejobs PPC Material» as the subject.

title: eCommerce Product Analyst
description:
PLEASE NOTE: WORK HOURS WILL BE IN PACIFIC STANDARD TIME

We are seeking an E-commerce Product Analyst with a focus on sourcing and analyzing products, particularly within the toy industry. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of researching and identifying trending products, as well as conducting post-holiday analysis to strategize for future seasons. Familiarity with the Chinese market is essential for this role, as is a deep understanding of market trends.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Actively source a variety of products (particular Toys) that ExKaliber can sell profitably on Amazon, Walmart and other eCommerce marketplaces.
- Research and analyze online selling activity to determine consumer interests, buying trends and to keep abreast of competitor merchandise.
- Drive new product development, overseeing every stage from concept, development, sourcing, and retail strategies.
- Spot new market opportunities by keeping a finger on the pulse of industry trends and retail channels by analyzing market research and being in the know for industry events.
- Collect and assess market competition by utilizing tools and marketing data to compare the health and evolution of our product catalogs versus competitors.
- Keep an eye on the product life cycles to determine strategic courses to improve existing products.
- Help guide the direction of future product lines by evaluating new product ideas using an in-house process to assess sales opportunity, profitability, and longevity.
- Determine new product pricing through thorough analysis of market research data, production and sales costs, projected volumes, and special or custom order costs.
- Assess current product lines and optimize, evolve, and/or pivot strategies by analyzing performance metrics and preparing reports that include addressing customer feedback, quality, improvements, and financial ROI.
- Forecast profitability for new products to optimize inventory turnover and product availability.

REQUIREMENTS:
- MUST HAVE: 3-4 years of professional work experience sourcing toys for Amazon marketplace in a high-growth, fast-paced environment.
- MUST HAVE: Familiarity with using basic Amazon tools such as Keepa, Jungle Scout, Helium 10,
- Strong familiarity with Amazon’s platform and its various features, including the ability to navigate and search for products on the site.
- MUST HAVE: Understanding of how to track product prices, sales ranks, and other data points over time.
- Knowledge of how to use Amazon tools and filters to analyze data and make informed sourcing and purchasing decisions.
- Ability to interpret and analyze data to make informed decisions about which products to purchase and when.
- Experience using Amazon tools to research and evaluate potential products for purchase.
- Proven to have sourced successful profit generating products in the toy category on Amazon
- Advanced Excel expertise, including pivot tables and bulk sheet creation/maintenance.
- Expertise in task management tools and product management platforms.
- Outstanding collaborative and communicative skills within a matrixed organization.
- A positive attitude, an inquisitive nature, and goal-oriented mindset.
- Exceptional focus and meticulous attention to detail.
- Ability to thrive in ambiguity with a solutions-oriented approach.

title: Personal VA with Instagram Automation Experience (Jarvee,MP,Sharingtools)
description:
We are an agency that specializes in growing Instagram and TikTok accounts for clients through automated, organic actions such as Story Likes, Post Likes, Follow, and Unfollow. Our unique system is built to enhance our clients’ online presence efficiently, similar to tools like Jarvee, MassPlanner, or SharingTools.

Important Note:
This is NOT a social media manager role. If you’re looking for traditional social media management tasks, this isn’t the right fit. What we do is deeply rooted in automation and data-driven strategies. If the names Jarvee, MassPlanner, or SharingTools don’t mean anything to you, this probably isn’t the role for you.

Your Primary Responsibility:

Daily Optimization & Analysis of Client Accounts:

Core Focus: Your main task is to monitor, analyze, and optimize our clients’ Instagram accounts on a daily basis. This involves diving into data, making adjustments to improve performance, and ensuring that our automation strategies are working effectively.
Target Optimization: You will fine-tune target settings, improve follow-back ratios, and identify new audiences to enhance client growth.
Software Supervision: Oversee the proper functioning of our automation tools, swiftly addressing any issues to ensure seamless operations.
Secondary Responsibilities:

Data & Reporting:

Use Excel to create comprehensive reports that track client account performance.
Analyze data regularly to guide your optimization efforts and deliver the best results for our clients.
Outreach & Proposals:

Write and submit proposals on Upwork to help grow our client base.
What We’re Looking For:

Automation Experience: Familiarity with automation tools like Jarvee, MassPlanner, or SharingTools is highly beneficial. If these tools are new to you, this role might not be the best fit.
Data-Driven Decision Making: Strong analytical skills and the ability to make decisions based on daily data analysis.
Excel Proficiency: You must be skilled in Excel for reporting and data management.
Reliability: Consistent, daily participation is crucial to the success of our clients’ accounts.
Compensation:

Starting rate: $4.50 USD per hour (non-negotiable for the start).
Hours:

1-2 hours per day.

title: Experienced and Organised Office/Practice Operations Coordinator (Xero Expertise)
description:
Job Description

Company: Margin Advisory Limited
Job Title: Practice Operations Coordinator
Location: Remote, based in Auckland, New Zealand
Reports to: Managing Director
Direct Reports: Nil
Start Date: Immediate

About Margin Advisory
Margin Advisory’s mission is to transform the accounting and business advisory industry with high-quality, customer-centric services supported by advanced technology. We provide actionable insights that drive operational efficiency and financial stability. Our offerings include financial compliance, strategic financial planning, business intelligence, process and systems optimisation, and advisory services. Committed to Integrity, Accountability, Dependability, Problem-Solving, and Professionalism, we partner with our clients to achieve tangible success.

Job Summary
Margin Advisory is seeking a proactive, tech-savvy Client Services Coordinator with strong multitasking skills to handle client services, practice management, and administrative tasks. The role involves overseeing client onboarding, relationship management, and operational efficiency for Margin Advisory, while also managing debt collection, client onboarding, and administrative duties for Priority Haulage, an associated entity that Margin Advisory provides management services to, ensuring effective service delivery for both organisations.

Role Overview
This part-time role for Margin Advisory initially offers flexible hours, focusing on supporting the business relaunch, infrastructure, and process development, requiring adaptability. As the business grows, the role will expand to encompass all noted job responsibilities, though the timeline for this transition remains flexible due to the company's early-stage status. 

Daily operations run from 4:00 AM PHT / 8:00 AM NZT to 1:00 PM PHT / 5:00 PM NZT.

The Priority Haulage component of this role will start at 3-5 hours per week, focusing on debt collection and client onboarding and management. As the business grows, hourly demands may increase, but capacity planning will ensure both roles are managed effectively.

Daily operations run from 3:00 AM PHT / 7:00 AM NZT to 1:00 PM PHT / 5:00 PM NZT.

Initially, early attendance is flexible as long as deadlines are met, but time requirements may evolve as the role progresses. You will need to be available during the following hours for Debt Collection, Client Onboarding and PDF Annual Report binding tasks:

• Morning: 5:30 AM - 7:30 AM PHT / 9:30 AM - 11:30 AM NZT
• Afternoon: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM PHT / 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM NZT

Job Responsibilities

Virtual Client Services Coordinator 
• Serve as Client Services Coordinator for Priority Haulage Limited on behalf of Margin Advisory, handling debt collection, client onboarding, and management responsibilities.

Practice Management 
• Create client Annual Reports in Adobe Acrobat by consolidating financial accounts and supporting documentation.
• Manage the filing of signed documents, including tax returns, closing completed jobs, and handling related administrative tasks.
• Assist with other practice and tax administration tasks.
• Organise and maintain files and data in Microsoft OneDrive and Xero XPM, ensuring easy access, accuracy, and completeness.
• Oversee debt collection processes to ensure timely payment collection.

Client Onboarding and Management 
• Manage the lead generation board in Notion, ensuring leads are effectively updated and tracked to optimise client acquisition efforts.
• Oversee the client onboarding process, ensuring a smooth transition into company systems, including the preparation and delivery of client engagement letters and proposals.
• Design, implement, and manage client feedback systems, such as surveys, to gauge satisfaction and inform service improvements.
• Support the management of client relationships by handling client data to enhance engagement and support development.

Marketing 
• Support marketing initiatives through social media, the website, and other appropriate channels, utilising data-driven decision making to boost client engagement.
• Conduct market research to derive insights that inform service improvements and continuous improvement.

Ad hoc 
• Collaborate across teams to enhance workflow automation and process optimisation.
• Facilitate clear and effective communication among team members.
• Provide support to the Managing Director in various capacities, such as sales development, process optimisation, and any other tasks that may arise.

Knowledge and Experience
• Minimum 5 years of experience in managing client service operations, with a strong focus on efficiency, compliance, and process optimisation.
• Proven remote work experience, demonstrating strong self-discipline, time management skills, and the ability to perform efficiently without supervision.
• Familiarity with data security protocols and compliance requirements for handling sensitive information.
• Demonstrated ability in overseeing client onboarding processes, ensuring smooth integration of new clients into company systems, and effectively managing lead generation boards to enhance client acquisition.
• Familiarity with maintaining oversight of debt collection processes, ensuring timely payments and compliance with financial protocols.
• Strong ability to collaborate within a team environment to align strategies and enhance business workflows.
• Excellent command of English, with superior written and verbal communication skills, essential for clear and effective interactions and documentation.
• Familiarity with professional services operations is essential, while knowledge of the transport industry, including logistics, fleet management, or supply chain management, is advantageous.
• High level of technical proficiency with strong skills in Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Outlook, and Xero; familiarity with other relevant business software is advantageous, including:
o Notion
o ChatGPT
o WhatsApp
o Adobe Acrobat
o Fillout (or similar form creation software)

Qualifications
• A degree or diploma in finance, business administration, or a related field is preferred.
• Professional certifications in financial management or client relationship management are advantageous.
• Certification in Xero or other relevant accounting software is advantageous.

Personal Attributes
• Highly organised, detail-oriented, and capable of managing multiple responsibilities effectively.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills, fostering collaboration across teams.
• Proactive and self-motivated, with a commitment to meeting deadlines and ensuring compliance.
• Innovative problem-solver, focused on streamlining workflows, improving processes, and adopting new technologies.
• Creative and forward-thinking, confident in navigating challenges and driving continuous improvement independently.
• Customer service-oriented, with a commitment to quality, integrity, and enhancing client relationships.
• Adaptable and open to change, consistently seeking opportunities to improve business practices.

Required Equipment and Setup
• Dedicated Workspace: A quiet, dedicated home office space free from distractions and noise, suitable for video calls and focused work.
• Desktop PC + Monitor (2 monitors preferred) or Laptop + Monitor
• Headset: Noise-cancelling, ensuring clear communication during virtual meetings and client calls.
• Webcam: High-quality external or integrated for video calls.
• Power Backup: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) or generator, ensuring a minimum of 3 hours of operational uptime during power outages to maintain workflow continuity and prevent data loss.
• Internet Backup: A secondary internet connection (such as mobile data or an alternative wireless connection) to ensure uninterrupted work during connectivity issues.

Minimum Performance Requirements:
• Processor: Intel Core i5 (or better)
• RAM: Minimum 8GB (16GB preferred) for smooth performance with multiple applications.
• Operating System: Windows 10/11, compatible with all required business software.
• Internet: Stable high-speed connection (minimum 10 Mbps download/upload)

title: Outbound Sales Development Representative

title: Proofreader / Administrative assistant
description:
Your primary task will be proofreading to ensure that the automation returns text that makes sense. We are taking textbooks and rewriting them so that the student cannot find the answer by way of a simple search of the original text. This new, modified text will be used in the mobile app with short quizzes after each section of reading.
There will also be other, miscellaneous tasks. Examples might be converting a document containing personal information into a fill-in-the-blank document for someone to fill in by hand, with a later version of the document which could be filled from a database of names, birth dates, addresses, and so on. There will also be more mundane tasks like setting up accounts or looking for addresses of prospective buyers, suppliers of equipment, and similar.
Position can be part-time or full-time, depending on the quality of the applicant.
Some basic image editing skills are required, such as removing text from a photograph or assembling crude mockups from which a graphic designer could work. Position may involve posting videos to YouTube, Rumble, etc.
If you experience in prompting with artificial intelligence platforms, please comment.
I am a big fan of open source software, but any documents that are produced must be accessible to those platforms. This means that if you use Microsoft Word or Adobe Photoshop, those files must be accessible to their open source equivalents and you must know the difference.
Basic Spanish language skills are definite plus. No, I do not expect anyone to be making phone calls on my behalf in Spanish, but being able to understand a voice message from one of my colleagues would be a definite advantage. This skill is entirely optional and will not qualify or disqualify any applicant.
I have a few disabiities and so may ask you to do things that I would otherwise do, but my eyes cannot take looking at the screen any longer. Despite this, I am helping my brother with his company, which is also a startup.
Work hours are flexible, but they should be in a block and at least four days a week.
As described, the available position is for and proofreader and administrative assistant. It is important that the administrative assistant have some background in law, such as a paralegal or the holder of a law degree. Attention to detail is paramount, so please put the word "LAWFARE" as the first line, no matter how ugly it looks.
A final qualifier will be to enumerate (count) how many errers (both grammar and spelling) are in this description, and include that number in your response. Standardized responses obviously written to be sent to all positions are an automatic disqualifier. I've told you a little about myself and so expect the same from any prospective applicant.

title: Client Success Rep (CSR)
description:
Job Description: Client Success Representative - Credit Card Processing
Position Overview:
As a Client Success Representative in our credit card processing division, you will be a key point of contact for our clients & affiliates ensuring their success and satisfaction with our services. Your primary responsibilities will include managing the submission of merchant statements, following up with affiliates, and confirming that all deals are received and processed correctly. You will play a crucial role in maintaining client relationships, ensuring smooth operations, and contributing to the overall success of our team.
Key Responsibilities:
Merchant Statement Management:
Assist clients in submitting their merchant statements accurately and in a timely manner.
Clients & affiliates will email you their statements and you have to submit them to the upload portal.
Review and verify the accuracy of submitted statements, ensuring all required documentation is complete.
Coordinate with internal teams to ensure the correct processing of merchant statements.
Affiliate Follow-Up:
Regularly follow up with affiliates to confirm that deals have been received and processed.
Track and monitor the status of each deal, providing updates to clients and internal stakeholders.
Resolve any issues or discrepancies that may arise during the deal submission and processing stages.
Client Relationship Management:
Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing their inquiries, concerns, and requests.
Proactively communicate with clients to ensure their needs are being met and to provide updates on their accounts.
Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with clients, understanding their business needs and objectives.
Collaboration & Coordination:
Work closely with sales, operations, and finance teams to ensure seamless client onboarding and ongoing service delivery.
Participate in team meetings and provide feedback on ways to improve client satisfaction and operational efficiency.
Reporting & Documentation:
Maintain accurate records of client interactions, submitted merchant statements, and deal statuses.
Generate and present regular reports on client success metrics, including the status of submitted deals and client satisfaction levels.
Qualifications:
Proven experience in client success, account management, or customer service, preferably in the financial services or credit card processing industry.
Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities effectively.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with a focus on clear and professional client interactions.
Ability to work independently as well as part of a collaborative team environment.
Proficiency in using CRM systems and other relevant software for managing client accounts and documentation.
Knowledge of credit card processing industry practices and compliance requirements is a plus.
Key Competencies:
Customer-Focused: Strong dedication to client success and satisfaction.
Detail-Oriented: High attention to detail, ensuring accuracy in all tasks and communications.
Problem-Solver: Ability to identify issues and implement solutions effectively and efficiently.
Team Player: Willingness to collaborate with various teams to achieve common goals.
Adaptable: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, evolving industry.
Benefits:
Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
Opportunities for professional growth and development within the company.
Supportive and dynamic work environment.
After 60 day assessment discuss benefit packages/options for individual and family
About Us:
We are a leading provider of credit card processing services, committed to helping businesses streamline their payment processes and reduce costs. Our success is driven by our dedication to client satisfaction, innovative solutions, and a team of talented professionals who share our passion for excellence.

title: Virtual Assistant - Extensive Google Sheet Experience - Data Automation & Process Creation- Long Term Full Time Position
description:
WHO YOU ARE:
You are a Virtual Assistant with extensive experience in creating Google Sheets automations and processes for ecommerce, marketing or supplement companies. You have a deep understanding of Google Sheets and its advanced features. You are passionate about creating efficient automations and processes that streamline workflows. You thrive in a collaborative environment where you can continuously learn and grow. You are detail-oriented, adaptable, and committed to delivering high-quality work. You are interested in committing to a long term opportunity with huge growth potential.

WHAT YOU WILL DO:
As a key member of our Virtual Assistant team, you will work closely with our rapidly growing brand to understand our business needs and create custom Google Sheets to display data, create processes and automations. You will analyze complex data, identify patterns, and develop efficient solutions to optimize workflows. Your attention to detail will ensure data accuracy and consistency. You will communicate effectively with the team to provide updates and explain technical concepts in simple terms. We are looking for someone with huge goals, interested in constantly growing as an individual and helping take the company to the financial goals we have set.

THE COMPANY:
We are a growing e-commerce skincare brand focused on acne and anti-aging. Its mission is to help women feel more confident about their skin thanks to innovative at-home products inspired by professional treatments. Started in Italy from the founder's own struggle with acne, the brand now operates mostly in the US. We've improved the skin of over 100,000 women, worked with 600 influencers, and partnered with a celebrity Doctor to be the face of our marketing campaigns. Our goal is to reach 1 million customers in the next 2 years. We foster a culture of continuous learning from the top experts in our field, open communication, and data-driven decision-making. Our fast-paced environment offers endless opportunities for professional growth and the chance to make a real difference in people's lives through skincare.

PAY:
We offer a competitive salary range of $800 - $1400 per month, depending on your background and the value that you are going to provide to the company from day one. The higher the value you bring, the higher the salary. The more key parts of the business processes you are going to be in charge of, the higher the salary. We have no issues paying you VERY WELL if the value brought is very high. We believe in fostering a supportive work environment where you can grow and succeed.

GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES:
We are committed to your professional development and will provide access to learning materials and courses to enhance your skills. We sponsor further development opportunities to help you stay up-to-date with the latest Google Sheets features and industry trends.

WORKING HOURS:
This is a full-time position. We expect you to be available during regular business hours in GMT +4 and be willing to put in the time and effort required to create world-class automations and processes.

TO APPLY:
Fill out this form and send the following:
 
forms.gle/gJEF1W4aVwWzEK6h9

Applications will close soon. If you're an agency, please don't contact us.

Technical Qualifications:

-Must have a headset

Salary and Details:
This is a part-time work from home role for a U.S. company: 20 hours per week.

Please note, there may be an opportunity to go full time in the future depending on performance. Therefore, please apply only if you fully understand that this is currently a part-time role, but with a need to be flexible for the future in case it goes full time.

The pay is $4.50 an hour.

Guaranteed 1 year raise (minimum 10%-20%).

Sick days/holidays are currently unpaid.

You will be an independent contractor. You will get paid via Payoneer every 2 weeks.

The hours are Mon-Fri 9am-1pm EST (Eastern standard time). That is a 12 hour time difference from you-9pm-1am Philippine time would be the converted schedule for you.

***Important: if you have another job that conflicts with this schedule, please do not apply. Your screen will be tracked (Time Doctor software) so if it is discovered that you are working 2 jobs during the same schedule, you will end up wasting your time and ours.

Start date: sometime around August 26th, a set date will be provided after interviewing.

***DIRECTIONS ON HOW TO APPLY ARE ON THE BOTTOM OF THIS DESCRIPTION


HOW TO APPLY****:
If interested, email your resume to asliresumes@gmail.com with the subject line "IJ's Virtual Assistant".

**Please attach your resume as a PDF format attachment.

**Dropbox links or google drive links for resumes will NOT be reviewed.

Please follow these instructions and do not apply in any other method, as it will lead to your application being rejected.

***We are looking to fill this role ASAP. Must be able to start immediately.

Keep a very close eye on your emails. If selected, interviews will take place within the next 24-72 hours. You will be notified by email if you advance to the interview phase. We move fast with interviews, so if you apply and don’t check your emails frequently, you may miss your opportunity for an interview.

We look forward to hearing from you. Thanks!

title: WordPress/Elementor Designer and website manager
description:
There are two areas I need expertise in. I have to build 8 new websites for products I have rights to distribute and sell. My servers run on Virtualmin and I have a part-time admin to help with server management. This requires starting from zero to fully functioning marketing websites. Some sites are very simple with one item to market (an airplane, for example) and the focus would be soliciting clients to request data and purchase. Other sites will be a product line of items for specific vendors. Some are inventories, some are dropped from the factory.

The new websites you will design and quickly implement will focus on aircraft and aviation products that I am involved with and parts connected with aircraft and aviation. I need a skilled WP/Elementor designer to help design, build, populate and update as the sites grow. The sites need to follow the vendor's guidelines for style, imagery, font and other guidelines. I will provide the marketing components while you design the site and operational details. We will need to collaborate up front and you will be expected to guide the project and I will help with any problems or decisions you have to make.

Clients need to be able to order, request quotes and pay. But many of these items are high value so credit cards are not the solution. Most clients use wires, ACH, checks and other cash-like transfers to avoid fees. Many items are high-priced, low volume so tracking leads and advertising are critical to reach the customers. 

You should be able to improve my ability to deliver client quotes, obtain customer feedback, submit support inquiries and assist connecting with a CRM so we can track our leads and customers. Many of the products can be shared across multiple websites so catalog product management experience would be helpful but not required. A major part of the sales pitch is imagery and graphics designed to sell specific aircraft and aircraft-related products. I also have imagery from a major vendor and rights to sell products that need a professional dealer website, fast response to monthly product and price changes and ability for customers to interact, ask questions, get quotes, design and order different combinations of products, track inventory and more. I am doing that manually at this time so you have a chance to improve both our lives.

I am based in Canada and most clients will be in North America and to a lesser extent Australia and Europe. Shipping and receiving is a major piece of my business that is growing. Some items are drop shipped. I have not explored any sales on ebay, Amazon and the products do not seem suited to social media marketing but I do advertise there to obtain mostly to funnel members to my websites.

A secondary project is moving my 10-year community phpbb site to latest version (3.3). PHP/Mysql would be beneficial but not essential. I will need assistance to migrate special mods to the new "extension" methods. Skills in this area would be helpful but not required for the primary sites above.

This position has some immediate requirements for the right person and long-term employment potential. I run a very small team and I am very involved in the details but need to expand these new product lines and continue to upgrade the site that I currently maintain. A probationary period would be expected so we can see if we can work long-term together as a team. Salary is negotiable and tied to skills you have.
