title: Hubspot Integration Specialist
description:
Please read the job posting carefully.

We are looking for a Hubspot Integration Specialist who will join our team. As the HubSpot Integration Specialist, your primary role will be to create and manage HubSpot sub-accounts for the clients. This includes optimizing the internal HubSpot account and supporting client accounts by building workflows, automation, and reports. Your expertise will directly impact our client's operational efficiency, data accuracy, and overall satisfaction with the company's services.

Responsibilities:

1) CRM Management:
- Set up new HubSpot sub-accounts for clients, including full migration of data from previous CRMs.
- Develop and configure client-specific pipelines and automation frameworks within their HubSpot sub-accounts.
- Manage user setup, including the integration of emails, phone systems, and calendars within each client sub-account.
- Create and manage meeting links to facilitate seamless scheduling and communication for clients.

2) Reporting Hub:
- Design, create, and update comprehensive dashboards and reports for client sub-accounts to support business analytics.
- Perform regular data cleaning to maintain up-to-date and accurate records across pipelines and contacts in client accounts.
- Set up and manage sales forecasts, goals, and analytics within each client’s HubSpot sub-account to track performance metrics.

3) Marketing Hub:
- Utilize Marketing Hub Plus to drive marketing initiatives for clients, including campaign setup and tracking within their sub-accounts.
- Set up email workflows using prewritten content triggered by form fills and other user actions in client accounts.
- Create and manage website forms within client sub-accounts to capture and convert leads effectively.

4) Content Hub:
- Use HubSpot’s Content Hub to design and manage landing pages, forms, and customer portals for clients within their sub-accounts.
- Ensure content is optimized for user engagement and lead conversion specific to each client's needs.

5) Automation:
- Set up and manage feedback surveys within client sub-accounts to collect customer insights and satisfaction data.
- Build and deploy workflows based on established templates and frameworks to streamline operations within client sub-accounts.
- Create sequences that automate repetitive tasks, improving overall efficiency for each client's operations.

6) Help Desk Setup:
- Establish a help desk from scratch within client sub-accounts, including the configuration of inboxes and workflows for efficient customer support.
- Ensure the help desk is fully integrated with other systems and workflows for seamless operation in client sub-accounts.

7) Integrations:
- Integrate HubSpot with various third-party apps like Aircall and Xero within client sub-accounts to enhance functionality.
- Manage and maintain these integrations to ensure they operate smoothly and effectively for clients.

8) Strategic Optimization:
- Conduct thorough evaluations of client HubSpot sub-accounts to recommend improvements and optimize performance.
- Proactively interrogate processes within client accounts to identify opportunities for increasing productivity through platform utilization.

Desirable Qualifications and Skills Required:

1) Technical Proficiency:
- Extensive experience with HubSpot, including CRM setup, marketing automation, and content management within client sub-accounts.
- Strong understanding of integrations with platforms like Xero and Aircall, ensuring seamless data flow and system synergy for clients.
2) Analytical Skills:
- Ability to create, interpret, and update dashboards and reports within client sub-accounts to provide actionable insights.
- Skilled in data cleaning and management to maintain accurate and useful records in client pipelines and contacts.
3) Marketing Expertise:
- Proficient in utilizing HubSpot’s Marketing Hub Plus for campaign management and lead nurturing within client sub-accounts.
- Experienced in setting up email workflows and creating forms for effective lead capture in client accounts.
4) Automation and Workflow Management:
- Strong background in setting up complex workflows and automations to streamline business processes within client sub-accounts.
- Capable of building sequences that eliminate repetitive tasks and improve efficiency for clients.
5) Problem-Solving and Initiative:
- Demonstrated ability to identify and solve issues within HubSpot sub-accounts and related integrations for clients.
- Proactive in making recommendations and seeking out opportunities for platform enhancements in client accounts.
6) Communication and Collaboration:
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, for effective collaboration with TFM Digital team members and clients.
- Able to work closely with different departments, understanding client needs and translating them into HubSpot solutions.
7) Project Management:
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously within client sub-accounts, ensuring timely completion and adherence to quality standards.
- Experience in setting up and maintaining help desks, managing workflows, and ensuring smooth operations within client accounts.

Software to be used:
- HubSpot
- Xero
- Google Suite

CODEWORD: ILOVEOPUSX

To apply: please fill in the form: ats.opusx.com.au/

title: Senior Operation Analyst
description:
We are looking for an Operations Analyst or Senior Analyst to join the Elix team. This role will be dedicated to supporting Elix’s operations teams and assisting with data analysis, project management, inventory forecasting and day-to-day operations. This role’s responsibilities will include analyzing business performance, inventory forecasting, vendor management and supporting daily operations of the business.

If you are ambitious, highly motivated and detail-oriented with a desire for growth in your career, then we encourage you to apply for this role and join our dynamic team! Elix offers ample opportunities for personal and professional growth!

About Elix: We run an e-commerce business in the herbal healing space, currently focused on Womens’ menstrual wellness, rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine (a bonus if you’re familiar). We are US-based 100% Direct to Consumer (DTC) and largely a subscription-based business. We are proudly female-founded and a majority woman-led team.

Job Summary: The Operations Analyst / Sr Analyst will play a crucial role in optimizing Elix’s operational processes, managing inventory and purchase orders, forecasting demand, and maintaining effective communication with vendors. The ideal candidate will have strong project management skills, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to work collaboratively across departments to ensure operational efficiency.

The three main objectives of the Operations Analyst role are:
Increase team efficiency and effectiveness by project management of new and ongoing projects while maintaining effective communications that ensure accountability across internal teams and external vendor partnerships
Drive business results by analyzing and providing insightful data to effectively plan inventory and supply needs and submit purchase orders in alignment with business needs
Provide ongoing support on tech needs and minimize website errors by effectively QA new changes

Key Responsibilities:

Inventory and Purchase Order Management:
Inventory forecasting and cash forecasting needs based on sales data and seasonal trends. Monitoring inventory levels and adjusting orders to meet demand fluctuations.
Oversee the inventory management process, including tracking, ordering, and replenishing stock.
Support in conducting COGS updates and inventory payments.
Ensure accurate and timely processing of purchase orders.
Conduct regular audits to ensure inventory accuracy.
Coordinate invoice payments and timing with receipt of goods and quality assurance.

Forecasting:
Analyze historical data and market trends to develop accurate demand forecasts.
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and business metrics.
Adjust forecasts based on changing market conditions and business needs.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity by performing regular audits and validations.
Provide insights and recommendations for inventory and purchasing strategies.

Ad Hoc Reporting and Data Analysis:
Pull and analyze ad hoc reports as requested by management and other departments.
Collect and analyze data from various sources, including sales, website traffic, customer feedback, and market trends
Conduct in-depth analyses of customer retention data to uncover key insights

Project Management:
Assisting in managing day to day operations needs such as project management, purchase order submissions, managing various in flux projects on a as needed basis
Edit and develop existing SOPs based on best practices, changing conditions, etc. Serving as the internal reminder resource to make sure that all milestone deadlines are met and minimize roadblocks
Monitor project progress and provide regular updates to stakeholders.
Identify and mitigate potential risks to project success.
Have a keen eye for insights and improvements. Share these insights and possible improvements with Operations Manager and work together to implement new processes

Vendor Communications and Follow-Up:
Communicate effectively to ensure timely delivery of goods and services.
Conduct regular follow-ups to ensure vendor compliance with contract terms and performance standards.

Monitoring Website Performance:
Regularly monitor website changes and updates to ensure consistency and accuracy.
Analyze website data to identify trends and areas for enhancement.
Ensure that all changes align with company policies and standards.

Who You Are
Ability to work 40 hours per week over 5 days, preferably EST hours
Exceptional English writing capabilities (understanding American terminology and expressions)
Prior experience of 3-4 years with operation data analysis preferably in the DTC space. Preferably at an American DTC e-commerce startup in the women’s CPG, wellness or healthcare industry and experience with a subscription-based company
Proven experience in operations analysis, project management, inventory management, vendor relations, and data analysis.
Highly familiar with eCommerce platforms, particularly Shopify and Recharge.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proficiency in using project management software and inventory control systems.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) & Google workspace
Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy, efficiency and organization
The ability to take on independent tasks and proactively report up regarding status, roadblocks and questions
A great attitude – it’s about how can we turn the situation around vs. what’s done is done
An eye for sharing - not only share insights but also make suggestions on process improvements and action plans
An interest in growing and developing professionally – we are looking to onboard and invest in individuals to grow with the Elix for the long term

A Bonus If You:
Project Management Professional (PMP) certification.
Experience with ERP systems.
Advanced knowledge of forecasting techniques and tools.
Proficiency in data analysis tools such as SQL, Tableau, or similar.
Deeply proficient in Excel and analyzing large sets of data

What We Offer:
Competitive salary, depending on experience the range is between $8-15/hour
Ample opportunities for professional growth and development.
A collaborative and inclusive work environment.
The chance to make a significant impact on our company’s success.

Next Steps:
Please fill out this form https://elix.typeform.com/to/qvcBWGhY If it seems like a good fit we will reach out to schedule an interview in the next two weeks. We would love for someone to start by September 20024
.

title: Virtual Assistant - Customer Service & Online Service Fulfillment
description:
Summary:
We are a dynamic and innovative company seeking a highly organized and customer-centric Virtual Assistant to join our team. This role will primarily focus on providing exceptional customer service and support, as well as managing remote service fulfillment processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in customer service, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work independently.



Job Description


Key Responsibilities

Customer Service & Support:
• Provide outstanding customer service via email, chat, and phone, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly and effectively.
• Assist customers with product and service information, troubleshooting, and problem resolution.
• Maintain a high level of professionalism and empathy in all interactions, ensuring customer satisfaction and loyalty.
• Track and manage customer support tickets, ensuring timely and accurate responses.

Online Service Fulfillment:
• Coordinate and fulfill online service requests from clients, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality service.
• Work closely with other team members to ensure all client needs are met and services are delivered as promised.
• Monitor and manage service fulfillment processes, identifying and addressing any issues. 
• Communicate with customers regarding order status and any potential delays.
• Note: To show your attention to detail, put "cookies" in the 1st line of your message responding to this job post

Administrative Support:

• Prepare reports, summaries, and documentation as needed.
• Assist in creating and maintaining customer support resources, such as FAQs and knowledge base articles.

Requirements:

• Proven Experience: Demonstrable experience in a customer service role or a related field, preferably in a virtual or remote setting.

• Technical Skills: Proficiency in customer service software and support tools (e.g., Zendesk, Freshdesk), CRM systems, email, chat, or other communication tools (e.g., Slack, Zoom).

• Collaborative and supportive team environment.

title: Experienced Sales Development Representative / Appointment Setter (4+ years experience)
description:
Join Huzzle’s Talent Pool as an Appointment Setter! 

At Huzzle, we connect top-tier Appointment Setters & SDRs with leading companies across the UK, US, and Europe. Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.

WHO THIS IS FOR:
You're looking to:
• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.
• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.
• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.
• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.
• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.

And if you're:
• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.
• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.
• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.
• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.

What We Offer:
Competitive Pay: Starting at 37K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:
• Month 1: 37K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 3: 40.7K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 6: 44.4K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 9: 46.25K PHP/month + bonus 
Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.
Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.

Your Role as an Appointment Setter:
• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone, email, and social media platforms.
• Seamless Scheduling: Coordinate meetings and manage calendars for the sales teams, ensuring a smooth experience for both the team and potential clients.
• CRM Mastery: Keep meticulous records of all interactions, appointments, and follow-up activities in a CRM system.
• Database Management: Regularly update and review the contact database to maintain accuracy and relevancy.
• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.
• Optimize & Succeed: Monitor appointment success rates and work closely with the team to refine strategies for higher conversions.
• Industry Savvy: Stay updated on industry trends to engage clients effectively and address their needs.


Who We're Looking For:
• Experience: At least 4 years of experience with Appointment Setting, Cold Calling, and Outbound Messaging (LinkedIn, Cold Emails).
• Sales Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with relevant sales and outreach tools (CRMs, Prospecting Tools, Automation Tools, etc).
• Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients.
• Organizational Skills: Excellent time management and the ability to juggle multiple schedules.
• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.
• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.
• Detail-Oriented: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to maintaining high-quality data in systems.

Our Hiring Process:
• Step 1: Screening Interview
• Step 2: Take-home Task
• Step 3: Successful candidates are admitted to our talent pool, gaining access to exclusive opportunities.
• Step 4: We match you with a client for a final interview.


Application Requirements:
1. Make sure the Subject of the application is the name of the Capital City of Canada otherwise your application won't be reviewed.
2. Share your Resume/CV and any relevant experience / projects you've worked on.
3. Send anything else that can set you apart!

title: Experienced Accountant (US GAAP)
description:
We are seeking an experienced Accountant well-versed in US GAAP. This role requires a detail-oriented professional capable of handling comprehensive accounting tasks, from financial reporting and reconciliations to ensuring compliance with US GAAP standards. The ideal candidate will bring a strong analytical background, proven problem-solving skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic environment.

Work schedule

40 hours per week
Business hours within Eastern Time US (1pm-10pm EST)
Responsibilities

Manage client inbox and correspondence to ensure timely responses and follow-through with clients.
Manage client records and documents appropriately.
Maintain orderly accounting filing system and chart of accounts for each client
Document day-to-day financial transactions and complete posting process
Calculate variances from budget and report issues to client
Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable administration
Create monthly financial statements and management reports
Analyze client budgets
Evaluate clients’ internal control systems, software, and databases
Complete necessary tax forms
Ensure data (records) are accurate and reconcile reports to third party records
Support the client in activities relating to financial modeling, cash flow projections, data-driven financial strategies, and other financial services where your accountant lens could be useful
Qualifications

Accounting experience together with a passion working with numbers, documenting and learning more about the accounting and finance world.
2+ experience as an Accountant.
Knowledge of email communication software
General knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint)
Intermediate or Advanced level of Microsoft Excel skills desired.
Preferred knowledge of NetSuite, QuickBooks, Xero, or similar software
Preferred knowledge of A/P Workflow systems such as bill.com, tipalti, etc. though not required.
Strong attention to detail.
Strong data entry skills.
Can work with minimal supervision once training/guidance is given.
Enjoys critical thinking discussions, problem solving and learning more.
Contribute to an engaging, fun, learning work culture.
Other requirements
Computer/laptop

Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
RAM: 8GB or higher
Storage: 256GB SSD or higher Operating
System: Windows 10 or macOS
Display: 13-inch or larger screen size with a resolution of 1920x1080 or higher
Battery Life: Minimum of 8 hours
Internet

10 Mbps download and 5 Mbps upload
Accessories

Webcam
Noise-canceling headset with mic
Work set-up

Professional/presentable background
Quiet and distraction-free area
Demonstrates thorough knowledge and/or a proven record of success in tax compliance-related processes within a tax services delivery center, preferably within a global network of professional services firms, including the following:
Setting up the internal technology tools used to manage tax return processes;
Preparing and filing tax extensions;
Preparing data on relevant tax forms, reviewing and transmitting
Receiving and organizing client data;
Collecting, verifying, identifying outstanding information, and filing and notifying engagement team when complete;
Receiving, sorting, processing and inputting external K1 tax return forms;
Preparing E-filing tax returns, including clearing diagnostics, submission of returns, clearing rejections, filing confirmations, engagement team notification;
Understanding the process workflows related to work requests from initiation through completion;
Demonstrating teamwork dynamics by working as a team member
Understanding individual and team roles;
Contributing to a positive working environment by building solid relationships with team members;
Proactively seeking guidance, clarification, and feedback.
Consolidated filers with multinational and multistate operations (for Managers)
Applying technical skills in completing and reviewing the following IRS tax forms: 1065/K1’s, 1120, 1120-F, 1042, 1042S. 8865, 5471, 8858, 8621, 5472, Form 8886
Completing applicable state and partnership tax returns
Directly report to a US based Tax Team Lead.
Qualifications and Requirements

Must be a Certified Public Accountant (CPA).
At least 1 year of experience with US Tax, US GAAP and analysis work
A Plus but not required: 3+ years working as financial auditor for big five auditing firms (Ernst & Young, Deloitte & Touche, Arthur Andersen, KPMG, PwC)
Willing to work on night shift (US hours).
Willing to work remotely.
Can work with minimum supervision.
If interested, please share a link to your updated resume and a Loom video explaining why you are a good fit for this position.

To proceed to the next step, please ensure all requirements are complete. Incomplete submissions will not move forward in the process. Thank you for your understanding.

title: Underwriting Officer
description:

title: Payroll Compliance Specialist
description:
Job Title: Payroll Compliance Specialist
Job Type: Full Time
Work Hours: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM PST
Salary: $1,200 per month

TO APPLY, FILL OUT THIS FORM: https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-9431/W8OUA5LV4G3FVFC762

SUMMARY/OBJECTIVES:

Provide overall compliance support to projects requiring prevailing wages and other specific labor requirements.

DESCRIPTION OF DUTIES & SCOPE:

Monitor certified payroll for both internal self-perform projects and external subcontractors.
Be responsible for labor compliance company wide.
Review all public contracts (and any private ones that have special requirements) for labor requirements (certified payroll, skilled labor, local hire, diversity, and other such labor-related requirements), and then work with the project teams and appropriate departments to ensure appropriate plan in place to monitor and report, as well as to ensure proper submissions to agencies.

Perform periodic audits on projects to ensure compliance.
Develop risk assessment on the Compliance Programs.
Monitor and stay abreast of applicable laws and regulations that might affect the company’s policies and procedures.
Participate in third-party / Government reviews, audits, and inquiries, working in conjunction with the appropriate departments and the Department Manager.

Ensure compliance with organizational policies and procedures.
Create and maintain healthy relationships with stakeholders and contractors.
Participate in labor compliance training classes/seminars for stakeholders, program employees, and contractors.
Reviews and verifies payroll records, benefit statements, employer training contributions, and apprenticeship paperwork to determine compliance with applicable rules and regulations.
Issues requests for missing and revised documentation and corresponds with the applicable contractor & staff to ensure compliance.

Work with LCPTracker and other compliance monitoring software to review and approve certified payroll and payroll documents.

Compile information for any third-party requests for information.
Compose letters requesting payments and follow up with third-party requestors when sending information.
Perform other related duties as assigned.

QUALIFICATIONS:

Minimum of one year’s experience working with Public Works Labor Compliance Programs and/or Project Labor Agreements.
A Bachelor of Arts/Science Degree from a recognized college or university in business or a related degree is required.
Must have experience with prevailing wage enforcement, analysis, and auditing skills.
Demonstrated knowledge of employment practices in the construction industry and a strong working knowledge of state labor regulations
Experience implementing procedures and coordinating with other internal and external departments.
Ability to work independently, accurately, strategically, and resourcefully, yet intuitively know when and how to inform, verify, collaborate, and escalate.
Ability to work in a dynamic environment across the organization, providing compliance guidance to a variety of teams and senior management.

title: Customer Success Manager (SMB)
description:

The Customer Success Manager (SMB) will own a large group of SMB customers, and will help them get great results from our software. They will be the customer’s primary point of contact at Applause.

title: Maintenance Coordinator
description:
Job Title: Maintenance Coordinator
Job Type: Full Time
Work Hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM Pacific time
Salary: $960.00 per month

TO APPLY, FILL OUT THIS FORM: https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-20151/Y6YFN4190ELPMUY2C6

Summary:

We are seeking a highly organized, diligent, and responsive Maintenance Coordinator to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will excel in managing maintenance requests, coordinating with vendors, and ensuring timely and effective communication with tenants. This role requires excellent troubleshooting skills, an ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently, and a keen understanding of maintenance operations within the real estate sector.

Core Responsibilities:

Tenant Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for tenants for all maintenance requests through emails, calls, voicemails, and work order systems like AppFolio. Ensure clear, concise, and timely responses to all inquiries.

Troubleshooting: Conduct detailed troubleshooting with tenants to accurately assess maintenance needs and determine the scope of work required.

Vendor Coordination: Maintain a roster of reliable vendors and coordinate with them to ensure work orders are completed to satisfaction. This includes sending work order details (tenant contact, address, specific requests) and confirming completion of tasks.

Estimate Preparation: When necessary, compile detailed estimates from 2-3 vendors to provide options for maintenance work, ensuring cost-effectiveness and quality.

Urgent Response: Quickly respond to urgent and emergency maintenance issues, keeping tenants informed about the status and expected resolution timeline.

Negotiation and Justification: Possess a good understanding of market rates for various maintenance tasks and negotiate with vendors when appropriate. Be prepared to justify decisions regarding after-hours or weekend jobs.

Property and Vendor Knowledge: Organize and maintain knowledge of specific requirements for properties and match them with specialized vendors when required.

Requirements:

Experience: Proven experience in maintenance coordination, property management, or a related field.
Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to be both brief and detailed as the situation demands.
Problem-solving: Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to resolving issues.
Vendor Management: Experience in managing and negotiating with vendors, along with a solid understanding of maintenance work scope and costing.
Time Management: Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize urgent tasks.
Technology Proficiency: Familiarity with property management software (e.g., AppFolio) and standard office software for communication and documentation. Comfortable with video conferencing tools for daily communication.
Flexibility: Availability to respond to emergency situations outside of standard work hours as needed.

TO APPLY, FILL OUT THIS FORM: https://forms.clickup.com/9011062867/f/8chku2k-20151/Y6YFN4190ELPMUY2C6

title: Assistant Property Manager/Personal Assistant
description:

We are a property management company based in Detroit, MI, equipped with robust systems that support remote working, including leasing management, maintenance request handling, and tenant communication.

We are currently seeking an Assistant Property Manager/Personal Assistant to focus on leasing management and lead follow-up. The ideal candidate will be available to work from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST. When replying to this post, please include the word "space" in the subject line of your response.

What You’ll Do:
This role will be divided between personal tasks and property management-related responsibilities.

Property management tasks include:
• Manage leasing inquiries, applications, and renewals with efficiency and professionalism

• Maintain accurate records of tenant interactions, leases, and other relevant activities
• Handle maintenance requests and coordinate with relevant teams to resolve issues
• Utilize sales techniques to secure new leases and maintain high occupancy rates
• Collaborate with team members to achieve property management goals

Personal tasks may vary but could include:

• Familiarity with G Suite applications (Google Docs, Sheets, Gmail, etc.)
• Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and financial transactions
• Strong organizational and time management skills
• Effective communication skills, both written and verbal
• Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a remote team environment
• High level of integrity and professionalism in handling sensitive financial information

Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience in leasing management is a significant plus
• Familiarity with property management software is advantageous

Note: Property management experience is a plus but not required. We are seeking a motivated, full-time employee who can grow with the company.

Compensation and Benefits:
• USD 4 per hour
• 10 days vacation leave per year
• 10 days of sick leave per year
• Weekends off
• 13th-month pay (prorated in the 1st year based on time worked)
• Opportunities for professional development and growth within the company
• Collaborative and supportive team environment
• Continuous training and support

How to Apply:
Please attach a copy of your resume and include a short video in the following format:
• Self-Introduction: State your name (First Name ONLY) and where you are from
• Explain Why You’re a Good Fit: Highlight your previous job experience and relevant skills

This role requires excellent attention to detail, so please follow ALL instructions carefully. If you don't receive a response, it may be due to missing an important instruction.

Thank you for your consideration. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Customer Service Agent and Office Assistant
description:
**Customer Service Agent (Part-Time, Remote, Graveyard shift)**

**Position Overview:**
We are hiring a part-time, remote Customer Service Agent to join our team. If you are sharp, smart, and friendly, we would love to work with you for many years to come!

**Company Overview:**
Since 2005, our company provides private, 1-on-1 tutoring to high school students in California. We specialize in helping students improve their grades and achieve academic success. You can learn more about us at http://ontracklearning.net

**Work Schedule:**
Our company is based in California, USA, so our business hours are 10:00am-7:00pm Pacific Standard Time. Thus, you will be working during the “Graveyard Shift” in Philippine Standard Time.

- June-July: 20-25 hours per week
- August-May (Busy Season): 25-35+ hours per week
- Shift times: Early morning (graveyard shift) Philippine Time, 2:30 AM - 10:30 AM on Weekdays
- Two weekends per month: Sunday/Monday, 12:00 AM (midnight) - 5:00 AM Philippine Time

**Role and Responsibilities:**
- Answer phone calls and book appointments
- Multitask efficiently in a fast-paced environment
- Provide excellent customer service to American clients
- Solve minor customer service issues directly with clients
- Work closely with supervisors based in California, USA
- Most of your client interactions are centered around their scheduling and billing requests. You will seldom encounter difficult clients.

**Qualifications:**
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in a customer service office position
- Experience speaking with American or Western clients
- Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)
- Excellent computer skills (Google mail, Google Sheets, Zoom)
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Typing speed: 70 words per minute or faster
- Ability to work independently during early morning hours (Philippine Time)
- Previous experience as a Virtual Assistant (VA) is required

**Important Information:**
- If you can see this post, the position is available. Please do not message us asking if the job is still open; we will remove the post once the position is filled.
- Only candidates selected for a Round 1 interview will be notified via email.

title: Junior Accountant
description:
***Note***: If you still see this post, this means we are still hiring.




About Us:
Tax Heroes is a dynamic and growing cloud accounting firm based in Toronto, Canada specializing in offering comprehensive bookkeeping, accounting, and tax services to businesses of all sizes. Our mission is to save our clients on taxes, thus our slogan "Your financial success is our super power!"

Position Overview:
We are seeking a motivated Junior Accountant to join our team. As a crucial member of our firm, you will have the opportunity to learn and contribute by delivering exceptional accounting and tax services to our diverse client base. While prior tax experience is not mandatory, a willingness to learn and grow in this area is essential.

Responsibilities:

-Perform accurate and timely bookkeeping tasks, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, general ledger entries, and bank reconciliations.
-Assist in preparing and analyzing financial statements, balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements.
-Collaborate with clients to collect necessary financial information and provide guidance on financial matters.
-Learn and support the preparation and filing of tax returns
-Provide outstanding customer service by addressing client inquiries, concerns, and requests in a timely and professional manner.

Qualifications:
-Familiarity with basic accounting and tax principles
-Proficiency in accounting software and tools such as QuickBooks, Xero, or similar platforms is beneficial.
-No prior tax experience is required but it is beneficial
-A strong willingness to learn and grow is essential.
-Exceptional analytical skills, attention to detail, and ability to identify errors and discrepancies.
-Excellent written and verbal communication skills for effective client interaction.
-Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to work both independently and collaboratively.
-High ethical standards and a commitment to maintaining client confidentiality.
-Effective time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines in a dynamic environment.
-Must be comfortable using TimeProof.

Why Join Us:

1. Opportunity to kickstart your career in the accounting and tax field with a forward-thinking firm.
2. Supportive and collaborative work environment that fosters professional development.
3. Exposure to a diverse client portfolio spanning various industries and business sizes.
4. Competitive compensation
5. Ongoing learning and training opportunities to keep up with industry trends.

If you are a dedicated and enthusiastic individual who is eager to learn and contribute to the growth of a young and dynamic accounting firm, we encourage you to apply. Join TaxHeroes and embark on a journey of learning, growth, and meaningful client impact.

APPLICATION DETAILS:

If you are interested, please send us a 5 minute video of why you would like to work for Tax Heroes and why you are a good candidate for this role. Make sure you mention Tax Heroes in the video otherwise your application will NOT be considered.

You can email your resume AND a link to the video to careers@taxheroes.ca.

title: Marketing Analyst
description:
POSITION SUMMARY
The Marketing Operations Analyst will bring experience and a passion for data, leveraging digital technologies to port, extract, and report on data from company initiatives and marketing channels. This role requires critical thinking, complex problem-solving, and the ability to transform insights and trends into actionable strategies. The ideal candidate will have an understanding of digital marketing campaigns, the integration of CRM tools across a marketing tech stack, managing digital connections through Zapier, and developing insightful reports. They will work closely with the Senior Marketing Operations Manager to accomplish daily marketing operations tasks and assist in optimizing daily marketing operations.

This position is 100% remote.

ABOUT CARDONE VENTURES
Our mission is to help business owners achieve their personal, professional, and goals through the growth of their businesses. We work in dozens of verticals and provide strategic business guidance through courses, live events, partnerships, and investments. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, accountable, transparent, disciplined, aligned, and results-oriented. This company operates nationally and is growing by the day.

What is it like to work here? Check this:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIIv7sYj1Ns

This role will take on the following tasks; 
- Key Report maintenance and automation
- Daily reporting automation
- Marketing Workflow management
- Execution of all marketing funnel system integrations
- Marketing funnel audits and tracking

OBJECTIVES
- Integrate digital platforms across the tech stack to ensure seamless data flow and integration.
- Manage CRM tools and digital connections to ensure optimal performance and data accuracy.
- Assist in various marketing operations tasks, including updating marketing meeting links, creating Zoom links, Shipbox tracking and backend management, Kajabi course creation, Select Your Rep pages, QR code creation, and handling marketing requests.
- Assist in automations, such as lead form workflows, Typeform creation and integration, funnel integrations and audits, and general workflows.

COMPETENCIES
- Proficiency in extracting, porting, and reporting on data from various data sources and marketing channels.
- Ability to analyze data trends and generate actionable insights.
- Expertise in data reporting, KPI tracking, and developing comprehensive reports that drive marketing and business growth.
- Skilled in integrating CRM tools and managing digital connections through Zapier.
- Expertise in leveraging digital technologies to enhance data flow, data integrations and reporting optimizations..
- Ability to learn new technology quickly and apply key benefits to the current tech stack.
- Proficient in operating within and pulling reports from HubSpot, ClickFunnels, Kajabi, and Shopify.
- Strong critical thinking skills to analyze complex problems and develop innovative solutions.
- Capability to transform insights and trends into actionable strategies.
- Proven ability to manage projects from initiation to completion with consistent daily communication and updates.
- Proficient in tracking and campaign management through tools like Asana.

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS
Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer

COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY
As an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce Cardone Ventures recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.

If this position caught your eye, send us your resume! For best consideration, please complete the online application form:

title: Medical Records Reviewer
description:
MEDICAL PHYSICIAN's ONLY POSITION

Independent Medical Exam Records Reviewer. 

This is a position that will start as part time and if competency and proficiency is shown will move into a full-time position. The goal is for this to be a long-term position. 

What is an IME? An IME is an exam conducted by a physician where many (100-1000's) of medical records are sent to the physician to review in advance of the actual physical exam of the patient. These are requested by attorneys (personal injury, worker's compensation). 

Pain point: currently we are in need of a proficient and competent medical record reviewer who can organize, and type out the pertinent points from the medical records review section of the IME via the system our physician uses. We are getting more requests than we can keep up with completing in a timely manner.

Practice: Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Physician who performs forensic exams in personal injury claims.

title: Server Administrator
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Server Administrator to join our team. Please write "ServerAvatar" at the beginning of your application so that I know you have looked at this post. 

As a Server Administrator, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining our company's servers and network infrastructure. 

You will work closely with our backoffice team to ensure the smooth operation of our systems and provide technical support to our employees.

This job is currently part time but may lead to a full time position for the right candidate.


Responsibilities:

1. Server Management

Installing and configuring servers (Linux, Windows).

Install, configure, and maintain server software (Plesk, and Server Avatar)

Managing server performance and monitoring.

Conducting regular server maintenance and updates.

Implementing server security measures.

Transfer Wordpress websites to our servers as needed

2. Network Administration

Configuring and managing network devices (routers, switches).

Ensuring network security and firewalls are properly configured.

Troubleshooting network issues.

Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in server technology

3. Database Management

Installing and managing database systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL).

Performing database backups and restorations.

Optimizing database performance.

Collaborate with the backoffice team to plan and implement system upgrades and updates.

4. Website Hosting

Configuring web servers (Apache, Nginx).

Managing DNS settings.

Ensuring website uptime and performance.

Setup Cloudflare and maintain it to keep or websites secure and running smooth

5. Security Administration

Implementing security protocols (SSL/TLS, firewalls).

Conducting vulnerability assessments and audits.

Responding to security breaches and incidents.

Implement and maintain security protocols to protect our systems from cyber threats

Manage user accounts and permissions on servers and network devices.

6. Backup and Recovery

Setting up backup solutions for data integrity.

Testing disaster recovery plans.

Conduct regular backups and disaster recovery procedures

7. Technical Support

Providing technical support to staff and clients.

Troubleshooting server and application issues.

8. Cloud Services Management

Managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, Hetzner).

Implementing cloud-based solutions for scalability.

FreePBX Knowledge a plus but not required

Set up tools for SEO including Scrapebox, GSA
9. Scripting and Automation

Writing scripts for automation of tasks (Bash, PowerShell, N8N, Albato, Zapier, Apex-drive, Pabbly, Zerowork, Robomotion, Make, Boost.Space ).

Using configuration management tools (Ansible, Puppet).

Python knowledge a plus but not required

10. Monitoring and Reporting

Implementing monitoring tools (Nagios, Zabbix).

Generating performance reports and analytics.
11. Collaboration Tools Management
Managing collaboration tools (Slack, Microsoft Teams) for team communication.
Ensuring integration with server systems.
12. Compliance and Documentation
Ensuring compliance with industry standards (GDPR, HIPAA).
Maintaining clear documentation of configurations and procedures.
13. Performance Optimization
Analyzing server load and optimizing resource usage.
Implementing caching solutions for faster website loading times.
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
- Proven experience as a Server Administrator or in a similar role
- In-depth knowledge of server operating systems, such as Windows Server and Linux
- Familiarity with virtualization technologies, such as VMware or Hyper-V
- Experience with server hardware, including RAID configurations and storage systems
- Strong understanding of networking concepts and protocols
- Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
- Ability to work independently and in a team environment
- Good communication and interpersonal skills
- Relevant certifications, such as Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert (MCSE) or Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE), are a plus.
Here is some information on server avatar:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysANH_QGpaA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JnyxrNARZyI
https://serveravatar.com/docs/getting-started/what-is-a-server
https://serveravatar.com/deployments

Adaptability: Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and adapting to changing priorities.
Please include the subject line or at the top of your response the following code "227824" in your application to indicate that you have read and understood the entire job description.

Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team in a rapidly growing marketing agency.

Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Marketing Executive
description:
About Us:

Intercorp Solutions, a pioneering name in workplace biometric systems, is expanding its footprint to the vibrant market of Manila, Philippines. With a strong foundation in Singapore, we lead the industry with cutting-edge facial recognition technology and a comprehensive product lineup encompassing hardware, cameras, mobile apps, tablets, and cloud solutions. Our advanced enterprise biometric platform is designed to streamline management, enhance workforce data visibility, fortify workplace security, boost productivity, simplify payroll processing, and elevate safety standards across various industries. Our commitment to delivering cutting-edge software solutions empowers clients to achieve their strategic objectives. Join our dynamic team as we embark on this exciting journey of expansion in Manila.

Job Description:

We are seeking a dynamic and creative Marketing Executive to join our IT software development company. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies to promote our software products and services, drive lead generation, and contribute to the growth of our company. This role requires a strong understanding of IT and software development, along with a passion for marketing and communication.


Key Responsibilities:

1. Develop and execute marketing strategies that align with the company's goals and objectives.
2. Create and manage marketing campaigns to promote our software products and services.
3. Conduct market research to identify target audiences and customer needs.
4. Craft compelling marketing materials, including EDM, brochures, PPT, case studies, blog posts, and social media content.
5. Manage and update the company website with relevant content and product information.
6. Coordinate and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and engage customers.
7. Design and develop video marketing material, including video content creation and editting. 
8. Collaborate with the sales team to ensure marketing efforts support lead generation and sales conversion.
9. Establish and maintain relationships with industry influencers and partners.
10. Organize and participate in trade shows, conferences, and webinars to promote our products and services.
11. Support the development of branding and messaging for the company and its products.
12. Provide regular reports on marketing activities and outcomes to management.
13. Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing campaigns and make data-driven improvements.

Qualifications:

1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in marketing, particularly in the IT or software development industry.
3. Strong understanding of software development and IT concepts.
4. Proficiency in digital marketing, including SEO, SEM, social media, and email marketing.
5. Excellent communication, writing, and copywriting skills.
6. Familiarity with marketing tools and platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, CRM software, marketing automation).
7. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
8. Creativity and a strong eye for design and branding.
9. Strong project management and organizational skills.
10. Team player with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
11. Proficiency in Video creation and editting.

This Marketing Executive role offers an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact in promoting our IT software solutions and contributing to the growth of our company. If you are a passionate and results-driven Marketing Executive with a background in the IT sector, we encourage you to apply and join our dynamic team.

At Intercorp Solutions, we are committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate individuality and believe that a diverse workforce leads to better ideas and innovation. No matter your background, we welcome all qualified applicants to apply.

To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining your relevant experience and why you're the ideal candidate for this role to charleskho@intercorpsolutions.com.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:

Develop new programs, evaluate existing programs and processes, and make recommendations for improvements.
Analyze current programs, including performance, diagnosis, troubleshooting, and designing solutions to problematic programming.

Stay current on industry standards and incorporate them as necessary.
Test, debug, document, and suggest improvements for all projects.

AWS:
Address any issues/problems occurring on new and old instances.
Set up new instances.

POC

GovconIndex
GovconWire
GovconWire events
ExecutiveBiz

Assist other developers with their tasks if they need assistance.


Requirements:
Technical Skills:
1. Front-end Development:
- Proficiency in HTML/CSS: Understand semantic HTML and modern CSS techniques, including frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS, JavaScript: Strong knowledge of ES6+ features, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming (Promises, async/await), and familiarity with popular libraries and frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
2. Back-end Development:
- Programming Languages: Typically, proficiency in at least one server-side language such as JavaScript (Node.js), Python (Django, Flask), Ruby (Ruby on Rails), Java (Spring Boot), or PHP, (Laravel). Database Management: Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB). API Design and Integration: Ability to design RESTful APIs and integrate third-party APIs.
3. Version Control Systems:
- Proficiency with Git for version control and collaboration with other developers.
4. Deployment and DevOps:
- Understanding of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
- Knowledge of containerization (e.g., Docker) and container orchestration (e.g., Kubernetes) is a plus.

Experience:
- Project Experience: Have completed or contributed significantly to several web
development projects, showcasing both front-end and back-end skills.
-Troubleshooting and Debugging: Ability to debug issues across the stack,
from front-end UI glitches to back-end server crashes.
- Testing and QA: Familiarity with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) and
implementing automated testing for both front-end and back-end code.

Design and UX/UI Skills:
- Responsive Design: Understanding of responsive and mobile-first design
principles.
- UI/UX Basics: Awareness of usability principles, accessibility standards, and
design tools like Adobe XD, Canva, Sketch and Figma.
Soft Skills:
- Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify issues
and implement effective solutions.
- Communication: Ability to collaborate with team members, communicate
technical concepts effectively, and understand client requirements.

Remote work

title: Project Management Virtual Assistant w/ Engineering Background

- Collaboration on Staging Upcoming Projects:
- Field Crew Preparation: Assignment of project or scope item to team member, translate/transcribe sold scope of work to Spanish, Material Procurement for Starting Job, Check on Delivery Orders
- Processing Subcontractor Bid Requests, PO's, Bills
- **Misc Tasks**
- Personal: Calendar time blocks for fitness, reminders to check in with some family periodically, etc.
- General Research

**About the client:**

At our General contracting business, trust-building is the cornerstone of everything we do. With a commitment to integrity and quality craftsmanship, we strive to build lasting relationships with our clients. From the initial consultation to the final nail, we prioritize proactive communication and collaboration, ensuring that your vision is brought to life with precision and care. Choose us as your Trusted partner in construction.

We are an assistant outsourcing agency where we specialize in hiring, managing, and growing executive assistants for solopreneurs and small business owners.

Are you eager to keep learning new skills?

Do you value self-growth and development?

Do you enjoy a flexible work schedule and a fun culture?

Are you self-responsible and someone who honors your commitments?

If the answer is YES, then we need someone like **you!**

**We are looking for Project Management Virtual Assistant w/ Engineering Background**

**Basic Requirements:**

- You live in Cebu
- You have good operational skills
- You love learning and you are always working hard on making yourself better
- You like helping others
- You work hard to do great work, but you are also willing to make mistakes
- You’re brave and willing to take action where the action is needed
- You’re a problem solver

**Technical Requirements:**

- High School diploma required / Bachelor’s degree preferred
- Administrative Executive Assistant experience with:
- Project Management
- Social Media Content Management
- Digital Marketing

**Salary Range is:** [Php30,000-33,000] per month (depending on experience)

**We are looking forward to meeting you!**

**Company Overview:**

2xYou Executive Assistant Services is not like your usual “assistant” company. We make sure that both the client and assistant are constantly growing in both business and skills.

We give full support to the assistant to empower the business owner and make sure that the relationship is growing as well.

**Why join us:**

If you want to continue to make progress in life by learning, getting new experiences, and being around highly knowledgeable, helpful people, this is the place for you.

We are a human-centric tribe of people highly committed to solving problems for other humans through business and innovation. However, it is our tribe that we focus on first and foremost as we can solve many more problems in amazing ways with happy, healthy people who are always learning and growing.

title: Executive and Marketing VA
description:
About Offshore Launch

Offshore Launch is a staffing agency that specializes in helping small business owners scale their operations with the top 1% of global remote talent. We are a people-centered agency with a passion for leaving every person and business in a better position than we found them.

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Impact the growth and success of small and medium-sized businesses.
- Work in a people-first, remote environment that values growth and ongoing development.
- Access comprehensive benefits that include HMO, PTO, professional development, and an overall emphasis on teamwork and collaboration.
- Contribute to a culture that values partnership, service, and excellence.

Your Role

As an employee of Offshore Launch, you are being hired for a unique role within a target Client’s company. We value long-term partnerships, and seek to recruit talent that will serve an individual Client’s business for multiple years.

You will work full-time with the Client company. However, the Agency provides ongoing support to ensure your continued success. As such, we create space for ongoing check-ins, feedback and development through:

- Membership in the Offshore Launch Slack workspace
- Bi-weekly All Team meetings
- Monthly reviews

Your job is to help the Client succeed.

Our job is to help you succeed.

About the Client:

We're dedicated to making a difference in every aspect of our operations. We help our clients manage life’s demands by providing personalized assistance, allowing them to focus on what truly matters.

We are looking for a dedicated Executive and Marketing VA to join our team. This role involves handling a variety of administrative tasks to support our daily operations and client communications.

Join us to help make a tangible difference in our clients' lives and the broader community!

Responsibilities:

- Manage invoicing and expense entries.
- Create proposals using Bonsai.
- Manage and update HubSpot and Klaviyo for customer and networking contact emails.
- Develop and manage HubSpot and Klaviyo marketing emails and other automation tasks.
- Maintain a clean business inbox and manage owners' calendars.
- Route customer communications to relevant parties.
- Write and edit content for blogs, client newsletters, and team newsletters.
- Manage social media inbox like LinkedIn, website chats, and email communications.
- Research grants, contests, speaker opportunities, associations, podcasts, and interview opportunities.
- Conduct keyword research and manage trending hashtags.
- Edit video content for blogs and manage LinkedIn profiles.
- Update and manage tracking spreadsheets related to various operational tasks.

Requirements:

- Seasoned Operations, Executive and Marketing VA or similar role (used to wearing multiple hats).
- 2+ years experience with copy writing and content creation preferred.
- Experience working in a fast-paced, startup-type environment.
- Proficiency with Klaviyo, HubSpot, Quickbooks, Google Suite, Calendly and Bonsai preferred.
- Excellent writing and communication skills.
- Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Self-motivated with a keen attention to detail.
- Experience in handling confidential information with discretion.

Compensation & Benefits (to be provided by Offshore Launch):

- $950-$1150 depends on experience
- 13th month pay
- Performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive HMO policy, including dependents.
- Annual continuing education budget to support professional development

Note: The Client is not involved in compensation or benefits. As an employee of Offshore Launch, all compensation and benefits are to be provided by the Agency.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and tech-savvy Executive Assistant to support a fast-paced entrepreneurial environment. The ideal candidate will assist with research, outreach, administrative tasks, and database management, and should have a keen ability to work independently. A strong grasp of productivity and AI-based tools, as well as top-tier communication skills, is essential. 


Key Responsibilities:

--Conduct research on various topics and present findings in clear, actionable formats.
--Handle outreach efforts, including email communications, scheduling, and coordination with external partners.
--Manage administrative tasks such as calendar management, travel arrangements, and meeting preparation.
--Maintain and organize databases using Google Sheets, Airtable, Notion, and other tools.
--Utilize AI-based tools to enhance productivity, automate processes, and assist with document drafting.
--Support in creating and managing reports, presentations, and other documents.
--Coordinate projects and tasks, ensuring timely delivery and clear communication across stakeholders.
--Provide assistance with email management, including drafting responses and managing follow-ups.

Requirements: 

--Proficiency in Mac operating systems, Google Sheets, Airtable, Notion, and email management.
--Familiarity with AI-based tools for productivity and automation.
--Excellent organizational skills and ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
--Strong written and verbal communication skills.
--Ability to work independently and problem-solve proactively.
--High attention to detail and ability to prioritize efficiently.
--Experience with research and outreach in a professional setting.
--Flexibility and adaptability in a dynamic, fast-paced work environment.

Preferred Qualifications: 

--Experience in a similar role supporting executives or entrepreneurs.
--Knowledge of marketing, project management, or business development.
--Familiarity with other productivity tools (e.g., Slack, Trello) is a plus.

Work From Home Set-Up & Work Schedule. Since this role is 100% remote, we require: 

--Stable internet service is a must. The primary internet should be cabled wired on either DSL or FIBER connection with a download/ upload minimum speed of 10 Mbps. 
--Should have a backup internet solution - LTE Mobile Data or Pocket WIFI 
--A desktop Computer or Laptop preferably with Intel i3 or equivalent processor, Windows 7 and above or MAC OSX OS, 8GB RAM 
--A good headset with an extended microphone and noise cancellation is preferred Good external or integrated webcam 

We look forward to hearing from you & working with you!

title: Email Marketer In-House for Fashion Ecommerce Dropshipping Company
description:
We are a rapidly growing fashion eCommerce dropshipping company with multiple stores based in different countries. Our business is currently generating high six-figure revenue monthly, and we are on track to reach seven figures. As we continue to expand, we are seeking a talented and dedicated in-house Email Marketer to join our team and help us achieve our ambitious growth targets. 

MAKE SURE YOU READ THE WHOLE JOBPOST.

Key Responsibilities:

Campaign Creation and Management:

- Develop, plan, and execute email marketing campaigns 2-3 times a week.
- Create compelling email content that resonates with our target audience.
- Ensure emails are optimized for deliverability and engagement.

Revenue Growth:

- Implement strategies to achieve a 20-30% increase in revenue from email marketing.
- Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics to identify areas for improvement.
- Conduct A/B testing to optimize email content and strategies.

List Management:

- Manage and segment email lists to ensure targeted and personalized campaigns.
- Grow our email subscriber base through effective lead generation strategies.

Automation and Personalization:

- Set up and manage email automation workflows.
- Utilize personalization techniques to increase engagement and conversion rates.

Collaboration and Coordination:

- Work closely with our content, design, and sales teams to align email marketing efforts with overall business goals.
- Coordinate with other marketing channels to ensure a cohesive and integrated marketing approach.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as an Email Marketer, preferably in the eCommerce or fashion industry.
- Strong knowledge of email marketing best practices, tools, and platforms (e.g., Klaviyo).
- Demonstrated ability to create engaging email content and compelling subject lines.
- Experience with email list segmentation, growth, and management.
- Proficiency in analyzing email marketing metrics and making data-driven decisions.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Familiarity with dropshipping business models.
- Experience with HTML/CSS for email template customization.
- Proficiency in graphic design tools for creating email visuals.

Comment "gold" at the end of your application so we know you have read the whole jobpost.
