title: Executive Assistant
description:
***Prior experience as a virtual assistant is REQUIRED, if you do not have virtual assistant experience (any job working virtually for international clients), please do not apply.

***Must be comfortable speaking in English on the phone.

***Prior experience in admin/executive assistant tasks is preferred.

***Prior experience in cold calling is preferred.

***Prior experience with marketing and lead generation is preferred.

***Must be open to doing a multitude of different tasks.



Job Details:
We are looking to fill a virtual assistant role that will consist of primarily admin/executive assistant tasks along with helping with marketing and outreach in the form of cold calling, cold emailing, and coming up with different methods to attract new business.

The Company:
We are a restaurant/food truck business in North Carolina. You will be working directly with the owner of the company as her VA.

Key Responsibilities-

1. Admin/Executive Assistant:
You will be assisting the CEO with all sorts of tasks that pop up. Some tasks you'll be performing (or similar):
-filling out applications to events for our food trucks
-contacting merchants
-placing orders for products or necessary tools/equipment
-doing research for random projects
-answering customer service requests
-staying on top of the CEO to make sure projects get done
-being CEO's right hand man/woman
-various other admin tasks


2. Cold Outreach:
-you will be doing cold calling to local businesses inquirng about catering opportunities
-you will be taught to do cold email via our software in order to get interested businesses in the area to book us as a caterer for their events
-using various marketing/lead generation methods to get more catering opportunities



Basic Requirements:
-Must have a college/university degree
-Must be proficient in English (verbal and written)
-Must have organizational skills
-Must have good grammar
-Must have proficient computer skills
-Good communication skills
-Be willing and open to learn
-Be open to feedback and constructive criticism
-Must be able to ask questions when confused
-Be a problem solver
-Have patience
-Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage time effectively.
-Attention to detail.

Detailed Qualifications:
-Proven experience as a virtual assistant.
-Experience in admin/executive role is preferred
-Proven cold calling experience

Technical Qualifications:
-Must have a good internet connection
-Must have a computer
-Must have a headset
-Google suite proficient: gmail, sheets, docs, slides, etc.




Salary and Details:
This is a part-time work from home role for a U.S. company: 20 hours per week.

Please note, there may be an opportunity to go full time in the future depending on performance. Therefore, please apply only if you fully understand that this is currently a part-time role, but with a need to be flexible for the future in case it goes full time.

The pay is $4.50 an hour.

Guaranteed 1 year raise (minimum 10%-20%).

Sick days/holidays are currently unpaid.

You will be an independent contractor. You will get paid via Payoneer every 2 weeks.

The hours are Mon-Fri 9am-1pm EST (Eastern standard time). That is a 12 hour time difference from you-9pm-1am Philippine time would be the converted schedule for you.

***Important: if you have another job that conflicts with this schedule, please do not apply. Your screen will be tracked (Time Doctor software) so if it is discovered that you are working 2 jobs during the same schedule, you will end up wasting your time and ours.

Start date: sometime around August 29th, a set date will be provided after interviewing.

***DIRECTIONS ON HOW TO APPLY ARE ON THE BOTTOM OF THIS DESCRIPTION


HOW TO APPLY****:
If interested, email your resume to asliresumes@gmail.com with the subject line "IJ's Virtual Assistant".

**Please attach your resume as a PDF format attachment.

**Dropbox links or google drive links for resumes will NOT be reviewed.

Please follow these instructions and do not apply in any other method, as it will lead to your application being rejected.

***We are looking to fill this role ASAP. Must be able to start immediately.

Keep a very close eye on your emails. If selected, interviews will take place within the next 24-72 hours. You will be notified by email if you advance to the interview phase. We move fast with interviews, so if you apply and don’t check your emails frequently, you may miss your opportunity for an interview.

We look forward to hearing from you. Thanks!

title: Assistant Project Manager
description:
Position: Combined Project Manager/Account Manager 
Location: Remote Reports to: Director Of Operations

Hours: Part-time with possibility to go full time depending on performance. 

Position Overview: 

As the Project Manager / Account Manager at Denver Digital Agency you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the successful execution of client projects while maintaining effective communication and collaboration among internal teams and clients. Your combined responsibilities of project management and client account management will contribute to the agency's reputation for delivering outstanding results and maintaining strong client relationships. 

Responsibilities:

Project Management: 
Set up and maintain Asana boards and teams to organize and track project tasks, deadlines, and progress.
Ensure that tasks are being completed on time by coordinating with team members, providing support, and addressing any roadblocks.
Work closely with writers, link builders, JR SEOs, SEO Manager, Head Of Off Page SEO, and Head Of On Page SEO to ensure seamless task execution and resource allocation.
Assist in task communication, allocation, and team organization to achieve project milestones and deliverables.

Client Account Management:
Serve as the primary point of contact for assigned clients, fostering strong relationships and understanding their needs and expectations.
Deliver project updates, deliverables, and performance reports to clients in a clear and timely manner.
Communicate with clients through various channels, including emails, Slack, and monthly meetings, providing insights, addressing concerns, and maintaining transparency.

Client Communication:
Develop and maintain a deep understanding of each client's business, industry, and goals.
Craft and deliver professional and informative client communications, ensuring all client queries and requests are addressed promptly and accurately.
Effectively manage client expectations and provide proactive recommendations for optimizing their digital marketing strategies.

Administrative Tasks:
Manage administrative aspects of client accounts, including document management, meeting notes, brand guidelines, reporting set up, and access to all necessary client accounts
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of client interactions, communications, and project details.

Collaboration and Coordination:
Collaborate with internal teams, including Content Creation, SEO, and Off-Page SEO, to ensure projects are aligned with client objectives and agency strategies.
Coordinate resources and efforts to ensure efficient project execution while maintaining quality standards.

Problem Solving:
Identify potential challenges, roadblocks, or issues within projects and work proactively to address them in collaboration with relevant teams and the Director of Client Success.

Client Success and Growth:
Strive to exceed client expectations by consistently delivering high-quality work and exceptional service.
Identify opportunities for upselling or expanding services to contribute to client retention and agency growth.

Continuous Improvement:
Contribute to process improvement initiatives to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of project management and client communication processes. 

Qualifications:
Proven experience in project management and client account management within the digital marketing or agency environment.
Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
Proficiency in project management tools such as Asana
Ability to analyze data and provide insights to clients.
Client-centric mindset with a focus on building and maintaining relationships.
Problem-solving skills and the ability to adapt to changing situations.
Familiarity with SEO and digital marketing principles is a plus. Project Manager/Account Manager Policies and Guidelines 

1. Task Assignment and Organization:
The Project Manager/Account Manager is responsible for meticulously assigning tasks to appropriate team members within Asana boards.
Tasks must be accurately assigned based on specialization, such as writing tasks to writers and link building tasks to link builders. 

2. Due Date Adherence:
Tasks within Asana boards must have due dates aligned with expected work completion times.
Ensuring due dates are in sync with project timelines contributes to efficient project execution. 

3. Clear Task Awareness:
The Project Manager/Account Manager must ensure that all team members are aware of their assigned tasks and corresponding due dates.
Clarity on responsibilities and deadlines enhances accountability and task completion. 

4. Deliverable Delivery and Client Communication:
The Project Manager/Account Manager remains responsible for delivering project deliverables to clients in a timely manner.
Maintaining effective communication via email and Slack contributes to client satisfaction and project success. 

5. Client Email Notifications:
Immediate notification to the Directors regarding significant client emails is essential for transparent communication and decision-making. 

6. Adherence to Timelines and Task Completion:
Maintaining Asana boards with accurate assignments and due dates ensures adherence to project timelines.
Monitoring task completion contributes to project efficiency. 

7. Quality Asana Board Maintenance:
Thorough and organized management of Asana boards, including assignment accuracy and due dates, is crucial.
Clear task tracking enhances project visibility and management. 

8. Client Communication Responsiveness:
Timely responses to client inquiries via email and Slack contribute to open and effective communication.
Promptly addressing client concerns enhances client satisfaction. 

9. Warning and Termination Process:
In cases of Asana board mismanagement, consistent task delays or incompletions, or inadequate client communication, one official warning will be issued. If the situation does not improve following the warning, termination consideration may occur. 

10. Continuous Improvement and Adaptability:
Continual assessment of processes and adaptability to changing project requirements contribute to effective project management. Identifying areas for improvement enhances overall efficiency. 

11. Professionalism and Client Satisfaction:
Upholding professionalism in interactions and communications, both internally and with clients, is paramount.
Client satisfaction is achieved through transparent communication and efficient project management. 

12. Accountability for Results:
The Project Manager/Account Manager is accountable for task assignment, Asana board maintenance, timely deliverable delivery, and client communication.

Consistent adherence to guidelines and standards ensures successful project outcomes. By adhering to these policies and guidelines, the Project Manager/Account Manager contributes to the agency's commitment to the team.

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
Virtual Assistant Job Description - Wildly Grounded Co.

Read through the Entire description to be considered for this Job.

Wildly Grounded Co. is a thriving and dynamic coaching and wellness business seeking skilled individuals to join our team as a Virtual Assistant. We are passionate about helping working mums find balance, release mum guilt, and achieve their personal and professional goals. If you’re eager to grow alongside a purpose-driven company and contribute meaningfully to our mission, we’d love to hear from you.

Job Responsibilities:
Managing Social Media Accounts: Curating, scheduling, and posting engaging and aligned content on platforms such as Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube & Spotify (Podcast).
Content Interaction: Facilitating communication and interactions with followers, responding to comments, and managing direct messages in a way that aligns with our brand voice and values.
Sales Data Management: Tracking, organising, and reporting on sales data from our programs and services, ensuring accurate records and insights.
Client Support: Assisting with client communications, scheduling calls, and managing client onboarding processes.
Automation Management: Setting up and managing automated processes for email sequences, client follow-ups, and other routine tasks to ensure efficiency and consistency in client communication.

This is a PART-TIME position to start, approximately 5-10 hours per week, with the potential for growth based on performance and business needs. The working hours are within 5pm to 10pm Australian Central Standard Time (ACST) or 3am to 8am ACST.

There is significant potential for growth within Wildly Grounded Co., allowing for increased earning opportunities based on performance. Commission-based incentives may also be possible as we grow together.

Requirements:
- Proficient English typing skills with an emphasis on clear and effective communication
- Keen attention to detail in all tasks, from social media posts to client interactions
- Ability to follow instructions meticulously while also showing initiative
- Eagerness for personal and professional growth, aligned with our mission and values
- Capability to convey emotions effectively through text, reflecting our brand’s tone and approach
- Active listening skills to truly understand client needs and feedback
- Availability to be online within the specified hours

To be eligible, you will need access to:
- A reliable computer
- Email and the designated social media platforms
- WhatsApp Application for team communication
- Zoom for meetings and training sessions
- A fast internet connection

Training: Comprehensive training will be provided through our system. A paid probationary period of 60 days will be in effect to ensure a good fit for both parties.

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
- Write (from provided Copy) and schedule 2 emails per week with a focus on value, promotions, and updates
- Initiate and log 100 new SBC (Sell By Chat) conversations weekly
- Social Media Content Creation each week (Instagram, Facebook & LinkedIn)
- Convert 30% of leads from SBC and emails into paying members monthly
- Client Onboarding - Contact 100% of new clients within 3 days of signup and log the contact in the system

To be considered for this position, please respond to this Job Offer with the following statement:
"This is (YOUR NAME). I am thrilled to join your team and contribute to Wildly Grounded Co. I would like to apply for the Virtual Assistant position. Today is (THE DAY and MONTH YOU SEND THE EMAIL e.g., May 26). Thank you." 

Additionally, please complete this form to finalise your application:
https://forms.gle/f3m7dHVoC1DWL5yS6

Failure to complete the form will result in the exclusion of your application.

title: Automations Manager
description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:

•Coordinate with a team including our CMO, graphic designer(s), copywriter(s), and conversion rate optimization experts to implement, build, test, and improve our sales and marketing workflows & funnels

•Design and create standardized templates in GoHigh Level to allow for the rapid creation of common marketing funnels and workflows (i.e. email templates, opt-in campaigns, product-delivery campaigns, etc.); integrate AI bot for calls / messaging into workflows
•Simplify existing tagging schema in GoHigh Level to simplify basic functions, such as building lists of email recipients for broadcast emails. 


EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS REQUIRED

•Experience with AI tools and automations (chat and calling) is highly preferred

•Be comfortable with if-then rules for tagging and behavior (e.g. visited page, clicked link, etc.) in GoHigh Level to start, stop, or move prospects or customers from one marketing campaign to another.
•Advanced automations user, comfortable with building campaigns, sequences, templates, order forms, discount codes, broadcast emails, segmenting by behavior, creating tagging schemas, if-then design, integration of platforms via APIs, webhooks, or Zapier, etc.
•Excellent time management skills, with the ability to work and manage tasks and priorities within project deadlines.

title: LinkedIn/Lead Generation
description:
Job Responsibilities

Lead Identification and Research:

Utilize LinkedIn and other tools to identify potential leads based on criteria such as industry, company size, job title, and geographical location.
Conduct research to gather relevant information about leads, including their business needs, pain points, and decision-makers.

Profile Optimization:

Optimize LinkedIn profiles to enhance visibility and attractiveness to potential leads.
Ensure that profiles highlight relevant skills, achievements, and company value propositions.

Outreach and Engagement:

Craft and send personalized connection requests and follow-up messages to potential leads.
Engage with leads through LinkedIn messaging, posts, and comments to build relationships and establish trust.

Campaign Management:

Develop and manage LinkedIn lead generation campaigns, including sponsored content, InMail campaigns, and other paid advertising strategies.
Monitor and analyze campaign performance, making adjustments to optimize results.

Lead Nurturing:

Implement strategies to nurture leads through the sales funnel, including providing valuable content and responding to inquiries.
Track interactions and follow-up appropriately to move leads towards conversion.

Reporting and Analytics:

Track and report on key performance metrics, such as connection acceptance rates, engagement rates, and lead conversion rates.

title: Graphic Designer needed for regular, ongoing work
description:
THE COMPANY
Avalon Creative Group is a well established and innovative content marketing agency based in the San Francisco Bay Area and Silicon Valley in California. We specialize in the creation of captivating and engaging content for corporate clients, offering comprehensive content design, production, and creative services.

Working with Avalon Creative Group is an exciting opportunity to join an award winning team of amazing designers, create content for renowned brands, and to expand your potential in a positive environment that encourages continuous learning for personal and professional growth.

JOB DESCRIPTION
Avalon Creative Group is seeking a talented and experienced graphic designer based in the Philippines to work with us as an independent contractor. Our goal is to establish a long term working relationship with the right designer. The right person will become an integral member of our creative team on a full-time basis.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
> Create graphic assets for corporate marketing campaigns, such as…
> Graphic ads for various social media channels
> Website design and banner ad creation
> Slide templates and presentations
> Print collateral
> Brand development
> Promotional materials and “swag” for corporate marketing events
> AI generated illustrations
> Layout and design for white papers

OTHER RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE:
> Ensuring consistent application of brand and style guides across all assets created
> Organizing and managing graphic templates and asset libraries
> Documenting guidelines and process details for team members and clients

ENGAGEMENT DETAILS:
> An initial trial period will be a half-time, retainer engagement for 80 hours per month
- Trial period may last up to 3 months
- Hours per week may vary and unused hours may be carried over to the next month
> This is a remote work position
> At least 50% of the work hours (maybe more) will need to overlap with standard business hours in California, with work starting at 4:00am GMT+8 or earlier, depending on client and internal needs
-See time zone comparison - http://drive.google.com/file/d/1J9KW_EerdE1suk6bSxbTTRxsR3Qy2I0p/view?usp=drive_link

COMPENSATION
> Full-time compensation rate will be $1000 - 1500 USD per month
>> The rate established will be based on qualifications and experience
> Once transitioned to full-time, paid holidays and paid time off days will be added
> Compensation rate range for the initial trial period will be $500 - 750 USD per month
- This is a retainer engagement for 80 hours of work per month
- Hours per week may vary and unused hours may be carried over to the next month
- No paid holidays or paid time off days will be included during the initial trial period

KEY REQUIREMENTS:
> You must be based in the Philippines with fast, reliable internet access and a robust computer
> You must have a flexible schedule and be able adaptable to receive design requests and quickly start design and production work to deliver assets requested in a timely and efficient manner
> You must have strong creative skills and a portfolio of work that demonstrates your passion and experience with illustrative design and typography
> You must have experience working with various digital and print formats, platforms and tools
> English fluency (written and spoken) along with excellent communication skills are essential

QUALIFICATIONS:
> College degree in graphic design, visual communications or other related field
> At least 5 years of professional experience creating digital and print assets for corporate marketing activities, such as social media advertising, web banner ads, web design and graphics, email templates, slide templates and presentation, white paper layout and design, and promotional materials for events
> A diverse portfolio that demonstrates your direct, hands-on experience creating these type of assets
> A comprehensive understanding of the various formats and specifications of assets required by different social media channels, website platforms, printing options, etc.
> Proven expertise and mastery using the following tools:
- Adobe Creative Suite Tools (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign and others)
- Figma
- Canva
- Midjourney & other AI image generation tools

If you meet these requirements and are interested in working with us, please submit your application to this URL: https://forms.clickup.com/9009113392/f/8cfra9g-9413/FSZOU76P6VZ9FZJLDA

title: Sales and Service Associate
description:
THE ROLE

We are looking for a full-time Sales and Service Associate to perform customer support and client management functions. We have an increasing number of customers who engage with us from various channels who we want to understand better and engage back with, which we can convert into paying customers.

Our aim is two-fold – KPIs. The duties and responsibilities include, but not limited to: 

KEY RESULT AREA #1 – Contact to Sale Conversion

Drive Signups and revenue through engaging with potential and existing customers - Target per month $10,000 in revenue

1. This will be achieved through
a. Answering and reaching out to people who ask questions on our website about our products and services
b. Contacting and converting into paying customer the signups to our Facebook Group
c. Contacting and convert to paying customer, signups to our various download pages
d. Answer questions and having private conversations with customers on our Facebook group
e. Host, engage and sell to our customers on live 1-2-1 and 1-2-many Q&A calls for services such as the VA Academy, USS and FTF leads

2. This will be measured through conversions in Zoho CRM
a Contacted leads
b. Closed leads
c. Build up a database on leads 
d. Other metrics
- Enquires to conversions
- Contact conversions - Analytics, CRM, and Wordpress

KEY RESULT AREA #2 – Client Support

Understand our customers better to drive improvements in our service. Listen to our customer issues on social media and reach out to them to resolve them privately.

1. Document, screen capture and text capture any and all feedback
a. Save customer feedback images here
b. Using lightshot save image to folder
c. Share positive feedback in the internal chat
d. Compile commonly asked questions and responses. Build a Knowledge Base by collecting all the frequently asked 
questions and responses

2. Document common questions and give feedback on how we can improve to better serve our customers. This includes:
a. Questions asked through chat, Facebook group, Facebook chat, emails, Customer Service issues logged through the 
website, etc.
b. Record this on ZoHo Desk/ZoHo Sales 
c. This will be achieved by:
- Answering Zoho chatbot sales and support sales questions
- Being the 1st line support and answers to emails in the support and marketing email channels
- Answering Facebook /Instagram business chat channels
- Resolving Customer Service issues logged in the website
- Escalating to proper department as necessary
- Following through of resolution

3. Whilst we expect you to provide feedback to the department heads on how they can improve their service offerings, we 
also expect you to create process and business improvements in your own offer (customer sales and service), IE how 
you interact with customers, recording all the frequently asked questions and responses, etc.
4. We will also be placing a heavy focus on automation and efficiencies to keep costs low within the business
5. Host a one-hour company feedback session inside the company
a. Once per month host a 1-hour feedback session with the leaders of the various departments about our range of 
products, services, and marketing
b. 1 hour is to be broken down into a 20-minute presentation and 40 minutes Q&A
c. Presentation is to show the voice of the customer, which will discuss each of the following areas:
- For each product & service (FTF Leads UK, FTF Leads USA, VA Academy, USS)
1. Before signup 
- Most common questions
- Why they like our service
- Their current situation
1. Whilst using the service
- Common questions / Issues
- What improvements they want to see
- Strength, weakness, Opportunities and Threats
- For our website/marketing
1. How did our visitors find out about us
- Anything else


KEY RESULT AREA #3 Project Management
- Collaborate with different departments/ business units for all any related projects and programs
- Performance Metrics: Project Timelines, Milestones

THE REQUIRED COMPETENCIES 
- At least college graduate with Business Management any related course
- At least 5 years working experience 
- At least 3 years experience in customer service support role, client management, sales, telemarketing
- SME experience is a plus

TECHNICAL KNOW-HOW 
- Client Management
- Inbound Sales
- Customer Service 
- Escalation process

SOFT SKILLS 
- Communication Skills; fluent in English (essential) – spoken and written 
- Strong communication and negotiation skills 
- Business Acumen 
- Customer Service Skills
- Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills 
- Management and leadership skills 
- Teamwork/Interpersonal Skills 
- Research Skills – Business Intelligence, Competitor Analysis, Voice of the Customer, Market Research 

TECHNOLOGY SKILLS 
- Google Suite 
- MS Office Applications
- Communication Media - Slack, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Skype, Zoom, Trello 
- CRM tools
- Strong systems aptitude

OTHER SKILLS 
- Demonstrated ability to solve problems
- Detail-oriented with the ability to rapidly learn and take advantage of new concepts
- Has initiative, passion for excellence
- Willingness to perform various functions
- With high regard for Integrity, Excellence, Continuous Learning, Teamwork, and Creative Thinking/Innovation
- Comfortable working in a fast-paced and digitally centric environment
- Process compliance

THE REQUIRED TOOLS

- Computer specs: 
- Processor - Intel Core i5 or higher (excluding U processors)
- RAM - 8 GB or higher
- A fast and stable internet connection (at least 30 MBPS) and with a back-up internet (eg pocket wifi) 
- Noise-canceling headphones
- Web camera
- Skype for video calls
- Quiet and professional workstation

THE OFFER
- Full-time career
- Opportunity to learn different facets of the e-Commerce operations
- Career advancement opportunities
- Monthly salary: minimum Php 25,000.00 NET, payable twice a month 
- Nighttime shift and weekend work (8 hours/day; 5 days/wk)

title: Contract NetSuite Administrator
description:
Job description
At Pulse PEMF, our mission is to enhance all life.

Join Pulse PEMF's dynamic team and experience the unparalleled power of our mission to enhance lives worldwide! As a leading global manufacturer and supporter of PEMF (Pulsed Electromagnetic Field) technology for wellness. 

We are seeking an experienced NetSuite Administrator to join our dynamic team. As a mid-level NetSuite Administrator, you will be responsible for the ongoing support, maintenance, and knowledge of our NetSuite ERP system. You will collaborate closely with various departments to understand their business processes and ensure the current NetSuite setup meets their operational needs. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent problem-solving skills, and a deep understanding of NetSuite functionality.

Initially, the candidate would work closely with our outsourced NetSuite support team and internal IT team to familiarize themselves with our ERP setup and manage employee NetSuite support requests. The candidate will also be involved in a number of NetSuite related projects on the company roadmap. The candidate will train to become a subject matter expert for the company NetSuite account.

Candidate will typically dedicate 50-70% of their time handling support tickets and support projects. This can fluctuate depending on ongoing project support needs and year-end inventory tasks. Candidate will participate in Sprint activities, when necessary, during involvement and contribution to projects on the IT roadmap.

This is an Independent Contract position. 

Responsibilities & Duties


Support outsourced NetSuite Support team with employee support requests.
Mitigate high priority NetSuite Support tickets within the company SLA’s.
Manage user roles, access, permissions, and customizations in NetSuite.
Perform system maintenance and regular updates to ensure optimal performance.
Develop and maintain saved searches, reports, and dashboards in NetSuite.
Create and maintain SOPs and contributions to the Pulse IT knowledge base.
Foster strong working relationships with departments like procurement, production, logistics, finance, and quality assurance to ensure seamless alignment between NetSuite functionalities and business processes.
Proactively identify and resolve issues related to sales functions, production processes, inventory discrepancies, supply chain disruptions, and basic accounting errors.
Provide training to staff on NetSuite functionalities relevant to sales, supply chain, manufacturing, and basic accounting processes.
Identify and implement optimizations to streamline efficiency and minimize waste across supply chain and manufacturing operations.


Minimum Education

Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field is a plus


Experience Required

Minimum of 4 years’ experience as a NetSuite ERP administrator
Basic understanding of supply chain principles including logistics, inventory management, procurement, production planning, Bill of Materials (BOM), and Work in Progress (WIP).
Solid understanding of fundamental accounting principles covering accounts payable, accounts receivable, and general ledger management. Familiarity with E2O (Engineer-to-Order), O2C (Order-to-Cash), and Purchasing processes is beneficial.
Data Analysis experience with Excel (indexing, v-lookups, pivot tables)


Desirable Attributes/Skills

NetSuite SuiteFoundation Certification
NetSuite Administrator Certification
Ability to work in a rapidly changing environment
Ability to work independently with minimal guidance
Competency in SQL or other query languages
Accounting or finance background is a plus
Ability to communicate clearly and concisely; able to lead discovery interviews to understand business problems and desired outcomes.
Must be proficient with saved searches, formulas, reporting, dashboarding, custom forms, creating workflows, and Suitescript
English language fluency (Spoken and Written) is needed for a candidate to operate in this role effectively

title: SEO Manager (Technical SEO Specialist, Off-page & On-page)
description:
Full-time home-based job, with a salary from 40,000 to 100,000+ (based on skills & experience). Why should you join us? Here is what our team members say: carelulu-team-testimonials.crd.co

** PLEASE read "How to apply". Incomplete applications will not be considered. **

========
About Us
========
CareLuLu is on a mission to help improve access to safe, affordable, quality child care and early education. We help parents find the right child care or preschool program, by providing all the information in one place. We also help child care programs grow their business while saving time for what truly matters: children!

=============
Job Description
=============
We are on a mission to help improve access to high-quality, affordable child care and we are looking for an SEO Manager / Technical SEO specialist / Growth marketer to help us accelerate our organic user acquisition! This is an amazing opportunity to make a real impact on our company, but also on our customers: families, and children’s early education. You will be responsible for optimizing website architecture and implementing technical strategies to improve our site performance and search engine rankings.

We operate in a highly autonomous environment, and you’ll be the first SEO hire, so this channel is yours to own and grow (there’s room for career growth, by hiring other SEO team members: link building outreach specialists, content writers and more!) You’ll be responsible for everything SEO-related: Site Audit & Analysis, Keyword Analysis, Content, Link Building, Website Architecture (XML sitemap, robots.txt files, canonical tags), Technical Troubleshooting and On-page Optimization (Page load speeds, Schema markup, Tags, Featured Snippets, etc.)

===================
What You will Be Doing
===================
You must be comfortable getting your hands dirty and doing everything (at least initially, until we hire other SEO team members that you can delegate work to):
• Site audit: conduct thorough technical SEO audits of our website to provide recommendations for optimization.
• Analytics: monitor and analyze website traffic, keyword rankings, and other metrics to identify opportunities.
• Reporting: provide regular, clear, and detailed reporting on important metrics and performance.
• Keyword research: identify valuable search terms to grow our user acquisition and traffic.
• Technical SEO & On-page Optimization: optimizing website structure, improving speed and mobile friendliness.
• Content Strategy: develop content strategy to rank for valuable search terms, and collaborate with content team.
• Technical Troubleshooting: find and fix all errors (duplicate content, crawling & indexing errors, etc.
• SEO Tools Management: be responsible for Google Search Console, Google Analytics GA4, SEMrush.
• Link Building: develop and implement strategy to acquire backlinks to increase website authority.
• Work closely with our engineering & web development team to implement technical SEO changes.
• Create and maintain technical SEO documentation and guidelines for internal team.
• Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in technical SEO and search engine algorithms.

===========
Qualifications
===========
• 5+ years of direct experience working in SEO (we’ll consider less, if you can show you’re amazing!)
• Strong knowledge of HTML, CCS, JavaScript.
• Hands-on experience with Google Search Console, Google Analytics GA4, SEMrush.
• Deep understanding of search engine algorithms to determine what governs crawlers’ behavior and page ranking.
• Strong knowledge of site architecture, schema markup, URL structure, redirect management.
• Expertise in troubleshooting and debugging SEO issues, as well as optimizing site speed and performance.
• Strong communication skills to collaborate with developers, content creators, and marketers.
• Data-driven, analytical mindset and excellent attention to detail.
• Owner mentality: you are self-motivated, use data to evaluate success and deliver results working independently.

====================
Compensation / Benefits
====================
• 13th month & possibility of HMO with tenure
• Learning/education budget, to continue learning and stay up to date with best practices
• Flexible work-from-home setting (no more commute!), possibility of flexible hours/schedule.
• Flexible and understanding team when it comes to time-off, family emergencies, etc.
• Team gatherings/events (e.g. buffet dinners) + occasional team retreat in a nice villa!
• Competitive salary (40,000 to 80,000+, negotiable based on skills and experience)

We are a small team with a big mission. We are looking for long-term team members and if you consistently contribute to the team & company, you will have room for growth (including hiring other team members to manage, if you wish). However, we have high expectations of ourselves and of team members. ===========
How to apply
===========
Incomplete applications will not be considered. Send an email to jobs @ carelulu.com with the email subject: "Your Next SEO Specialist (Your Name)". In your email, include your resume in PDF, and explain:
1) how you heard about us and why you want to join CareLuLu instead of another company.

3) include links to **ALL** your profiles (Onlinejobs.ph, LinkedIn, Facebook, and if available: Twitter).
4) answer this question (using personal experience, not a Google answer!): Explain how you have used structured data to enhance search engine visibility and user experience. Provide a specific example.
5) bonus: like and follow us: www.>facebook.com/Carelulu - www.twitter.com/mycarelulu - www.instagram.com/mycarelulu

Looking forward to hearing from you :)

Quick About me:
I have been doing videography and editing for 10+ years, and entrepreneurship/marketing for 8 years. I’ve helped people grow their social media on YouTube and Instagram. I live in Texas and am focused heavily on my work and growth within the business. I own a creative agency where we help our clients grow and get more business at the same time. We focus on quality and mainly work on educational short form videos, podcasts and Video Ads.

To Apply for the Job, send numerically and with bullet points or "*" so it's easy for me to read. Format it nicely:
1. Change the subject line to “I am intentional [Insert the name of the CEO of VaynerMedia here]”
2. What is my job title? (Check @ricosayan Instagram)
3. (Label this answer 1.) At the top of your message write 2-3 sentences on why you would like this position, and why you are a good fit. Do not write more than that or else your application will be deleted.
4. (Label this answer 2.) Below that tell me what experience you have that may be suitable for this position, and what jobs you’ve worked in the past. This should be no more than 5 sentences.
5. (Label this answer 3.) Can you work the hours I listed above?
6. (Label this answer 4.) Answer number 2 at the end (job title question).

Make sure to follow all the steps above. This is a great job opportunity with the ability to get bonuses and raises, so I will only look at applicants that really want the job. If I decide to interview you there will be a short zoom call between us and video will be required.

Do not write more than what I have asked you above, if you write more than what is asked for above I will ignore your job post.

Thank you,
Emmanuel Sayan

title: General Virtual Assistant (JOB ID:ROHMAX)
description:
Job Title : General Virtual Assistant
JobID :ROHMAX
Industry : Logistics
Location : Remote - CA
Hours :8:30AM -5:30PM PST | Sunday-Thursday or Tuesday-Saturday
Pay rate : $600/monthly
Target Start Sept 9, 2024 



About the Client:
Is a trusted name in interstate freight transportation. With a fleet of 19 trucks and a commitment to safety, the company specializes in the efficient transport of general freight, household goods, and paper products across state lines. Since its establishment in 2021, has grown steadily, operating under the authority granted by the FMCSA and maintaining a solid reputation for reliability and compliance. The company prides itself on providing tailored logistics solutions, ensuring timely deliveries while prioritizing the safety and satisfaction of their clients.

Job Summary:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Virtual Assistant to handle data processing, report conversions, and internal communications. The VA will support our logistics operations by converting reports from PDF to CSV, uploading data to our software, monitoring dashboards, and communicating task completions to the team.

Responsibilities:
Data Processing & Conversion: Convert PDF reports to CSV format weekly (typically Wednesdays), upload and verify data using custom logistics software.
Dashboard Monitoring: Keep a close eye on internal dashboards and ensure accurate and timely updates.


Report Creation: Compile reports for dispatchers and analysts to keep the team informed of delivery statuses and ongoing operations.
Internal Communication: Collaborate with internal teams, including dispatchers and analysts, to communicate task completion and update them on progress.
Process Improvement: Find ways to streamline processes for efficiency, creating new workflows where needed.
Required Skills
Computer Proficiency: Strong skills in G Suite applications and Microsoft Office, especially Excel (e.g., pivot tables).
Data Manipulation: Ability to handle and manipulate data, convert files, and ensure accuracy in report creation and uploads.
Attention to Detail: Sharp focus on detail to ensure data accuracy and quality in all reports and tasks.
Communication: Strong written English skills for internal communications and team updates.
Proactive & Leadership Oriented: A proactive personality with the potential to take initiative and lead tasks independently.
Time Management: Excellent organizational skills to manage time and tasks effectively, adhering to deadlines.
Technical Requirements

title: CMS expert with strong Canva design skills
description:
CMS expert with strong Canva design skills

We are a small but growing company who manages the design and deployment of video based content to be displayed on digital signage in schools across Ireland so we work in GMT time zone. Our site is www.schooltvpro.com 

Content is designed on Canva and deployed remotely to a CMS system. We actually use 3 different CMS which are similar. Experience in using a CMS is important. 
?https://youtu.be/_EkK942BdKQ is a quick explainer. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_DgpDOy8U4&ab_channel=CiaranCronin shows what teachers see. 

I’m looking for someone to manage this system. The right candidate has extensive knowledge in operating and using a CMS as well as has great experience in using Canva. 
We are facing into year 3 right now. My last VA is leaving as she has found a full time job in Education. 

Once you’re up and running it’s the same thing every week so not a difficult job. 
You get regular, weekly work and pay cheque. Some weeks are quieter than others. 

CMS
The 3 different CMS is quite simple and rudimentary. Schools are listed on the CMS. If there is a connection it shows as green, if there is an issue it shows in red. Wherein there will be an onboarding process, I expect that your CMS experience will shine through and you will quickly get up to speed on how content is scheduled and deployed on the system. 

Onboarding
My previous VA has written up a detailed doc outlining her role and everything that she did in the role so you will have this doc. Equally, she has agreed to do one onboarding session with you over google meet / zoom to finalise the onboarding and get you up to speed on everything. 
The working week
You are contracted for 20 hours per week. 

Communication is on Slack. You clock in and out this way as well as using timedoctor. 
Every Tuesday and Wednesdy reminders are sent to schools to have their content in by the Wednesday. Most schools will comply and some will be late which we tolerate on a case by case. Generally most schools comply and have their content requests submitted by the WEdneday via a shared google sheets system. It’s all very straight forward. 

Canva / Design
You must be very good and experienced in using Canva and have an ability to produce high quality work. This part isn’t rocket science. You need to show good design flair knowing that content approach needs to change from week to week to keep things interesting. WE take a ‘video first’ approach which is to say that content is to be in some sense dynamic and not appear like a ‘powerpoint’. I have many examples of content that I can share with you which I feel will help greatly. 

Other skills
You must be good with google sheets, google docs, email etc. 

Accuracy
Your English needs to be good. This is content that will display to teachers so accuracy around dates, spelling, language etc needs to be good. In most cases the text is already there and I am here to help. 
Accountability
This will be done using time doctor. 

Pay
Rate of pay for first 6 months is $4 p/h. After review rising to $4.50 p/h. As more schools come on board, we can review hours upwards as needed. This means I am looking for a top quality, dedicated candidate. 

Having another job
I understand that this is not a full time job. So once I know and understand what an existing job looks like for you and that it fits with this role I shouldn’t have an issue. As long as you are online when you should be, contactable and doing the work on time and accurately etc I will be happy with this. We can talk this out over interview. I expect honesty here. 
Onboarding new schools
AS we get into the year, we will be onboarding new schools. There will be some set up work here eg with the google sheets etc but this is easily counted in the hours as it’s not a big task. 

Treatment and respect
I am a very fair manager. You can ask this with the previous VA if you get to onboarding stage. I will treat you with the utmost respect. In another business I run, I have a VA for 5 years and know what it means to be respectful on my side. I believe you will see this at interview stage. I ask that you are open and communicative.
What I am not looking for
Someone who has multiple other jobs and cannot commit to this
Someone who has a history of turning up late, absent
Someone who lies about experience
Someone who is resilient. Some weeks will be very busy, some will be quiet. I need someone who can work hard when it’s needed and can deal with different situations as they arise. 
Background checks
I will conduct background checks. Having employed many VA’s in the past, I have seen how valuable this is. Be prepared that I will contact previous employers etc. I will expect to have the correct contact details of this person eg I expect that they will have a business email. Equally, please do not include a colleague as a reference, it would need to be a line manager, boss, Principal etc. 

If you feel you are the right person let’s talk!
If you have no CMS experience please do not apply.

title: Customer Success Associate
description:
We are an early-stage startup that is hiring an enthusiastic Customer Support Associate to support our growing Customer Success team. We are looking to bring on individuals who want to make sure our clients and experts have an amazing experience working with us! To do this, you will utilize your interpersonal and relationship-building skills to help resolve customer requests in a timely manner. If you are a strong communicator who can dynamically interact with customers over the phone, showing empathy, encouragement, and care, then this could be the right role for you!

As a Customer Support Associate, you will:
* Manage email, phone, and chat communication with customers as a primary contact for customers who have questions, concerns, or want additional features for their website.
* Support long-term customers with the management of their web presence, helping them when they have questions about the direction of their website. 
* Learn the tools of our web design suite and assist customers with small design tasks.
* Contribute to Knowledge Base/FAQ and other customer-facing support resources.

You’d be a good fit if:
* You have 2+ years of experience supporting American clients or customers in an external-facing role.
* You are a quick and clear writer (you must be highly proficient in English) and an amazing communicator.
* You have experience in the world of web design, helping launch and manage websites.
* You have empathy for small business users and can quickly grasp the issues they’re facing.
* You feel comfortable managing your time and deciding amongst competing priorities.
* You are patient, thoughtful, encouraging, and calm.
* You have some familiarity with managing third-party integrations on websites.
* You enjoy learning and teaching.
* You care about and want to contribute to our mission of helping people do meaningful work.
* You are willing to work full-time, graveyard shift: 8 hrs/day (9:00 am - 6:00 pm US Eastern Standard Time, New York / 10:00 pm - 7:00 am Philippine time)

Don’t fear
* We don't have a minimum number of years of experience for this role. We highly favor talent and interest.
* Some candidates may see this list and feel discouraged because they don’t match all the items. Please apply anyway: there’s a good chance you’re more wonderful than you think you are.
* Our company is a safe place for human beings. We particularly encourage you to apply if you identify as a woman, are a person of color or other underrepresented minority, or are a member of the LGBTQIA community.

How to apply
Please provide:
* A pointer to your CV, resume, LinkedIn profile, or any other summary of your career so far.
* Some informal text introducing yourself and what you are excited about.

title: ROCKSTAR BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist - Full-Time Remote Position
description:
We are seeking a driven BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist to join our team. This role involves two main responsibilities: cold calling medical practices to pitch our client’s digital marketing services and generating leads by scraping data from platforms like Zocdoc. You will play a key role in expanding our client base and identifying high-potential prospects in the medical field.
Key Responsibilities:

Cold Calling and Sales Outreach:
Make outbound calls to medical practices to pitch our digital marketing services.
Effectively communicate the benefits of our services and convert interest into booked calls.
Aim to book a minimum of 5 qualified calls per week, with bonuses awarded for reaching this target. 
Maintain accurate records of all call outcomes and follow-ups in Salesforce.

Lead Generation and Data Scraping:
Access Zocdoc and other platforms to identify and scrape leads for medical practices by specialty and location, excluding those based on insurance.
Avoid hospitals, universities, and practices without a dedicated website.
Use Google Ads and the Facebook Ads Library to identify practices that are spending on digital marketing.
Cross-reference all new leads with existing records in Salesforce to avoid duplication and ensure lead quality.
Document all new and qualified leads in Google Sheets, clearly noting whether they are untouched prospects.
Data Management and Reporting:
Keep meticulous records of all generated leads and call activities in Google Sheets and Salesforce.
Provide regular reports to the team, detailing lead quality, call outcomes, and conversion rates.

Focus on High-Potential Targets:
Prioritize targeting enterprises, doctor groups, and multi-specialty clinics.
Example targets include Circle Medical, Salience Health, and other specified practices and groups.

Tools and Resources Provided:
VPN: For accessing tools and data securely.
Zocdoc: For identifying and scraping leads.
Google Ads and Facebook Ads Library: To identify marketing spend.
Salesforce: For cross-referencing leads and managing data.
Excel/Google Sheets: For tracking and documenting new leads.

Ideal Candidate Profile:
Experience in B2B sales, cold calling, or lead generation.
Familiarity with Salesforce, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads Library.
Strong English communication skills with a clear, neutral accent.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet daily and weekly targets.

Compensation:
Competitive hourly rate of $5/hour.
30% Bonuses for every 5 booked calls and successful lead conversions.

How to Apply:
If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with experience in sales and lead generation, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume to davidcho02@g.ucla.edu with the subject line "B2B Sales Specialist - (NAME)."In the email, include the word "Pineapple" at the end of your response to show you've read the job description carefully.

Interview Process:
We will conduct a Zoom interview to evaluate your English accent, comprehension, and communication ability. Selected candidates will be given a sample task to assess their skills further.

title: Property Manager Specialist
description:
About Us:

At Regal Stay, we specialize in managing exceptional short-term rental properties that provide memorable experiences for our guests. We are a vibrant and growing team dedicated to maintaining the highest standards in the industry. We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Property Manager Specialist to oversee our portfolio of short-term rental properties and ensure outstanding guest satisfaction.

Position Overview:

As a Property Manager Specialist for Short-Term Rentals, you will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of our short-term rental properties. This role requires a keen eye for detail, a passion for hospitality, and excellent organizational skills. You will ensure that our properties are in top condition, manage guest interactions, and work to maximize occupancy rates and revenue.

Key Responsibilities:

Guest Management: Handle all aspects of guest interactions, including booking inquiries, reservations, check-ins/check-outs, and addressing any guest concerns or special requests.
Property Maintenance: Coordinate regular cleaning, maintenance, and repair services to ensure that properties meet high standards of quality and guest satisfaction.
Operational Efficiency: Oversee property listings on various short-term rental platforms (e.g., Airbnb, VRBO), manage calendar availability, and optimize listing descriptions and pricing strategies.
Quality Control: Conduct regular inspections of properties to ensure they are well-maintained, clean, and equipped with necessary amenities. Implement and monitor quality control measures.
Financial Management: Monitor and manage property budgets, including tracking rental income, processing expenses, and preparing financial reports. Work to maximize rental income and occupancy rates.
Compliance: Ensure compliance with local regulations and short-term rental laws, including licensing, safety requirements, and tax obligations.
Marketing & Promotion: Develop and implement strategies to increase visibility and attract bookings. Enhance online property listings and utilize social media and other marketing channels.
Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Property Management, Hospitality, Business Administration, or a related field preferred.
Proven experience in managing short-term rental properties or in a similar role within the hospitality industry.
Strong understanding of short-term rental platforms, pricing strategies, and industry best practices.
Excellent organizational and multitasking skills with the ability to handle multiple properties and guest interactions simultaneously.
Outstanding communication and customer service skills with a focus on delivering exceptional guest experiences.
Proficient in property management software and Microsoft Office Suite.
Familiarity with local short-term rental regulations and compliance requirements.
Flexible schedule with availability for occasional evening and weekend work as needed.
What We Offer:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional development and growth within the company.
A dynamic and supportive work environment.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their qualifications and experience to. Please include “Property Manager Specialist – Short-Term Rentals Application” in the subject line.

Regal Stay is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

We are excited to find a dedicated professional who shares our commitment to excellence in short-term rental management!

title: Virtual Assistant for Property Management
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Virtual Assistant to support our short-term rental operations. The ideal candidate will be responsible for a variety of tasks related to managing our rental properties and ensuring smooth operations. This is a remote position.
Tasks:
Guest Communication: Respond promptly to guest inquiries, bookings, and feedback via email, messaging platforms, and phone calls.

title: Sales Development Representative / Appointment Setter (4+ years experience)
description:
Join Huzzle’s Talent Pool as an Appointment Setter! 

At Huzzle, we connect top-tier Appointment Setters & SDRs with leading companies across the UK, US, and Europe. Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.

WHO THIS IS FOR:
You're looking to:
• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.
• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.
• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.
• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.
• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.

And if you're:
• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.
• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.
• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.
• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.

What We Offer:
Competitive Pay: Starting at 37K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:
• Month 1: 37K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 3: 40.7K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 6: 44.4K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 9: 46.25K PHP/month + bonus 
Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.
Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.

Your Role as an Appointment Setter:
• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone, email, and social media platforms.
• Seamless Scheduling: Coordinate meetings and manage calendars for the sales teams, ensuring a smooth experience for both the team and potential clients.
• CRM Mastery: Keep meticulous records of all interactions, appointments, and follow-up activities in a CRM system.
• Database Management: Regularly update and review the contact database to maintain accuracy and relevancy.
• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.
• Optimize & Succeed: Monitor appointment success rates and work closely with the team to refine strategies for higher conversions.
• Industry Savvy: Stay updated on industry trends to engage clients effectively and address their needs.


Who We're Looking For:
• Experience: At least 4 years of experience with Appointment Setting, Cold Calling, and Outbound Messaging (LinkedIn, Cold Emails).
• Sales Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with relevant sales and outreach tools (CRMs, Prospecting Tools, Automation Tools, etc).
• Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients.
• Organizational Skills: Excellent time management and the ability to juggle multiple schedules.
• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.
• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.
• Detail-Oriented: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to maintaining high-quality data in systems.

Our Hiring Process:
• Step 1: Screening Interview
• Step 2: Take-home Task
• Step 3: Successful candidates are admitted to our talent pool, gaining access to exclusive opportunities.
• Step 4: We match you with a client for a final interview.


Application Requirements:
1. Make sure the Subject of the application is the name of the Capital City of Canada otherwise your application won't be reviewed.
2. Share your Resume/CV and any relevant experience / projects you've worked on.
3. Send anything else that can set you apart!

title: KARTRA Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
Do you LOVE all things KARTRA & DIGITAL MARKETING? 

Are you detail oriented, have excellent written English skills and feel confident interfacing with clients via email? 

Do you get excited with creating landing pages, opt in pages, setting up email sequences, building out funnels, etc 

If so, CONGRATS you may have just found your DREAM CAREER POSITION…

The KARTRA Digital Marketing Specialist is a key support position for Big Impact HQ.

Chances are you have experience with SEVERAL CRMs (like Active Campaign, Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) and feel totally confident managing multiple client’s accounts in Karta while taking care of Affiliate & Speaking Gig Logistics as an Admin Assistant

Big Impact HQ specifically works with 7 Figure Women Speakers, managing their affiliate campaigns and speaking gigs to help them fill their events, programs and retreats. You will be responsible for all the admin, logistics, funnel building and email management with our clients and affiliates. 

If you have experience in Customer Service or as an Executive Assistant, plus know Kartra, this position is ideal for you. 

We’re not so much into temporary hookups, nor we’ll treat you as a remedy to this “gap” (position) that we’re trying to fill. We’re in this together for the long run! So if you’re someone looking for a LONG TERM CAREER, here’s the benefits you can earn: 

HMO
PTO
Internet allowance
Generator 
Performance Reviews
...and a LOT more!

If you don’t want a long-term career with growth potential **please do NOT apply**

This is a FULL TIME 40 hours/ week position. 

This is a long term career opportunity, with 13th month and benefits after 90 days of successful performance. In exchange we require an exclusive commitment, no outside project, clients, freelancing or P/T jobs. 

Must be willing to work US hours. You have at least 2 years experience working US hours.

Responsibilities:

Affiliate Launch Management - setting up email sequences, sending manual emails as needed and being forward facing, replying to time sensitive emails with clients & affiliates 
KARTRA CRM database management, email sequence, provide technical support and troubleshooting
Submitting Support tickets, troubleshooting and resolving issues, as needed 
Managing multiple Client’s Affiliate Programs inside KARTRA’s Affiliate Program 
Tracking stats accurately, running reports and providing stats to Client’s 
Speaking Gig Admin - collecting & submitting logistics and docs- sending bio, headshot, talk title, creating offer links, etc 
Updating & scheduling email sequences 
Weekly sweep to make sure all logistics are collected, accurate, links working, etc
Manage Pipeline - research, tracking & following up with leads, ensuring they have a stellar experience every step of the way.
OUTREACH & Follow up with speaking engagements, leads, events, podcasts, etc. You will be in charge of appointment setting and following up with leads.
RESEARCH- creating and adding to list of leads, ensuring list has right type of leads, ensuring all contact info is accurate, etc
Project Management **excellent organization & project management skills is a MUST** ability in prioritizing tasks & projects
Calendar Management- create, manage and streamline CEO’s time and scheduling systems, prioritizing appointments and working directly with executives, customers, and other partners & team members as necessary 
Email Management- reviews and answers email and other inquiries and determines when executive action is required.
Ability to handle confidential information- recognizes and effectively handles proprietary information on a routine basis. Interfaces with various levels of management and clients and customers. 
Filing & Organization Systems- establishes, develops, maintains and updates the filing system for CEO. Retrieves information from files when needed. 

The ideal candidate will:

Know KARTRA inside & out - at least 2 years experience with all kinds of CRMS (ex: Active Campaign, InfusionSoft/ Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) 
Understand Affiliate Marketing, online launches and how to manage it through the Kartra Affiliate Program 
Have excellent time management & project management skills
LOVE tech and know too many tech platforms to list!
Proficient in Gdrive and G Suite
Are a self-starter who thrives in a team environment and is wired to “mark things off the list” and get projects completed ahead of deadlines.
Are comfortable forward facing with Clients, replying to questions via email 
Like routine and knowing what to expect each week, reliable and dependable to get consistent tasks done each week plus manage tasks associated with various projects at the same time.
Are meticulous and detail-oriented - ability to manage A LOT of details, logistics and moving parts at once and double check your work for accuracy 
Demonstrate a solid typing WPM (ideally 45 wpm)
Pride yourself in getting tasks done accurately and efficiently the FIRST time
Excel at creating workflow efficiencies and using tech & automation to save time
Have the ability to SPEAK UP, give feedback and direction to help your CEO stay organized and manage time effectively
Are tech-savvy and proficient in all major platforms
Enjoy leading in a supportive, “behind the scenes” kind of way
Clear, focused, super organized, grounded, efficient, achieve outcomes FAST
Show up & execute, anticipate needs – ability to think 10 steps ahead vs wait for things to be delegated to you
Have a high level of professionalism, grace and business etiquette. Due to the confidential and sensitive nature of information, discretion is a MUST
Are resourceful, proactive & takes initiative
Quick learner & flexibility- ability to engage in a number of detailed tasks at once and handle the demands from the CEO
Have excellent communication skills - ability to work cohesively with different team members and personality types
Committed to RESULTS with great problem solving skills
Excel at getting tasks done accurately and efficiently the FIRST time
Work independently and well with a team
Have the ability to multitask, and work effectively under pressure and deadlines
Take initiative, organize and complete projects with minimal direction and micromanaging

Experience with technology & tools:
At least 2 years experience with all kinds of CRMS (ex: Active Campaign, InfusionSoft/ Keap, Kartra, Go High Level, etc.) 
Experienced with Project Management (ex: Asana, Trello, Monday, Clickup)
Experience with Kartra’s Affiliate Program 
Time Doctor (or other time tracking systems)
Gdrive & Gsuite 
Slack 

NEXT STEPS:

If this position sounds like YOU and you’re jumping for JOY at this opportunity, follow these instructions very carefully:

Send your updated resume/CV and cover letter answering the following questions to Hiring@BigImpactHQ.com:

* What attracts YOU to this position & why are you the BEST candidate?
* How many years experience do you have using KARTRA? Do you have experience with the Kartra Affiliate Program, if so how many years? 
* On a scale of 1-10, how detail oriented are you? How do you ensure accuracy with your work? 

**This is no time to be bashful… put your best foot forward and really sell yourself... if you don’t, no one else will ;)

Thanks and GOOD LUCK!

title: Visionary Automation & AI Expert
description:
Seeking Visionary Automation & AI Expert to Transform Our Agency's Operations

Are you a tech-savvy innovator with a passion for revolutionizing business processes through cutting-edge automation and AI solutions? Our dynamic and forward-thinking agency is on the hunt for an exceptional Automation and AI Expert to join our team and spearhead our digital transformation journey.

About Us:
We are a growing agency committed to staying at the forefront of technological advancements. We believe that by harnessing the power of automation and artificial intelligence, we can not only streamline our operations but also deliver unparalleled value to our clients. As we continue to expand, we're looking for a talented individual to drive our automation initiatives and help us scale efficiently.

The Role:
As our Automation and AI Expert, you will be the driving force behind our agency's technological evolution. Your primary mission will be twofold: optimizing our internal operations and enhancing our content creation capabilities through innovative automation solutions. This is a hands-on role that requires both strategic thinking and technical expertise.
Key Responsibilities:

Operational Process Automation:

Conduct thorough analyses of our current workflows to identify inefficiencies and bottlenecks
Design, implement, and maintain robust automation solutions using platforms like Make.com and Zapier
Integrate various tools and systems through APIs and HTTP requests to create seamless workflows
Continuously monitor and optimize automated processes for maximum efficiency


Content Creation Automation:

Develop AI-driven solutions to augment and streamline our content creation processes
Implement and fine-tune machine learning models for tasks such as content generation, optimization, and personalization
Create automated systems for content distribution and performance tracking


Tool Integration and Development:

Leverage tools like Airtable and Notion to create powerful, interconnected systems
Research and implement new technologies that can benefit our agency's operations
Develop custom scripts or applications when off-the-shelf solutions are insufficient


Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing:

Work closely with various departments to understand their needs and implement tailored automation solutions
Provide training and support to team members on new automated systems
Document all processes, integrations, and custom solutions for future reference and scalability



Required Skills and Qualifications:

Mastery of automation platforms, with particular emphasis on Make.com (formerly Integromat) and Zapier
Extensive experience working with APIs, webhooks, and HTTP requests
Proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Python, JavaScript, PHP)
Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software architecture principles
Hands-on experience with Airtable, Notion, and similar productivity tools
Familiarity with AI and machine learning concepts, especially in the context of content creation
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to overcome technical challenges
Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical team members
Proven track record of successfully implementing automation projects that have demonstrably improved business operations
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience)

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working in a digital agency or similar fast-paced, client-focused environment
Knowledge of digital marketing tools and processes
Familiarity with project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure)

To Apply:
We're looking for candidates who can demonstrate their skills through concrete examples and a portfolio of successful projects. Please submit your application including:

A comprehensive resume/CV detailing your relevant experience and technical skills
A portfolio showcasing your previous automation and AI projects, including:

Detailed screenshots of implemented automations, showing both the user interface and backend configurations
Comprehensive specification documents outlining project requirements, proposed solutions, and implementation strategies
Flowcharts, diagrams, or mind maps explaining your automation architectures and data flows
Code samples or snippets demonstrating your programming skills (if applicable)
Case studies or metrics demonstrating the tangible impact of your automations (e.g., time saved, increase in productivity, cost reductions, improved accuracy)


A cover letter (max 2 pages) addressing the following points:

Your philosophy and approach to automation and AI implementation
How you stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends
A specific example of a complex automation challenge you've faced and how you overcame it
Your vision for how you would contribute to our agency's growth through automation and AI


Any relevant certifications or continued education in automation, AI, or related fields
(Optional) Links to your professional profiles (e.g., LinkedIn, GitHub) or personal tech blog if applicable

Assessment Process:
Shortlisted candidates will be invited to:

Participate in a technical interview to discuss their portfolio and assess their problem-solving skills
Complete a practical assignment simulating a real-world automation challenge
Meet with key team members to ensure cultural fit and alignment with our agency's values

We're eager to find a candidate who not only possesses the technical skills required but also shares our passion for innovation and continuous improvement. If you're ready to make a significant impact by revolutionizing our processes through automation and AI, we want to hear from you!
Join us in shaping the future of our agency and the broader digital landscape. Apply now and let's create something extraordinary together
