title: Webflow Web Designer & Developer
description:
As a Web Designer & Developer for Webflow, your main responsibilities will be creating and managing websites. We have a rapidly growing business and are developing more within our home improvement service. All of these require skilled writing to maintain and grow.

### **Web Design:**

- Collaborate with the team to design Low-Fi and High-Fi prototypes for GorbMedia clients.
- Improve and provide suggestions for better UX and UI designs.
- Create visually appealing and user-friendly layouts.
- Ensure the website is responsive and compliant across mobile, tablet, and desktop formats.
- Integrate relevant content and media in collaboration with the marketing and content teams.
- Conduct user research and testing to refine design solutions.

### **Web Development:**

- Develop and implement website features using Webflow, including new pages, components, and functionality.
- Ensure website performance and security by applying best practices in development.
- Upload videos and write/add informative content as required.
- Create and maintain internal tools and automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
- Perform cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent performance.

### **Website Technical SEO:**

- Publish SEO-optimized websites, focusing on:
- Alt text for images
- Page speed optimization
- Proper page structure and headings
- Image compression
- Canonical tags
- Configuration of robots.txt file
- XML sitemaps
- Page indexing
- Google Analytics
- and other SEO Compliance requirements
- Stay informed about the latest Webflow SEO optimization recommendations and industry best practices.
- Implement schema markup, including local, review, and organizational schemas.
- Collaborate with the SEO team to identify and resolve technical SEO issues.
- Implement technical SEO recommendations for clients.
- Conduct technical audits to ensure website health and performance.

### **Communication and Collaboration:**

- Communicate and collaborate with the team to understand project requirements, provide updates, and address any concerns.
- Ensure timely delivery of high-quality work and adherence to project deadlines.
- Assist in managing and executing various micro-projects as needed.
- Provided technical support and troubleshooted website-related issues.
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, tools, and best practices.

## Characteristics & Qualifications:

- Expert in the following Applications:
- Webflow
- Figma
- Relume
- Notion
- Google:
- Google Search Console
- Google Analytics
- Has a blend of technical expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills to ensure our client's websites perform at their best & tools to support our internal teams.
- Ability to translate design mockups into functional web pages
- Ability to understand and align with the brand, mission, and client avatar
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
- When you apply, write the title of your job post, “Web Design 49 from,” and then add your name.
- Maintains a positive and constructive approach to work, understands and respects the perspectives of others, and is committed to personal and professional growth


Questions to Answer:
- Provide at least 3 websites that you have worked on or developed.
- When sending your resume, please describe a few of the hardest problems you solved and exactly how you solved them within your profession.

title: Personal PA
description:
I am the founder of 
https://zenovateai.com.au/

I need a PA to help me to run this business together. Below are some tasks related to this PA.

Administrative Setup: Help with the initial setup of your business, including registering the business, setting up bank accounts, and organizing legal documents.

Market Research: Conduct research on potential clients, competitors, and market trends in the AI automation industry. This will help you identify opportunities and develop a business strategy.

Organizing Meetings and Networking: Schedule and manage meetings with potential clients, partners, investors, and other stakeholders. This includes preparing agendas, taking notes, and following up on action items.

Digital Presence and Branding: Assist with setting up a website, social media profiles, and other digital marketing activities. This could include coordinating with designers or agencies and managing initial content creation.

Tool and Software Management: Help select and set up essential tools for your business, such as project management software, CRM systems, and automation tools.

Client and Prospect Outreach: Assist in reaching out to potential clients through email, LinkedIn, and other channels to generate interest and set up introductory meetings.

Financial Management: Help manage the budget, track expenses, and handle invoicing and payments as the business starts to grow.

Attention to Detail: If you have read this message, send me a message, and make sure you include in your message with a magic word "MAGIC". So that I know that you have the attention to detail

Organizing Workflow and Processes: Assist in developing and documenting standard operating procedures (SOPs) for different aspects of the business, including client onboarding, project execution, and follow-up.

Research and Content Creation: Assist in creating content such as blog posts, newsletters, and presentations to establish thought leadership in the AI automation space.

General Support and Coordination: Provide general administrative support and act as a coordinator for various tasks, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks as you focus on strategy and business development.

title: CSR- Agent
description:
1. Respond to customer inquiries, concerns, and requests related to property rentals, leases, maintenance, repairs, and other property management services. Providing information, guidance, and assistance to customers in a professional and timely manner.
2. Review any past interactions with the customer and their previous inquiries and responses
3. Conducting research and gathering information to address the customer's concern or question
4. Compiling and organizing the relevant information to deliver effective troubleshooting and resolutions to customers in a professional and timely manner.
5. Efficiently locate and engage third-party technicians or contractors online, as needed, to ensure swift issue resolution and seamless operational continuity.
6. Ensuring that the customer fully understands the information and answer provided and addressing any further questions or concerns they may have.
7. Communication with property owners: Coordinating with property owners or landlords to provide updates on tenant issues, property maintenance, vacancies, or any other matters requiring owner involvement.
8. Handle and resolve tenant complaints or disputes, investigating issues, and taking appropriate actions to address concerns and ensure customer satisfaction.
In summary, the customer service representative assists guests by offering useful information, responding to inquiries, and handling complaints. They serve as the first point of contact for clients and customers and work to make sure that they are happy with the services and overall stay in the property.

title: Social Media & Content Creator
description:
Overview:

The Social Media & Content Creator / Fashion Trend Analyst and Developer will manage the online presence and content strategy for a beauty brand while also analyzing shifts in the fashion market. This dual role involves creating engaging content, managing social media accounts, engaging with online communities, and conducting in-depth market research to guide designers. The goal is to drive brand awareness, cultivate customer relationships, and support innovative collections aligned with consumer preferences and future trends.

Job Details:

Content Creation and Management

- Create weekly and monthly content calendars in alignment with brand guidelines and fashion trends.
- Schedule and publish social media content across all channels, including Meta, Snapchat, YouTube, and TikTok, ensuring alignment with brand activities.
- Research and generate content ideas, transforming them into visuals (videos, images, infographics) and text captions while considering current fashion trends.
- Use social media management tools to optimize content scheduling, engagement, and trend integration.
- Analyze performance metrics of digital marketing campaigns and recommend strategies for improvement in both content and trend forecasting.

Market Analysis and Brand Management

- Conduct comprehensive research on consumer preferences to forecast fashion and beauty trends while monitoring brand’s online reputation.
- Engage with the brand's online community to cultivate relationships and enhance customer engagement, while ensuring relevant online presence.
- Present findings from market research through visually appealing mood boards and storyboards, guiding the design process across teams.
- Participate in live and online events, providing support to the marketing team and gathering insights for community engagement.
- Keep abreast of trends and discussions in the beauty and fashion community to adapt strategies and content accordingly.

Community Engagement and Creative Concept Development

- Analyze online customer knowledge to adapt strategies that drive traffic and sales while fostering creativity among design team members.
- Collaborate directly with designers to ensure trend insights are integrated into content and collections, providing feedback during the design process.
- Generate original ideas that inspire designers, while implementing feedback from the design team to refine content and creative concepts.
- Measure and report on community engagement strategies and adjust action plans according to trend findings and performance data.
- Foster a collaborative environment that encourages creativity and keeps the design team informed about emerging trends.

Analytics and Presentation of Insights

- Use social listening tools to measure brand awareness and identify opportunities for growth through audience engagement analysis.
- Create impactful presentations that summarize trend findings for stakeholders, including clear narratives that inform decisions.
- Report on the performance of social media campaigns and community engagement strategies, identifying successful methods and innovative approaches.
- Develop and deliver seasonal trend reports while engaging stakeholders through storytelling techniques to highlight important trends and insights.
- Continuously monitor market developments and adjust analyses and recommendations as needed for campaign effectiveness.

Continuous Learning and Adaptation

- Stay updated with the latest social media trends, changes in algorithms, and advancements in design practices for optimization.
- Engage with peers in the industry and online communities to exchange ideas and learn new practices, promoting a culture of continuous learning.
- Reflect on campaign outcomes and integrate lessons learned into ongoing content and trend analysis activities.
- Attend training, fashion shows, and workshops to enhance content creation, digital marketing skills, and trend forecasting expertise.
- Embrace feedback from the design team and community engagement metrics to refine strategies and improve future planning.

Qualifications:

- University Degree in Fashion Design, Marketing, Communications, or a relevant field.
- Proven experience in social media content creation and market analysis, particularly in the beauty or fashion industry.
- Strong copywriting skills in Arabic and English; Arabic proficiency is essential.
- Strong familiarity with design principles, color theory, and materials used in fashion.

Skills and Competencies:

- Excellent time management and organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to synthesize data into actionable insights.
- Strong presentation and communication skills with experience in visual storytelling.
- Creative thinking and innovative problem-solving abilities; familiarity with social media management tools and analytics.
- Ability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams, encouraging creativity among team members.

Preferred Experience:

- Experience in the beauty or fashion industry with prior involvement in digital marketing campaigns and strategies.
- Familiarity with digital design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite and trend forecasting methodologies.
- Past involvement in fashion shows, product launches, or community engagement initiatives is a plus.

Personal Attributes:

- Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality and performance in both content and analysis.
- Proactive and strong at taking initiative within a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
- Creative and innovative with a passionate approach to beauty, fashion, and current cultural trends.
- Strong communicator with excellent interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively.

Work Environment:

- Remote work flexibility
- Fast-paced environment with a strong focus on creativity and innovation among team members.

title: Immediate Hire: Physical Therapist/Occupational Therapist
description:
Hey there! Are you ready to join something amazing in the healthcare field? If you love physical therapy, diet, and nutrition, we have an awesome opportunity for you to join our team as a Health Care Specialist in Customer Support!

We are looking for a dedicated and compassionate Health Care Specialist to join our team. As a Health Care Specialist, your role is crucial in providing support and guidance to our valued customers. You'll ensure their needs are met with patience, empathy, and accurate information.

As a valued member of our team, you will play a key role in evaluating our healthcare programs, developing innovative educational initiatives, and ensuring the delivery of top-notch services to our valued customers. Your friendly and approachable demeanor will be instrumental in building positive relationships with our customers, ensuring their satisfaction and well-being.

#

Who are we?

We are RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., and we've been around since 1999. We're always growing our team, and we've had the pleasure of offering sustainable employment opportunities to many virtual assistants over the years. Our main virtual assistant has been with us for over a decade, which really shows how we value long-term relationships. Right now, we have a team of over 90 full-time virtual assistants who are all dedicated to what they do.

We're on the lookout for someone who's independent, resourceful, and able to problem-solve. You'll need to be adaptable and open to new ideas, as well as someone who can work without constant supervision.

This job requires flexibility in terms of working hours, and you'll need to be open to working on rotational shifts. We use a time-tracking tool called Hubstaff to ensure accountability and productivity. This tool lets us monitor your working hours, capture your computer screen during work, measure your productivity, and keep track of the websites you visit while on duty.

#

What is it like working with us?

At RK Exercises For Injuries Corp., we believe in progress and constant development. You won't be doing the same old thing day in and day out for years on end. We will give you a chance to try new things and expand your horizons, which will benefit both you and the company.

Additionally, we place a high premium on fairness, honesty, and integrity in the workplace. We foster an environment where everyone is encouraged to speak up and share their ideas for growth and improvement.

#

Skills and Requirements:
- Degree in Physical Therapy/Physiotherapy, Occupational Therapy, Sports Medicine or equivalent.
- Minimum of two years of relevant experience as a Health Care Specialist.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
- Effective verbal and written communication skills in English, with attention to grammar.
- Tech-savvy with a reliable working PC, stable internet connection, and noise-canceling headset.
- Punctuality and commitment to maintaining a consistent attendance record.
- Positive working attitude and ability to maintain professionalism at all times.
- Strong work ethic, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to maintain the confidentiality of critical information.
- Teamwork and collaboration skills.
- Ability to ensure brand consistency and accuracy in all tasks.
- Comfortable working with a time-tracking tool to manage work hours effectively.

#

Duties and Responsibilities:
- Respond to inquiries, concerns, and requests from customers regarding healthcare services and products.
- Address and resolve customer complaints or issues, ensuring a satisfactory resolution.
- Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions and follow-up actions taken.
- Collaborate with healthcare professionals and internal teams to ensure a seamless and positive customer experience.
- Continuously improve customer support processes and contribute to enhancing the overall customer experience.
- Provide guidance and educational resources to customers, helping them make informed decisions about their healthcare.
- Develop written procedures for the company's current processes and procedures.

#

How to apply for this position?

To apply, simply send an email to hiringmanager@ExercisesForInjuries.net .

Use this subject line: Full-Time Health Care Specialist Customer Support (Work From Home) - Application

To ensure a comprehensive review of your application, please provide the following information:

1.) Attached Resume: Please attach a clear and updated copy of your resume. Ensure that it includes your recent photo.

2.) Character References: Please provide the names, contact numbers, and email addresses of three character references who can speak to your professional skills and work ethic.

3.) Onlinejobs.ph Account: Please provide the link to your Onlinejobs.ph account.

4.) Employment Status: Are you currently employed? Please let us know your current employment status.

5.) Interview Availability: Are you available to be interviewed at any time? Please inform us of your availability for interviews.

6.) Salary Expectation: Please state your salary expectation for this position.

7.) Certifications: If you hold any certifications or credentials relevant to the healthcare field, please provide a link to them for our review.

Note that we only accept applications through email, and we appreciate your adherence to these instructions.

We look forward to reviewing your application thoroughly and potentially having the opportunity to connect with you. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.

Best regards,

~ EFI Hiring Manager

title: BOOKKEEPER FOR AUSTRALIAN ACCOUNTING PRACTICE
description:
We have an awesome opportunity for a Bookkeeper experienced in the Australian environment and QuickBooks Online, to join our small team. 

We have well documented established procedures in our online portal. 

#### To be considered you must include all details requested in Section E below ####

A THE ROLE

We and accounting firm looking at an experienced Bookkeeper who loves adding value to our valued clients. You need great bookkeeping skills combined with excellent written and spoken English.

You will spend your time adding value by providing bookkeeping services for our clients. 

Our Client Service Mantra is “ACE” – Accurate, Cost-effective and Efficient

This role is four days per week Monday to Thursday.

The Role Is Perfect for You If:

# Have Formal Accounting or Bookkeeping Training
# You love to focus on being productive, and delivering client work in a timely manner
# Have a solid understanding of accounting principles and practice
# You have a can-do attitude
# You love supporting Clients, Bookkeeping and QuickBooks Online
# You love technology and how it can improve your productivity
# You love following established procedures
# You’re organised and a strong time manager
# You are a fast learner
# You have a history of clients complimenting you for your attention to detail
# You’re comfortable working in the Office 365 and Google Drive environment
# Your commitment to client confidentiality is paramount
# Understand Australian GST rules and their peculiarities
# Are able to work under pressure 

We have clearly documented procedures. We are looking for people to follow our established systems so all staff are producing a similar, high-quality product that will add value to our clients’ businesses.

B SPECIFICS OF THE ROLE

Responsibilities included in this role include:
# Work as part of a team providing a consistent service to small business clients. 
# Bookkeeping – processing transactions for small business clients 
# ensuring General Ledger allocations are accurate,
# ensuring GST allocation is correct 
# reconciling bank accounts and review of any outstanding transactions 
# Preparation of BAS 

Essential skills and attributes include:
# Demonstrated Passion for accounting 
# Excellent written and spoken English
# Rock solid understanding of Debit & Credits – you will be tested prior to interview
# Ability and willingness to follow our well-documented procedures
# Ability to understand the end goal of assigned tasks
# Ability to effectively communicate with team at all levels
# Client and Team focussed
# Advanced computer skills are essential, and you will be tested prior to interview

There are always opportunities for advancement for star performers.

C WHO ARE WE?

Cascade Accounting & Tax services small business across Australia. We value people who are self-motivated, great communicators and keen to learn new things. 
· Process automation is paramount, and you need to have a can-do attitude towards computers.
· Most of our clients are on QuickBooks Online
· Confidentiality is paramount

D TERMS OF EMPLOYMENT 

The role is Monday to Thursday, 36 hours per week, working 8:00 am to 5:30 pm. GMT +10

Payment is on a permanent basis in line with Fairwork requirements with Pro-Rata annual leave and Personal leave. 

We have a Christmas shutdown, generally of about 2 weeks.

The amount of pay will be commensurate with experience with regular performance bonuses.

E HOW TO GET OUR ATTENTION

To apply for this rewarding opportunity, submit your application to karen@cascadeconsulting.com.au with the subject line “Bookkeeper Superstar - ”

Our scanning is generally fairly fast. If you get our attention, we will send you some short personality tests and some written questions before inviting you to an interview.

To apply for this rewarding opportunity, you need to include:

1) Current Resume

Your resume that includes all work and study in the last 5 years plus a summary of any prior work. We are interested in all of your work history, not just the highlights you think apply.

2) A covering letter that tells me about:

a) When you realised you had a passion for bookkeeping and how that happened;
b) Tell me about what makes you feel you have done a good days’ work.
c) An example of how your attitude toward technology has added value to a work/study situation
d) An example of Your skills to manage assigned tasks and meet deadlines;
e) Details about your experience in QuickBooks online;
f) The best thing you have done in each Word & Excel and how you added value to the project this task was part of;
g) Your favourite subject you have studied and what you liked about it and the strategies you used to achieve success;
h) An example of your can-do attitude solving a problem;
i) How much are you expecting to earn from this role. 

Our websites are:
* www.cascadeconsulting.com.au/
* thelegalbookkeeper.com.au/
* https://karenmcdonald.online/

title: Virtual Executive Assistant to the Provider working Pacific Standard Time
description:

Provide comprehensive administrative support to executives, including managing calendars, scheduling meetings, and coordinating travel arrangements.

Conduct research and compile reports or presentations as needed.
Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.
Handle ad-hoc projects and tasks with efficiency and professionalism.
Anticipate needs and proactively address issues to ensure smooth operations.
Collaborate with team members and external stakeholders to facilitate communication and streamline processes.
Available Pacific Standard Time 8 hours business hours for on-call support, demonstrating flexibility and readiness to assist whenever required.

Requirements:
Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written.
Confidence in dealing with high-pressure situations and interacting with senior executives.
Passionate and driven attitude, with a commitment to delivering exceptional service.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Proficiency in using virtual communication tools and office software.
Previous experience as an executive assistant or in a similar role preferred.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Availability to work outside regular business hours and respond promptly to urgent requests.

Skills: Excellent Communication Skills: Effective communication is paramount for a virtual executive assistant. They must clearly convey information, both verbally and in writing, while representing the executives they support. Clear communication ensures smooth coordination of tasks, facilitates collaboration with team members and external stakeholders, and helps manage expectations effectively.

Strong Organizational Skills: The ability to stay organized amidst multiple tasks and deadlines is crucial for success in this role. Virtual executive assistants are responsible for managing calendars, scheduling meetings, coordinating travel arrangements, and handling ad-hoc projects. Strong organizational skills enable them to prioritize tasks, maintain efficiency, and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

Adaptability and Flexibility: Given the dynamic nature of executive support roles, virtual executive assistants must be adaptable and flexible in their approach to work. They may encounter unexpected changes, urgent requests, or high-pressure situations, requiring them to pivot quickly and adjust priorities accordingly. Adaptability allows them to navigate challenges smoothly and continue delivering exceptional service despite evolving circumstances.

title: Sales Representative for High Growth Cleaning Company
description:
We are a US-based house cleaning company looking for a part-time, home-based Sales Representative to work with our sales and customer success department. This person will work the hours 5pm-8pm CT M-F with option to expand hours either on weekends or earlier in the day on weekdays.

Your daily responsibilities would include:
1. Send a daily report detailing completed and ongoing tasks.
2. Take inbound sales calls, customer requests and/or complaints and make outbound calls.
3. Respond to customer questions via phone call, email, live chat, Facebook messenger, or SMS.
4. Provide service quotes & make sure to do a follow-up with the leads.
5. Book new jobs, reschedule &/or update service jobs in our booking calendar system.
6. Identify customers’ needs, clarify information, research every issue, and provide solutions and/or alternatives
7. Be on the front lines of finding and hiring new cleaning talent

We are invested in our agent’s success. You will go far if you are/have:
- 2 Years of Sales Experience
- A fast learner
- A great communicator
- Calm and collected under pressure
- Can help us optimize our current processes
- Be a self-starter

This is a full-time position. You need to have excellent English skills.

Work hours are Monday to Friday 5:00 pm to 8:00 pm Central Standard Time with the option to expand hours on weekends or earlier on weekdays. $4.5-6/hr. to start, with raises every 6 months.

If accepted, you will be provided with training to help respond to customer queries via phone call, email, live chat, Facebook messenger, & SMS.

How to Apply:
Send an email to riley@tidyhandstx.com with the subject line: “I want to be a sales representative”. Please include a link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile within the email when you apply then complete the Google form you will receive in an email.

Note: After you send the email to apply, you will receive a response from me with a link to a Google form. Please complete the questions in the Google form to be considered for this position. Forms that are not completed or only partially completed will not be considered. In the form, you will be asked your age. Answer 40 to prove you are paying attention to detail.

I look forward to working with you!

title: EDM Manager
description:
Job Summary
Urban Road is seeking a dynamic and hands-on EDM Manager to lead our email, SMS, and MMS marketing efforts. This role is crucial in driving our customer engagement, loyalty, and revenue growth through strategic and innovative digital messaging. With a strong focus on Klaviyo, the EDM Manager will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimising campaigns that resonate with our audience and contribute to the overall success of our brand.


Department: Marketing
Reports To: Head of Marketing
Location: Burleigh Heads, QLD Australia (REMOTE ROLE)


Key Responsibilities
1. Campaign Strategy and Planning
Develop and Execute Campaigns: Lead the development and hands-on execution of comprehensive EDM strategies across email, SMS, and MMS channels, with a focus on utilising Klaviyo for optimising email flows.
Lead Capture and Database Growth: Own and execute the strategy for lead generation and database growth, ensuring compliance with data protection regulations while expanding our reach.
Content Personalization: Leverage Klaviyo’s segmentation and personalization features to craft highly targeted content that enhances customer engagement and drives revenue.
2. Performance Tracking and Optimization
Analytics and Reporting: Actively monitor and report on campaign performance using Klaviyo’s tools, focusing on metrics like open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates. Use insights to continuously improve campaign outcomes.
A/B Testing: Implement and manage A/B tests to refine content and optimise engagement, applying learnings to drive higher revenue.
3. Customer Relationship Management
Loyalty Campaigns: Develop, manage, and execute loyalty programs to reward repeat customers and build long-term relationships.
Repeat Purchases: Design and optimise email flows targeting repeat purchases, leveraging Klaviyo’s predictive analytics and insights.
Customer Engagement: Maintain strong customer relationships through relevant and timely communications, directly contributing to increased customer satisfaction and retention.
4. Compliance and Deliverability
Regulatory Compliance: Ensure all campaigns comply with GDPR, CAN-SPAM, and other relevant regulations, staying informed on the latest data privacy laws.
Deliverability Management: Oversee campaign delivery, ensuring optimal sender reputation and mobile responsiveness.
5. Collaboration and Coordination
Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work closely with content creators, designers, and data analysts to ensure campaigns are aligned with company goals and delivered effectively.
Vendor and Tool Management: Manage relationships with Klaviyo and other vendors, ensuring the effective use of tools and platforms.
6. Innovation and Continuous Improvement
Trend Monitoring: Stay ahead of industry trends and innovations in EDM marketing, particularly within the eCommerce sector, to keep our strategies cutting-edge.
Creative Development: Lead the development of interactive and engaging content, incorporating storytelling and multimedia elements to boost customer engagement.

Qualifications
Experience: Minimum 3-5 years of experience in EDM or digital marketing, with at least 2 years of hands-on experience using Klaviyo in an eCommerce environment.
Skills: Advanced proficiency in Klaviyo, including segmentation, automation, and analytics. Strong analytical skills and a passion for hands-on execution and optimization of email flows.
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field.

Key Competencies
Hands-On Execution: Passion for being directly involved in the planning, execution, and optimization of campaigns.
Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and execute long-term strategies that align with business goals.
Customer-Centric Approach: Strong focus on enhancing customer experience and driving customer loyalty.
Analytical Skills: Capability to analyze data, derive insights, and make informed decisions to optimize campaigns.
Collaboration: Effective in working cross-functionally and managing relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

What We Offer:
Competitive Salary and Benefits: Enjoy a competitive salary package along with 20 days of paid annual leave in addition to public holidays.
Professional Growth: Urban Road provides opportunities for professional development, allowing you to grow within a dynamic and innovative team.
Creative Environment: Work with a forward-thinking company where your contributions are valued and creativity is encouraged.
Flexible Hours: Self managed roster with the ability to complete work with flexible start and finish times between 8am and 6pm AEST 

About Urban Road
Urban Road is a leading Australian home decoration brand known for our commitment to quality, creativity, and innovation. We are passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and inspiring products that transform spaces into homes. Our values of creativity, collaboration, and customer-centricity drive everything we do, and we believe in empowering our team members to contribute their best.

Our Values
Creativity: We embrace creativity in every aspect of our business, encouraging innovative thinking and solutions.
Collaboration: We believe in the power of teamwork and collaboration, working together to achieve common goals.
Customer-Centricity: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do, and we strive to exceed their expectations through every interaction.

Application Process
If you are a proactive and skilled EDM Manager with a passion for digital marketing and customer engagement, we would love to hear from you. Please send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are a good fit for this role.

title: VIRTUAL RECEPTIONIST (JOB ID: IOVR750)
description:
Virtual Receptionist

We're a U.S.-based virtual receptionist company providing exceptional customer service for home service businesses. We're looking for a motivated and detail-oriented individual to join our team!

Benefits

Competitive compensation: $750/month
Flexible schedule: 5 days a week, 9 hours per day with a 1-hour lunch break and two 15-minute breaks.
Pacific Standard Time (Los Angeles)
We offer a chance to develop your skills, be part of a supportive team, and contribute to a growing company!

PLEASE SUBMIT a Whatsapp recording of you reading this script to this number: 747-242-8808

[Introduction] Hello, thank you for calling WeZib support. My name is [Your Name], and I’m here to assist you today. How can I help you?

Thank you for sharing that with me. I understand that you’re experiencing an issue where your Clover POS system is displaying a 'Transaction Failed – Unable to Connect to Server' error every time you try to process a payment. Is that correct?"

[Pause for Confirmation]

[Providing a Solution] "Let’s go ahead and resolve this for you. Here’s what we can do:

Step 1: First, let’s reboot your Clover POS system. Please hold down the power button until the system powers off completely. Once it’s off, wait for about 10 seconds and then turn it back on by pressing the power button again.

Step 2: Next, once the system has restarted, let’s check the network connection. Please go to the settings menu on your Clover device and navigate to the 'Network' or 'Wi-Fi' section. Make sure your device is connected to the correct network and that the signal strength is strong. If it’s connected, but the issue persists, try disconnecting from the network and reconnecting.

Step 3: Finally, after reconnecting, try processing a small test transaction to see if the issue is resolved. You should see the transaction go through successfully without any error messages. If it works, that means the connection issue has been resolved."

[Closing the Call] "Great! If the problem occurs again, or if you have any other issues, feel free to reach out to us anytime. Thank you for contacting [Your Company Name] support, and I hope you have a wonderful day!"

title: Billing Specialist
description:
Company
The OCD and Anxiety Treatment Center has a true passion for bringing help and hope to some of the most underserved
clinical populations. We strive to change the lives of individuals and their families who have been suffering from
unrelenting anxiety, disturbing and terrifying thoughts, uncontrollable worry, exhausting behaviors and rituals, and
avoidance that keeps them from living their lives. We are an evidence-based practice, which means we do what works,
we stay up to date with scientific research, and we regularly attend international training to keep us at our very best.

Summary
A billing specialist is someone who enjoys utilizing their medical billing expertise. The position requires a motivated and
professional individual who will contribute positively to the team by helping others problem-solve in a collaborative
environment. They will use EMR software and contribute to the full revenue cycle management services, including payer
credentialing and contracting, claims, payments, follow-up, and denial resolution. They have a thorough knowledge of
payer policies, guidelines, appeals, corrected/voided claim submission, and up-to-date on all-payer changes. They verify
the completeness and accuracy of all claims before submission and accurately post all insurance and client payments.

Objectives:
• Understands and utilizes relevant laws and best practices

• Adheres to all company policies and procedures
• Presents self in a professional manner

• Creates invoices for submission

contractual agreements
• Performs a variety of duties, including accounts receivable, customer service, correspondence response, and
daily reconciliation of activities
• Manages unassigned payments and applies them to outstanding balances or submits requests forrefund
Requirements:
• Proficient knowledge of computers, including Microsoft Word, Excel, and other computersoftware
• Accurate and efficient electronic data entry
• Must be punctual and maintain excellent attendance
• Organized, detail-oriented, takes initiative, and completes job responsibilitiesindependently

• Multitask, problem-solve, interpersonal skills, and strong written and verbal communication skills
Maintain confidentiality and trustworthiness

title: Webflow Web Developer
description:
As a Web Designer & Developer for Webflow, your main responsibilities will be creating and managing websites. We have a rapidly growing business and are developing more within our home improvement service. All of these require skilled writing to maintain and grow.

### **Web Design:**

- Collaborate with the team to design Low-Fi and High-Fi prototypes for GorbMedia clients.
- Improve and provide suggestions for better UX and UI designs.
- Create visually appealing and user-friendly layouts.
- Ensure the website is responsive and compliant across mobile, tablet, and desktop formats.
- Integrate relevant content and media in collaboration with the marketing and content teams.
- Conduct user research and testing to refine design solutions.

### **Web Development:**

- Develop and implement website features using Webflow, including new pages, components, and functionality.
- Ensure website performance and security by applying best practices in development.
- Upload videos and write/add informative content as required.
- Create and maintain internal tools and automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
- Perform cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent performance.

### **Website Technical SEO:**

- Publish SEO-optimized websites, focusing on:
- Alt text for images
- Page speed optimization
- Proper page structure and headings
- Image compression
- Canonical tags
- Configuration of robots.txt file
- XML sitemaps
- Page indexing
- Google Analytics
- and other SEO Compliance requirements
- Stay informed about the latest Webflow SEO optimization recommendations and industry best practices.
- Implement schema markup, including local, review, and organizational schemas.
- Collaborate with the SEO team to identify and resolve technical SEO issues.
- Implement technical SEO recommendations for clients.
- Conduct technical audits to ensure website health and performance.

### **Communication and Collaboration:**

- Communicate and collaborate with the team to understand project requirements, provide updates, and address any concerns.
- Ensure timely delivery of high-quality work and adherence to project deadlines.
- Assist in managing and executing various micro-projects as needed.
- Provided technical support and troubleshooted website-related issues.
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, tools, and best practices.

## Characteristics & Qualifications:

- Expert in the following Applications:
- Webflow
- Figma
- Relume
- Notion
- Google:
- Google Search Console
- Google Analytics
- Has a blend of technical expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills to ensure our client's websites perform at their best & tools to support our internal teams.
- Ability to translate design mockups into functional web pages
- Ability to understand and align with the brand, mission, and client avatar
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
- When you apply, write the title of your job post, “Web Design 49 from,” and then add your name.
- Maintains a positive and constructive approach to work, understands and respects the perspectives of others, and is committed to personal and professional growth


Questions to Answer:
- Provide at least 3 websites that you have worked on or developed.
- When sending your resume, please describe a few of the hardest problems you solved and exactly how you solved them within your profession.

title: Digital Marketing Strategist & Ads Specialist
description:
Multipeak Marketing, a Christian-based digital marketing company, is seeking an experienced and highly skilled Digital Marketing Strategist & Ads Specialist. This role is ideal for someone with deep expertise in digital marketing strategies, ad optimization, and client management within the orthodontic and dental industry. You will collaborate closely with our team to enhance advertising performance, streamline client campaigns, and ensure our websites and email automation systems are operating at peak efficiency, all while upholding our Christian values and commitment to integrity.

Key Responsibilities:

Ad Management & Optimization:

- Strategize, create, and optimize ads on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Google, and TikTok.
- Monitor and analyze ad performance, adjusting strategies to maximize ROI and meet client objectives.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends and best practices, implementing advanced strategies to improve client ad performance.

Client Communication & Management:

- Collaborate with clients to understand their goals, provide regular updates, and deliver comprehensive reports on campaign performance.
- Handle client communications for ad campaigns, email marketing, and website updates, ensuring all client needs are met promptly.

Website Design & Maintenance:

- Design and maintain custom WordPress websites for clients, ensuring functionality, user experience, and SEO optimization.
- Manage website updates, landing page creation, and blog post publishing using WordPress and HubSpot.
 
Email Campaigns & Automation:

- Design, implement, and optimize email campaigns and automation workflows on platforms like HubSpot and ActiveCampaign.
- Develop and execute targeted email strategies to increase engagement and conversions.

HubSpot Management:

- Utilize HubSpot for client relationship management, email marketing, and reporting.
- Integrate and organize client data within HubSpot, ensuring accurate tracking and reporting.

Graphic Design:

- Create visually appealing designs using Photoshop and Canva for various digital and print projects, including ads, email templates, and trade show materials.

Content Creation & Strategy:

- Collaborate with the team to plan and execute content strategies for clients, including blog posts, video content, and social media creatives.
- Ensure all content aligns with client branding and marketing goals.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience in digital marketing, with a strong focus on ad management and optimization across Facebook, Instagram, Google, and TikTok.
- Advanced knowledge of HubSpot, including email marketing, automation, and CRM management.
- Proficiency in WordPress for website design and maintenance, with a strong understanding of SEO best practices.
- Expertise in email marketing platforms like HubSpot and ActiveCampaign.
- Strong graphic design skills, with experience in Photoshop and Canva.
- Excellent client communication skills, with a focus on delivering results and maintaining strong client relationships.
- Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
- A strategic thinker with a passion for staying ahead of digital marketing trends.
- Alignment with Christian values and a commitment to integrity in all professional interactions.

Preferred Skills:

- Experience in the orthodontic and dental industry is a plus.
- Advanced certifications in digital marketing, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, or related fields.
- Familiarity with analytic tools and tagging for precise campaign tracking and reporting.

Communication & Task Management:

- We use Slack for team communication and Todoist for task management. Familiarity with these platforms is a plus.
How to Apply:

To stand out from the crowd, please send us a video introducing yourself, showcasing your experience, and explaining why you’d be a great fit for this role. Email your video to tyler@multipeakmarketing.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Executive Admin
description:
Join a dynamic and innovative company that empowers entrepreneurs, particularly women, in real estate investing and wealth-building strategies. We offer comprehensive resources, including educational programs, coaching, and community support, to help individuals achieve financial independence. Focusing on actionable insights and practical tools, we are dedicated to guiding our members through every step of their entrepreneurial journey, from initial investment to long-term success.
We are seeking a versatile and proactive Virtual Assistant who can support various aspects of our operations. This role involves content management, customer support, event coordination, digital product management, administrative support, financial administration, and market research. The ideal candidate will have a strong ability to multitask, excellent communication skills, and a passion for helping others succeed.


Roles and Responsibilities:

Content Management
• Schedule Social Media Posts: Create and maintain a content calendar, scheduling posts across various social media platforms.
• Content Editing and Proofreading: Review and edit social media posts, blog articles, and digital product materials for accuracy and consistency.
• Content Coordination: Collaborate with content creators and designers to ensure timely delivery of content.
• Video Editing: Edit videos for social media and digital product materials.

Customer Support
• Customer Inquiry Handling: Respond to customer inquiries across social media, email, and other platforms. Provide information about courses, mentorship programs, masterminds, and conferences.
• Customer Relationship Management: Maintain a CRM system to track customer interactions and feedback, ensuring customer satisfaction and addressing any issues.

Event Coordination
• Event Planning and Logistics: Assist in organizing online and in-person events, handling venue bookings, travel arrangements, and other logistical details.
• Attendee Management: Manage attendee registrations, send out reminders, provide support during events, and coordinate with speakers and sponsors.
• Graphic Design: Create visual assets for event promotions and materials.

Digital Product Management
• Course and Mentorship Program Coordination: Assist in the creation and updating of course materials and mentorship resources, and manage online platforms for delivering digital products.
• Sales and Promotion: Support marketing efforts to promote courses, mentorship programs, and events, while tracking sales and performance metrics.
• Go High Level (CRM and Marketing Automation): Utilize Go High Level for CRM management and funnel design.

Administrative Support
• Email and Calendar Management: Manage the influencer's email inbox and calendar, scheduling meetings, calls, and appointments.
• Document Preparation and Organization: Prepare reports, presentations, and other documents, while organizing and maintaining digital and physical files.

Financial Administration
• Invoicing and Payments: Handle invoicing for digital products and events, tracking and managing payments and expenses.
• Budgeting and Financial Reporting: Assist in budget planning and financial reporting for various projects.

Market Research and Analysis
• Audience Insights: Conduct research to understand audience preferences and trends, and analyze social media engagement and feedback to inform content strategy.
• Competitor Analysis: Monitor competitors and industry trends to identify opportunities and threats.

Miscellaneous Tasks
• Brand Representation: Represent the influencer's brand professionally in all communications and interactions.
• Continuous Improvement: Suggest and implement improvements to processes and workflows.

Qualifications:
• Proven experience in a similar role, preferably in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
• Strong communication, organizational, and multitasking skills.
• Proficiency in content creation, social media management, video editing, and CRM systems (preferably Go High Level).
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a proactive and problem-solving mindset.
• Attention to detail and commitment to quality in all tasks.

How to Apply: If you are passionate about empowering others and have the skills and experience required, we would love to hear from you. Please apply at this link: docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScPnyfp9ugkDbb2jAN9wMCCCsdCocjo0VH_Zr0Z1Ge3USKM_A/viewform

title: Operational & Executive Assistant
description:
Are you looking to work for an ELITE level entrepreneur?

If you consider yourself to be a skilled Operational Assistant, this might just be your dream job...

How would you like to be part of a FAST GROWING, highly motivated team that will pay you what YOU ARE WORTH, while giving you unlimited potential to grow within the company?

If that gets you excited, you need to read this:

My name is Jayden and I'm the CEO of AMZ Success Academy. 

In the past 12 months, we have helped over 200 clients start, grow and scale their Amazon businesses to 10K/mo, 20K/mo, and some even past 100K/month. 

And in light of that, we are looking to hire a operational / executive assistant to help us with operational efficiency as we are rapidly scaling this company. 

This is not your traditional "freelance gig" where you work 1-2 hours per day and finish a project every week...

This position will START full time and we will need to you go ALL IN with our company as you will be working as my right hand man. 

Primary Responsibilities (Minimum 40 hours a week) include but are not limited to: 

-- Increase Operational Efficiency of the Company 
-- Creating Airtable Bases & Google Sheets 
-- Input Data on Google Sheets and Airtable 
-- Doing Quality Control checks 
-- Creating automations using Zapier & Make 
-- Creating automations using Close.io & Calendly 
-- Creating SOP's for team members to follow 
-- Any other operational task that Jayden needs done

You must have also mastered these softwares 

- Airtable 
- Make 
- Zapier 
- Calendly 
- Zoom 
- Slack 
- Manychat 
- Close.io 
- Trello

WHO THIS IS NOT FOR: 

-- If you have NO real-world experience with being a EA
-- If you are not willing to go ALL IN with our company, and like to have multiple jobs, this is not for you.
-- If you are not willing to work some weekends, or a few extra hours because the team needs you, this is not for you. 
-- If you do not like to work hard, work fast, and collaborate in a team environment, do not apply. 
-- If you cannot handle a critical, demanding environment where your CEO (Jayden) will be tough on you when giving you constructive criticism to build you into a better team member, this is not for you. 

WHO THIS IS FOR:

-- If you have over a year of REAL-WORLD experience being an EA
-- If you are willing to go ALL IN, long term for at least 2+ years with our team, this is for you. 
-- If you like to be paid off of PERFORMANCE (meaning the results you bring to the company) rather than hourly pay, this is for you. 
-- If you are LOYAL, and want to have a long term relationship with your employer who will treat and compensate you the right way for years to come, this is for you. 

Compensation: 

For the primary responsibilities listed above, full-time compensation will start at around $500-$800 USD/month. 

This however, is NEGOTIABLE. If you have extensive experience and can justify why a higher retainer makes sense, I am open to hearing you out. Pay is a reflection of value, and if you can show that you can deliver more value, I'm more than happy to compensate you more. 

If you’ve reached the bottom of this, it means you’re still interested in this position. 

If so, please do the following (Not following these steps COMPLETELY will result in your disqualification):

Question 1: What type of work experience do you have as an EA or Operational Assistant? 

Question 2: Send over your resume or CV

Question 3: Are you able to work in a US time zone

Question 4: What is your Whatapp so we can reach out to you directly?

Question 5: Do you have job experience using Airtable and Zapier?

DEADLINE: We are receiving a LOT of applications for this, and so I would encourage you to apply for this AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. If you're reading this, that means position is still open. As soon as we find the right candidate, we will close this application.

If you are qualified, Jayden/his team will reach out to schedule interview in the next 24-48 hours

Talk to you soon,

Jayden

title: Account Sales Manager - Very Competitive Salary!
description:
OVERVIEW
The Account Sales Manager serves as a pivotal link between the company and its clients, responsible for fostering and maintaining strong client relationships while driving business growth. They act as the primary point of contact for assigned accounts, understanding their needs, addressing their concerns, and delivering tailored solutions to meet their requirements.
In this role, the Account Sales Manager manages a portfolio of client accounts, identifies opportunities for upselling and cross-selling, and ensures the successful implementation of the company's products or services. They collaborate closely with internal teams, including sales, marketing, and customer support, to deliver exceptional service and value to clients.

RESPONSIBILITIES
Develop strong, long-lasting relationships with clients by understanding their needs, preferences, and business goals. Establish trust and rapport to become a reliable advisor.
Oversee the health and status of assigned accounts, ensuring clients are satisfied and their expectations are met or exceeded. Proactively identify and address any potential issues.
Serve as the main point of contact for clients, managing all communications and inquiries. Ensure timely and effective resolution of client concerns and requests.
Identify and pursue opportunities to expand accounts through upselling and cross-selling strategies. Develop and execute strategic plans to increase client spend and maximize revenue.
Ensure all client needs are met within the agreed service level parameters. Coordinate with internal teams to deliver solutions that meet client requirements.
Act as the quarterback for client-related initiatives, coordinating with various departments to ensure seamless execution of projects and initiatives.
Maintain a strong understanding of our products and services. Provide clients with accurate and comprehensive information to help them make informed decisions.
Develop and implement strategies to encourage satisfied clients to refer new business. Track and measure referral success and adjust strategies as needed.
Regularly review account performance metrics and client feedback to identify areas for improvement and opportunities for growth.
Collaborate with clients to develop tailored strategies that align with their business objectives and drive mutual success.
Provide training and support to clients on product usage, best practices, and new features. Ensure clients are fully utilizing our products to their maximum potential.
Collect and relay client feedback to internal teams to drive product and service improvements. Advocate for client needs within the organization.

THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
Strong ability to build and maintain professional relationships with clients.
Demonstrated success in driving account growth and achieving sales targets.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and effectively.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to address client issues and identify opportunities for improvement.
Skilled negotiator with the ability to close deals and manage contract renewals.
Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks.
In-depth knowledge of our products and services, and the ability to quickly learn new products and features.
2+ years Account Management experience

TECHNOLOGY REQUIREMENT
Minimum 80 mbps Internet Speed
Minimum intel i5 8th gen with 8GB of RAM
Webcam and Headset
Designated Office Space in your home

CULTURE COMPETENCIES
Have a Drive to Win
The Team's Success is my Success
Growth
Perform with Excellence
Confident with Humility
Speak up

JOB OVERVIEW
Job Location: PH Remote
Job Type: Remote
Department: Sales
Reports To: VP of Sales
Shift: 9AM - 5:30PM ET
Direct Report(s): N/A

title: Onboarding Head (GPO Lead)
description:
Are you passionate about building strong client relationships, dedicated to delivering exceptional service, and ready to lead the charge in creating memorable onboarding experiences? If so, we want you to join us on our mission to redefine the way we welcome clients to our Medical Company.

The Onboarding Head is responsible for overseeing the onboarding of new accounts, maintenance of client profiles and updating of customer licensing as required. This individual will also be responsible for meeting or exceeding team KPIs, daily development of team associates and the overall success of the customer onboarding process.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

- Regularly review GPO (Group Purchasing Organization) contracts for pricing and product updates
- Determine, at the time of processing, if any accessorial contracts need to be loaded to the customer profile
- Proactively contact current customers when licensing is due to expire to ensure no lapse in service or contract connections
- Ensure the Onboarding team is following up on daily tasks and tickets
- Proactively alert account managers when a new account does not have the necessary documentation to complete account setup with a particular vendor
- Effectively communicate with internal and external customers on status of onboarding requests
- Review team dashboards and KPIs weekly and provide insight to Director of Operations on gaps to be addressed or any issues that arise
- Ensure all customer/vendor accounts are established within timelines provided, proactively report and remediate any delays

THE IDEAL CANDIDATE
- Fluent in written and spoken English with minimal spoken accent. 
- 8+ years experience managing supply chain connections or multi-warehouse distribution
- Is a natural leader with a passion for building relationships and a talent for inspiring trust and confidence.
- Thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and excels at juggling multiple priorities and deadlines.
- Has a creative mindset and a knack for thinking outside the box when it comes to designing memorable experiences for clients.
- Is a proactive problem-solver who can anticipate challenges, identify solutions, and drive results.
- Ability to work independently, self-motivate and work from a remote setting
- High attention to detail and extremely organized 
- Customer satisfaction focused
- Team player
- Ability to multitask on high demanding and stressful tasks
- Ability to exceed goals on a daily, weekly, monthly and annual basis. 
- Strong performer in metric-based environment 

TECHNOLOGY REQUIREMENT
- Minimum 80 mbps Internet Speed
- Minimum intel i5 8th gen with 8GB of RAM
- Webcam and Headset
- Designated Office Space in your home

WE OFFER A VERY COMPETITIVE PAY FOR THIS ROLE WHOEVER IS SUCCESSFULLY SELECTED. 
GROWTH OPPORTUNITY
POSSIBLE INCENTIVES BASE ON PERFORMANCE

title: Customer Service Representative

title: Virtual Operations Executive
description:
Job Summary:
The Virtual Operations Executive will support the day-to-day operations of our short-term rental properties. This is not just a customer service role but a multifaceted position that requires attention to detail, quick problem-solving skills, and the ability to juggle multiple tasks efficiently. You will be the first point of contact for guests, manage maintenance coordination, and ensure all aspects of property management run seamlessly.
Key Responsibilities:
Guest Communication & Support
Serve as the first-hand responder for guest inquiries and issues via platforms like Airbnb, Booking.com, Expedia, and direct emails.
Address guest concerns over the phone, resolving issues promptly and effectively to enhance guest satisfaction.
Respond to negative reviews professionally and promptly, ensuring guest feedback is acknowledged and actioned.
Operational Coordination
Liaise with on-ground maintenance supervisors to ensure timely resolution of maintenance issues.
Conduct pre-arrival and post-departure checks, ensuring that all properties are in excellent condition for incoming guests.
Audit & Reporting
Audit invoices and expenses from various platforms to ensure accuracy and compliance with company policies.
Provide structured reports on property status, guest feedback, and any operational challenges.
Tech & AI Integration
Utilize AI tools such as ChatGPT for prompt generation and task automation to optimize guest communication and internal processes.
Requirements:
Experience:
Minimum of 2 years of experience in hospitality management or short-term rental BPO (Business Process Outsourcing).
Previous experience working with major short-term rental platforms (Airbnb, Booking.com, Expedia) is a must.
Skills:
Exceptional organizational skills and the ability to handle a high-volume workload efficiently.
Strong problem-solving abilities, with a focus on resolving guest issues swiftly and professionally.

title: Customer Service
description:
We are a startup company that provides specialized software for patent law firms. Our user base is growing quickly and we are looking for someone to deal with support requests. Initially, your task would be mostly to try to understand the problem that a user reports, try to reproduce it, discuss with a programmer how the issue can be solved, and to report to the user via email. In the long run, we hope that you can gain so much knowledge about our software that you can also give live support to users via video calls where they share their screen.

You should have
- very good English skills
- a communicative and friendly character
- background in software, e.g. a university degree in computer science or engineering, or some programming experience or in depth experience with office software
- an interest in technology and willingness to learn our software product

Ideally, you would regularly be available during office hours in Germany, i.e., you should be willing to work late in the evening Philippines time.

Depending on your qualification, the initial hourly rate could be 6 USD. If you have a strong technical background (e.g. bachelors degree in Computer Science with very good grades) and you speak very good English it could be up to around 12 USD.

The work is initially part time but could grow into fulltime. If you have a Bachelor degree in natural sciences or engineering, after one or two years we might offer an employment in Munich, Germany.

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips.

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:
EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing
We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing
We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.
You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)
You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform
You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.
*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*
If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:
Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement with your new employer, you get to meet her in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.
Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process!


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $400 USD a month ($4800 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification

title: Web Marketing Analyst
description:

Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing and development teams to implement data-driven strategies and solutions that align with our clients' goals.
Continuous Learning: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in web analytics and digital marketing.

Proven experience as a Web Analyst or similar role.
Proficiency in Zoho PageSense and Google Tag Manager is required.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
Experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) and A/B testing platforms.
Knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS is a plus.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Detail-oriented with a passion for improving web performance.

- Healthcard

title: HVAC/R Operations Coordinator

They offer a unique pairing of software and services to save customers money on emergency repairs and energy bills. The role requires prior customer service experience, with a proven ability to multi-task and speak to and assist a wide range of customers.

-Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading - MUST

-Experience in customer service with a strong commitment to customer happiness and satisfaction
-Experience problem-solving to meet customer needs
-Strong computer skills
-Ability to learn new technology, share knowledge, and provide feedback to improve our company's internal processes
-Ability to work independently and in a team setting
-Ability to prioritize in a fast-paced environment and excellent time management skills
-A positive, can-do attitude and eagerness for continuous improvement
-Experience with Zoho tools (Zoho desk, Zoho books, CRM) - ADVANTAGE

Work Schedule:

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:

2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Laravel & React JS - 5+ Years of Experience
description:
Hey there, code wizards!

We’re on the hunt for a rockstar developer with 5+ years of hands-on experience in Laravel, React JS, Laravel Filament, and Next.js. If you’re ready to dive into this exciting role, we want to hear all about your adventures with these tech tools.

Here’s the scoop:

Start Date: ASAP! We’re ready when you are.
Hours: Full-time, 40 hours a week. Kick-off at 7 AM and wrap up by 4 PM, Philippines time (with a one-hour lunch break to recharge those brain cells).
Days: Monday to Friday – because weekends are for fun!
Salary: Between 70,000 PHP and 90,000 PHP per month, depending on how much you dazzle us with your skills.
Extras: Yep, there are additional benefits too!

What we need from you:

Laravel Superpowers:

Laravel Framework Whiz: You know your way around Laravel for building slick web applications, APIs, and databases.
MVC Mastery: You can dance with the Model-View-Controller pattern that Laravel loves.
Database Dynamo: You’re a pro with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or any database that pals around with Laravel.
API Ace: Crafting and consuming APIs with Laravel is your jam.
Security Sensei: You’re all about keeping things secure with CSRF protection, authentication, and authorization.
Testing Tactician: PHPUnit and other testing frameworks? You’ve got this.
Composer Connoisseur: Managing PHP dependencies with Composer is a piece of cake for you.
Laravel Filament Fun: You’ve played around with the Laravel Filament admin panel package and lived to tell the tale.

React Razzle-Dazzle:

React Rockstar: Building front-end applications with React.js is second nature to you.
Component Guru: You’re all about that component-based architecture life.
State Savvy: Redux, Context API, MobX – you know how to manage state like a boss.
JSX Jedi: JSX syntax and the virtual DOM are your playground.
API Integration: Integrating React apps with RESTful APIs (maybe even ones built with Laravel) is a breeze for you.
UI/UX Unicorn: You’ve got an eye for intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Front-end Tools Tamer: Webpack, Parcel, npm, Yarn – you’re familiar with the whole gang.
Next.js Ninja: Building server-side rendered and statically generated web apps with Next.js? You bet!

If you’re ready to join our fun and dynamic team, show us your tech chops by detailing your experience with the above points. If you’ve got the goods, we’ll be in touch. If not, well, we might not be the right fit this time around. 

Happy coding!
