title: REMOTE Executive Assistant
description:
Do you thrive in organizing chaos in a fast-paced, ever-changing, and growing environment? Have you been an EA for companies in multiple industries? 

An EA in our environment is someone who aspires to assist with demonstrated confidentiality and discretion, who can plan out tasks, ensure deadlines are met, work as a team player and ensure quality standards are kept. If that excites you, then we may have the perfect EA role for you.

We are seeking an experienced, high level, Executive Assistant to work remotely filling a major role supporting the Management Team. Ensuring accuracy and completeness you will manage emails, calendars, and expenses, attend meetings to support management, Communicate with internal and external stakeholder, and Project Assist with the Team on projects. 

If this sounds like it may be a good fit for you, please read on.

About Our Workplace Environment: We are about work/life balance in this fast paced ever changing environment of design build construction. We believe in mutual honesty and respect with those we work with and understand that we ALL are focused on the same end goal of exceeding customer expectations while delivering quality design and craftsmanship. 

Executive Assistant Job Responsibilities: The job responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:
• Manages Emails, including filing and routing, organization, replies, and saving attachments.
• Manages Calendars for Executive’s, including scheduling internal and external meetings, Time Blocking, re-schedule as needed, arrange travel accommodations, including airfare, hotels, cars, restaurants. 
• Manages Expenses, including filling out expense reports and other paperwork on behalf of the executives, contacting and resolving errors with vendors on incorrect expenses.
• Project Assist including internal research, order samples/products, uploading & entering information in CRM & project management software, working & follow-up with vendors, task creation and monitoring in PM software 
• Communication includes maintaining contact database, creating Loom videos for repetitive tasks, receive Teams messages with tasks, requests, etc.
• Attend Meetings Remotely includes taking minutes, creating action items for all attendees, email action items along with copy of minutes, create “To Do” items in BT/Project Teams and assign task for completion.


Work Hours: Our office hours are Monday – Friday, 7am – 4pm PST with some flexibility


Executive Assistant Skills and Qualifications: 

• Bachelor’s Degree preferred (if not, must have worked at minimum 5 years in Executive Assistant role)
• Confidentiality – Must sign NDA Agreement & pass a Background Check
• Excellent organization and time-management skills
• Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
• Proficient in Microsoft Office 365- Teams, Outlook, SharePoint, Word, Excel
• Construction Industry knowledge preferred (if no experience, willing to learn)
• Builder Trend Software and Bluebeam Revu experience preferred (if no experience, willing to spend extra time to learn the software)

During the interview process the successful candidate will be asked questions and participate in a live video interview. 

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, cover letter, and answers to the 5 questions listed below to resume@mvaninc.com. If you are considered for the position, you will receive a reply with a link to upload an audio or video introduction (required) outlining your qualifications and interest in the position.

Please note that only applicants who complete all 4 requirements will be considered for interviews. 
If you are selected for an interview, you will be given a task to complete, and the interview will be conducted on MS Teams. We look forward to reviewing your application! 

1. Describe the last 2 EA roles you have had and what you did for the company?

2. Tell us about the best working relationship you have had with a previous CEO/President?

3. Are you currently working? If yes, what about your current position is making you look elsewhere for work?

4. This is a 40hr a week role, what is your desired compensation. 

5. What about this job post resonates with you and why?

title: B2B Lead Generator and Strong Writer for US Accounting Agency + SaaS
description:
We are looking for an experienced lead generator with a strong background in selling B2B to the American market. You should have experience with cold outbound (emailing + running social media campaigns)

This job is roughly 20 hours per week (4 hr/ day), and is fully flexible when you work. 

It will start mostly base pay hourly + a fixed fee per qualified meeting set ($25), but eventually can have more enticing compensation plans as deals get closed. 

Eventually this job could grow to more hours and responsibilities.

Some of the things you will be doing:
Cold outbound:
- Cold emailing. You should be confident in writing sales emails that convert. You will have a budget to purchase relevant sales tools and data
- Prospecting. We can help you find leads, but you’ll also need to find them
- Reaching out to potential customers, or other leads who expressed interest

Warmer inbound:
-We’d also like for you to run our founders LinkedIn account. This includes making posts, engaging with others, DMing and connecting with relevant people and more.
- Creating sales content. Not the bulk of your job, but being able to help write case studies, and make an email newsletter might be included.
- Following up with inbound leads via email + messaging
- Suggestions changes for the website
- Helping find and implement technology that enhances automation for follow up, our CRM, and website.

You should be:
- Someone who likes to take initiative
- Is a strong writer & communicator
- Likes technology
- Is organized, and can keep track of many leads & tasks

Experience selling agency services and to the eCommerce industry is a plus!

Who are We?

We are a software + services company that automates accounting for Amazon sellers and are looking to grow our development team. You can learn more about us at sellanalytix.com. We use our proprietary accounting software for this.

To apply, please set the subject to “I can generate leads for your Accounting Software to Amazon sellers!!”, and share your experience in B2B lead generation, resume, your email address, and we will reach out soon!

title: Technical Support Engineer (contract)
description:
Company Description

We are …
We are Hextom, a leading SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) company based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Our mission is to empower e-commerce businesses with a comprehensive suite of software solutions designed to enhance sales and streamline store management. From customer engagement and SEO optimization to inventory management and store automation, our growing range of tools is integrated within the Shopify ecosystem. Hextom is a dynamic, rapidly growing company offering substantial opportunities for career advancement. We are dedicated to fostering a collaborative environment and supporting your professional development as you work towards achieving your career goals.

title: Senior WordPress Technical Support Engineers
description:
Overview

LevelUp is a specialist agency that provides WordPress technical support for vendors, agencies and website owners. We have been servicing a number of WordPress companies for over 5 years now, and have a rapidly growing team of skilled and passionate WordPress professionals. In line with the steady expansion of the company, we are in constant need to hire Senior Technical Support Engineers with great communication skills backed by solid technical knowledge. The ideal candidate has 3+ years of hands-on experience with WordPress and is passionate about providing top tier customer support.

Responsibilities

Help a variety of WordPress users across the world through ticket and live chat based help desk systems.
Guide customers on how to use specific products by answering their questions and providing correct information and clear instructions.
Diagnose problems that customers have on their sites and offer solutions.
Troubleshoot and investigate issues to identify the root cause of the problem.
Create detailed bug reports for developers so that they can quickly understand the issue and identify a fix. 
Share your knowledge and help other team members.
Keep up-to-date with important changes in the WordPress ecosystem with a focus on continuous learning and development.

Experience

-WordPress Experience
Over 3 years of hands-on experience with WordPress with in-depth knowledge of the WordPress ecosystem 
HTML and CSS
Proficient in creating well-structured HTML documents and implementing CSS from simple to more complex CSS techniques for styling. 
Can handle tasks like creating responsive layouts using media queries, styling elements, and implementing custom CSS solutions.

-JavaScript/jQuery
Possesses foundational knowledge of JavaScript and can understand basic scripts. 
Can implement simple jQuery scripts for basic interactivity on a website.
Is able to recognize JavaScript console errors and use them to help with troubleshooting issues.

-PHP
Familiar with basic PHP syntax and can understand how PHP code works within WordPress. 
Can make simple modifications to existing PHP code snippets.
Experience using custom hooks and filters to add or change functionality in WordPress.
Proficient in diagnosing and resolving WordPress issues using WP Debug, browser console errors, and other debugging tools.

-Experience with WordPress page builder plugins, theme builders, the block editor, common caching & performance optimisation plugins, and SEO plugins.
-Skilled in optimizing WordPress websites according to Google Core Web Vitals and PageSpeed Insights.
-Experienced in building and managing WooCommerce websites, including customizing WooCommerce templates.
-Capable of setting up WordPress local environments, staging sites, and site migration.
-Familiarity with WordPress security best practices, protocols, and permissions.
-Ability to create custom WordPress plugins and themes from scratch (nice to have)

Other Technical Experience

-Familiarity with common web hosting stacks, such as cPanel, NGINX, Apache, MySQL, etc.
-Proficient in cPanel or similar and FTP client tools like Filezilla for managing website files. 
-Proficient in using Cloudflare and possessing advanced DNS knowledge.
-Knowledge of CDNs and various types of caching.
-Proficient in command-line operations (SSH), including WP-CLI (nice to have).
-Previous exposure to live chat or help desk tools like Help Scout, Freshdesk, or Zendesk (nice to have).

Communication & Attitude

-Exceptional written and verbal English communication skills.
-Experience with technical/customer support or regularly interacting with clients on technical matters.
-A strong team player with a supportive and friendly attitude.
-Has a proactive and can-do approach to work. 
-Genuinely enjoys helping people solve their problems and cares about customer experience.
-Is passionate about continuous learning and self improvement.

Additional Information

-This is a fully remote position with a standard 40-hour fixed-schedule work week.
-The exact work schedule depends on the client that you are assigned to, but is often an afternoon or night schedule and so having flexibility when it comes to schedule is important.
-We have a company culture that focuses on the well-being of its team members, with a good work life balance and respectful work environment.

Need to hire two (2) Senior WordPress Technical Support Engineers

Apply on this link: https://bit.ly/snrtseAF

title: Cold Email Outreach Specialist (3+ Years Experience)
description:
A new opportunity has become available for a Cold Email Outreach Specialist to join Skayl, a fast-growing remote working UK-based digital marketing agency working with clients in the UK & USA.

As Cold Email Outreach Specialist, you will join Skayl with a minimum of 3 years of experience in cold email marketing, specifically with expertise in building and managing lead databases. Your role will involve leading the development and execution of cold email strategies to generate high-quality leads, increase response rates, and drive client acquisition. You will have the support of the wider team, including our leadership, to ensure you achieve our growth goals.

Role specification:

- Lead the development and execution of cold email strategies to generate high-quality leads, increase response rates, and drive client acquisition.
- Build and manage a lead database from scratch, including manually filtering leads to ensure they match our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP).
- Craft and send personalised cold email campaigns using tools like Apollo, Snov.io, and Clay, designed to resonate with potential clients and improve open and response rates.
- Conduct A/B testing on subject lines, email content, and calls to action to refine strategies and improve results.
- Track and report key metrics such as open rates, click-through rates, and conversions, and provide actionable insights to the leadership team.
- Collaborate with the leadership team to align outreach efforts with broader business goals and drive sustainable growth.

Required:

- Minimum 3+ years’ experience in cold email outreach with strong proficiency in building and managing lead databases.
- Experience in manual lead filtering to match leads with the Ideal Customer Profile (ICP).
- Strong communication skills - written and verbal, with a talent for crafting compelling email copy.
- Attention to detail and commitment to performance optimisation.
- Organised yet flexible, able to prioritise your workload to meet agreed deadlines.
- Exceptional technical skills in email marketing, with a solid understanding of CRM tools and email automation software.
- Experience running cold email campaigns for a UK-based digital marketing agency is preferred.

To apply, please do the following:

Submit a copy of your latest CV.

Submit a short intro video (loom recording is OK) that's about 3 mins long highlighting your skills, experiences, and the reasons why we should hire you. Start the video with the greeting “Hello Matt”.

Please submit your CV and link to your video, including your expected salary to hr@skayl.co.uk and indicate your expected salary for this role as well.

Thanks and looking forward to speaking to you soon.

title: The Career You Deserve: Email Coordinator
description:
Position Description
We are seeking a full-time (40 hours per week) freelance contractor to oversee the end-to-end production of email campaigns across multiple platforms one of our clients. In this role, you will handle setup, quality assurance, deployment, segmentation reporting, and analytics. You will work within client ESPs and SMS tools like Klaviyo, Attentive, and SMS Bump, manage approvals, monitor sends, troubleshoot technical issues, maintain email and SMS lists, and ensure compliance with GDPR policies and industry best practices. Additionally, you will compile weekly and monthly reports, provide strategic recommendations, and assist with project management related to campaign sends, automated programs, and retention efforts.


Your responsibilities will also include managing the importation and analysis of sales data from different angles such as products, retailers, and channels. You will develop and refine processes for accurate marketing and sales data reporting, extracting valuable insights to aid in decision-making and strategic planning. Utilizing various analytical tools, you will uncover trends and offer insights that drive efficiencies and strategic value for the business. You will report to both the Senior Director of Consumer Sales and the CMO, contributing to new marketing projects and initiatives as needed.



About the work
Help with email campaign production from end-to-end across multiple platforms, including setup, QA, deployment, segmentation reporting, and analytics for multiple clients
Work hands-on inside client ESPs & SMS tools such as Klaviyo, Attentive, and SMS Bump to execute campaigns
Manage the approvals process and route previews to internal and external stakeholders and implement all revisions
Monitor daily sends and troubleshoot technical issues related to HTML, segmentation, rendering, and deployment
Compile and maintain email and SMS lists and monitor list health and hygiene
Contribute to email strategy from the operational perspective ensuring email deliverability and that they consistently follow GDPR policies, branding and industry best practices
Compile weekly and monthly reports; summarize results of email campaigns, identify trends, and provide strategic recommendations to drive future optimization opportunities
Assist with project management related to campaign sends, automated programs, & retention efforts
Prioritize and manage multiple digital campaigns simultaneously
Produce error-free work, following standard operating procedures
Ensure proper landing pages are in place and operational
Optimize and monitor email and SMS signup units
Set up various automated email and SMS workflows
Assist with the creative briefing for clients
Perform quality assurance checks on soon-to-be deployed emails and associated assets
Constantly look for new ways to improve overall programs through new technology, tools, partners, trends, and best practices
Assist in new marketing projects/initiatives as necessary
Provide information regarding email marketing initiatives
Fill ad-hoc requests on an ongoing basis


Boxes to check
4+ years of experience in client services/account management in an advertising agency, marketing company, or client-side marketing department with a working knowledge of:
Online and offline creative development and production
Digital/Multichannel/Integrated Marketing 
Email campaign management 
Email deployment platform experience
Relationship/Client Management
Bachelor's degree required
Ability to multi-task and work well in a fast-changing environment
Intermediate proficiency in Excel
Klaviyo experience preferred
A desire to grow and learn more about the email marketing space
A basic understanding of HTML & CSS with the desire to learn more
A BS in Marketing/related field or equivalent experience
Good organizational skills & attention to detail while meeting tight deadlines


About the role
Full-time position at $10/hr, working 40 hours per week
Night shifts with fixed weekends off
Freelance job without benefits, insurance, or paid time off
Long-term engagement/contract
Permanent work-from-home setup

title: Voice over (horror story) for my youtube channel
description:
Hi,

Hope you are doing great.

We are looking for a voice-over artist for the long term. We create faceless youtube videos (better known as youtube automation.

The scripts will be a maximum of 25 minutes.

- $1 for every minute
- How many voiceovers of 25 minutes could you deliver a day?
- Could you send me a sample of the script below?
- You can decide your own working hours

Style of speaking: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hNoKzd866-o

Voice overs through vocaroo won't be responded. Looking for quality only.

Please reply with the sample in order to start our partnership

When I was 21 years old, I would be home alone at my parents' house a lot. We lived on a little pond, which was directly in our backyard. On the other side of the pond was a little town park. Our neighbors were a bit spaced out. It was a pretty upscale, expensive block compared to the rest of the town, so the properties were big. I'm fully moved out now, but this was back when I was in college. My parents make a lot of money, and we have multiple homes, so often I was home alone.

It was a random night in the summertime. I was off from school, so I can't remember if it was the weekend or a weekday, but odds are since I was home, it was a random weekday. I was in the back sunroom watching a show. That was my favorite room in the house in the summer because it was the most cozy and had the best breeze with all the windows open. I was right on the corner of the couch, closest to the corner window, when I heard splashing from outside, like in the pond. It could have been a goose or duck; sometimes they'd fight in the water and make a bunch of splashing sounds, so at first, I ignored it. But as it persisted, I decided to lower the volume on the TV and listen. I put my ear up to the window even and heard consistent splashing sounds, way too heavy to be from a duck or goose. It sounded like they were splashes from a person.

title: Looking for a Rock Star Scheduler for Home care Agency
description:
Human Resource Virtual Assistant to support Scheduling and Customer Service functions for Home Care Agency.

JOB DESCRIPTION 
We are a home care agency with a close-knit team looking to hire a virtual assistant to work on full cycle Scheduling management for the business with a friendly personality to join our team.

As a Scheduler perform activities that facilitate Agency operations. These activities include coordination of our caregiver schedules with client wants/needs, processing intake information and schedule requests, and communication with caregivers to ensure timely shift coverage. 

The Scheduler will be responsible for efficiently matching the right caregiver to clients based on their specific needs, while managing a clear and up-to-date availability chart to swiftly assign caregivers, considering both availability and travel distance.

We view all members of the company as highly valued team players, working together to grow the company. We build relationships with our caregivers and clients from the very first phone call—which is where you come in! You will have frequent interactions over the phone, via instant messaging, and through email with our clients, staff members, and the Operations Director in these responsibilities. 

IMPORTANT: 
1. Please apply only if you consider yourself to have exceptional skills (5-star level) in scheduling, customer service, and speaking English. "Perfect" English required. 
2. If you cannot commit to at least 40 hours a week, please do not respond to this ad.

JOB DUTIES
• Answering agency phones and responding to customer requests & questions in an efficient and professional manner
• Manage incoming requests for services & follows up with potential client/family questions through phone, text or standard mail. Enter new client information into the company’s software system 
• Maintains schedule for services requested and provided to agency clients
o Assures that cases are filled within established time frames
o Monitors overtime and travel records of employees.
o Responds to emergency calls and arranges schedule accordingly.
• Assures employees receive complete and accurate directions and information about client needs as directed by licensed professional staff, Plan of Care/Aide Care Plan and service request
• Follows up with employees on scheduling problems encountered by the on-call staff
• Contacts clients, referral sources, families, and other disciplines as directed to assure care coordination
• Prepares correspondence, reports, documents, and Plans of Care/Aide Care Plans for Caregivers

ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS
• Performs job in compliance with Agency policies and procedures as well as community and professional standards.
• Maintains confidentiality in all aspects of the job
• Attends meetings and educational programs as required.
• Completes all reports for the management team and forwards in a timely manner
• Performs other related duties and responsibilities as deemed necessary.

REQUIREMENTS
• Proven experience as Virtual Assistant as a Scheduler
• Bachelor’s degree, preferred
• MUST possess perfect English speaking skills. Do not apply if you have an accent.
• Excellent computer skills, including a high degree of proficiency in Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDF Forms.
• Strong writing skills
• 2-3 years scheduling experience
• 2 computers
• Wired, reliable and high speed internet connection. (25mbps or higher)
• Noise cancellation Headset with Microphone
• Quiet home or office space
• Familiarity with current technologies, like GSuite, Scheduling software, etc.
• Excellent phone, email, and instant messaging communication skills
• Excellent time management skills
• Solid organizational skills
• Great written communicator
• Fast implementer and self-starter
• Dependable and trustworthy
• Detail oriented
• Have a “get the job done” attitude


ABOUT ME
Here are few things you should know about me:
1) I am a home care agency owner and we provide private duty home services for all age groups
2) I move very fast & expect the people I work with to be the same way
3) I am very loyal to my employees & treat them with respect
4) I give bonuses for doing a good job (If the business makes money, you should too!)
5) You can learn more about me here: www.comforcare.com/loudoun-county

ABOUT COMPENSATION
• Pay weekly or Bi-weekly
• We pay bonuses for great work
• We give pay increases based on performance

HOW TO APPLY
If you are interested in this position and believe you have the qualities listed above to be successful, follow these steps to apply for this position:
a) Make the title of your job post: “#Job Title - <Your_Name> ”. 
b) Send a video recording of yourself, explaining who you are and why you want this job
c) Attach your resume and provide a link to your profile on the onlinejobs.ph website.

Once you submit your responses, I will respond within 48 hours if your video explaining why I should hire you aligns with our needs.

Congratulations you made it to the end! I look forward to learning more about you.

This is an ongoing position. I want to work with you for years, not weeks.

title: Executive Driver
description:
Position Title: Executive Driver
Position Overview: The Executive Driver is responsible for providing safe, reliable, and discreet transportation services to senior executives and other high-profile clients. This role demands a high level of professionalism, exceptional driving skills, and a strong commitment to ensuring a seamless travel experience.
Key Responsibilities:
Safe and Reliable Transportation: Safely transport executives and clients to and from meetings, events, and various destinations in a punctual and secure manner.
Vehicle Management: Maintain the cleanliness, functionality, and appearance of the vehicle. Conduct regular inspections, perform routine maintenance, and address any mechanical issues promptly.
Route Planning: Plan and execute efficient travel routes, taking into account traffic conditions, road closures, and client preferences. Utilize navigation tools and real-time traffic updates to avoid delays.
Client Relations: Provide a high standard of customer service, demonstrating discretion, confidentiality, and a courteous
demeanor. Anticipate and accommodate client needs and preferences during travel.
Safety Protocols: Adhere to all safety regulations and traffic laws. Implement defensive driving techniques and maintain a keen awareness of the surroundings to ensure the safety and comfort of passengers.
Scheduling and Coordination: Work closely with administrative staff to manage schedules, coordinate pickups and drop-offs, and adjust plans as needed based on client requests or changes.
Qualifications:
Experience: Proven experience as a professional driver, with a solid track record of safe driving and exemplary service. Prior experience with executive or VIP transportation is highly desirable.
Licensing: Valid driver’s license with a clean driving record. Specialized certifications or endorsements related to professional driving are a plus.
Skills: Excellent driving skills, knowledge of local and regional roadways, and proficiency in using GPS and navigation systems. Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to maintain confidentiality.
Attributes: Professional appearance, punctuality, reliability, and the ability to remain calm under pressure. Flexibility in working hours, including evenings, as required.
Education: High school diploma or equivalent; additional training or certification in defensive driving or vehicle maintenance is advantageous.
- Stay out
- Location: BGC
- must have a professional driver's license
- must be willing to submit an NBI clearance
- must be willing to undergo a medical examination and submit a clearance
- must be knowledgeable in navigation apps (Waze, Google Maps)
- previous experience as an executive driver
- must be amenable to work long, flexible hours
- with allowances

title: Webflow Web Designer & Developer - Full Time
description:
As a Web Designer & Developer for Webflow, your main responsibilities will be creating and managing websites. We have a rapidly growing business and are developing more within our home improvement service. All of these require skilled writing to maintain and grow.

### **Web Design:**

- Collaborate with the team to design Low-Fi and High-Fi prototypes for GorbMedia clients.
- Improve and provide suggestions for better UX and UI designs.
- Create visually appealing and user-friendly layouts.
- Ensure the website is responsive and compliant across mobile, tablet, and desktop formats.
- Integrate relevant content and media in collaboration with the marketing and content teams.
- Conduct user research and testing to refine design solutions.

### **Web Development:**

- Develop and implement website features using Webflow, including new pages, components, and functionality.
- Ensure website performance and security by applying best practices in development.
- Upload videos and write/add informative content as required.
- Create and maintain internal tools and automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
- Perform cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent performance.

### **Website Technical SEO:**

- Publish SEO-optimized websites, focusing on:
- Alt text for images
- Page speed optimization
- Proper page structure and headings
- Image compression
- Canonical tags
- Configuration of robots.txt file
- XML sitemaps
- Page indexing
- Google Analytics
- and other SEO Compliance requirements
- Stay informed about the latest Webflow SEO optimization recommendations and industry best practices.
- Implement schema markup, including local, review, and organizational schemas.
- Collaborate with the SEO team to identify and resolve technical SEO issues.
- Implement technical SEO recommendations for clients.
- Conduct technical audits to ensure website health and performance.

### **Communication and Collaboration:**

- Communicate and collaborate with the team to understand project requirements, provide updates, and address any concerns.
- Ensure timely delivery of high-quality work and adherence to project deadlines.
- Assist in managing and executing various micro-projects as needed.
- Provided technical support and troubleshooted website-related issues.
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, tools, and best practices.

## Characteristics & Qualifications:

- Expert in the following Applications:
- Webflow
- Figma
- Relume
- Notion
- Google:
- Google Search Console
- Google Analytics
- Has a blend of technical expertise, creativity, and problem-solving skills to ensure our client's websites perform at their best & tools to support our internal teams.
- Ability to translate design mockups into functional web pages
- Ability to understand and align with the brand, mission, and client avatar
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
- When you apply, write the title of your job post, “Web Design 49 from,” and then add your name.
- Maintains a positive and constructive approach to work, understands and respects the perspectives of others, and is committed to personal and professional growth


Questions to Answer:
- Provide at least 3 websites that you have worked on or developed.
- When sending your resume, please describe a few of the hardest problems you solved and exactly how you solved them within your profession.

title: Full Stack Developer with a Focus On Data
description:
We're a dynamic company specializing in Local SEO solutions. We help businesses get discovered online by distributing their critical information, photos, and videos across the internet. We're looking for a talented Full Stack Developer who thrives on working with massive datasets and has a passion for APIs and webhooks.

Your Role:
As a key member of our development team, you'll wear multiple hats and contribute to various projects. However, your primary focus will be on:

Big Data Management: You'll handle large datasets of business information, images, and videos, ensuring they are efficiently stored, processed, and optimized for distribution.
API Integration: You'll be the master of connecting our systems to various third-party APIs, enabling seamless data exchange and automation.
Webhook Development: You'll create and manage webhooks to trigger real-time data updates and actions across different platforms.

Beyond the Core:
While your main focus will be on data and APIs, you'll also have the opportunity to contribute your full-stack skills to other projects, including:

Frontend Development: Enhancing user interfaces and user experiences.
Backend Development: Building and optimizing server-side logic.
Database Management: Ensuring data integrity and performance.

What We're Looking For:
Passion for Data: You love working with large datasets and have experience in data processing, cleaning, and transformation.
API Expertise: You're comfortable integrating with various APIs and understand the intricacies of authentication, authorization, and data formatting.
Full-Stack Skills: You're proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a server-side language like Python, Node.js, or PHP.
Problem-Solving: You're a natural problem-solver who can analyze complex issues and develop creative solutions.
Collaboration: You enjoy working with others and thrive in a team environment.
What We Offer:

Exciting Challenges: You'll work on cutting-edge projects with a direct impact on our clients' success.
Growth Opportunities: We encourage continuous learning and provide opportunities for professional development.
Collaborative Culture: We value teamwork and foster a supportive environment where everyone's ideas are heard.
Competitive Compensation: We offer a competitive salary and benefits package.
Join Us:

If you're a full-stack developer who loves big data, APIs, and webhooks, and you're looking for a challenging and rewarding role in the Local SEO space, we'd love to hear from you!

Please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and passion for data and APIs.

title: Marketing Specialist - Full Stack Analyst
description:
Company Overview:
Top Position is a results-driven advertising company dedicated to promoting small to medium-sized businesses. We offer a range of services including website design, search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, PPC services, business analytics, and advertising campaigns across all digital channels.

Our Mission:
Our goal is to help 10,000 businesses achieve their financial objectives through cutting-edge digital marketing and business optimization software.

Our Core Values:
Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are ethical, professional, innovative, we keep ourselves and each other accountable, we are result-oriented, transparent, we set metrics to be aligned with our goals, and integrity is the name of the game for us.

Job Opportunity:
We are seeking a dynamic and skilled Marketing Specialist - Full Stack Analyst who can leverage data to drive marketing strategies and deliver exceptional results for our clients.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies across various digital channels
- Analyze and interpret marketing data to optimize campaigns and improve ROI
- Conduct market research to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive landscape
- Implement and manage PPC campaigns, SEO strategies, social media marketing, and content marketing
- Utilize analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and other marketing software to track performance and generate insights
- Create detailed reports and dashboards to communicate findings and recommendations to clients and internal teams
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align marketing efforts with business goals
- Stay updated with the latest marketing trends, tools, and technologies to ensure continuous improvement

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Marketing Specialist, Full Stack Analyst, or similar role
- Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and best practices
- Proficiency in analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, SEMrush, Ahrefs, and similar platforms
- Experience with PPC campaigns, SEO strategies, social media marketing, and content marketing
- Ability to analyze data, generate insights, and create actionable recommendations
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Strong project management skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- English proficiency at a B2 level or higher

What We Offer:
- Fully remote, full-time position (8 hours a day)
- Work schedule from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm Eastern Time (New York time zone)
- Career opportunities in the dynamic and global U.S. market
- A young, friendly team from around the world

We are looking for like-minded individuals to join our team. If your skills align with our requirements, we encourage you to apply!

title: Shopify Admin/Developer with Expertise in Bulk Product Edit and Imports
description:
We are a growing company with 3 E-commerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager)

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

title: Multimedia Graphic Designer
description:
JOB OVERVIEW

As a Multimedia Graphic Designer, you'll work closely with our CEO and marketing team, contributing to the creation of visually compelling digital assets. Your role includes designing effective landing pages, developing engaging marketing funnels, and crafting eye-catching ads for various platforms and other media formats such as video, audio, and animation. Through this dynamic position, you will play a key role in enhancing our brand's online presence and driving user engagement.


RESPONSIBILITIES

• Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to understand campaign goals, target audience, and brand messaging.
• Design high-converting landing pages and sales funnels that are visually compelling and user-friendly.
• Create eye-catching Ads for various platforms (FB, IG, X, and LinkedIn) that stop the scroll, grab attention, and generate clicks.
• Develop brand-consistent visuals (including static graphics, animations, short-form and long-form video content) that resonate with the target audience.
• Manage and edit photos and videos for various marketing materials.
• Work effectively with internal teams to ensure timely project delivery.


REQUIRED SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS

• Strategic Creative Input: The candidate must have extensive experience with personal brands, offering strategic recommendations beyond executing client requests. A proactive approach to shaping brand identity and delivering impactful results is essential.
• Digital Marketing Knowledge: A strong grasp of digital marketing is crucial, with the ability to align design choices with marketing strategies to drive business objectives.
• Multimedia Design Experience: The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in:
a. Video Editing: Both short-form and long-form video content.
b. Graphic Design: Expertise in designing visuals for social media, adhering to brand guidelines.
c. Landing and Funnel Page Design: Basic experience in creating effective and visually appealing landing and funnel pages.
• Portfolio Focus: Applicants should present portfolios that are not only modern but also unique, showcasing innovative approaches to design.
• Proficiency in tools for graphic design, funnel pages, ads, and video editing such as Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, WordPress, Clickfunnels, Canva, Filmora, and other relevant software.
• Demonstrated ability to leverage AI tools and technologies to enhance design efficiency and creativity.
• Excellent communication, collaboration, and time management skills.
• Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects, and meet deadlines efficiently.


GOOD TO HAVE

• Experience working with US clients.
• B2B marketing experience is a plus.


TO APPLY

title: Virtual Accounting and Forecasting Specialist
description:
Job Summary
The Virtual Accounting and Forecasting Specialist will maintain financial records and reports, perform account reconciliations, assist with close processes, conduct internal audits, and maintain accounts receivable and payable processes. The role will also be assisting the Accounting Manager in responding to information requests by management and other departments. The role will analyze past financial information to generate reporting on future performance.

General Duties
- Daily maintenance of full cycle AR and AP processes including but not limited to Billing, Collections, AP entry, sales ledger and data management, account reconciliations, and cash management.
- Perform client credit analysis and update sales and lab teams regarding the status of releasing client orders.
- Prepare accounting journal entries including accruals, reclassification entries, and other month-end close tasks.
- Perform internal audits of Sales and Expense processes and make recommendations as needed.
- Analysis of business and financial data relating to sales and cost trends, market trends, and other ad-hoc analysis.
- Create financial reporting to support forecasting and organizational decision-making.
- Develop reporting and forecasting tools for more efficient use of data.
- Ensure compliance with GAAP in accounting and financial reporting.
- Other ad-hoc responsibilities as needed.

Qualifications
- A bachelor’s degree in accounting, finance, or a related field is preferred.
- Knowledge of the balance sheet, profit and loss, and cash flow statements.
- Two years of professional experience as a financial analyst, accountant, auditor, or computer programmer analyst.
- Proficiency with Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office Suite, QuickBooks Online, or similar accounting systems.
- Comfort and ability to work autonomously or with minimal guidance.
- Solid organizational skills with the ability to prioritize multiple responsibilities.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with solid attention to detail.
- Strong analytical skills and data-gathering skills.

Salary Range
- Starting from $1200 can range up to $1500

Please make sure to submit a link to your resume. Thank you.

title: Salesforce Administrator
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Salesforce Administrator to join our team and play a vital role in enhancing and managing our Salesforce platform. This position requires a proactive individual with a deep understanding of the Salesforce ecosystem, capable of designing scalable best practice solutions, managing user support, and optimizing the overall user experience. The Salesforce Administrator will be responsible for all aspects of user management, platform maintenance, data quality improvement, and change management. The ideal candidate will effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels, translating technical information into accessible terms and ensuring that platform changes align with business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
> Manage user accounts, roles, permissions, and licenses. Provide user support and training to improve adoption and satisfaction.
> Perform system configurations and customizations, including workflows, Flows, Process Builder, page layouts, and reports. Manage sandbox environments and system deployments.
> Work with stakeholders to gather requirements, design scalable solutions, and optimize platform features.
> Ensure data accuracy and integrity through regular data management, validation rules, and automation processes. Conduct system maintenance and security reviews.
> Communicate platform updates to users and stakeholders. Develop and deliver training sessions and maintain user guides and technical documentation.
> Create and maintain dashboards and reports for marketing analytics and performance tracking. Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
> Develop and maintain a platform roadmap aligned with business goals. Collaborate with senior management on strategic initiatives.
> Perform additional tasks and support other departments as needed to achieve organizational objectives.

Requirements & Qualifications:
> Minimum of 2+ years of hands-on experience as a Salesforce Administrator with both Salesforce Classic and Salesforce Lightning.
> Strong knowledge of Salesforce products and features, including workflows, Process Builder, Flows, and other automation tools.
> Salesforce Administrator Certification.
> Proficiency in Excel and Office 365.
> Experience in change management and governance.
> Excellent relationship-building skills and the ability to liaise with stakeholders at all levels.
> Proven ability to translate requirements into technical solutions and design scalable, best practice solutions.
> Strong experience in user training and support, as well as technical documentation.
> Experience with database management (TSQL, MySQL) and business intelligence tools (Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
> Amenable to work Monday – Friday either 8 AM – 12 PM OR 1 PM – 5 PM PST (US/Canada)

Preferred Qualifications:
> Demonstrated experience in marketing analytics report development and maintenance.
> Additional Salesforce certifications (e.g., Advanced Administrator, Platform App Builder).
> Experience working with integrated applications such as HubSpot, Phoneburner, Elevate UC, CoStar, Reply.io, Zapier, and similar tools.
> A proactive attitude toward platform enhancements and continuous improvement.
> Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a detail-oriented mindset.

Next steps:
As part of our hiring process, we kindly request you to complete a DISC personality test before your scheduled interview. This test will help us better understand your personality and ensure alignment with the requirements of the position.

Please take the test using the following link: www.123test.com/disc-personality-test/

Please submit the result of the DISC personality test and an updated copy of your RESUME to this email: beth@lawcoaching.com
Subject line: Salesforce Admin
Also, kindly share your proficiency or years of experience with the following:
- Salesforce Admin
- Salesforce products and features, including workflows, Process Builder, Flows, and other automation tools.
- Do you have a Salesforce Administrator Certification?

Ensure that the resume is in PDF format.
Do not forget to provide a link to your profile on Onlinejobs.ph

title: Executive Assistant & Technical Project Manager
description:
Job Description:

Are you a tech-savvy, detail-oriented individual who thrives on managing multiple tasks and projects? Do you have the technical know-how to build, edit, and manage various software tools, but also possess the creativity to help drive innovative solutions? If so, I’m looking for you to join me as my right-hand person to help manage and execute a wide range of tasks across my diverse set of ventures.

About Me: I'm David Prado, an entrepreneur who juggles multiple projects including running a clothing brand, working as a marketing consultant, managing a Christian organization’s eCommerce and automation systems, and pursuing a music career. I’m constantly building out new ideas and processes, but I need someone to help me execute them, manage my time, and keep all of my projects on track.

What You’ll Be Doing:

Project Management: Manage project management software (e.g., Notion, Slack) to keep tasks organized, on schedule, and efficiently executed.

Automation & Integration: Set up and manage automation processes using tools like Zapier and Motion AI to streamline operations across various platforms.

Technical & Creative Tasks: Handle everything from setting up automations, transcribing voice memos, editing videos with CapCut or Adobe Premiere, and creating basic graphics in Canva or Photoshop.

Time Management: Help me manage my schedule, set up meetings, and ensure I’m using my time effectively.

Task Execution: Assist with executing tasks, whether it’s setting up software, managing emails, or coordinating small projects with other team members.

Research: Conduct research across various fields—clothing, marketing, Christian organizations, eCommerce, and music—to help inform decision-making and strategy.

Team Collaboration: Occasionally manage group chats, lead conversations, and coordinate with other team members or freelancers to ensure tasks are completed on time.

Administrative Support: Help with hiring processes, posting job listings, and screening candidates.
Skills & Requirements:

Technical Proficiency: Experience with project management tools, automation platforms, and a wide range of software including Slack, Notion, ChatGPT, MidJourney, CapCut, Canva, Photoshop, and Adobe Premiere.

Creative Execution: While technical skills are key, you should also have the ability to creatively approach problem-solving and task execution.

Video Editing: Intermediate video editing skills to create engaging content, even if you’re not an expert.

Adaptability: Ability to learn quickly, follow instructions, and execute tasks across a variety of domains.

Organizational Skills: Strong organizational skills to manage multiple projects and keep everything running smoothly.

Communication: Excellent communication skills to manage team conversations, summarize meetings, and draft emails.

Proactive & Self-Starter: You should be able to take initiative, work independently, and find solutions to challenges as they arise.

Position Details:

Part-Time to Full-Time: Start part-time with the potential to transition to a full-time role as our working relationship grows and tasks increase.

Flexible Work Environment: You can work remotely, but must be available to collaborate regularly and meet deadlines.

Opportunities for Growth: As my ventures expand, there will be opportunities for you to grow with the role, take on more responsibilities, and potentially lead larger projects.

Application Requirements:

Intro Video: Please include a short video introducing yourself, explaining why you’re the perfect fit for this role.

Portfolio & Resume: Submit your resume along with any relevant portfolio examples that showcase your technical and creative skills.

Cover Letter: Include a brief cover letter explaining why you’re the ideal candidate and how your skills align with the tasks outlined.

Application Deadline: Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the right candidate is found.

Compensation:

Hourly Rate: Competitive, based on experience and skill level.

I’m looking for someone who is excited to take on a diverse set of challenges and grow alongside my ventures. If you’re a proactive, technically skilled, and organized individual who’s ready to help manage and execute my projects, and if your faith is an important part of your life, I’d love to hear from you!

title: Sentimental video montage for a 1st birthday
description: We are seeking a skilled and creative Montage Video Editor to create a heartwarming and memorable video for a one-year-old's birthday celebration. The video will compile a series of clips and photos documenting the child’s first year, set to appropriate music, and edited to evoke emotion and joy. The final product should be a beautiful keepsake that the family can cherish for years to come. **Responsibilities:** - Review and organize provided video clips, photos, and other media related to the child’s first year. - Edit footage into a cohesive and engaging montage, including transitions, effects, and color correction as needed. - Select and incorporate suitable background music to enhance the emotional impact of the video. - Collaborate with the family to understand their vision and incorporate any specific requests or themes. - Ensure the final video is of high quality, with smooth transitions and timing that aligns with the selected music. - Deliver the final product in the desired format and within the agreed-upon timeframe. **Requirements:** - Proven experience in video editing, particularly in creating montages or similar projects. - Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve). - Strong sense of timing, rhythm, and storytelling through video. - Ability to work with provided content and incorporate client feedback effectively. - Attention to detail and a creative approach to video editing. - Ability to deliver the final product on time and meet deadlines. **Preferred Qualifications:** - Experience editing family-oriented or children’s videos. - Portfolio showcasing relevant work, especially montage-style videos. **Application Process:** Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining your experience and approach to creating a montage video for a one-year-old's birthday. Include any relevant work samples that demonstrate your ability to create emotionally impactful videos. **Deadline for Applications:** [Insert Deadline] **Compensation:** [Insert Compensation Details] --- This job description can be tailored further based on your specific needs or preferences.

title: Manual QA Tester
description:

100% remote

- Gherking.

- e-commerce experience.
- API experience.
- Familiarity with Javascript is a mega plus.

title: Power BI developer
description:
Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Power BI Developer with expertise in data modeling to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in business intelligence, data analysis, and data visualization. This role requires proficiency in designing and developing interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI, as well as creating and optimizing data models to support efficient data analysis and reporting.
Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain interactive Power BI dashboards and reports to provide actionable insights into key performance indicators (KPIs) and business metrics.
• Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications for data models and reports.
• Create and optimize complex data models, including star and snowflake schemas, to support efficient data analysis and reporting.
• Develop and implement data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
• Write and optimize complex DAX calculations to enhance the functionality of Power BI reports.
• Conduct data cleansing, transformation, and loading processes to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
• Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI and data visualization best practices.
• Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to Power BI reports and dashboards.
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• Proven experience as a Power BI Developer or in a similar role.
• Strong expertise in data modeling, including creating star and snowflake schemas.
• Proficiency in Power BI, including developing reports and dashboards, using custom visuals, DAX functions, and Power Query.
• Experience with ETL processes using SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).
• Strong knowledge of SQL, including writing complex queries, stored procedures, and optimizing database performance.
• Excellent data visualization skills, with experience in Power BI, Tableau, and Advanced Excel.
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and R for data analysis and automation tasks.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Preferred Qualifications:
• Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate
• Microsoft Certified: Power BI Data Analyst
• Certified Business Intelligence Professional (CBIP)

title: Ecommerce Email Designer
description:
About us: Arcady Media is a growing email marketing agency who values amazing emails, and great design. Learn more about us at our website!

______________________

Key Responsibilities

1. Designing and developing responsive email templates.

2. Collaborating closely with your copywriter, strategists and data analyst to deliver results-driven email campaigns.

3. Optimizing designs for conversion and engagement.

4. Ensuring designs align with brand guidelines and overall brand aesthetic.

5. Staying updated with the latest design trends, tools, and techniques in email marketing.

6. Collaborating with the team, joining our virtual office, and weekly meetings.

______________________

Who This Role Is NOT For 

- Generalists -- Those without a specialization in email design or who lack a focused expertise.

- Silos Workers -- Individuals who prefer working in isolation without team collaboration or client interaction.

- Unexperienced -- Individuals who aren't familiar with Figma or Photoshop.

- Non DTC - Those who don't have a deep understanding of DTC brand aesthetics and requirements.

- Non-Adaptable -- Individuals who are uncomfortable working in fast-paced environments or adapting to changing client needs.

- Not data driven -- Designers who don't prioritize data-driven decisions or results.

- SOLO artists -- Designers who won't collaborate and talk with the rest of the design team 

______________________

Who We're Looking For:

- Passionate email designers with a proven track record in creating compelling visuals for DTC brands.

- Familiarity and expertise with email and email design capabilities.

- A keen eye for detail, color, and typography.

- A strong portfolio showcasing responsive email design work.

- Excellent collaboration and communication skills.

- An adaptable mindset, eager to learn and grow in the ever-evolving world of email marketing.

- Figma experience

______________________

Benefits of Working for Arcady Media

- Competitive Salary and Performance Bonuses.

- Work with high-profile DTC brands, providing ample opportunity to build a standout portfolio.

- A flexible and remote-friendly work environment.

- Continuous learning opportunities with access to courses and workshops.

- Collaborative and inclusive team culture.

______________________

2. Fill out the questions and submit!
