title: Property Manager & Tenant Communications
description:
Hello!

We are a real estate development company based out of Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. We are now hiring for a full-time employee (available Monday to Friday between 8:30am-4:30pm CST) to help with the growth of our company!

The successful candidate should enjoy performing tasks, as well as have skills, in these 3 key areas:

(1) Property Management
(2) Customer Service
(3) Admin Support

Here is a what we are looking for in terms of your values, attitude, personality, and mindset:

(1) Positive and optimistic attitude
(2) Creative problem-solving abilities
(3) Ability to work independently and create solutions
(4) Fluent in English with excellent oral and written communication skills
(6) Can follow directions well
(7) Can perform repetitive tasks
(8) Systems-focused individual that can reduce redundancy and increase efficiency
(9) Takes initiative
(10) Can prioritize well
(11) Team player and works well with others
(12) Detail oriented 
(13) Ability to seamlessly switch between tasks as needed
(14) Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office (especially Word and Excel)

Note - these qualities are MORE important to us than your experience (but experience definitely helps!) 

Here is what your duties would look like on a day-to-day basis:
(1) Primarily handling tenant communications, including receiving and addressing maintenance issues, complaints and general requests and inquiries
(2) Facilitating tenant move-ins, lease renewals and move-outs
(3) Liaise or make follow ups with tradespeople or vendors
(4) Promptly responding to emails, text and chat messages as well as phone calls via Open Phone.
(5) Ensure communications are all responded on a timely manner and daily coordination of completed tasks with the property manager.
(6) Any other (similar) task that the team requires
Here is what we are looking for in terms of your workspace and computer requirements:

(1) A reliable internet connection with 10mbps or higher speed
(2) Reliable and newer computer that has both a webcam (for team meetings via Zoom) as well as latest Microsoft Office installed (Apple laptop preferred, but not necessary, so that you can type your text messages)
(3) Quiet workspace (when making phone calls)
(4) Use of iMessage is preferred (with iPhone/Mac) for group messaging (but not necessary)

Here is what we can offer you in exchange for your services:

(1) Starting wage of $4.50 which is paid bi-weekly (every other Friday)
(2) Performance based bonuses
(3) Opportunity to learn and grow with a fun, high performance team, with the ability to add value to the lives of others

Here is what we want from you when you apply:

(1) CV and Resume (including references)
(2) Screenshot of your internet speed test
(3) Screenshot of your computer specifications plus photo of your work station
(4) A short video recording where you introduce yourself (60 seconds or less is okay)
(5) A short paragraph on why you think you’d be a great fit for our company

Please send everything to Garret@froesecorpgroup.com. Applications sent to the inbox here will not be reviewed. Kindly note that we will only respond to candidates we feel would be an appropriate fit for this position. We will also not respond to any emails that do not contain the 5 items listed above.

We are not looking for a short-term employee; we are looking for a long-term partner that we can develop a strong working relationship with! We have a fun, fast-paced work environment with a great team. We look forward to working with you!

Thank you so much in advance for your application. Have a wonderful day!

title: Data Visualization and Reporting Specialist (Proficient in Tableau and SQL)
description:
About Us:
We’re a forward-moving e-commerce and retail company based in London, looking for a skilled Data Visualisation & Reporting Analyst to join our team. Your expertise in Tableau & SQL/Excel will be instrumental in driving insights and strategies for our commercial and operations teams.

The Role:
Initially, you’ll focus on creating detailed Tableau dashboards for our commercial and operations teams. This task is essential for presenting our data clearly and supporting initial analysis efforts. Over time, as these dashboards become a core part of our operations, your role will expand. You’ll move into a broader analyst support role, maintaining these dashboards as well as handling regular reporting and ad-hoc requests to meet our team’s data requirements. This development is designed to ensure our data continues to support our business effectively.

Who We’re Looking For:
Someone with solid experience in Tableau & data manipulation with intermediate/advanced SQL skills, capable of handling both dashboard creation and complex data analyses.
A detail-oriented, highly organized individual who thrives on uncovering insights from data.
A confident communicator, able to translate surface data into actionable insights for various team members.
Flexible and adaptable, willing to adjust to evolving role requirements and work hours to meet team needs across GMT/UK time zones.

The requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Statistics, Economics, Business Administration, or a related field.
Proven experience in data analysis, ideally within the eCommerce/Retail industry
Prior experience building data visualisations using Tableau
Strong proficiency in SQL / Excel

title: Email Marketing Copywriter Virtual Assistant
description:

title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
Sona is a B2B software platform for demand-generation marketers. Our dynamic team is growing, and we are seeking a talented and experienced Senior Data Analyst to join our team with a strong focus on marketing performance analysis. As a Senior Data Analyst, you will be responsible for onboarding clients onto the Sona Platform, configuring reports and dashboards, and providing ongoing data analysis support. Related to onboarding new clients, you will be responsible to work through a checklist of data configuration items, collaborate with clients to gather configuration information, and to help clients understand how to utilize the Sona Platform. For clients with data services support, you will be responsible for monitoring, analyzing, and deriving insights from cross-channel marketing performance data on platforms, including Google Ads, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, and more. Additionally, you will provide valuable insights and recommendations to optimize performance across these platforms. If you are detail-oriented, and passionate data-driven decision-making, we encourage you to apply. 

As a Senior Data Analyst, your duties will include:
- Guide new clients through data integration setup on the Sona Platform

- Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in client data to provide actionable insights and recommendations.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's or advanced degree in Data Analytics, Marketing, or a related field.
- Experience with online advertising data analysis 
- Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL) and visualization tools (e.g., Google Data Studio, Tableau).
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to extract insights from complex data sets.
- Excellent communication skills to effectively convey data-driven recommendations to non-technical stakeholders.
- Detail-oriented mindset with a high level of accuracy in data analysis.
- Experience in python or php programming is a plus

Training for the position will be provided.

**How to Apply**
Please provide cold email sequence writing samples with your application.
In your email, please do the following to have your application considered:
1. Include the keyword: SONADATA in the subject line. Your application will then get automatically sorted for consideration.
2. Include a CV, resume, and a link to your GitHub profile with your application.
As part of the interview process, we'd like to collaborate on an initial trial project. Further details will be provided following a successful interview.

Thanks!

pigeonhole.com/

About the Company
Starting as a hidden treasure in Perth’s laneways in 2007, Pigeonhole has grown into a vibrant community across Australia, with locations in Perth, Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane.
We’re more than just a store—we’re a family of passionate people who love fashion, design, and creativity. Our mission is to connect with our communities and make creativity accessible to all.
At Pigeonhole, we host exciting events, from art shows to workshops, and offer opportunities for young creatives through internships and work experiences. Our seasonal collections, crafted with care in Korea, include a wide range of jewelry and accessories.

Job Overview:
The Marketing Specialist at Pigeonhole is responsible for enhancing the brand's visibility and driving traffic to both the online store and physical locations through high-quality video content and strategic marketing efforts. This role involves developing and executing a marketing strategy that aligns with the company's values, increasing store foot traffic by 20% over six months, and boosting social media engagement by 15% through compelling video content. The Marketing Specialist will manage Pigeonhole's social media presence, ensuring a consistent brand voice, and work closely with the sales team to align marketing efforts with sales goals. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video production, social media management, and marketing strategy, with a focus on creating an authentic and engaging brand experience.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Video Content Creation:
Lead the production of compelling video content, from concept to final edit.
Collaborate with in-store teams to capture footage that genuinely reflects the Pigeonhole brand.
Manage a content calendar to ensure consistent and timely video releases.
2. Marketing Strategy Development:
Craft and implement a marketing strategy that effectively promotes both digital and physical store fronts.
Analyze market trends and customer behavior to optimize campaign performance.
Work closely with the sales team to align marketing efforts with sales targets and KPIs.
3. Social Media & Online Presence:
Manage Pigeonhole’s social media platforms, focusing on storytelling and community engagement.
Use video content to enhance online marketing, driving traffic to the web store and physical locations.
Monitor and analyze social media performance, adjusting strategies for maximum impact.
4. Brand Consistency & Development:
Maintain a consistent and authentic brand voice across all marketing channels.
Collaborate with the creative team to develop visual assets that align with Pigeonhole’s aesthetic.
Continuously seek opportunities to innovate and improve Pigeonhole’s marketing approach.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field.
• Proven experience in an executive assistant role, with a strong emphasis on sales analytics and KPI management.
• Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret and manage complex data sets.

• Experience in project management is a plus.

Practical Requirements

Work Environment

Job Role: Supabase/Postgres Engineer

Design, implement, and manage complex OLTP-style Postgres-based backend systems.
Create and optimize Postgres functions, manage security (including Row Level Security), and enhance performance through effective use of indexes, partitioning, and other techniques.

Demonstrated expertise in Postgres functions, security (including RLS), performance optimization, and complex schema design.
Strong understanding of RDBMS design patterns to solve various problems, including event logging, complex many-to-many relationships, time series data, and temporal context.
Proficiency in PL/pgSQL.
Strong portfolio showcasing your work and contributions to similar projects.
Benefits:

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
A collaborative and innovative work environment.

title: Expert Laravel PHP Developer for US eCommerce Accounting Software
description:
We are looking for an experienced Laravel PHP Developer with a strong background in building and maintaining web apps, preferably with a focus on ERP type functionality (accounting, inventory management, etc) and understands eCommerce sales platforms.

We are a software + services company that automates accounting for Amazon sellers and are looking to grow our development team. You can learn more about us at sellanalytix.com. We use our proprietary accounting software for this.

You will be responsible for developing new features, maintaining existing code, troubleshooting issues, and collaborating with our team to enhance our software's functionality and performance.

This is full time roughly 40 hours per week, and fully remote work.

You can work whenever you want with some meetings weekly. Experience with AWS (EC2, RDS) and MySQL is essential. Familiarity with Bootstrap for the frontend is a plus. We use nginx, on EC2 servers. XAMP also works for developing, and we use bitbucket for version control. Some DevOps is a plus for using our servers. 

Knowing how to optimize code for speed, and big data is helpful: we are having speed issues and want help with them. Also knowing yajra datatables, and laravel actions is a plus.

Medium skills in UI are preferred to help build new features from given specifications. 

Strong English is needed, and you should be comfortable meeting live on video calls.

Using ChatGPT or other AI tools in your application will result in immediate disqualification.

To apply, please set the subject to “Developing with SellAnalytix is Exciting!”, and share your experience in Laravel PHP development, your email address, and we will reach out soon.

title: Web automations for e-commerce platforms - scraping - API - Amazon - Bol.com - Coding - Web automation
description:
Hi there! 

We are looking for someone who can automate e-commerce tasks on Bol.com and Amazon. I can work out what needs to happen, but I have no idea how, so please let me know!

We want to:

1. Automate pricing on Bol.com based on something called the 'buybox' and minimum profit margin from a Google sheet

2. Automate checking price changes from Amazon.nl, noting this in a sheet, updating the price on Bol.com if needed or putting the product on 'pause' in Bol.com and in the sheet

3. Checking if a product is out of stock on Amazon, if so, we want it noted in our sheet and put the product on Pause in Bol.com

4. Get all the order information automatically from Bol.com in our Google spreadsheet. (we already have this, but currently, we use Zapier and it is too expensive)

5. Make it so we can put in a URL of a store and it gets/ scrapes all the EAN's (product codes), brand, delivery time, price and product URL into a sheet

The API page from Bol.com: 
https://api.bol.com/retailer/public/Retailer-API/v10/functional/retailer-api/subscriptions.html#_competing_offer_subscription

https://api.bol.com/retailer/public/redoc/v10/retailer.html

Amazon API page: 
https://aws.amazon.com/api-gateway/ 

Let me know if you can do (some) of these things!

Cheers

PS. We do NOT want automation with (a lot) of Zapier

PS. PS. We want to hear from you how long it will take and how much you ask for it. We added an indication of salary of 18,20$/ hour

Before you read on, this is NOT a typical customer support job where you just copy paste standard responses or choose a canned response from the help desk software...if that's what you are looking for then you should stop reading right now, because this job is NOT for you.

We are looking for a Customer Service Specialist to help create an amazing customer experience that turns customers into raving fans.

From the moment a person clicks "Follow" or joins our community, the customer needs to feel like she has a special friend who is there to help and support her along the way....and that's exactly your job as a Customer Service Specialist.

As our Customer Service Specialist, you’re the essence of an extraordinary customer service. You love people and love to enrich their lives through dialogue about our products as well. Having a detailed knowledge, you’re not just serving information, but are also making recommendations and play an advisory role.

You are the heart of our reputation, and ensure feedback flows to all teams in order to improve and innovate our services. And you spark customers with new ways to make their experience continuously better.

We are aiming to be the gold standard for customer support in the beauty industry. Customer support is extremely important to us, and we only hire the warmest and the most positive, genuine and dedicated people to represent our company.

ABOUT US
• We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Distinguished for outstanding accomplishments, including receiving awards like "Top Team Leader of the Year", "Employee of the Year", and demonstrating swift career progression into higher roles.
• Minimum of 2 years of experience in customer service. Most of the support will be conducted via email and chat. However, proficiency in phone support is a plus.
• Recognized for exceptional achievements, such as attaining Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude).
• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written. As an email support representative, you will likely interact with US clients whose first language is English. Your level of English needs to be on the level that an English native speaker thinks they are talking to another native speaker. Adherence to a specific writing style (a mix between friendly/semi-casual and formal; depending on the occasion), flawless grammar, and punctuation standards is highly required.
• Enabling an empathy-driven approach by providing exceptional customer service and fostering positive relationships with customers through email communication.
• Fast and accurate typing skills to respond to emails promptly, great attention to detail and reliability are essential qualities for success in this role.
• Highly organized with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
• Adeptness at working in a fast-paced environment where others rely on you to deliver is essential. It is expected that you have an innovative mind and are a self-starter.


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE
• Customer Care: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, including email, chat, social media and phone. Address customer inquiries, concerns, and requests with empathy and professionalism.
• Product Knowledge: Develop an in-depth understanding of our holistic beauty programs, their benefits, and the exercises in it.
• Problem Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and effectively, ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Educational Support: Provide product recommendations, usage guidance, and holistic beauty advice to customers.
• Feedback Collection: Collect and document customer feedback and suggestions to help improve products and services.
• Organizational Skills: Maintain organized records of customer interactions and orders, ensuring accurate and up-to-date customer profiles.
• Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and product development, to relay customer insights and feedback.
• Process Enhancement: Document the process and create/adapt SOPs to improve the system.

REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
• Reliable Computer/Laptop
• High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
• Conducive Work Environment

WORKING SCHEDULE
• Full-time Employment Opportunity

BENEFITS
• Competitive Salary
• Training and Development Opportunities
• Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
• Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m a Customer Service Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you provide an example of a challenging customer situation you've successfully resolved in the past?
3.) What are the names of your last three supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
4.) Schedule Availability:
4.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
4.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
5.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
6.) Take the following tests and attach the 4 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
6.1.) Go to www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
6.2.) Go to www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
6.3.) Go to www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
6.4.) Go to speed.cloudflare.com/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
7.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).

We are expanding and looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you feel you meet our qualifications and requirements, we strongly encourage you to apply. Please follow the provided instructions to ensure your application is considered.

title: Senior Virtual Assistant (Intermediate Web Development and AI Tools Skills Required)
description:
### Position: Senior Virtual Assistant (Intermediate Web Development and AI Tools Skills Required)

Location: Remote (Philippines-based preferred) 
Compensation: $5.00 - $8.00 per hour, increasing from $5 to $8 over 6 months based on performance and responsibilities. 
Hours: Flexible, full-time

About Us:

AchieveAI revolutionizes business operations by blending advanced AI with strategic human outsourcing. We specialize in enhancing efficiency, reducing costs, and improving customer experiences through AI and human expertise. Our services include automation, machine learning, and tailored outsourcing solutions.

Job Description:

The Senior Virtual Assistant will take on a key role, combining advanced administrative support with intermediate web development skills and experience using AI tools, particularly ChatGPT. This position is ideal for professionals who are skilled in high-level VA responsibilities and are capable of building and maintaining websites while leveraging AI technologies.

Key Responsibilities:

- Web Development:

- Support the development and maintenance of WordPress websites.
- Implement intermediate-level features and optimize site performance.
- Assist in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues.

- Task Management:

- Handle complex administrative tasks and coordinate projects.
- Ensure timely completion of tasks and provide regular updates to project managers.

- Project Coordination:

- Assist in organizing and prioritizing tasks for various projects.
- Prepare detailed reports and summaries for client updates.

- Content Creation and Management:

- Create content for various platforms, including social media and blogs.
- Manage and optimize social media accounts and engagement strategies.

- AI Tools Utilization:

- Utilize AI tools like ChatGPT for automating responses, content generation, and enhancing customer interactions.
- Stay updated with the latest AI tools and integrate them into daily tasks.

- Collaboration:

- Work closely with senior team members and project managers to align on project goals and deliverables.
- Mentor and support junior virtual assistants.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a virtual assistant or in a similar role, focusing on complex tasks.
- Intermediate web development skills, including WordPress, HTML, CSS, and basic PHP.
- Experience using AI tools, especially ChatGPT, for various tasks.
- Strong organizational and multitasking skills.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proficiency in content creation and social media management.
- Openness to ongoing training and skill development.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

Compensation Structure:

- Starting Rate: $5.00 per hour
- Increase Schedule:
- Month 1-2: $5.75 per hour
- Month 3-4: $6.50 per hour
- Month 5-6: $7.25 per hour
- Month 7 onwards: $8.00 per hour

How to Apply:

To apply, please respond to this job post with your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role. Include the secret word "Innovation" in your response to show that you have carefully read the job description.

This role offers a unique opportunity to leverage both administrative and technical skills, supporting personal and professional growth. Join AchieveAI and be a key contributor to delivering innovative solutions that drive business success.

title: Quality Assurance / Automated Testing Engineer
description:
*** Please Note, any applicants that do not follow the posted instructions will not be considered. ***

Job Title: SaaS QA Engineer (Front-End Focused)
Location: Remote
Type: Full-Time

About Us: We are a US-based software company specializing in proposal software. Our innovative platform offers customizable service plans and templates, providing our clients with flexible options to meet their needs. We're looking for a dedicated QA Engineer to join our team and ensure the highest quality for our front-end application.

Job Description: We are seeking an experienced QA Engineer with a strong focus on front-end testing and automation. The ideal candidate will have at least 5 years of experience in QA, with a deep understanding of automated testing frameworks, front-end technologies, and user acceptance testing (UAT). You will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive test plans, ensuring that our software's various configurations, including service plans and pricing options, function correctly.

Key Responsibilities:

- Develop, execute, and maintain automated and manual test cases for front-end features.
- Ensure accurate and reliable testing of dynamic front-end applications, including responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
- Work closely with development and product teams to validate user stories, identify bugs, and ensure that all edge cases are covered.
- Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and collaborate with stakeholders to gather and incorporate feedback.
- Integrate automated tests into our CI/CD pipeline.
- Assistance with defining test cases on feature tickets
- Ensure that all service plan configurations and pricing options are thoroughly tested and produce correct results.

Requirements:

- At least 5 years of experience in QA, with a focus on front-end testing and automation.
- Proficiency in automation tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright.
- Understanding of testing frameworks and including them as part of a CI/CD pipelines.
- Experience with responsive design testing and cross-browser compatibility.
- Advanced level of English, with excellent communication skills.
- Ability to handle complex configurations and variable-driven scenarios in testing.
- Availability to work at least partial hours in the Mountain Standard Time (MST) timezone.

Why Join Us?

- Be part of a growing company with an exciting product in the SaaS space.
- Work remotely with a flexible schedule.
- Collaborate with a dynamic team that values innovation and quality.

Does this sound like a great fit for you? Great! Visit our website to apply and select the appropriate role you'd like to apply for:

https://www.smarterlaunch.com/apply/

title: Video Editor and Social Media Content Manager
description:
Video Editor (YouTube) and Social Media Content Manager

Are you a creative and energetic content manager, passionate about turning raw content into engaging videos and social media? Powered by KLOUD (PBK) is looking for a talented Video Editor and Content Manager to join our team! 

We currently produce "The Weather Report" YouTube channel and The Weather Report newsletter for 1,600+ subscribers. In The Weather Report we interview high performers in business, sports and media, then distill those interviews into actionable tactics for our readers and viewers.

We are now hiring a permanent, part-time (20-25 hrs / week) video editor and content creator to manage the video production process and drive subscriber engagement through our newsletter and social media.

Your Responsibilities:

Video
Edit 2-3 raw, uncut interviews per month into finished long-form and short-form videos and promote to our primary video channel (StreamYard & YouTube)
Maximize individual video viewership through strategic editing and optimization techniques, including creative thumbnails, titles, descriptions and cards (Adobe, Descript, VidIQ, TubeBuddy, Canva)
Manage batch production of videos to meet tight deadlines (Google, Trello, Other)

Social
Create engaging reels/shorts from long-form interviews and promote on social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
Create graphic posts from interviews, coaching and existing course materials and promote on social media channels (FB/IG/LI) 
Manage social media posts using automation and scheduling tools (Metricool)
Make recommendations about content quality, type and/or frequency to Increase overall social subscriber counts (goal = 2x in 12 months)

Newsletter / Email
Manage production of the weekly newsletter from our existing template (ConvertKit)
Develop automations and follow-up funnels to increase after-open activity - including additional downloads, course subscriptions and paid coaching (ConvertKit)
Maintain industry-leading newsletter open rates (+55%)
Increase overall newsletter subscriber levels (goal = +10k)
Leverage affiliate agreements to generate new revenue streams

Requirements for Consideration:
Proven experience in video and editing (Adobe, CapCut, Descript, Streamyard)
Understanding of social media analytics and management tools (ex. Metricool)
Experience with maximize viewer/reader engagement and retention
Comfortable working independently on a short timeline
Familiarity with paid advertising and social media promotion

What We Offer:
An exciting and dynamic work environment.
The opportunity to work with high-profile guests and content.
Competitive compensation, including “13th month” after probationary period ends
Professional training and opportunities for full-time employment

title: Magento Developer
description:
Job Title: Magento Developer
Employment Type: Full-Time
Experience Level: Mid to Senior Level
About Us:
At Discount Surgical, we’ve been helping customers save on medical-grade compression socks and stockings for over 25 years. We're dedicated to delivering quality products at great prices.
Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, customize, and maintain Magento 2 websites, focusing on performance, scalability, and security.
- Build and implement custom Magento modules and extensions to meet business needs.
- Troubleshoot and optimize existing Magento stores to resolve performance issues.
- Integrate third-party APIs and payment gateways into Magento 2.

- Magento Certification is a plus.

title: Level 3/SME/ Senior IT Engineer URGENT HIRING
description:
To apply, visit our website remotepro.ph/

About the Role:
Our senior team members are critical to supporting our awesome clients and their users. They leverage industry leading tools and their experience to help resolve complex issues and help prevent futures ones

This position is an integral part of the Helpdesk Team, and the ideal candidate should be comfortable serving as a “hands-on” senior team member who responds to support requests from clients and junior team members.

The goal is to deliver exceptional service and long-lasting solutions to clients in order to foster loyalty and client satisfaction.

Responsibilities:

Identify the ideal solution based on the issue and the information provided by the clients.
Perform remote troubleshooting using diagnostic methods and guide the client through the troubleshooting process.
Serve as a point of escalation for issues raised by Level 1 and Level 2 support
Support and troubleshooting for multiple clients leveraging a broad range of solutions
Provide guidance and direction to more junior members of the team.
The role is technically challenging, and it will require you to communicate with clients and vendors over the phone or via email.
Log events, problems, and their resolutions.

What we’re looking for:

Previous experience working in an MSP environment is a PLUS.
Excellent communication skills – Ability to have a comfortable conversation in English without thinking formal or technical – be a friend
Excellent attention to detail and follow-through abilities (never let it go till solved)
Demonstrable experience working with Windows systems (client/server). Ideally, enough experience with a wide range of end-user and other IT areas to solve problems that others may overlook.
We are heavy users of Office 365 and Azure, so you’ll need to have solid experience and know the fundamentals or demonstrate skills in something very similar.
Experience with MSP tools such as RMM, PSA, and similar is extremely important, as not everyone can quickly learn how to use these tools.
Essentially, you must demonstrate that you can handle even the most difficult tasks by properly setting expectations and determining the solution in a reasonable amount of time.
Out-of-the-box thinker, proactive/creative, and always improving things.
Willingness to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction.
Have the ability to “figure things out” even new things.

Nice to Haves:

Scripting/PowerShell experience
Mac OS use and support experience
GoogleWorkpace/etc.

title: Virtual Personal Assistant

title: Appointment Setter (1+ years experience)
description:
Join Huzzle’s Talent Pool as an Appointment Setter! 

At Huzzle, we connect top-tier Appointment Setters & SDRs with leading companies across the UK, US, and Europe. Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.

WHO THIS IS FOR:
You're looking to:
• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.
• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.
• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.
• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.
• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.

And if you're:
• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.
• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.
• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.
• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.

What We Offer:
Competitive Pay: Starting at 30K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:
• Month 1: 30K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 3: 33K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 6: 36K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 9: 38K PHP/month + bonus
Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.
Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.

Your Role as an Appointment Setter:
• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone, email, and social media platforms.

• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.

• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.
• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.

Our Hiring Process:

title: Senior Backend Developer - Full Time
description:
We're seeking a skilled Back-End Developer to join our team and help build our inventory management application. If you're proficient in Python, Django, and Celery, with experience in MySQL and Azure technologies and a strong focus on optimising queries for server load and scaling, this could be your perfect role.

Key responsibilities:

* Develop and maintain the back end of our inventory management app using Python, Django, and Celery
* Collaborate with front-end developers and QA engineers for seamless integration
* Optimise app performance and address bottlenecks, with a focus on server load and scaling
* Design robust and scalable data models and schemas in MySQL
* Write efficient and optimised SQL queries to handle large datasets and high-traffic
* Implement security measures and protocols
* Leverage Azure technologies (Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Azure Storage, Azure Database for MySQL) to build a scalable and resilient cloud-based architecture
* Utilise Celery for managing asynchronous tasks and background job processing
* Communicate effectively with team members to articulate technical challenges and solutions

Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent experience)
* Strong Python expertise with at least 4 years of experience
* Deep understanding of MySQL and experience in writing optimised SQL queries to handle large datasets
* Proven track record of optimising application performance and scalability
* Experience with Azure technologies and building scalable cloud-based architectures
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git)
* Good understanding of RESTful APIs and web services
* Knowledge of caching strategies and performance monitoring tools is a plus
* Experience with Django and Celery is essential
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly express technical problems and solutions

This is a full-time, 40-hour per week position. Our core hours are from 2 PM to 6 PM PHT, with the remaining 4 hours to be completed flexibly around this time to make up an 8-hour workday. We'd love to hear from you if you're dedicated to software quality and ready to contribute to a dynamic inventory management application.

To apply, send your CV and cover letter to recruitment@sjretail.uk with the subject 'Senior Backend Developer—[Name]'. Apply now!

title: Onboarding SEO Specialist
description:
Summary of Duties & Responsibilities
As part of this role, you will be responsible as an Onboarding SEO Specialist, you will lead the technical audits, analysis, and implementation of technical recommendations.
Essential Functions
Initial Audit & Analysis:
- Conduct a comprehensive website audit (technical SEO, content, user experience) to create a sitemap for designers and content direction for the website build
- Analyze current keyword rankings and performance.
- Review competitor websites and their SEO strategies.
Technical SEO Setup:
- Set up Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager.
- Verify XML sitemap submission and robots.txt file configuration.
- Set up or review schema markup.
- Setup SEO Tool and configure into WordPress Site
Keyword Research & Strategy Development:
- Perform keyword research to identify target keywords.
- Develop a keyword strategy aligned with client goals.
- Create a content calendar or plan based on keyword research.
Map Out in Sitemap On-Page SEO Optimization:
- Optimize meta titles, descriptions, headers, and content.
- Optimize images with alt tags and proper file names.
- Check and fix any broken links.
- Setup instant indexing API
Content Review & Strategy:
- Review existing content for SEO opportunities (e.g., updating old content, adding new keywords).
- Plan content creation or blog strategy if applicable.
- Ensure content aligns with the target keywords and user intent.
Skills & Competencies
- 2-3+ years of local SEO experience at a digital agency
- Expert knowledge of the most up-to-date SEO industry standards and best practices
- Deep knowledge of Google’s guidelines and major algorithm updates
- Strong sense of ownership, drive, and urgency
- Self-starter willing to tackle projects with excitement
- High attention to detail
- Be Honest and Transparent
- Proactive, Not Reactive
- Discipline and organization to work remotely
- Responsiveness and consistent communication
- Someone who wants to be an industry expert for their main competencies
Technical Skills
- Basic understanding of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JSON-LD, APIs, and Web Content Accessibility Guidelines
- Intermediate with tools like Google Search Console, Google Analytics, GA4, Google Tag Manager, Google Data Studio, etc
- Experience with WordPress and other content management systems
- Familiarity with industry tools such as SEOmoz, Screaming Frog, SEMRush, Ahrefs, Majestic SEO, Crawlers, etc
Education or Prior Work Experience
- 2-3+ years of technical SEO experience at a digital agency
- College degree preferred
Reports to
Jenni Bandealy
Number Supervised
0
Travel
Up to 0% for Annual company-wide meeting
Work Environment
This job operates in a remote capacity within a remote location the employee chooses. We prefer that employees protect our sensitive information when choosing a public location. We provide a company computer and all other equipment is approved by Human Resources. Employees are responsible for creating and maintaining a safe and comfortable location to complete their daily duties.
Physical Demands
While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to sit,; use hands to finger, handle or feel; and reach with hands and arms.

title: Personal Assistant / Operations Manager / Property Manager

We have established connections with 67 property investment firms throughout the UK, which adds to the dynamic nature of this position.

3. Is independent and can solve problems on their own. 
4. Has the ability to take on spontaneous tasks (design, research, analysis).
5. Is truly committed to the role.

This role requires 40 hours per week at $700 per month for the first 12 months. This is non-negotiable. The salary will then increase every 12 months based on individual performance and commitment to the company. Additionally, we are proud to provide 30 days of annual holidays on a pro-rata basis.

Bonus structure:
There is a $3000 annual bonus based on individual performance and contribution to the company.

You are expected to work from 7 am GMT to 12 pm GMT Monday to Friday as the main core hours and the rest of the hours to work around this time providing you with the flexibility to manage your time well.

Due to the large number of applications we receive, before contacting us, please answer the following questions:

1. What is your highest level of education? (High school/pre-college, bachelor's, masters)

NOTE: You are NOT allowed to use ChatGPT when answering these questions. We are interested to learn who you are, not how best you can use ChatGPT. There are 3 rounds of interview after the initial CV screening, including a telephone and video interview respectively. I

Individuals found to not follow the above guidance will be ignored and your application will not be processed. You must answer all the questions in the job post and attach your CV otherwise you will be ignored.

title: BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist at Top Healthcare Firm
description:
We are seeking a driven BDR/SDR B2B Sales Specialist to join our team. This role involves two main responsibilities: cold calling medical practices to pitch our client’s digital marketing services and generating leads by scraping data from platforms like Zocdoc. You will play a key role in expanding our client base and identifying high-potential prospects in the medical field.
Key Responsibilities:
Cold Calling and Sales Outreach:
Make outbound calls to medical practices to pitch our digital marketing services.
Effectively communicate the benefits of our services and convert interest into booked calls.
Aim to book a minimum of 5 qualified calls per week, with bonuses awarded for reaching this target.
Maintain accurate records of all call outcomes and follow-ups in Salesforce.
Lead Generation and Data Scraping:
Access Zocdoc and other platforms to identify and scrape leads for medical practices by specialty and location, excluding those based on insurance.
Avoid hospitals, universities, and practices without a dedicated website.
Use Google Ads and the Facebook Ads Library to identify practices that are spending on digital marketing.
Cross-reference all new leads with existing records in Salesforce to avoid duplication and ensure lead quality.
Document all new and qualified leads in Google Sheets, clearly noting whether they are untouched prospects.
Data Management and Reporting:
Keep meticulous records of all generated leads and call activities in Google Sheets and Salesforce.
Provide regular reports to the team, detailing lead quality, call outcomes, and conversion rates.
Ideal Candidate Profile:
Experience in B2B sales, cold calling, or lead generation.
Familiarity with Salesforce, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads Library.
Strong English communication skills with a clear, neutral accent.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and meet daily and weekly targets.
Compensation:
Competitive hourly rate of $6-10/hour.
30% Bonuses for every 5 booked calls and successful lead conversions.
How to Apply:
If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with experience in sales and lead generation, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line "B2B Sales Specialist - (NAME)."In the email, include the word "Pineapple" at the end of your response to show you've read the job description carefully.
Interview Process:
We will conduct a Zoom interview to evaluate your English accent, comprehension, and communication ability. Selected candidates will be given a sample task to assess their skills further.

title: Sales Support Assistant
description:
Fintonia Group is at the forefront of the digital assets revolution, and we're seeking a dynamic Sales Support Assistant to join our growing team. This role is crucial in providing the backbone support that enables our sales teams to thrive.

About the Role:

As the Sales Support Assistant, you will:

Sales Operations Support:
Assist the sales team in day-to-day operations, including preparing sales materials, coordinating meetings, and managing client communication.
Maintain and update CRM systems, ensuring accurate and timely data entry and reporting.
Support the preparation of presentations, proposals, and reports for internal and external stakeholders.

Client Onboarding and Documentation:
Prepare and manage onboarding forms for new clients, ensuring all necessary documentation is completed accurately and in a timely manner.
Coordinate with compliance and operations teams to ensure that all client documentation meets regulatory and operational requirements.
Serve as a point of contact for clients during the onboarding process, providing guidance and support as needed.

Due Diligence Questionnaire (DDQ) Preparation:
Take ownership of completing and coordinating DDQs, ensuring all information is accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with regulatory requirements.
Collaborate with internal teams to gather necessary data and insights, ensuring timely submission of DDQs to clients and partners.
Maintain a library of responses and continuously update them to reflect any changes in products, services, or regulatory standards.

Client Coordination:
Serve as the primary point of contact for client inquiries, providing timely and accurate information to facilitate smooth transactions.
Coordinate and follow up on client requests, ensuring that all requirements are met and issues are resolved efficiently.
Work closely with clients and internal teams to schedule and organize product demonstrations, webinars, and meetings.

Compliance and Operations Coordination:
Work closely with compliance and operations teams to ensure all sales activities and client interactions adhere to regulatory and operational standards.
Collaborate with these teams to streamline processes and enhance the overall client experience, ensuring that all regulatory and operational risks are managed effectively.

Process Improvement:
Identify areas for improvement in sales processes and contribute to developing more efficient workflows.
Collaborate with the sales, marketing, compliance, and product teams to refine and enhance sales support tools and materials.

Market and Product Knowledge:
Stay updated on the latest trends in digital assets and traditional finance to better support the sales team.
Assist in gathering and analyzing market data to inform sales strategies and client engagement.

Qualifications and Experience:
To excel in this role, you should have:
- A minimum of 3 years of experience in sales support, sales administration, or a related role within the financial services sector.
- Experience in preparing and managing Due Diligence Questionnaires (DDQs) and client onboarding forms is highly desirable.
- Strong organizational skills with attention to detail.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with proficiency in English. Knowledge of Mandarin or other regional languages is an advantage.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and experience using CRM systems.
- Tech-savvy with the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new tools and technologies.
- Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment.
- A proactive, can-do attitude, and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively

title: Software Developer
description:
### Job Advertisement: Junior Software Developer

**Company:** Confidential

**Location:** Cebu (Onsite Preferred / Remote Considered)

**About Us:**
We are a dynamic and innovative company dedicated to providing top-notch solutions in the transport and logistics industry. Our suite of applications and platforms is designed to streamline operations and enhance efficiency for our clients. We are looking for a talented junior software developer to join our team and contribute to the growth and success of our products.

**Role Overview:**
As a Junior Software Developer at our company, you will be responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and expanding our suite of applications and websites. You will work closely with our development team to ensure our platforms are robust, scalable, and provide an exceptional user experience. Ideally, you will work onsite in Cebu, but for the right candidate, remote work may be considered. You will work autonomously under the guidance of the senior engineer, who will provide knowledge transfer and mentorship.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications hosted on Google Firebase and Digital Ocean.
- Work on both frontend and backend development using Angular, Next.js, WordPress, and WooCommerce.
- Enhance our mobile applications built with Flutter, Dart, Java, Kotlin, and Swift.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

**Tech Stack & Platforms:**
- **Web Applications:**
- **Superadmin & Client Portal:** Front End: Angular, Back End: Google Firebase (Firestore, Authentication, Cloud Functions), MongoDB, Golang.
- **Main Website:** Front End: Next.js, Back End (CMS): WordPress.
- **E-commerce Store:** Front & Back End: WordPress CMS/WooCommerce.

- **Mobile Applications:**
- **Baseline:** Flutter, Dart.
- **Android:** Java, Kotlin.
- **iOS:** Swift.

**Qualifications:**
- Basic experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
- Familiarity with front-end frameworks such as Angular and Next.js.
- Knowledge of backend technologies including Google Firebase, MongoDB, Golang, and WordPress.
- Experience with Flutter and Dart for mobile app development.
- Understanding of platform-specific development with Java, Kotlin, and Swift.
- Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

**Preferred:**
- Experience with cloud hosting platforms such as Google Firebase and Digital Ocean.
- Familiarity with e-commerce platforms like WooCommerce.
- Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.

**What We Offer:**
- Competitive salary and benefits.
- Flexible working hours and the possibility of remote work for the right candidate.
- A collaborative and supportive work environment.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- The chance to work on cutting-edge technology in a rapidly growing industry.

**How to Apply:**
Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are a good fit for this role. Please include links to any relevant projects or GitHub repositories.


We are an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

---

**Join us and help shape the future of transport and logistics technology!**

title: Loan/Mortgage Processor - Dayshift
description:
TITLE: Loans Processor - AU Company

ROLE:
- Work with a fun, energetic, and enthusiastic Australian Mortgage Broking team, with a focus on clear open communication, transparency, and accountability.
- Gather and analyze all required data from borrowers, including income, assets, credit reports, and job information.
- Examine loan applications to ensure all necessary information is correct and comprehensive.
- Prepare and submit loan proposals for underwriting approval.
- Build strong relationships and communicate with borrowers, loan officers, and other team members to offer updates and seek further information.
- Order appraisals, title reports, and any other papers required to complete the loan file.
- Ensure that all applicable regulations and requirements are followed.
- Keep loan files and paperwork up to date and thorough.
- Assist multiple Brokers.
- Assist management with additional activities and projects as assigned.

REQUIREMENT:
- Experience in the submission to settlement process of Loan Processing / or must have experience as a Credit Analyst/Officer directly with a bank.
- Solid end-to-end Loan/Mortgage Processor experience for 4 years in an AU Company
- Fast and reliable internet.
- Working Full Time Australia business hours (Monday to Friday).
- In addition to your headset and camera, two computer monitors would be advantageous for your success in this role.

title: Sr. WordPress Developers
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE: 

Looking for several WordPress developers specializing in custom WordPress theme development.

This role is responsible for coding, designing, and maintaining various websites. This person strives to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.

The ideal candidate loves working with a variety of projects and people. He/she should have a creative and thoughtful approach to requests and collaborate with the team.

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

In this role, you'll get to...

create the website architecture (WordPress Dashboard, using but not limited to ACF, Gutenberg blocks)
design and build the website front-end by using standard HTML/CSS practices
create an immersive experience for the user using micro animations while maintaining excellent Lightspeed performance scores
design and manage the website back-end including database and server integration
integrate data from various front/back-end services and databases using REST-API
generate custom WordPress themes and plugins
navigate and utilize the WPEngine dashboard (including but not limited to updating, hosting and domain setup/integration)
monitor the performance of the live website (using tools such as Page Speed Insights, GTMetrix, and other related tools)
create and integrate quality assurance tests to ensure website success and security
collaborate with the development team to develop and maintain the website(s)
conduct WordPress training with the client (when needed)
stay up to date on technology
attend regular meetings/check-ins with the dev team, project managers and business stakeholders
perform other ad hoc duties related to the role as assigned
REQUIREMENTS: 

On day one, we'll expect you to...

have proven work experience as a WordPress developer using custom built themes
have at least 4+ years of experience working as a WordPress Developer
have attention to detail
be an expert in CSS animations and have a portfolio of production websites with CSS animations 
have bachelor's degree in Computer Science or any related field
know the basics of WordPress Template Hierarchy
apply Basic SEO Integration to the WordPress project
have working knowledge in front-end technologies including SASS, CSS3, JavaScript, HTML5, AlpineJS, jQuery
have working knowledge in backend developments such as WordPress, PHP, MySQL, API integrations, JSON, and XML
have knowledge on CSS Frameworks such as Bootstrap, Foundation, or TailwindCSS
be experienced in code versioning tools such as Git, Github or Gitlab
have the ability to custom the WordPress development using the following:
o   ACF
o   Gutenberg
o   Custom components
o   Yoast SEO
o   Gravity Forms
o   Custom plugins
have basic knowledge of Web Apps for site maintenance such Google Analytics and Tag Manager
be adept in using SEO Figma, Sketch, Invision, GIT, WPEngine, Pardot and HubSpot, and various web compliance standards
have good experience working with debugging tools such as Chrome Inspector and Firebug
have good understanding of website architecture and aesthetics
exhibit a strong understanding of current web development standards, protocols, and processes
document and create user guide(s) for various websites using an existing template/format
have experience with Webflow
be a team player
have the ability to manage projects
have excellent in written and verbal communication skills (English) and able to collaborate and communicate effectively with business stakeholders and team members
have a fully functional and up-to-date computer with which to perform duties
be willing to install next-generation endpoint protection on the computer
be willing to work in US Pacific time zone (8:00am-5:00pm PST) corresponding to 12:00am -9:00am PH time
be a current resident of the Philippines and can perform work from there

What separates the best from the rest:
working knowledge in ReactJS, VueJS and GSAP

NOTES:
Benefits await full-time contractors. 
This is a remote (work from home) position.
Salary Range: $5.50 to $7 per hour

title: Senior FP&A Analyst
description:
Please read before applying:

We are currently seeking a driven individual to join our Advisory department as a Sr. Financial Analyst. In this role, you will support the financial planning and analysis (FP&A) function by performing financial and actuarial analysis and modeling. You will be responsible for the development, maintenance, and enhancement of financial reports and forecast models for a portfolio of clients from various industries.

You will also serve as the primary point person for many client relationships and support the building and maintenance of dynamic models, financial reports, and KPI/data-driven analytics. This is a fast-paced and dynamic position with a high level of cross-functional interaction with our entire team. You will work closely with our Accounting, Payroll, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, and Compliance team members in ongoing client support and regular client reporting tasks.

Responsibilities:
- Build robust 5-year, 3 financial statement, bottoms-up and top-down management models, annual budgets, and long-range 
- strategic forecasts from spreadsheets like Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel
- Guide clients in primary systems, processes, and financial and operational improvements
- Capable of communicating cash runway, KPI's, and other financial drivers to Executive teams, Board members, and non-finance Department Heads
- Project Management of client engagements, including finance, accounting, Payroll/HR
- Problem solving, improving systems, and contributing to the success of the team. 

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
- Minimum 4-6 years of experience performing similar job functions.
- Experience building and maintaining financial models.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- High level of proficiency with Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets and PowerPoint.
- Knowledge of accounting principles for the purpose of creating/updating financial statements and forecast models.
- Ability to identify data anomalies and research and investigate the underlying drivers.
- Capable of building creative approaches to complicated problems.
- Innate aptitude for critical thinking and strong problem-solving abilities.
- Ability to manage and prioritize multiple projects while simultaneously meeting company goals and deadlines.
- Experience with QuickBooks & Xero software and other accounting software is a plus.
- Well-organized and a team player.
- Entrepreneurial spirit with a resourceful nature, team-first attitude, and problem-solving nature.
- Ability to rapidly familiarize self with clients’ operations and objectives; is a Quick Learner and Self-Starter.
- Flexible in working with multiple clients with various communication styles and backgrounds.

If interested, please send us a link to your updated CV

title: Low Voltage Tech**Technical Division
description:
Department: Technical Division - Low Voltage
Position: Analyst

Overview:
We are seeking a dedicated Analyst to join our Technical Division - Low Voltage team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for providing expert remote technical support for systems dependent on Low Voltage infrastructure, including access control, CCTV, intercoms, and multimedia/audio-video systems. This role involves troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, managing system configurations, and assisting clients with various technical setups.

Roles and Responsibilities:
Remote Technical Support:

Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to access control, CCTV, audio/video, and multimedia systems remotely.
Provide technical support and guidance to clients for television hardware, game consoles, and other multimedia devices.
System Configuration and Management:

Add, remove, and manage users/accounts/devices on access control and CCTV platforms.
Configure and troubleshoot streaming systems such as Sonos and BlueSound for optimal performance.
Collaboration and Innovation:

Work closely with team members to develop innovative solutions and enhance system performance.
Assist the onsite team with network rack and stack, cabling, and cable termination standards based on prior experience.
Documentation and Process Maintenance:

Maintain accurate records of system configurations, troubleshooting steps, and client interactions.
Utilize ticketing systems like Autotask for managing support tickets and tracking time.
Qualifications:
Education and Experience:

Associate degree in IT or a related field, OR 1-2 years of relevant experience in IT or a related field.
Proven experience (1-2 years) in a technical support role within a helpdesk or service desk environment.
Technical Skills:

Proficiency with Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Teams for effective communication and collaboration.
Familiarity with Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM) tools such as Datto.
Experience with access control platforms like ZK, Paxton, and PDK.
Expertise in working with CCTV systems from manufacturers like Invid, Dahua, and Hikvision.
Knowledge of audio streaming systems like Sonos and BlueSound for setup and troubleshooting.
Understanding of CAT, COAX, and other low voltage cabling standards and terminations.
Capability to support Accuvox intercom systems technically.
Soft Skills:

Strong organizational skills and effective time management abilities.
Excellent communication skills with a focus on customer service.
Demonstrated problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently.
Experience in documenting system configurations and client interactions accurately.


How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume. Please email your application to thifanny@faroutsupport.com

title: Frontend Engineer
description:

Optimize application performance, considering factors such as rendering, network requests, and overall user experience.

Excellent spoken and written English
3+ years of experience in frontend development with a focus on React JS
Strong proficiency in React JS, JavaScript and TypeScript
Experience with design collaboration tools, such as Figma
Experience with state management libraries/frameworks (e.g., Redux)

title: Virtual Assistant (Scheduling, Sales, HR, and Finance)
description:
Are you a versatile and detail-oriented professional with excellent communication skills? Join our fast-growing, family-run service company based in California, USA! We’re looking for skilled Virtual Assistants to support various departments, including Scheduling, Sales, HR, and Finance.

Position: Depends on your fit
Work Hours: PST (Pacific Standard Time)

Your Role Includes (but is not limited to):

Scheduling:
- Manage and coordinate schedules for multiple teams and technicians
- Communicate with clients and team members to confirm appointments
- Handle rescheduling requests and cancellations efficiently
- Keep our scheduling system up-to-date and accurate

Sales:
- Handle inbound calls and emails from the Marketing Department and convert them into sales
- Make outbound follow-up calls to potential clients in your pipeline
- Record accurate information while listening to customers and asking probing questions
- Collaborate with the sales team to ensure a seamless sales process

HR:
- Assist with recruitment tasks, including posting job ads, screening resumes, and coordinating interviews
- Maintain employee records and assist with onboarding new hires
- Support the HR team with various administrative tasks as needed

Finance:
- Assist with basic bookkeeping tasks, including data entry and invoice processing
- Help manage accounts payable and receivable
- Support the Finance team with budget tracking and financial reporting

What We’re Looking For:
- A proactive and detail-oriented individual with strong multitasking abilities
- Previous experience in any of the listed departments (Scheduling, Sales, HR, or Finance)
- Excellent English communication skills are highly encouraged
- Familiarity with relevant software and tools (e.g., CRM for Sales, scheduling software, HR systems, accounting software) is a plus
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively

Why Join Us?
- Full-time employees receive an HMO Package (Maxicare)
- We provide power supply backup (subject to manager’s approval)
- We’ll equip you with any software or technology you need (you’ll need to have your own computer and Wi-Fi to start)
- Be part of a rapidly growing team with opportunities for long-term employment
- Enjoy constant communication and support from ownership, management, and teammates
- Full-time employees receive a 13th-month bonus.

Interested in joining our team?

Applicants who don't know how to FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS will be automatically rejected - we're only looking for detail-oriented VAs**

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:

DEPARTMENT: Client Services

environment.

- 13th Month of Pay

Outreach and Communication: Email potential partners and business associates to establish and build relationships, maintaining professional communication.

Relationship Building: Develop and maintain relationships with clients, partners, and stakeholders through effective communication and follow-up.

Spreadsheet Management: Develop and manage Excel spreadsheets for scheduling, tracking data, creating reports, and organizing information.

Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role.
Strong organizational and time management skills.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and Google Workspace.

Knowledge of social media management and digital marketing.
Familiarity with scheduling and email automation tools.

Remote work environment.
Opportunity for growth and professional development.
Competitive compensation based on experience.

title: GO HIGH LEVEL EXPERT
description:
**Job Listing: Virtual Assistant for Radiant Men's Health Club**

**Position:** HIGH-LEVEL Virtual Assistant

**Location:** Remote

**Company:** Radiant Men's Health Club

**About Us:**
Radiant Men's Health Club is dedicated to providing exceptional health and wellness services tailored specifically for men. We are committed to enhancing the lives of our clients through innovative health solutions and personalized care. We are looking for a highly skilled Virtual Assistant to join our dynamic team.

**Job Description:**
We are seeking a high-level expert Virtual Assistant with strong skills in copywriting, funnel creation, automation, and email marketing. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and optimizing our digital marketing efforts to drive engagement and growth and customer service management through pipeline management. 

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Develop and implement effective email marketing campaigns.
- Create compelling copy for various marketing materials, including emails, landing pages, and social media.
- Design and manage marketing funnels to optimize customer journeys and conversion rates.
- Set up and manage automation workflows and triggers to enhance marketing efficiency.
- Analyze campaign performance and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to align strategies and ensure cohesive messaging.

**Qualifications:**
- 2 years Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role.
- 2 years Expertise in copywriting, with a portfolio of successful marketing materials.
- 2 years Strong knowledge of funnel creation and optimization.
- 2 years Proficiency in high-level marketing automation tools 
- 2 years Excellent understanding of email marketing best practices.
- 2 Years Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret data to drive decisions.
- 2 years Excellent communication and organizational skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

**How to Apply:**
Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are a good fit for this position. 

Create an AUDIO application and upload it to Dropbox or Google Drive and answer the following questions or you will not be selected. 

What is your past experience?
Is the graveyard shift ok with you? We operate in the eastern time zone. 
Have you worked high level and marketing and pipeline management before? What was your experience? 
What is your home situation like?
Home office?
Computer?
Internet speed?
Distractions? (children family etc)
We pay anywhere from 4-8$ per hour based on your experience. It that ok?

title: Data Engineer
description:
SUBMIT YOUR RESUME HERE: https://www.careers-page.com/hiretidal/job/QV9W5X98

Company Overview:
Tidal is a Direct Placement Agency that helps job seekers find job opportunities for real growth. We work with stable, responsible businesses experienced in remote hires and are excited to welcome international team members. Tidal is owned and operated by consumer brand owners and operators. We have offshore team-building experience and aim to help businesses leverage global talent.

About This Role:
As a Data Engineer, you will be a crucial part of our Technology Team, responsible for managing and optimizing our AWS data warehouse, including S3 and Redshift, and overseeing our Looker reporting environment. Your role will involve scoping and translating reporting requirements, building and optimizing data environments, ensuring data quality, and creating scalable reporting frameworks.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and manage data pipelines and ETL processes using AWS services, including S3 and Redshift.
- Develop and maintain a secure, scalable data architecture to support the organization's analytics and reporting needs.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to define reporting requirements and develop detailed specifications for data products.
- Implement Looker dashboards and reports, ensuring they meet business objectives and performance standards.
- Conduct data validation and quality assurance to maintain data accuracy and reliability.
- Optimize data workflows and ETL processes to enhance efficiency and system performance.

title: Technical Chat Support Specialist
description:
================
IMPORTANT: Please make sure to read the details at the end of this post.
=================
Howdy!

We are Tydal, a fast-growing software company on a mission to empower entrepreneurs to build awesome Shopify businesses. Over 100,000 Shopify merchants around the world trust us, and we’re just getting started.

We’re an entirely remote team. The company is on a journey to create an e-commerce platform built around nurturing customer relationships through marketing automation solutions.

We’re looking for a full-time Technical Chat Support Representative to join us in creating world-class experiences for our Shopify eCommerce applications.

This position is 100% remote. You’ll have the freedom to work where you’re the happiest and, of course, be a part of a team that cares about your success and well-being.

What does the position entail?

- Providing live chat support that serves as the first point of contact for customers who reach out for help
- Respond to general inquiries with a friendly, professional tone and ready-to-help attitude
- Willing to help in any area of the product (help documentation, product research, etc.)
- Collaborate with all teams as an advocate for the customer
- You must be willing to work graveyard shifts, holidays, and on the weekends.

What you’ll be doing

- Have thoughtful, personalized conversations with Merchants through chat
- Relay and advocate for merchant feedback received to help inform product decisions
- Facilitate important cross-functional team communication as an advocate for our merchants
- Build long-lasting, meaningful business relationships through human conversations
- Act as a point of contact and business coach for our merchants while sharing best practices, solutions, and recommendations
- Identify prospective merchants and work to recommend solutions to improve their performance with our apps

Here are the skills and experience we're looking for:

- 3+ years of experience in chat-based support
- Strong CSS/HTML skills (this is a technical role, so technical expertise is essential) 
- Excellent written and verbal English skills
- Familiarity with Shopify or other eCommerce platforms
- Proficiency with cloud-based tools such as Slack, Zendesk, Intercom, etc.

title: GO High-Level Expert (Project-Based)
description:
Job Title: GO High-Level Expert (Project-Based)
Location: Remote
Job Type: Project-Based (Monthly Payment)

title: Dispatcher VA for a towing company
description:
Job Summary:
The Towing Dispatcher will be responsible for coordinating and dispatching towing services in a timely and efficient manner. The ideal candidate will have experience in dispatcher accounts, exceptional communication skills, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment. PLEASE NOTE: ONLY CANDIDATES WITH UPDATED CV AND AN INTRO VIDEO WILL BE PROCESSED.

Key Responsibilities:

Dispatching and Coordination:

Receive and prioritize incoming service requests via phone, email, and digital platforms.
Assign towing jobs to drivers based on availability, location, and urgency.
Monitor the status of active jobs and provide real-time updates to customers and drivers.
Ensure timely dispatch of drivers to provide prompt assistance to customers.
Communication:

Communicate clearly and effectively with drivers, customers, and other stakeholders.
Provide drivers with accurate information regarding job details, including location, type of service needed, and special instructions.
Address and resolve any issues or delays that may arise during the dispatch process.

Record Keeping and Reporting:

Maintain accurate and detailed records of all service requests, dispatches, and job completions.
Update dispatcher accounts with relevant information and ensure data accuracy.
Generate reports on dispatch activities, including response times, job statuses, and any incidents.
Customer Service:

Provide exceptional customer service by addressing inquiries, concerns, and complaints promptly and professionally.
Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction with the services provided.

Application Process:
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their experience and qualifications for this position. Please send your application to patrick.g@globalpacificsupport.com with the subject line "Dispatcher" . PLEASE ATTACH THE LINK OR SHORT VIDEO INTRODUCTION OF YOURSELF HIGHLIGHTING YOUR EXPERTISE AND EXPERIENCE AS A DISPATCHER.
