title: Operations Lead (for Loss Prevention)
description:
How to apply? Fill out the form: https://tinyurl.com/apply-pan-ollp

You’re a proven leader of leaders. A problem solver, a strategist, a coach, an innovator. You take a consultative approach to design and implement processes and solutions, and you do so with a burning sense of urgency. Inefficiency bothers you on a personal level. You accept nothing short of excellence from yourself or your team, and pride yourself in helping those around you achieve it. You thrive in a fast paced environment where innovation is rewarded and execution is worshiped. With a keen eye for solving problems and a strategist's mind, you serve as both coach and are not afraid to be direct. Your consultative approach enables you to craft and implement effective processes and solutions with unwavering urgency. Inefficiency is your nemesis, and you demand nothing less than excellence from both yourself and your team, guiding them towards achieving it. In a high-octane environment, your passion for innovation shines, and you excel where execution is paramount.

You’ll jump-start your career with us by taking ownership of these key responsibilities:
- Assist the director in monitoring, updating and re-assessing Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that align with the company's strategic goals.
- Assist the director in Managing the overall Profit & Loss (P&L) of the department, ensuring financial targets are met or exceeded.
- Providing strategic insights along with the director about the updates on departmental performance
- Lead, inspire and coach team leaders about fostering a culture of accountability, innovation, and excellence.
Identify areas for process optimization and implement solutions that significantly reduce costs and improve efficiency.
- Provide and update documentations about the department's activities across the operation
- Analyzing and interpreting data, particularly root cause analysis, customer journeys, and customer experience.



Who Is Our Ideal Candidate?
Need to have:
- Willing to work 40 hours Eastern Standard Time
- Substantial experience leading a significant number of leaders or assisting a director. 
- Can demonstrate a capacity for effective team and performance management.
- Knowledge in Data Analytics specifically in Chart Creation and Data Interpretation
- Analytical Solving Problems such as Root Cause Analysis and Deep Dives
- Has advance knowledge in Excel and Spreadsheet
- Excellent Communication and Collaboration skills
- Experience in Creating FlowCharts and Process Mapping
- Good planning and Forecasting skills
- Ability to Identify opportunities for process improvement and automation to streamline workflows

Nice to have
- Has experienced a startup environment
- Tech-savvy mindset; willing to explore and adapt to innovative applications and platforms
- Proficiency in financial management, including budget oversight, resource forecasting, and cost 
- Can work with minimal supervision

Nice to have, but not required: 
- Management certifications like PMP, Scrum and Design Sprint
- Process improvement certifications like Lean Six Sigma 
- Proven track record in process improvement, identifying inefficiencies, and implementing solutions.
- Strong financial acumen, with the ability to manage and optimize departmental budgets and resources.
- Exceptional leadership and team development skills, fostering an environment of growth and excellence.
- Advanced communication and interpersonal skills, with a knack for consultative engagement and stakeholder management.
- Very data driven people management strategy



Compensation and Perks
- Competitive Remuneration: You can expect to draw a salary of up to PHP 60,000 per month (negotiable) during your first year of employment. We’re looking for believers in the vision that are excited about building something incredible and lasting.
- Mentorship & Regular Feedback: We want all of our team members to succeed and that includes you. We like to work with team members who want to grow, realize that mistakes happen, and understand that advice from more experienced professionals is worth its weight in gold.
- Abundant Career Progression Opportunities: We promote a culture of career development and learning. We need visionaries and you could be one of them!
- Solid benefits: pro-rated 13th-month pay and paid days off across national holidays, sick leave, and discretionary leave.


How to apply? Fill out the form: https://tinyurl.com/apply-pan-ollp

title: CRM Analyst
description:
About the Company: 

Hiive is a marketplace startup based in Vancouver, Canada, and is backed by seasoned professionals with decades of experience in venture capital, private equity, and capital markets. The fintech company has built a revolutionary trading platform for buyers and sellers of shares in private late-stage venture-capital backed companies and “unicorns,” bringing a rational, beautiful and modern technological interface to a messy and opaque traditional market.

Duties and Responsibilities:

As a CRM Analyst, you will support Hiive’s Sales Operations team in building, maintaining and populating our databases and creating analytical tools for monitoring and evaluating success.

Your day-to-day duties may include: reviewing internal communications and third party data sources to extract and log relevant information and data points; performing lead generation research and data entry; importing and exporting data from our CRM and trading platform; cleaning and organizing large CSV files; and updating client database profiles.

Minimum Qualifications:

- At least three (3) years of relevant experience
- Proficient in Google Workspace and Microsoft 365
- Some experience in working in or on a customer relationship management software program, such as Salesforce, Hubspot or Pipedrive.
- Have an undergraduate degree or college diploma in a relevant area, such as economics or business administration.
- Be tech-savvy, with the ability to quickly learn and adapt to new software applications, systems and processes.
- Be highly organized, effcient, quick, patient and detail-oriented, with a keen eye for and interest in managing, organizing, updating, cleaning and processing large sets of customer data, and performing data import/exports and migrations.
- Be a process-oriented, open-minded thinker, willing to look at problems from multiple angles, with an appetite and patience for getting it right, iterating on systems and processes, and continuously improving.

title: Customer Success Specialist
description:
We are a leading hair extension company dedicated to providing premium quality hair products, including top-of-the-line human hair extensions for women. We are seeking an exceptional Customer Success Specialist who is passionate about building and nurturing client relationships. As a full-time member of our team, you will receive comprehensive training on our products and play a pivotal role in enhancing customer satisfaction, driving sales, and fostering client loyalty.

Responsibilities:
- Establish and maintain strong, positive relationships with new and existing clients through phone, text, and email, fostering long-term customer loyalty.
- Engage in proactive sales activities, including cold calling potential clients to introduce our products, and converting leads into loyal customers.
- Reconnect with previous clients to rebuild and strengthen business relationships.
- Act as the primary point of contact for clients, ensuring that their needs are understood and effectively addressed.
- Work closely with internal teams to ensure customer requests are met in a timely and efficient manner.
- Monitor and analyze customer behavior data to anticipate changing needs and recommend proactive solutions.
- Resolve client concerns promptly, keeping detailed records of interactions and ensuring customer satisfaction.
- Regularly update HubSpot with detailed notes from daily client interactions to maintain accurate records.
- Provide high-quality customer service via phone, email, and text on a day-to-day basis.

Requirements:
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, with the ability to convey information clearly and persuasively.
- Proven experience in sales, with a strong ability to close deals and meet targets.
- Demonstrated experience in cold calling and converting prospects into clients.
- Ability to multitask effectively and manage multiple responsibilities simultaneously.
- Strong organizational skills with a keen eye for detail.
- Proficient in using Google Workspace (e.g., Google Sheets, Google Drive).
- Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to find creative solutions.
- Must be available to work from 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM Eastern Time.

title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT
description:
We are AIRASSISTANT.io, an award-winning virtual assistant agency that is passionate about helping our clients grow their businesses and processes to new heights using social media automation and sales funnels! We help professional women from the Philippines by training them to be master Executive Assistants to our clients through Social Media Management, Sales Funnel Creation, Executive Assistant Task/Calendar Management, Digital Marketing, as well as Sales & Lead Generation (yea, all that and a bag of chips.

Become a certified AirAssistant for FREE, then get guaranteed part-time or full-time job placement with one of our vetted clients within 30 days of certification - with opportunity for raises and full time employment. Before you read any farther - this role is not for the lazy person, freeloader, inexperienced or incompetent. You’ll probably get fired as soon as you start, so save yourself the embarrassment. If you are a detail-oriented, OVERCOMMUNICATING go-getter who loves the idea of helping change lives through entrepreneurship, then read on…

Details below:
EXPERIENCE:
1+ years of experience in Social Media Marketing, Sales Funnels, Shopify, or Digital Marketing
We're looking for a professional woman who is passionate about helping changemakers simplify their lives by setting up systems that will allow them to operate their businesses with more ease and less overwhelm. You have experience with sales funnel and CRM software
1+ years of experience advertising on platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, within a Marketing team consisting of Paid Acquisition, Organic Marketing, Customer Retention, & Product Marketing
We’re looking for an emerging leader who has the potential to head a team in the future that will report directly to you. Having leadership experience is a MAJOR plus
1+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant with track record of company success.
You've done it all from managing schedules to email & calendar management. You have a meticulous eye for detail where Prioritization and Organization are your love language
Creating SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures)
You’ll ensure each business function has detailed documentation for repeatable and scalable growth if it isn't already in place. If you see gaps, you take the initiative to fill them and produce results without anyone knowing there was an issue (yea, we did say all that and a bag of chips :-)
Experience working at a digital/online product/platform
You’re familiar with online courses, digital products & platforms and popular tools in the business space ranging from landing page builders and email service providers to CRMs, and course hosting platforms aren’t foreign to you (We teach tools like Shopify, Convertkit, Kajabi, Teachable, Learnworlds, Calendly, etc)

ABOUT YOU:
“You down with SOP? Yeah you know me!”—You’re an advocate for SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) to make our systems repeatable & scalable.
Your love language is processes & predictable, meteoric growth. We never question company progress towards the quarterly and yearly goals because you keep real-time metrics for all projects.
You’re aware of new software and can look at current systems and identify how to automate tasks a company has been doing manually for months.
You’re addicted to digital processes & automation in the world of social media because you love building connections in the digital space and you’ve seen how powerful it can be in business growth
You’re driven by metrics & tracking. You know that you can’t improve something unless you measure it, so you develop ways to measure performance so your company is always predictably improving.
Timeliness and deadlines are your jam. When we have a team call at 10:00am, you show up at 9:55am. When the deadline is Tuesday at 5:30pm, you have it done Monday.
You overcommunicate clearly and confidently. If you agree/disagree with something, you communicate that without hesitation or overthinking. You’re no stranger to asking why we do things a certain way to ensure we’re intentional with our resources. You send regular updates without having to be asked, and always make sure to treat the company you work for as if it was your own brainchild.
You’re a leader and team player. Ego? What ego? If something needs to be done, you dive in to make sure all critical tasks are accounted and cared for.
*because we care about detail-oriented applicants, mention the secret word “PINEAPPLE” in your application so we know you read this in its entirety*
If you’re nodding your head “Yes” to the above, proceed below to apply.

PERKS:
We're committed to setting you up for success as a certified Air Assistant that is equipped to take on any role your employer assigns you to. Upon acceptance as a candidate, you get exclusive access to trainings that will certify your skills in:
Task & Calendar Management
Launch/Sales Strategy Planning
Sales Funnel Tech Setup (For E-Commerce or Service Based Businesses)
Social Media Management
Digital Media Marketing (Including Email and SMS Marketing)
Lead Generation
After one week of training and assessment, you're officially a certified Air Assistant, which means we work to guarantee a part-time remote job with a woman-owned business dedicated to long term success of her company's team and clients/customers. Before signing an employee agreement with your new employer, you get to meet her in a virtual Executive Assistant Mixer to make sure there is a connection between brand and AA.
Apply and we'll be in touch soon to invite you to next steps in the application/candidate process!


Part time work hours (minimum 25 hours per week required)
Work from anywhere in the world (as long as your internet signal is strong and computer is fast)
Starting Salary at $400 USD a month ($4800 USD annual)
Free certification program to enhance your professional skills in your career
Guaranteed job placement after certification

title: Solidworks CAD Automatisation Engineer
description:
Join Our Innovative Startup and Lead the Automation of CAD Assemblies with DriveWorks Pro!

Are you a skilled SolidWorks CAD expert with a passion for automation and innovation? Do you want to take your career to the next level by mastering DriveWorks Pro and creating cutting-edge configurators for a forward-thinking startup? If yes, then we want you on our team! Nordair Systems, a small but ambitious startup specializing in customized cleanroom workstations based in Hamburg, Germany, is looking for a talented individual to automate the creation of CAD assemblies and sales documents using DriveWorks Pro.

Job Description:

Primary Task: Automate the creation of CAD assemblies, bills of materials, technical drawings, quotes, flyers, and invoices using DriveWorks Pro.
Learning Opportunity: You’ll gain access to an extensive video library to learn how to implement and optimize DriveWorks Pro for our specific needs.
Key Project: Develop and implement a product configurator for our website, nordair-systems.de, that will revolutionize how our customers interact with our offerings.
Long-Term Goal: Eventually, you’ll be responsible for deploying an interactive 3D configurator on our website using DriveWorks Live.

Soft Skills:

Fast Learner: Ability to quickly absorb new information and apply it effectively.
Problem Solver: Aptitude for identifying issues and finding creative solutions independently.
Independent Worker: Capable of managing your own tasks and time efficiently.

Required Technical Skills and Experience:

Proficiency in SolidWorks CAD: Strong experience in creating and managing CAD assemblies.
Advanced English Skills: At least C1 level proficiency.
Basic Coding Knowledge: Understanding the fundamentals of coding to work effectively with DriveWorks Pro.

Desired Technical Skills:

Experience with DriveWorks or CPQ Systems: Prior exposure to configuring and automating CAD models using DriveWorks or similar software.
Advanced Programming Skills: Ability to write and troubleshoot scripts or code within DriveWorks.
Software Administration: Experience managing software tools or platforms in a professional setting.

Detailed Responsibilities:

Configurator Creation: Develop a comprehensive configurator for our products, such as laminar flow boxes and cleanroom enclosures, using DriveWorks Pro.
Automation: Drive the dimensions, change configurations in SolidWorks, and automate the generation of sales documents like quotes and flyers.
Website Integration: Implement an interactive 3D configurator on our website using DriveWorks Live, enhancing the customer experience.

Work Schedule and Holidays:

Flexible Hours: Choose your own working hours, with only one weekly meeting to attend.
Generous Holidays: Enjoy all regular holidays in the Philippines plus 20 days of paid time off annually plus additional sick leave.

Salary: $1,500/month (40 hours/week)

Perks and Benefits:

13th Month Pay: Receive an additional month’s salary after completing your 6-month probation period.

Training Provided:

DriveWorks Pro: Access an online video course to learn and master DriveWorks Pro.

Career Potential:

Growth Opportunities: Be part of a small, flat-hierarchy startup with plenty of opportunities to develop your skills and advance your career.

How to Apply:

Send us a SolidWorks project you are proud of and include “I want to become a DriveWorks Pro” in the subject line.

Ready to take the next step in your career? Apply today and become a key player in our innovative startup!

title: Shopify Expert
description:
If interested Submit the following: (failure to follow instructions will not be entertained)

1. CV with no weird format (Upload it via google drive and make sure that the link is shared publicly)
2. 60-sec Introduction video of telling something about yourself. (Must have a formal background and no audio issues)


Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Shopify Expert to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the Shopify platform and be capable of handling technical requests and updates as needed. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and a passion for e-commerce.

Manage and optimize our Shopify store, ensuring it runs smoothly and efficiently.

title: SEO Analyst
description:
We're seeking an experienced SEO Analyst to join Digital Treasury. The ideal candidate will have a deep technical understanding of search engine optimisation and advanced proficiency in various SEO techniques and strategies.
Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct in-depth technical SEO audits, focusing on crawlability, indexability, and site architecture
- Perform comprehensive competitor research, content gap identification, and backlink analysis
- Analyse search console data to identify growth opportunities, monitor indexing issues, and improve click-through rates
- Implement and manage web analytics, including setting up enhanced e-commerce tracking, custom events, and conversion funnels
- Deploy and manage tag management systems for streamlined tracking implementation across various marketing platforms
- Conduct advanced keyword research, focusing on search intent with supported data using keyword researching tools
- Optimise technical and on-page elements including meta tags, schema markup, XML sitemaps, robots.txt files, etc
- Perform log file analysis to identify crawl budget issues and optimise crawl efficiency
- Implement and test structured data for rich snippet opportunities
- Analyse Core Web Vitals and implement strategies to improve page speed and user experience
- Develop and execute internal linking strategies to improve site architecture and page authority distribution
Required Skills and Experience:
- 3+ years of hands-on SEO experience with demonstrable results in improving organic search visibility
- Thrive in a fast-paced environment, able to manage multiple projects simultaneously and adapt quickly to changing priorities
- Demonstrate strong time management skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines without compromising the quality of work
- Advanced proficiency in SEO crawling and auditing techniques
- Expert-level skills in backlink analysis and competitive research
- In-depth understanding of web analytics, including experience with advanced data analysis
- Proven ability to use search console APIs for large-scale data extraction and analysis
- Proficiency in tag management systems, including custom variable creation and trigger configuration
- Strong knowledge of technical SEO concepts including hreflang implementation, pagination handling, and canonical tag usage
- Proficiency in SEO tools such as Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Search Console (GSC), and Google Tag Manager (GTM), among others.
Bonus:
- Experience with programming languages like Python or R for data analysis and visualisation of large SEO datasets
- Familiarity with web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with the ability to identify and resolve rendering issues
- Up-to-date knowledge of search engine algorithms, including an understanding of EEAT principles and core algorithm updates
- Knowledge in other SEO software tools
- Portfolio of recent works
- Knowledge of SQL for database querying and large-scale data analysis
- Familiarity with version control systems for collaborative SEO implementations
- Understanding of machine learning concepts and their application to SEO strategies
- Experience with API integrations for custom reporting and data analysis workflows

title: Marketing Automation Specialist
description:
DAP Brands is a leading tax strategy company dedicated to helping businesses and individuals navigate the complexities of taxation with precision and expertise. We pride ourselves on delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service to our clients. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a talented Marketing Automation Specialist to join our team and drive our marketing efforts to the next level.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Marketing Automation Specialist to design, implement, and optimize automated marketing campaigns that drive engagement, generate leads, and increase conversions. In this role, you will leverage specialized software to automate repetitive marketing tasks, allowing DAP Brands to efficiently manage large-scale campaigns and personalize communications at scale.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Campaign Planning and Strategy:
- Develop and execute marketing automation strategies that align with DAP Brands’ overall marketing goals.
- Create targeted campaigns that effectively guide prospects through the marketing funnel.
2. Email Marketing:
- Design and manage various email marketing campaigns, including drip campaigns, newsletters, and transactional emails.
- Segment email lists to deliver personalized content to specific audience groups.
3. Workflow and Automation Setup:
- Build and maintain automated workflows and sequences that trigger actions based on user behavior (e.g., email sends, lead
scoring, CRM updates).
- Utilize marketing automation platforms such as HubSpot, Marketo, or Pardot to create and manage these workflows.
4. Lead Nurturing and Scoring:
- Implement lead nurturing programs to engage prospects over time and move them closer to a purchasing decision.
- Establish lead scoring models to prioritize leads based on their interactions with DAP Brands’ marketing materials.
5. Data Management and Integration:
- Ensure accurate collection, storage, and integration of marketing data with other systems, such as CRM platforms.
- Use data-driven insights to refine targeting, improve campaign performance, and inform decision-making.
6. A/B Testing and Optimization:
- Conduct A/B tests on various campaign elements (e.g., subject lines, content, send times) to optimize performance.
- Analyze campaign metrics to identify areas for improvement and implement changes to enhance effectiveness.
7. Reporting and Analytics:
- Monitor the performance of marketing automation campaigns and report on key metrics (e.g., open rates, click-through rates, conversions, ROI).
- Provide insights and recommendations to improve future campaigns.
8. Collaboration:
- Work closely with content creators, designers, sales teams, and other marketing professionals to ensure cohesive and effective campaigns.
- Align marketing automation efforts with broader marketing and sales strategies.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Marketing Automation Specialist or in a similar role.
- Proficiency with marketing automation platforms (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot, GHL).
- Strong understanding of email marketing best practices and campaign management.
- Experience with lead nurturing, lead scoring, and CRM integration.
- Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their application through this online form: forms.gle/R9BV91DbNfRHsZtJ6
Use the Job Code: AUTO

title: Senior pay-per-click (PPC) Manager and Technical SEO specialist
Virtual Finance and Client Support Specialist | $8-$12/hr, Remote
description:
We operate a company that manages investments and handles funds. We focus on improving our systems to ensure our clients receive accurate and timely service. Because of growing demand for our services, we need to hire more professionals, such as accountants, engineers, or finance experts, to handle our clients' needs and requests.

Key Responsibilities:
• Client Data Management: Enter and update client information in our system to keep it accurate. You need to be detail-oriented and good with CRM tools.
• Report Preparation: Create and edit reports and proposals using Adobe for client meetings. This requires strong skills in understanding and summarizing financial data.
• Meeting Preparation: Help get ready for meetings by making Google Slides presentations and checking meeting details via email. Good communication skills are needed for this.
• Team Support: Assist the team by preparing financial statements and other documents. You’ll use your interpersonal skills to provide helpful insights and recommendations.
• Workflow Adherence and Improvement: Follow our set procedures carefully and suggest ways to make them better. You need to be skilled in financial software and able to work both independently and with the team.
• Documentation: Complete paperwork and make sure all documents are accurate and meet regulatory standards. Accuracy is key here.
• Onboarding and DocuSign: Help new clients get started and send out necessary materials using DocuSign. Professionalism in managing these processes is important.
• QBO Experience: Use QuickBooks Online to handle tasks like creating journal entries, categorizing transactions, preparing financial documents, and reconciling accounts monthly.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
• Proven experience in the financial services industry.
• Proficiency in CRM systems and financial software.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
• Detail-oriented with a high level of accuracy in data management.
• Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
• Excellent written and spoken English with professional email etiquette.
• High-speed internet, reliable computer, professional camera and microphone, and a quiet space for confidential conversations.

Work Environment and Culture:
• We are a fun company that treats our team with respect and care.
• This role is critical to our company’s success, and your input, contributions, and decisions are extremely important.
• We value positivity, organization, high standards, and a willingness to receive feedback and continuously improve.
• The role offers flexibility in working hours, with a requirement to work at least half of the hours during US Eastern Standard Time (EST).

Compensation:

• $8/hour during a three-month training and onboarding period.
• $9/hour for the following nine months.
• $10 to $12/hour after one year, depending on performance.
• OFS PhilHealth and SSS monthly self-payments are reimbursable.

Application Process:

Please send me a message with a personal finance tip, book, or mantra that you find inspiring. I will then provide you with a link to fill out the formal application and complete our standard questionnaire.
Include "Virtual Finance and Client Support Specialist" in the subject line.

Complete the English Proficiency Assessment on your Onlinejobs.ph profile through ExamEnglish.com and the IQ Test through IQTest.com before applying. This will improve your chances in the application process.

Selected candidates will proceed through a questionnaire, assessments, and interviews with our team.

We look forward to welcoming a new team member who shares our commitment to excellence and client satisfaction.

title: Expert in business management, GHL and SM design
description:
I’m an intuitive self mastery coach who is currently moving from one GHL provider to another. It’s a new beginning for both me and my business.
My current VA has let me know she will be targeting a more specific neich and raising her pricing - so it’s time for us to part ways.
I am now calling in a business management gun! Someone who is an expert in GHL who can manage the day-to-day administration of my business help create solid structures and automations.
I am in a state of flux right now as I step back from my business to really discover myself… I need someone who can step up and run the day today with autonomy and direction.
My VA is happy to on board and get you comfortable before she steps away completely.
So far, I have been the one creating and writing all the social media posts, and my VA was creating incredible artwork. We have templates. I would love someone who is fast but pays attention to detail And would love to do more video snippets so will need someone who can do editing etc. As well.
In October, I am going to step into working with an advertising agency and they will create a lot of the Automated flow charts then too .
Ideally I would love someone with a great creative flair but also very good at the implementation of the practical strategic stuff as well.
Trust is a very big thing for me. I have been burned before so I’m looking for someone who is a great communicator, honest and completes things in a timely manner.
Ideally I would love someone who can help organise me as well as work within a team environment taking direction from the ad team as well.
I’m a hyper creative so can have explosions of ideas very quickly and want to implement them- So someone authentic who can let me know if things are or are not possible at the earliest possible opportunity would be ideal.
The work I do has a focus around permission and pleasure so working with someone who doesn’t get shy around subjects of personal pleasure or expression is absolutely necessary.

title: Solutions Architect
description:
TO APPLY, please click on this link to proceed to our Recruitment Assessment and Video Interview: https://www.ondemandassessment.com/link/index/JB-X8FJVQJ5T?u=1146361

SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT

Job Summary: Responsible for designing and/or modifying systems architecture to meet certain business needs. The incumbent will test, integrate, and program software systems to ensure that specific business issues are solved.

Responsibilities:
1. Understanding business and technical requirements, assessing multiple technical alternatives, and recommending the most optimal technical solution architecture.
2. Recommending mobile, web and backend technologies that can help our clients solve their business goals and challenges.
3. Manages activities that take place during solution ideation, solution design, and solution implementation.
4. Assists in our clients understanding of modern software architecture.
5. Responsible for establishment of an IT Architecture practice, and the adoption of an architecture and standards methodology.
6. Design, estimate and propose solutions for projects and work with the company and client delivery teams to ensure they are successful.
7. Implementing application development/engineering methodologies, processes, and practices, to meet all project requirements, including product design, information security, code maintainability and reliability.
8. Helping to communicate to clients and potential clients in a written format the benefits and considerations for building a modern mobile or web application.
9. Speaking in front of large groups of potential clients at technical and non-technical conferences.
10. Assist with troubleshooting and resolving complex production system issues, including critical issues that might occur outside of normal business hours.
11. Develops key strategies on technology, the engagement process of the Pre-sales team with the client, solves critical problems, and drives them to success though advocacy, influence, and direction.
12. Act as a technical advisor to senior leadership and leads the resources and budgets from a technology perspective on all leads.
13. Play a leading role in the design, development, deployment of critical, large-scale projects and or the launch of new products.
14. Successfully lead the resources and prepare budgets from a technical resource perspective for the entire duration of the projects assigned.
15. Successfully lead cross department technical projects; defines and oversee multiple projects for teams while ensuring visibility to the business.
16. Successfully implement process improvements that increase the velocity and quality across all projects.
17. Productively contribute to the building, deployment, and monitoring of processes with an emphasis on reliability and performance.
18. Responsible for technical solutions and delivery success across all projects.
19. Effectively design the optimal solutions based on use case and applicable technology.
20. Effectively define non-functional requirements for projects under development.

Required Qualifications:
Formal Education or Equivalent:
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
Years of Experience:
8+ years of Application Architecture Experience on micro service using multiple technology
Competencies:
Strong interpersonal skills - work together to solve problems
Passionate about learning - help identify new technologies and approaches to problems
Proactive and self-starter - deep desire to do better and be better
Effective communicator (oral and written)

Specialized skills, knowledge, or certifications unique to this role:
Strong interest in mobile and web-based technologies (Flutter, React Native, Angular, Node, React, Vue experience is an asset).
Strong working experience with one or more programming and scripting languages such as JavaScript, SQL, .NET, Java, Python, 
PHP, Ruby, PERL, C++, and others.
Experience in leading technical architecture discussions and helping drive technical decisions.
Experience with large-scale, distributed, micro-service or event-based architectures 
Experience in building complex solutions on MEAN and JAVA.
Experience with XML, SOAP, JSON and REST technologies.
Experience with Relational, graph and/or unstructured data technologies such as SQL Server, Azure SQL and Cosmos.
Experience in cloud-based solution design making use of various PaaS and SAAS features offered by leading cloud providers 
like Azure and AWS.
Knowledge of integrating cloud services to other cloud services and on-premises services.
Experience with ASP.NET.
Experience with using cloud tools like Azure data lake and data streaming solution.
Experience with software development agencies.
Solid background in software architecture as well as working closely with clients in an active partnership model.

title: Full-Time Concierge Team Member – Be the Architect of Unforgettable Experiences
description:
Join Us as a Full-Time Concierge Team Member: Create Magic with Every Interaction

Are you someone who thrives on creating moments of magic for others? Do you have an innate ability to make every guest feel special, turning their stay into an experience they’ll never forget? If you’re passionate about hospitality and have a flair for anticipating needs before they arise, this role isn’t just a job—it’s your stage to shine.

About the Role:
As our Part-Time Concierge Team Member, you won’t just be answering questions; you’ll be crafting experiences. You’ll be the friendly face that welcomes our guests, the knowledgeable guide who enhances their stay, and the problem-solver who ensures every detail is just right. This is your opportunity to be part of something extraordinary, where your contribution truly makes a difference.

What Awaits You:

Craft Exceptional Experiences: From the moment guests arrive to the moment they depart, you’ll ensure every interaction is infused with warmth, care, and attention to detail. Your service will be the gold standard that sets us apart.
Dynamic and Engaging Work: No two days are the same. You’ll be meeting new people, solving new challenges, and making a real impact on our guests’ lives. Your role is vital to our success, and every day will bring new opportunities to excel.
Collaborate with a Passionate Team: You’ll work alongside like-minded individuals who share your commitment to excellence and your passion for hospitality. Together, we’ll create a work environment that’s as rewarding as it is enjoyable.
Growth Opportunities: Start with us part-time and grow into a full-time role as you showcase your talents. We believe in nurturing potential and offering pathways for advancement within our team.
A Stage to Shine: You’ll have the autonomy to showcase your hospitality skills and make a genuine impact on our brand. Your creativity and dedication will be recognized and celebrated.

What We’re Looking For:

Exceptional Communication Skills: The ability to engage with guests in a way that feels both professional and personal, ensuring they feel valued and heard.
Problem-Solving Abilities: A proactive approach to handling guest inquiries and resolving issues with grace and efficiency, always keeping their experience top of mind.
Attention to Detail: A meticulous eye for detail that ensures every aspect of the guest experience is flawless, from special requests to last-minute changes.
Hospitality Passion: A genuine love for creating memorable experiences and a desire to go above and beyond to make every guest’s stay special.
Availability to work 40 hours per week

Why This Role is Perfect for You:

Resonance of Grandeur, Hints of Mastery, Touches of Genius: You’ll be part of a brand that’s about more than just hospitality—it’s about creating moments of magic. Your work will leave a lasting impression on every guest you serve.
A Rewarding Environment: We value and recognize brilliance. You’ll enjoy a supportive work culture that rewards excellence and encourages you to bring your best self to work every day.
Be Part of a Legacy: Help us build something extraordinary. Your role will contribute to a legacy of exceptional guest experiences that will be remembered long after they’ve left.

If you’re ready to turn your passion for hospitality into a career and join a team that’s committed to excellence, we want to hear from you. Apply now and start making magic with us!

As we aim to expand our digital presence and online footprint, we are looking for a skilled Virtual Assistant from the Philippines to run and manage our Facebook and Instagram ads, enhance our social media campaigns, and support our branding and marketing efforts.

The Virtual Assistant - Social Media Ads & Marketing Specialist will be responsible for managing and optimizing our Facebook and Instagram advertising campaigns. This role involves overseeing Business Suite, scheduling posts, researching hashtag strategies, managing lead generation, growth of our following, and contributing to our overall branding and marketing strategies.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Ad Management: Create, manage, and optimize Facebook and Instagram ad campaigns to maximize reach, engagement, and conversions.
- Business Suite Management: Oversee and utilize Facebook Business Suite for campaign management, performance tracking, and reporting.
- Campaign Optimization: Continuously analyze ad performance, adjust targeting, and refine strategies to achieve optimal results.
- Post Scheduling: Schedule and manage posts across Facebook and Instagram to ensure consistent and strategic content delivery.
- Hashtag Research: Research and implement effective hashtag strategies to enhance visibility and engagement on social media platforms.
- Lead Generation: Manage lead generation activities, including creating and monitoring lead forms and follow-up processes.
- Branding & Marketing: Assist in developing and executing branding and marketing strategies to strengthen our online presence and attract new clients.
- Reporting: Generate regular reports on ad performance, campaign metrics, and lead generation outcomes to track progress and inform decision-making.
- Trend Analysis: Stay updated on social media trends, tools, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain cutting-edge and effective.

**Qualifications:**
- Experience: Must have a proven history in managing Facebook and Instagram ads, with a strong understanding of social media marketing and advertising.
- Technical Skills: Proficiency in Facebook Business Suite, Instagram Ads Manager, and GHL.
- Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze ad performance data, derive insights, and make data-driven recommendations.
- Creativity: Strong creative skills to develop engaging ad content and visuals that align with our branding.
- Organizational Skills: Excellent organizational abilities with attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
- Self-Motivation: Ability to work independently, demonstrate initiative, and maintain high levels of productivity in a remote setting.

**Preferred Skills:**
- Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with the mortgage industry and its marketing nuances. These are specialty category ads
- Graphic Design:** Basic graphic design skills or experience with tools like Canva or Adobe Creative Suite for ad copy
- Experience with GO HIGH LEVEL is a plus

Working Conditions:
- Remote Work:** This is a remote position, requiring a reliable internet connection and a quiet, dedicated workspace.
- Schedule: Flexible hours, does not have to be available during California business hours

**How to Apply:**
Interested candidates should submit their resume, a cover letter detailing their relevant experience, and any applicable work samples

Equal Opportunity Employer:
KEES Lending Inc is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: IT Operations Specialist - Sports & Entertainment Law Firm
description:
About Us:

Our Law Firm is at the forefront of sports and entertainment immigration law, specializing in P-1, O-1, and EB-1A visas for elite professionals worldwide. We pride ourselves on leveraging technology to enhance our legal services, streamline processes, and deliver exceptional results for our clients. We are looking for a highly skilled and versatile Technical Operations Specialist to join our team and help us maintain our cutting-edge approach.

Position Overview:

As a Technical Operations Specialist at Gil Law Firm, you will be the go-to expert for all things technical, handling a wide range of tasks from data analytics and full-stack development to managing our Google Workspace and automating our processes. Your role will be crucial in optimizing our technological infrastructure, ensuring that all systems run smoothly, and developing tools that enhance our legal operations. We’re seeking someone who is not just tech-savvy but also proactive and capable of wearing many hats.

Key Responsibilities:

Technical Management and Development:

Data Analytics and Science: Utilize data analytics and data science techniques to analyze client data, improve client intake processes, and support re-marketing efforts.

Full-Stack Development: Develop and maintain front-end and back-end tools, including those that integrate with artificial intelligence, to support the firm’s operations.

Dubsado Documents: Create, manage, and optimize Dubsado documents, ensuring they are tailored to the firm’s needs and legal standards.

Case Management Software: Upload settings and configurations into immigration-specific case management software, ensuring all tools are aligned with the firm’s processes.

Automation and Google Workspace Administration:

Google Workspace: Manage all Google Workspace operations, including user administration, tool integration, and troubleshooting.

Automation Tools: Develop and implement automation tools for email responses, client follow-ups, and other routine tasks, leveraging platforms like Google Workspace and other relevant software.

Custom Tool Development: Create custom configurations and tools to automate and streamline workflows, including email management and document processing.

Tech Support and Problem Solving:

Technical Troubleshooting: Serve as the primary technical support resource, resolving issues related to software, hardware, and network connectivity.

AI Integration: Explore and integrate AI tools that can enhance the firm’s operations, including client interaction, document processing, and data analysis.

Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest technology trends and tools, implementing improvements that benefit the firm’s operations and client services.

Qualifications:

Strong technical expertise across multiple areas, including data analytics, data science, full-stack development, and AI integration.

Proficiency in Google Workspace, with the ability to manage, troubleshoot, and develop custom tools within the platform.
Experience with creating and managing Dubsado documents and immigration-specific case management software.

Ability to develop automation tools that enhance efficiency in communication and document management.

Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to handle multiple technical tasks simultaneously.

Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical team members.

Proactive, self-motivated, and eager to explore new technologies that can benefit the firm.
Why Join Us?

Work remotely with flexible hours, allowing you to balance your professional and personal life.
Be part of a forward-thinking firm that embraces technology to enhance legal services.

Engage in meaningful work that supports high-profile clients in the sports and entertainment industries.
Opportunity for growth and development within a dynamic and innovative legal environment.

To Apply: Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience in data analytics, data science, full-stack development, AI integration, Google Workspace management, and automation tools to jobs@innovativeglobaltalent.com. We encourage you to highlight any specific projects or tools you’ve developed that demonstrate your expertise in these areas.

title: Client Relations and Immigration Specialist
description:
About Us:

Our law firm is a leading provider of immigration services with a focus on P-1, O-1, and EB-1A visas for athletes, entertainers, and high-profile professionals worldwide. Our dedication to excellence in sports and entertainment immigration law has positioned us as a trusted partner for clients seeking to navigate the complex U.S. immigration system. We are expanding our team and seeking a proactive, customer-focused individual with a passion for immigration law to join us.
Position Overview:

As a Client Relations and Immigration Specialist, you will be the primary point of contact for clients, ensuring that they receive timely updates and support throughout their visa application process. This role involves coordinating consultations, managing case updates, and performing essential tasks such as congressional inquiries and consular processing. Your ability to communicate effectively with clients, stakeholders, and team members will be crucial in delivering exceptional service and maintaining the firm’s reputation for excellence.

Key Responsibilities:

Client Interaction and Support:
Serve as the main point of contact for clients, providing timely and professional responses to inquiries and requests.
Obtain case update statuses from USCIS and other relevant bodies, ensuring clients are kept informed about the progress of their petitions.

Address client concerns and ensure no customer is left awaiting information or support.
Coordinate and schedule paid consultations, managing the process from initial inquiry to follow-up.

Case Management and Coordination:

Perform congressional inquiries and consular processing for U.S. visas, ensuring all necessary steps are completed accurately and efficiently.

Communicate with organizations for consultation letters, support letters, and other documentation required for visa applications.

Collaborate with other attorneys and stakeholders to ensure comprehensive support for each case.
Follow up on previously emailed alerts and unacknowledged reports to USCIS, tracking down pending petitions and investigating their status.

Client Service Excellence:

Proactively manage client relationships, anticipating needs and addressing issues before they escalate.
Maintain detailed records of client interactions and case progress, ensuring all information is up-to-date and accessible to the team.

Work closely with other team members to address client needs, answer questions, and provide support throughout the immigration process.

Qualifications:

Strong customer service skills, with a proven track record of managing client relationships effectively.
Previous experience in immigration law, with a focus on U.S. visa processes such as consular processing, is strongly preferred.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to explain complex legal information in a clear and concise manner.

Proactive and self-motivated, with a strong desire to learn about sports, entertainment, and U.S. immigration law.
Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously, with strong organizational and time management skills.
Familiarity with performing congressional inquiries, consular processing, and coordinating with various stakeholders in the immigration process.

Why Join Us?

Work remotely with flexible hours, offering a balance between professional and personal life.
Join a firm known for its expertise in sports and entertainment immigration law.
Contribute to meaningful work that helps high-profile clients achieve their goals in the U.S.
Opportunity for growth and development within a dynamic and forward-thinking legal environment.

To Apply: Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience in immigration law and customer service to jobs@innovativeglobaltalent.com

title: USA Visa Petition Document Manager – Sports & Entertainment
description:
About Us:

Our law firm is a leader in sports-based immigration, specializing in P-1, O-1, and EB-1A visas for elite athletes, coaches, business professionals, influencers, and more across the globe. We are committed to excellence, tailoring each petition to meet the unique needs of our clients and anticipating potential challenges from USCIS to avoid costly mistakes. Join our team and contribute to our mission of making the visa process as seamless and successful as possible for our clients.

Identify missing documents from initial submissions and promptly communicate with clients to obtain the required materials.
Direct clients to submit documents to the designated email address and provide guidance on document submission procedures.

Ensure all received documents are properly sorted, tagged, and organized within the firm’s document management system.
Create and maintain client folders, ensuring all relevant documentation is accurately saved and up-to-date.
Verify the completeness and accuracy of client documents, confirming receipt and organization within client folders.
Centralize document requests and follow up with clients via email and phone to obtain any missing information.
Collaborate closely with the legal team to forward client documents accurately and efficiently, ensuring all necessary materials are available for petition preparation.

Assist clients in completing required forms and documentation, offering explanations and support as needed.
Qualifications:

Strong organizational and attention-to-detail skills.
Excellent written communication abilities for client correspondence.
Ability to work collaboratively with a remote team.
Familiarity with email organization, tagging, and document management software.
Self-motivated, proactive, and able to manage document-related tasks independently.
Previous experience in immigration law, especially with P-1, O-1, and EB-1A visas, is strongly preferred.

Why Join Us?

Work remotely with flexible hours.
Be part of a firm recognized for its expertise and leadership in sports-based immigration.
Contribute to impactful work that helps elite professionals achieve their goals in the U.S.
Opportunity for growth within a forward-thinking and dynamic legal environment.

If you are organized, detail-oriented, and passionate about supporting a top-tier legal team, especially with experience in P-1, O-1, and EB-1A visas, we encourage you to apply for this role and join us in shaping the future of sports-based immigration.

title: Airbnb Property & Revenue Manager
description:
Join Our Team as an Airbnb Property Manager / Co-Host!

Are you passionate about property management and delivering top-notch hospitality? Do you excel at managing Airbnb and other vacation rental properties while maximizing revenue and guest satisfaction? If so, we want you to be a part of our dynamic team!

About Us:
We are Donaldson Vacation Homes, a fast-growing vacation rental management company based in Dubai. We specialize in managing high-end short-term rental properties across Downtown Dubai, Business Bay, and Dubai Marina. Our mission is to offer exceptional stays that exceed guest expectations while ensuring optimal returns for our property owners. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness, comfort, and customer service, all while driving maximum occupancy and revenue through strategic management.

Job Responsibilities:

Listing Creation & Management: Craft and manage compelling listings across multiple booking platforms (Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia, etc.), ensuring they are optimized for visibility and bookings.

Revenue Management: Collaborate with our revenue management team to implement pricing strategies using tools like Pricelabs. Monitor and adjust rates to optimize occupancy and revenue (REVPAR).

Maintenance Coordination: Oversee maintenance requests, hire and manage contractors, plumbers, handymen, and ensure that all issues are resolved promptly to maintain property standards.

Guest Communication: Deliver outstanding customer service, handle guest inquiries via phone, chat, and email, and manage guest relations. This role requires availability 24/7, with a prompt response time of within 10 minutes—please apply only if you can meet this requirement.

Cleaning Coordination: Work closely with cleaning services to ensure properties are cleaned and maintained to our high standards, with seamless scheduling and communication.

Claim Filing: Handle the filing of claims, manage disputes related to guest reviews, and work to maintain a positive online reputation.

Inventory Management: Manage inventory levels, coordinate the purchasing and delivery of supplies, and ensure all properties are well-stocked and guest-ready.

Review Management: Monitor and respond to guest reviews, and implement strategies to enhance our online presence. Experience in managing review removal on Airbnb is a plus.

Key Skills and Qualifications:

Proven experience in property management or co-hosting, with a strong track record of success.
Expertise in using booking platforms (Airbnb, VRBO, Expedia, etc.) and understanding their protocols and guidelines.
Exceptional communication and customer service skills, with a focus on delivering a premium guest experience.
Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks effectively, and manage time without close supervision.
Strong organizational skills and meticulous attention to detail.
Proficiency in a variety of tools and software, including but not limited to:
Airbnb, Booking, Hostaway, Pricelabs
Google Sheets, Facebook/Instagram Business Manager, Google Data Studio
Canva for basic design work
Additional Skills:

Product Research (Ecommerce): Assist with product research and sourcing as needed.
Social Media Management: Schedule posts, engage with followers, and help grow our presence on Facebook and Instagram.
Basic Canva Editing: Ability to create and edit simple graphics for social media and other platforms.
Why Join Us?
At Donaldson Vacation Homes, you’ll be part of a supportive and driven team that values your expertise and encourages professional growth. As we expand our portfolio, you’ll have the opportunity to play a key role in shaping the future of vacation rental management in Dubai.

title: Junior Refunds Associate
description:
ABOUT

Property Leads is a pay-per-lead marketing in the real estate space offering leads to real estate professionals. The target lead is a homeowner who wants to sell their home for cash. This role will cover one of the most vital parts of our business: processing client refund requests promptly and efficiently. In this role, you will be supported by our refunds team members and our Sales Manager.

ROLE

We seek an exceptional communicator and lead prospector capable of achieving remarkable results in the Property Leads Junior Refunds Associate role. This position will work closely with our Senior Refund Coordinator and Sales Manager to collect data through text, phone, and email communication and process refunds quickly and efficiently.

The successful candidate must know that this is not a traditional 9 am to 5 pm job, that evening and weekend work are required and that 40-60 hours per week will be required.

RESPONSIBILITIES

-Calling/texting/emailing seller leads to confirm the status of selling their home.
-Calling/texting/emailing seller leads to determine if they own the home.
-Calling/texting/emailing seller leads to confirm if a mobile home for sale does/does not come with the land it sits on.
-Move all prospects to the proper pipeline stage via CRM throughout the day.
-Maintain a clear, up-to-date, and accurate pipeline in our CRM.
-Follow up diligently and consistently with sellers over extended periods.
-Document all interactions with prospects and clients in the CRM's “notes” section, escalating to Support or the Senior Refunds --Coordinator as needed.
-Process refunds with integrity, according to the refund policy.

RESULTS

-Reach sellers promptly to help determine the outcome of declining/approving a refund request.
-All sellers are promptly followed up with.
-There is an effective line of communication between this role and the Senior Refunds Coordinator in which all necessary ---information is communicated promptly.
-Continuously improve communication skills (Crucial Conversations book, etc.)
-All internal communication cycles are adequately followed.
-REQUIREMENTS

-Proven work experience with cold calling or phone sales.
-Proven work experience with text messaging/emailing in English.
-You must enjoy being on the phone and speaking to sellers.
-Excellent communication skills, including listening and facing conflict head-on.
-Excellent at building rapport.
-Willing to work in a fast-paced environment and rapidly grow.
-Open to learning new processes in cold calling/seller outreach.
-Self-sufficient and able to properly manage one’s own time.
-Well-organized and able to maintain a pipeline that the Refunds Coordinator and sales Manager can observe and understand.
-Strong interpersonal skills.
-Experience as a real estate investor is preferred but optional.
-Must pass written and verbal exams.

SALARY + Quarterly Bonus

$18,900 - $31,300 per year

Job Type: Full-time

Expected hours: 40 – 60 per week

title: Operations Coordinator - HVAC/Refrigeration
description:
***PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE IN THE HEATING, VENTILATION, AIR CONDITIONING, AND REFRIGERATION INDUSTRY***

Our company is a leader in HVAC/R predictive maintenance and management for small commercial buildings. They offer a unique pairing of software and services to save customers money on emergency repairs and energy bills. The technology leverages smart sensors and artificial intelligence to detect HVAC and Refrigeration issues early, and they work with a preferred network of qualified contractors to fix these issues before they lead to system failure.

About the Position:

The Coordinator partners with the network of contractors and internal teams to deliver exceptional customer service experiences. The coordinator is responsible for taking inbound calls from customers and assisting them to the best of their ability. The role requires prior customer service experience, with a proven ability to multi-task and speak to and assist a wide range of customers.

This role presents an amazing opportunity to step up to an impactful, high-growth role and take on the following responsibilities:

-Answer customer and contractor inquiries by phone, text, email, and web in a timely manner

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Job Summary:
As the Marketing Manager, you will play a pivotal role in driving our lead generation strategies and initiatives. In addition to generating high-quality leads, you will also oversee email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and drive conversions. Your expertise in lead segmentation, data analysis, and marketing automation will be essential in optimizing our lead generation efforts and maximizing ROI. You will also manage a small team of lead generation specialists, providing guidance and support to ensure their success.

Responsibilities:

Lead Generation and Email Marketing:
Develop and execute lead generation strategies to drive high-quality leads and conversions.

Analyze metrics and market trends to identify optimization opportunities and improve campaign performance.

A/B Testing and Experimentation:

Continuously monitor and analyze results to refine strategies and drive improvements.

Continuous Improvement and Collaboration:
Stay updated on industry best practices and trends in lead generation and email marketing.
Collaborate with the Sales team to gather feedback and insights for continuous improvement.
Conduct lead segmentation analysis to identify target segments and tailor campaigns accordingly.

Team Management:
Manage a small team of lead generation specialists, providing guidance, support, and mentorship.
Set clear goals and expectations for team members and monitor performance against objectives.
Foster a collaborative and high-performing team culture that drives results.

Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience in lead generation and email marketing, with a strong grasp of lead segmentation and data analysis.
Experience in marketing automation platforms, such as HubSpot, Marketo, or Pardot.
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, derive insights, and optimize campaigns effectively.
Understanding of CRM systems and their integration with marketing automation platforms.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
Proven leadership skills with experience in managing and mentoring a team.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
Background in translation or language-related fields is highly desirable.

We are seeking a skilled AI Automation Specialist to join our growing team. We are an Australian marketing company, rapidly expanding into the AI automation field. This is a unique opportunity to join a fast-growing avenue within our business—don’t miss out!

title: HVAC/R Operations Coordinator
description:
***PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE IN THE HEATING, VENTILATION, AIR CONDITIONING AND REFRIGERATION INDUSTRY***

Our company is a leader in HVAC/R predictive maintenance and management for small commercial buildings. They offer a unique pairing of software and services to save customers money on emergency repairs and energy bills. The technology leverages smart sensors and artificial intelligence to detect HVAC and Refrigeration issues early, and they work with a preferred network of qualified contractors to fix these issues before they lead to system failure.

About the Position:
We are seeking to hire an Operations Coordinator.

The Coordinator partners with the network of contractors and internal teams to deliver exceptional customer service experiences. The coordinator is responsible for taking inbound calls from customers and assisting them to the best of their ability. The role requires prior customer service experience, with a proven ability to multi-task and speak to and assist a wide range of customers.

This role presents an amazing opportunity to step up to an impactful, high-growth role and take on the following responsibilities:

-Process payments
-Manage customer concerns and work to resolve them efficiently and effectively

-Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading - MUST

-Experience problem-solving to meet customer needs
-Strong computer skills
-Ability to learn new technology, share knowledge, and provide feedback to improve our company's internal processes
-Ability to work independently and in a team setting

-Experience with Zoho tools (Zoho desk, Zoho books, CRM) - ADVANTAGE

Work Schedule:

Make.com experience required

Diagnose and resolve automation issues.
Document automation processes and workflows comprehensively.

Tool Skills Needed

Make.com

Architect and Implement Advanced Automation Solutions: Design and build complex automation scenarios using Make.com, integrating multiple systems and APIs to streamline business processes.

Optimize Existing Automations: Evaluate and enhance current automation workflows to improve efficiency, reliability, and scalability.

Airtable

title: Short term rental VA for UK business
description:
### Job Title: Remote Virtual Assistant for Property Management

**Location**: Remote

**Job Type**: Full-Time, Remote

**Salary**: Competitive, with a £100 bonus every month if properties maintain 95% occupancy or above.

**About Us**:
We are a dynamic property management company specialising in short-term rentals across platforms like Booking.com, Airbnb, and others. We pride ourselves on delivering top-tier hospitality and maintaining high occupancy rates. We are looking for a motivated and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our team and help optimise our property listings, manage guest relations, and ensure the smooth operation of our properties.

**Key Responsibilities**:

- **Platform Management**:
- Daily tweaking and optimising of property listings on Booking.com, Airbnb, and other platforms to maximise visibility and bookings.
- Ensuring all listings are up-to-date with accurate descriptions, pricing, and availability.
- Listing new properties across various platforms and ensuring all necessary information is provided.

- **Guest Relations**:
- Responding promptly and professionally to guest enquiries and messages.
- Managing guest check-ins and check-outs, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience.
- Handling guest issues and complaints with professionalism and efficiency, escalating when necessary.

- **Review Management**:
- Monitoring guest reviews across all platforms and working proactively to address any negative feedback.
- Implementing strategies to improve overall guest experience and achieve consistently high reviews.
- Working to get unjust or incorrect negative reviews removed where possible, in line with platform policies.
- Ensuring an excellent standard across all reviews by consistently exceeding guest expectations.

- **Social Media Marketing**:
- Promoting properties on social media platforms to increase visibility and drive bookings.
- Creating and scheduling posts, engaging with followers, and managing property-related content.

- **Property Maintenance & Housekeeping Coordination**:
- Liaising with handymen and maintenance teams to address any property issues promptly.
- Coordinating with housekeepers to organise and maintain a consistent cleaning schedule.
- Ensuring properties are well-maintained and meet the company’s standards for cleanliness and appearance.

- **Photography & Visual Presentation**:
- Ensuring all property listings have professional-quality photographs.
- Coordinating with photographers to arrange shoots when necessary, ensuring timely and effective communication.

- **Damage and Dispute Management**:
- Handling any incidents of property damage reported by guests, including escalating and managing claims through Airbnb’s AirCover or similar protections on other platforms.
- Ensuring all claims are resolved efficiently and in the best interest of the company.

- **Performance Analysis**:
- Analysing occupancy rates and other performance metrics on a weekly basis.
- Implementing strategies to maintain or improve occupancy, ensuring properties are consistently booked.
- Preparing weekly reports on property performance, including recommendations for improvement.
- Presenting a clear table format of the listing analysis to the management every week, highlighting key metrics and trends.

- **Team Collaboration**:
- Working closely with the team to create detailed and user-friendly property guides.
- Assisting in the automation of check-in processes to enhance guest experience.

**Requirements**:

- Proven experience in managing property listings on Booking.com, Airbnb, and similar platforms.
- Strong understanding of social media marketing and experience in promoting properties online.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Ability to respond quickly and professionally to guest enquiries and issues.
- Strong organisational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Experience in coordinating with maintenance and housekeeping teams.
- Experience in managing reviews and working to remove or mitigate the impact of negative reviews.
- Familiarity with dispute resolution and handling claims for property damage through platforms like Airbnb’s AirCover.
- Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret occupancy data and optimise property performance.
- Familiarity with photography and visual presentation of properties is a plus.
- Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently in a remote setting.

**Benefits**:

- Competitive salary with a monthly £100 bonus for maintaining 95% occupancy or higher.
- Flexible working hours with the opportunity to work remotely.
- Ongoing professional development and the opportunity to grow with a dynamic company.

**How to Apply**:

If you are a dedicated and detail-oriented professional with a passion for property management and guest satisfaction, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your CV and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for this role.

**Application Deadline**: Wednesday, 4th September 2024

---

This job description now includes UK-based spelling and additional requirements for presenting listing analysis in a clear table format. Adjust any other details as needed.

title: Lead Generation Specialist
description:
A new opportunity has become available for a Lead Generation Specialist to join Skayl, a fast-growing remote working UK-based digital marketing agency working with clients in the UK & USA.

As Lead Generation Specialist, you will join Skayl with a minimum of 3 years of experience in lead generation, specifically with expertise in building and managing lead databases. Your role will involve leading the development and execution of multi-channel lead generation strategies to identify high-quality prospects, increase engagement rates, and drive client acquisition. You will have the support of the wider team, including our leadership, to ensure you achieve our growth goals.
Role specification:

Lead the development and execution of multi-channel lead generation strategies to identify high-quality prospects, increase engagement rates, and drive client acquisition.

Build and manage a lead database from scratch, including manually filtering leads to ensure they match our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP).

Develop and implement targeted outreach campaigns using various methods such as email, LinkedIn, and other social platforms, designed to resonate with potential clients and improve engagement rates.

Conduct A/B testing on outreach methods, content, and calls to action to refine strategies and improve results.
Track and report key metrics such as engagement rates, conversion rates, and pipeline value, and provide actionable insights to the leadership team.

Collaborate with the leadership team to align lead generation efforts with broader business goals and drive sustainable growth.

Required:

- Minimum 3+ years' experience in lead generation with strong proficiency in building and managing lead databases.
- Experience in manual lead filtering to match leads with the Ideal Customer Profile (ICP).
- Strong communication skills - written and verbal, with a talent for crafting compelling outreach messages across various platforms.
- Proficiency in using multiple lead generation tools and techniques, including but not limited to email outreach, social selling, and content-driven lead generation.
- Attention to detail and commitment to performance optimisation.
- Organised yet flexible, able to prioritise your workload to meet agreed deadlines.
- Exceptional technical skills in CRM management, lead scoring, and marketing automation software.
- Experience running lead generation campaigns for a UK-based digital marketing agency is preferred.

To apply, please do the following:

- Submit a copy of your latest CV.
- Submit a short intro video (loom recording is OK) that's about 3 mins long highlighting your skills, experiences, and the reasons why we should hire you. Start the video with the greeting "Hello Matt".

Please submit your CV and link to your video to hr@skayl.co.uk and indicate your expected salary for this role as well.
Thanks and looking forward to speaking to you soon.
