title: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT *Superstars Only*
description:
Are you highly organized and detail-oriented with a proven track record as an executive assistant?

Can you effectively manage responsibilities, ensuring no tasks are overlooked even in high-pressure situations?

We're seeking someone capable of handling complex tasks seamlessly, demonstrating proactive problem-solving skills and a commitment to continuous improvement.

If you're driven by delivering excellence and eager to take on new challenges, we encourage you to apply.
 
ABOUT US
· We're a fast-growing holistic beauty company that is looking for the brightest, most talented minds to work from home. More details will be shared during the interview, but you’ll have the opportunity to work with one of the fastest-growing holistic beauty creators, boasting over 2,000,000 followers.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
An executive assistant requires a diverse set of qualities beyond being detail-oriented to excel in their role. Here are the qualifications for the executive assistant role:

• Demonstrated outstanding achievements, such as earning Latin Honors (Summa Cum Laude, Magna Cum Laude, Cum Laude), receiving various excellence awards (e.g., "Agent of the Year", “Employee of the Year”), and showcasing rapid career advancement in previous roles.

• Minimum of 2 years of experience working as an executive assistant.

• Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, characterized by professionalism in tone and manner, clarity in conveying messages, and active listening.

• Strong attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and precision in all aspects of work.

• Proven ability to prioritize tasks effectively and manage time efficiently.

• Successful track record of managing projects.

• Proficient problem-solving skills, with the ability to address challenges effectively.

• Demonstrated excellent decision-making abilities, exhibiting sound judgment and discernment in various situations.

• Adaptability to changing environments, with a flexible approach to handle unforeseen circumstances and adjust plans accordingly.
 
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:
Here are the primary duties of an Executive Assistant:
 
• Support Services: Provide comprehensive administrative support to the executive, including managing calendars, scheduling appointments, and coordinating meetings and events.
• Information Management: Handle correspondence, emails, and phone calls on behalf of the executive, screening, and prioritizing messages as necessary.
• Relationship Facilitation: Serve as the primary point of contact between the executive and internal and external stakeholders, including staff, clients, vendors, and partners. Facilitate communication and maintain positive relationships on behalf of the executive.
• Project Support: Assist with project management tasks, such as tracking project timelines, milestones, and deliverables. Coordinate project-related activities and communications among team members.
• Confidentiality Management: Maintain strict confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information, documents, and communications. Safeguard confidential data and ensure compliance with privacy policies and regulations.
• Problem-Solving: Identify and resolve administrative issues and challenges as they arise, exercising sound judgment and problem-solving skills. Anticipate potential problems and take proactive steps to mitigate risks.
• Time Management: Manage the executive's schedule efficiently, prioritizing tasks and activities to maximize productivity and optimize time usage. Anticipate conflicting commitments and resolve scheduling conflicts as needed.
 
REQUIREMENTS FOR EFFECTIVE REMOTE WORK
· Reliable Computer/Laptop
· High-Speed Internet Connection (+backup)
· Conducive Work Environment
 
WORKING SCHEDULE
· Full-time Employment Opportunity
 
BENEFITS
· Competitive Salary
· Training and Development Opportunities
· Opportunity to contribute to a rapidly expanding company dedicated to promoting holistic beauty
· Great potential for career advancement into various leadership positions

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS
Since this is a long-term position, there will be an in-depth qualification process. If you believe you have what it takes, here's what to do next:

Please apply to this job ad with the phrase “I’m an Executive Assistant Superstar” and answer the following questions:

1.) Why are you specifically interested in this position?
2.) Can you share a situation where you had to solve a problem or address a challenging situation on behalf of an executive? How did you handle it?
3.) How do you handle stressful situations or high-pressure environments while maintaining a high level of professionalism and attention to detail?
4.) What are the names of your last three boss/ supervisors, and how would they rate you on a scale of 1-10? (you may need to arrange calls/email contact with them)
5.) Schedule Availability:
5.1.) What are your preferred work hours? (in PHT)
5.2.) Are you available to work weekends?
6.) On an English Proficiency Scale (from A1-C2), how would you rate your level of English proficiency and your ability to adjust your language to the target audience?
7.) Take the following tests and attach the 3 screenshots of the results in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
7.1.) Go to https://www.typing.com/student/typing-test/1-minute, complete the test and take a screenshot of your results. You don't need to sign in, just close any requests to sign in.
7.2.) Go to http://www.grammaring.com/english-grammar-test and take the test. Please take a screenshot of the final result.
7.3.) Go to https://www.speedtest.net/ and take a screenshot of the final result.
8.) Attach your CV in a Google Drive link (set to open access).
 
If you believe you meet our qualifications and requirements, we encourage you to apply now and become a valuable part of our rapidly expanding company.

title: Financial Analyst
description:
Job Title: Financial Analyst

Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full-time

Company Overview:
We are an outsource fractional services company that provides high-level financial services to diverse clients across various industries. Our team of experts partners with businesses to drive financial strategy, improve financial performance, and provide actionable insights. We are looking for a skilled Financial Analyst who is comfortable working in a dynamic environment and is passionate about helping businesses thrive.

Job Summary:

The Financial Analyst will play a critical role in supporting our fractional CFO services by conducting valuations, building extensive budget models, and forecasting cash flows for multiple clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical mindset, expertise in financial modeling, and the ability to manage multiple client projects simultaneously. This role requires a deep understanding of financial analysis, cash flow forecasting, and a keen attention to detail.

Key Responsibilities:

• Financial Modeling & Analysis: Develop, maintain, and enhance complex financial models, including budgeting, forecasting, and scenario analysis for various client projects.
• Valuation: Conduct business valuations using various methods (DCF, comparable company analysis, precedent transactions) to support strategic decision-making for clients.
• Budgeting & Forecasting: Create and manage detailed budgets and forecasts, ensuring alignment with clients’ strategic goals and financial health.
• Cash Flow Forecasting: Analyze and forecast cash flows to help clients manage liquidity, plan for capital expenditures, and optimize working capital.
• Client Engagement: Work directly with fractional CFOs to understand client needs and deliver insights that drive financial strategy and decision-making.
• Data Analysis: Gather, analyze, and interpret financial data to identify trends, risks, and opportunities for clients.
• Reporting: Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports, highlighting key insights and performance metrics.
• Project Management: Manage multiple client projects simultaneously, ensuring timely and accurate delivery of financial analyses and reports.
• Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams and clients to ensure a thorough understanding of financial goals and to provide support in financial planning and analysis activities.

Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. CFA, CPA, or other relevant certifications are a plus.
• 3+ years of experience in financial analysis, valuation, and financial modeling, preferably within a consulting, fractional CFO, or financial advisory environment.
• Proficiency in financial modeling software and tools (e.g., Excel, QuickBooks, financial forecasting software).
• Strong understanding of valuation techniques, including DCF, market multiples, and other standard valuation methodologies.
• Expertise in budgeting, forecasting, and cash flow analysis.
• Exceptional analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex financial data and provide actionable insights.
• Proven ability to manage multiple client projects with competing deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present financial information clearly and concisely to non-financial stakeholders.
• High attention to detail, with excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach.

Benefits:

• Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
• Flexible working hours and remote work options.
• Professional development opportunities, including training and certifications.
• Collaborative and dynamic work environment with a focus on growth and innovation.

This job description captures the key skills and responsibilities for a Financial Analyst in a fractional CFO company, emphasizing the need for expertise in valuation, financial modeling, and managing multiple client engagements. Let me know if you need any adjustments!

title: Full-Time WordPress Developer & Website Strategy Specialist (Real Estate Focus)
description:
Job Description:


We are seeking a talented WordPress Developer with a strong command of Elementor and expertise in plugin management to join our team. This role requires someone who can design, build, and manage high-performance real estate websites, integrate multiple plugins, and handle backend analytics and CRM systems (e.g., Go High Level).

We want to assess your skills and fit within our team during the initial two weeks, where you will work closely with us at a rate of $5 per hour. After this phase, we will renegotiate the salary based on your performance and contributions.

If you are a proactive and experienced developer with a passion for creating effective real estate websites, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:


Develop, design, and maintain WordPress websites using Elementor.
Manage, customize, and optimize WordPress plugins for performance, usability, and SEO.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, including plugin conflicts and layout problems.
Integrate websites with CRM systems like Go High Level and handle backend tasks for analytics and lead management.
Analyze website metrics and implement improvements to enhance user experience and conversion rates.
Develop a scalable website strategy tailored to real estate agents and prepare it for resale.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing and sales, to align website content with business goals.


Required Experience:
3-5 years of experience in WordPress development, particularly with Elementor.
Proven experience managing and customizing WordPress plugins.
Strong understanding of SEO best practices and performance optimization.
Familiarity with backend analytics tools and CRM integrations (e.g., Go High Level).
Experience in the real estate industry or similar fields is a plus.


Required Skills:
Advanced proficiency in WordPress and Elementor page builder.
Expertise in managing and troubleshooting WordPress plugins.
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and basic PHP.
Experience in backend analytics, SEO, and website performance optimization.
Familiarity with CRM integration and data management.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with real estate-specific plugins and tools.
Knowledge of marketing automation and sales funnel design.
Experience creating and selling digital products or templates.
A great enligh skills both writing and speaking. 


What We Offer:
Competitive compensation after the initial trial period.
Opportunity for growth from hourly/part-time to full-time.
Flexible, fully remote work environment.
Opportunity to be part of a unique and scalable project.


How to Apply:
To apply, please email your resume to jake@juneand.co with the subject line "Rodger to that" included manually in your email. In your email, briefly explain your experience with WordPress, Elementor, and any relevant projects you've worked on.

Note: The initial two weeks will serve as a trial period at a rate of $5 per hour. After this period, we will evaluate your performance and discuss a revised compensation package for a full-time role with pay up to even $10 per hour and monthly rate of $800-1500

title: Cold Email Campaign Manager
description:
Job Title: Email Marketing Specialist - Cold Outbound Focus
Job Description
A leading B2B lead generation agency operating on a retainer-based model is looking for a dedicated Email Marketing Specialist with a strong focus on cold outbound emailing. As an integral part of our team, you will be instrumental in expanding our email marketing initiatives, with a particular emphasis on crafting and optimizing outbound email strategies to connect with high-quality leads for both our agency and our clients.
Key Responsibilities
Outbound Email Campaigns: Create, design, and implement effective cold outbound email campaigns using tools like Instantly and Apollo, ensuring they resonate with the target audience an
generate high-quality leads. 
Email Strategy Development: Develop comprehensive email marketing strategies, focusing on lead nurturing and conversion optimization.
List Segmentation and Targeting: Segment email lists to deliver highly targeted and personalized messages, improving engagement and response rates.
A/B Testing: Conduct rigorous A/B testing to optimize various elements of email campaigns, including open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.
Collaborative Content Creation: Work closely with the team to develop compelling email content that captures the interest of potential leads.
Marketing Automation: Set up and manage marketing automation workflows, enhancing the efficiency of lead nurturing processes.
Analytics and Reporting: Regularly analyze and report on email campaign performance, using data to drive future strategy and improvements.
Industry Knowledge: Stay abreast of the latest trends and best practices in email marketing, especially in cold outbound techniques.
Qualifications 
Email Marketing Experience: Proven track record in email marketing, with specific experience in B2B lead generation and cold outbound campaigns.
Proficiency in Email Tools: Strong familiarity with email marketing and automation tools such as SendGrid, HubSpot, Instantly, Apollo, Snov, and Instantly
Technical Skills: Knowledge in email design and HTML coding.
Data-Driven Approach: Ability to analyze email marketing metrics and translate data into actionable strategies.
Communication: Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
Attention to Detail: A strong focus on quality, accuracy, and detail.
Teamwork: Capability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Nice to Have:
Experience with marketing automation platforms.
Familiarity with CRM systems like Apollo, Instantly, and Snov (Especially)
Graphic design skills or experience with design software.
Knowledge of SEO and content marketing principles.
Success in This Role: Success will be measured by your ability to effectively generate high-quality leads through strategic and well-executed outbound email campaigns. You will excel in this role by demonstrating a deep understanding of cold email best practices, the ability to engage and convert prospects, and contributing significantly to our clients' lead generation goals.
If you have a passion for email marketing and a talent for connecting with B2B audiences through strategic outbound communications, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity to grow with our dynamic team. (edited)

title: SEO Analyst
description:
We're seeking an experienced SEO Analyst to join Digital Treasury. The ideal candidate will have a deep technical understanding of search engine optimisation and advanced proficiency in various SEO techniques and strategies.

Key Responsibilities:

- Conduct in-depth technical SEO audits, focusing on crawlability, indexability, and site architecture
- Perform comprehensive competitor research, content gap identification, and backlink analysis
- Analyse search console data to identify growth opportunities, monitor indexing issues, and improve click-through rates
- Implement and manage web analytics, including setting up enhanced e-commerce tracking, custom events, and conversion funnels
- Deploy and manage tag management systems for streamlined tracking implementation across various marketing platforms
- Conduct advanced keyword research, focusing on search intent with supported data using keyword researching tools
- Optimise technical and on-page elements including meta tags, schema markup, XML sitemaps, robots.txt files, etc
- Perform log file analysis to identify crawl budget issues and optimise crawl efficiency
- Implement and test structured data for rich snippet opportunities
- Analyse Core Web Vitals and implement strategies to improve page speed and user experience
- Develop and execute internal linking strategies to improve site architecture and page authority distribution

Required Skills and Experience:

- 3+ years of hands-on SEO experience with demonstrable results in improving organic search visibility
- Thrive in a fast-paced environment, able to manage multiple projects simultaneously and adapt quickly to changing priorities
- Demonstrate strong time management skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines without compromising the quality of work
- Advanced proficiency in SEO crawling and auditing techniques
- Expert-level skills in backlink analysis and competitive research
- In-depth understanding of web analytics, including experience with advanced data analysis
- Proven ability to use search console APIs for large-scale data extraction and analysis
- Proficiency in tag management systems, including custom variable creation and trigger configuration
- Strong knowledge of technical SEO concepts including hreflang implementation, pagination handling, and canonical tag usage
- Proficiency in SEO tools such as Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Search Console (GSC), and Google Tag Manager (GTM), among others.

Bonus:

- Experience with programming languages like Python or R for data analysis and visualisation of large SEO datasets
- Familiarity with web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with the ability to identify and resolve rendering issues
- Up-to-date knowledge of search engine algorithms, including an understanding of EEAT principles and core algorithm updates
- Knowledge in other SEO software tools
- Portfolio of recent works
- Knowledge of SQL for database querying and large-scale data analysis
- Familiarity with version control systems for collaborative SEO implementations
- Understanding of machine learning concepts and their application to SEO strategies
- Experience with API integrations for custom reporting and data analysis workflows

title: On-Call AirBnB Guest Communication Specialist for US Short Term Rentals
description:
*ABOUT THE COMPANY*
FIBI Vacation Rentals is a rapidly-growing short term rental management company, based in Las Vegas, NV, USA, currently managing a portfolio of 40 properties in various states. As our portfolio continues to grow, so does our team!

We specialize in maximizing returns on short-term rental properties. What sets us apart is our unwavering focus and ability to enhance rental revenue. Unlike other property managers who charge high rates, FIBI begins each management partnership with a strategic consultation, evaluating each property’s performance or potential and devising plans to boost its profitability. We manage every aspect of the property operations, including bookings, guest communication, cleaning/turnovers, supplies, repairs, and maintenance. Our approach is hyper data-focused, ensuring that every decision we make is driven by analytics to optimize investment returns.

Position: On-Call Guest Communication Agent

Shifts Available:
Tuesday - Friday

Hours: On-call from 7am PST to 12am (midnight) PST

Compensation:
$1/hour for being on-call
$6/hour for hours worked when called in (with a minimum of 3 hours per call-in)

Expectations:
Must report to shift within 30 minutes if called in.
Provide last-minute coverage in case of a full-time team member calling out or during high workload periods.
Guaranteed a minimum of 3 working hours per week.

*RESPONSIBILITIES*
- Guest Inquiry Management: Respond promptly and professionally to guest inquiries.
- Booking Coordination: Assist guests with booking requests, reservation changes, cancellations, collecting payment, issuing refunds, and other booking-related matters.
- Pre-Arrival Communication: Provide guests with essential information such as check-in instructions, property details, and local area recommendations prior to their arrival.
- On-Stay Support: Handle guest issues and requests during their stay, such as maintenance needs, special accommodations, and other concerns, while ensuring timely and satisfactory resolution.
- Post-Stay Follow-Up: Gather feedback from guests post-stay, address any complaints, and work to resolve them promptly. Encourage guests to leave reviews and ratings.
- Property Knowledge: Maintain a strong understanding of our properties and amenities to accurately address guest questions and concerns.
- Issue Resolution: Mediate guest complaints as needed to resolve conflicts
- Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work closely with other departments such as maintenance and management to ensure seamless guest experiences.
- Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate records of guest interactions and issues, and provide regular reports to management.

*REQUIREMENTS*
- Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal is a MUST.
- Familiar with Google Workspace (Gmail, Drive, Spaces), OwnerRez Channel Manager, Breezeway, AirBnb Support, preferred.
- Familiarity with Screenlogic/Pentair Remote pool heating, preferred.
- Ability to work on Pacific Standard Time (PST) Time-Zone
- Back-up power supply & back-up internet

***HOW TO APPLY***

Answer below scenarios & Attached your CV

A. If you received this communication from a guest, how would you respond? Please also list any steps you may take or information you may need before responding to the guest as well.

"Hey Gina and Alexis, is there a way to get some extra bath, pool, and kitchen towels? We also noticed that there were no kitchen wash cloths or dishwasher soap - are those things you can provide? We also noticed that the regulator on the grill is a little wonky - you have to thread it just right to get adequate pressure to the burners so it might be worth having your maintenance person take a look. Finally, is there a charger for the dish soap dispenser? Thanks!"

B. Review the following interaction between guest and host. Evaluate the host response. Was it an appropriate response? Did it answer the guest's question or address their comment or needs? Is there anything you would have said/done differently? If so, what?

Guest: "Good afternoon. Our flight lands at 11:30 pm tomorrow. I hope this is not an issue. I appreciate your help!"

Host: "Hello Samantha thank you for letting us know of your arrival time, please note that early check in it's not possible due to same day turnover. Standard check in time is at 3:00 p.m. looking forward to hosting you tomorrow. Safe travels!"

C. You receive this pre-booking inquiry from a potential guest, how do you respond?

"Hello - your property looks wonderful Only question I have - can the pool be heated? If not do you have any idea what the water temperature might be for the days we plan to travel?"

D. You receive a message from a guest informing you that they have found a snake in the backyard of the property. What do you do? And/or what other information would you want/need to know?

As part of our expansion, we are seeking a talented and dedicated Development Security and Operations Engineer to get matched with one of our thriving freelancers and contribute to the ongoing success of his DevSecOps projects.

Job Overview:

As a Development Security and Operations Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the security, efficiency, and reliability of our freelancer’s software development and operations processes. You will be responsible for assisting the freelancer in implementing and maintaining robust security measures, identifying potential vulnerabilities, and optimizing our development and operational workflows to enhance overall efficiency and productivity. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in software development, a comprehensive understanding of security protocols, and a proven track record of implementing effective operations strategies.

Responsibilities:

Conduct regular security assessments and audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in the development and operational processes.
Implement and maintain security best practices, including access controls, authentication mechanisms, and data encryption protocols.
Collaborate with development teams to integrate security measures into the software development lifecycle, ensuring that security is prioritized at every stage.
Develop and implement disaster recovery and incident response plans to ensure quick and effective resolution in the event of security breaches or operational disruptions.
Monitor and analyze system performance and operational metrics to identify areas for improvement and implement strategies to optimize efficiency.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to streamline development and operational workflows, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, security threats, and best practices to proactively adapt and enhance our security and operational strategies.
Provide guidance and support to team members on security protocols, operational best practices, and troubleshooting techniques.

Qualifications:
HIGHLT PROFICIENT IN: GitLab, AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform and Linux Commands

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field; advanced degree preferred.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in software development, security operations, Terraform, Azure DevOps, or a related field.
Comprehensive knowledge of security protocols, encryption methods, and best practices for securing software applications and operational environments.
Proficient in programming languages such as AWS, Java, Azurem C++, Python, or others, with a strong understanding of software development principles and practices.
Experience with cloud-based platforms, containerization technologies, and DevOps tools such as Kubernetes, Gitlab, Docker, and Jenkins.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address potential security and operational issues proactively.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.
Relevant certifications such as Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) or Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP) are a plus.
Location:
Remote, 30-35 hours per week
Benefits:
Contractor work - which means the money you earn is the money you keep. All funds are paid via Paypal every other week (at $10 per hour)!
Join our team and be part of an exciting and innovative company that is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology while prioritizing security and efficiency.
How to Apply:
Reply to this job expressing interest and we’ll reach out with next steps if we find your qualifications meet what we’re looking for.

title: Operations Coordinator - HVAC/Refrigeration
description:
***PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXPERIENCE IN THE HEATING, VENTILATION, AIR CONDITIONING, AND REFRIGERATION INDUSTRY***

Our company is a leader in HVAC/R predictive maintenance and management for small commercial buildings. They offer a unique pairing of software and services to save customers money on emergency repairs and energy bills. The technology leverages smart sensors and artificial intelligence to detect HVAC and Refrigeration issues early, and they work with a preferred network of qualified contractors to fix these issues before they lead to system failure.

About the Position:
We are seeking to hire an Operations Coordinator.

The Coordinator partners with the network of contractors and internal teams to deliver exceptional customer service experiences. The coordinator is responsible for taking inbound calls from customers and assisting them to the best of their ability. The role requires prior customer service experience, with a proven ability to multi-task and speak to and assist a wide range of customers.

This role presents an amazing opportunity to step up to an impactful, high-growth role and take on the following responsibilities:

-Manage daily scheduling and support of contractors, emergency repair requests, maintenance visits, and other HVAC/R projects
-Answer customer and contractor inquiries by phone, text, email, and web in a timely manner
-Enter and manage work orders, jobs, and clients on a dispatch board using established processes
-Issue purchase orders for service
-Process payments
-Manage customer concerns and work to resolve them efficiently and effectively

Requirements:
-Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading - MUST
-HVAC industry experience - MUST
-Experience in customer service with a strong commitment to customer happiness and satisfaction
-Experience problem-solving to meet customer needs
-Strong computer skills
-Ability to learn new technology, share knowledge, and provide feedback to improve our company's internal processes
-Ability to work independently and in a team setting
-Ability to prioritize in a fast-paced environment and excellent time management skills
-A positive, can-do attitude and eagerness for continuous improvement
-Experience with Zoho tools (Zoho desk, Zoho books, CRM) - ADVANTAGE

Work Schedule:
-This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.


TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "HVAC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: AWS DEVOPS ENGINEER
description:
AWS DevOps Engineer
Job Title: AWS DevOps Engineer for Scalable Web Automation Deployment

Location: Remote
Type: Contract (Project-Based)
Duration: Short-Term

About the Project:

We are looking for an experienced AWS DevOps Engineer to design and implement the infrastructure for deploying high-volume web automation scripts. Your role will involve setting up and configuring a scalable AWS environment that can handle up to 1 million concurrent form submissions, integrating the automation scripts developed in the first phase of the project.

Key Responsibilities:

Infrastructure Design: Design and set up a scalable AWS infrastructure to support the deployment of multiple instances of Selenium WebDriver scripts.
Cloud Deployment: Deploy and manage automation scripts across AWS EC2 instances, ensuring they run efficiently and without interruption.
Load Balancing & Scaling: Implement load balancing and auto-scaling solutions to handle high volumes of traffic and ensure consistent performance.
Proxy Management: Set up and manage a robust proxy rotation system to prevent IP blocks and ensure smooth operation of the automation scripts.
Monitoring & Logging: Implement monitoring (using tools like AWS CloudWatch) and logging systems to track script performance, detect issues, and ensure reliability.
Optimization & Support: Optimize the infrastructure for cost-effectiveness and be available to provide support during the initial deployment phase on the live website.
Required Skills:

Extensive experience with AWS services, including EC2, S3, VPC, Load Balancers, and CloudWatch.
Experience deploying and managing Selenium WebDriver scripts or similar automation tools in a cloud environment.
Strong understanding of auto-scaling, load balancing, and high-availability configurations.
Experience with proxy management and integration into automated systems.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code (e.g., using Terraform or AWS CloudFormation).
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
Why Join Us?

Play a key role in the success of a high-impact, large-scale automation project.
Competitive compensation for your expertise in AWS infrastructure.
Flexibility to work remotely and on your own schedule within project timelines.
How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, along with a brief description of your experience with AWS infrastructure, Selenium WebDriver deployment, and similar projects. Include any relevant project portfolios or references.

Application Deadline: Rolling (Immediate start preferred).

title: Web Automation Developer
description:
Web Automation Developer
Job Title: Web Automation Developer for High-Volume Form Submission Project

Location: Remote
Type: Contract (Project-Based)
Duration: Short-Term

About the Project:

We are seeking a skilled Web Automation Developer to create and implement automated scripts for a high-volume form submission project. Your primary task will be to develop and test automation using Selenium WebDriver, integrating 2Captcha to solve any CAPTCHA challenges. This project is the first phase of a larger initiative, with the goal of automating up to 1 million form submissions.

Key Responsibilities:

Automation Development: Use Selenium WebDriver (or Puppeteer if preferred) to create automation scripts that can reliably submit forms on a specified website.
Captcha Integration: Implement CAPTCHA solving using 2Captcha (or a similar service) to ensure smooth automation without interruptions.
Error Handling & Retries: Develop robust error handling mechanisms and retry logic to manage any failed submissions or unexpected site behavior.
Testing: Thoroughly test the automation scripts on a sample webpage to ensure they can handle the submission process at scale.
Documentation: Provide clear documentation of the scripts, including configuration details, so they can be easily adapted to the live website once it goes online.
Required Skills:

Proven experience with Selenium WebDriver or Puppeteer for web automation.
Experience integrating CAPTCHA-solving services like 2Captcha, DeathByCaptcha, or similar.
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the DOM.
Familiarity with error handling and logging in automation scripts.
Ability to write clean, modular, and well-documented code.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Why Join Us?

Work on an innovative and challenging project with clear deliverables.
Competitive compensation for your specialized skills and time.
Flexibility to work remotely and set your own schedule within project deadlines.
How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, along with a brief overview of your experience with Selenium WebDriver, 2Captcha integration, and any similar projects you’ve worked on. Include any relevant code samples or project portfolios.

Application Deadline: Rolling (Immediate start preferred).

title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
About Us:
We are an innovative studio focused on building cutting-edge iPhone/Android apps and SaaS products. Our mission is to turn creative ideas into impactful, user-friendly digital solutions. As a small, fast-paced team led by an engineer, we are committed to building high-quality products that stand out in the market.
Job Overview:
We are looking for a talented and motivated Full-Stack Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for turning ideas into functional and well-crafted applications. You must be comfortable with rapid development cycles, enjoy working closely with an engineer-founder who values code quality, and be ready to iterate quickly based on feedback.
Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, test, and maintain robust, scalable, and user-friendly applications for iOS, Android, and web platforms.
- Collaborate closely with the founder to understand product ideas, requirements, and feedback.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while adhering to best practices in software development.
- Implement responsive user interfaces and ensure seamless user experiences across all devices.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize code to enhance application performance and reliability.
- Continuously learn and adapt to new technologies and frameworks as needed.
- Provide frequent updates on progress and actively participate in regular check-ins and code reviews.
Requirements:
- Proven experience as a full-stack developer with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
- Swift, Java for iOS and Android apps
- Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
- Experience with back-end technologies such as Node.js, Python, Ruby, or PHP, and familiarity with frameworks like Express, Django, or Ruby on Rails.
- Knowledge of mobile development frameworks such as React Native, Flutter, or native iOS/Android development.
- Familiarity with databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or similar.
- Strong understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to articulate technical concepts to a non-technical audience.
- Self-motivated, highly organized, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience working in a startup or fast-paced environment.
- Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and experience with serverless architecture.
- Understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working in Agile teams.
- Familiarity with automated testing frameworks and practices.
How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume and portfolio of projects they've worked on in the past.

title: Full Stack Developer (C#, Entity Framework, Azure, JavaScript, HTML, CSS) - Must have 5+ years of QA Experience
description:
About Offshore Launch

Offshore Launch is a staffing agency that specializes in helping small business owners scale their operations with the top 1% of global remote talent. We are a people-centered agency with a passion for leaving every person and business in a better position than we found them.

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Impact the growth and success of small and medium-sized businesses.
- Work in a people-first, remote environment that values growth and ongoing development.
- Access comprehensive benefits that include HMO, PTO, professional development, and an overall emphasis on teamwork and collaboration.
- Contribute to a culture that values partnership, service, and excellence.

Your Role

As an employee of Offshore Launch, you are being hired for a unique role within a target Client’s company. We value long-term partnerships, and seek to recruit talent that will serve an individual Client’s business for multiple years.

You will work full-time with the Client company. However, the Agency provides ongoing support to ensure your continued success. As such, we create space for ongoing check-ins, feedback and development through:

- Membership in the Offshore Launch Slack workspace
- Bi-weekly All Team meetings
- Monthly reviews

Your job is to help the Client succeed.

Our job is to help you succeed.

About the Client:

Is a cloud-based software solution for nonprofit fundraising that brings together best of breed technology with best practice fundraising methodology. Utilizing smart business strategies to create sustainable, robust and mission-driven nonprofits.

We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Engineer to provide advanced technical support (L2) to users and execute QA.

In this role, you will be instrumental in ensuring the quality and reliability of our innovative platform that serves the nonprofit and fundraising industry. You will be responsible for performing rigorous testing, providing advanced technical support, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve complex issues. 

Your primary goal will be to maintain the highest standards of software quality and client satisfaction, contributing to the continued success and growth.

Responsibilities:

- Troubleshoot full-stack web applications built with C#, Entity Framework, Microsoft Stack, Microsoft SQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, ensuring high-quality, responsive designs and efficient back-end operations.
- Manage Azure cloud services, including troubleshooting Azure Functions, to support and enhance the functionality of web applications.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and review code to identify and resolve issues, ensuring adherence to best practices and minimizing the introduction of bugs.
- Collaborate on system architecture and design by troubleshooting and optimizing existing structures, ensuring that applications maintain scalability and reliability.

Level 2 (L2) Support:

- Provide advanced technical support to users, resolving complex issues related to the platform.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve software issues reported by customers.
- Maintain detailed documentation of support cases and solutions.
- Develop and maintain knowledge base articles and user guides.
- Analyze and resolve customer support tickets; communicate directly with the customer

Quality Assurance (QA):

- Develop, execute, and maintain test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Identify, document, and track defects and inconsistencies in software.
- Perform various types of testing including functional, regression, and integration testing.
- Design and implement automated test scripts.
- Continuously improve QA processes, methodologies, and tools.

Requirements:

- Proven expertise in full-stack development with C#, Microsoft Stack, Microsoft SQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- 5+ years of experience in Quality Assurance (QA), including the development and execution of test plans, test cases, and test scripts, with proficiency in automated testing and various testing methodologies (functional, regression, integration).
- 3+ years of experience in technical support, with strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills to resolve complex software issues.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities with a keen attention to detail, capable of identifying and addressing both development and QA-related challenges.
- Strong communication skills in English, with the ability to effectively collaborate with team members, stakeholders, and customers.
- Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple tasks and priorities efficiently.
- Experience in maintaining detailed documentation of support cases, solutions, and QA processes.
- A passion for mission-driven work and alignment with the values of nonprofits.

Compensation & Benefits (to be provided by Offshore Launch):

- $1700 to $1900 depending on experience
- 13th month pay
- Performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive HMO policy, including dependents.
- Annual continuing education budget to support professional development
- Start date: September 1, 2024

Note: 

- The Client is not involved in compensation or benefits. As an employee of Offshore Launch, all compensation and benefits are to be provided by the Agency.
- Please note that we anticipate a response from candidates within 24 hours of our outreach. If we do not receive a reply within this timeframe, we will assume that you are no longer interested in pursuing this opportunity.

title: Infrastructure Developer for High-Volume Web Automation Project
description:
Job Title: Infrastructure Developer for High-Volume Web Automation Project
Location: Remote
Type: Contract (Project-Based)
Duration: Short-Term with Potential for Extension
About the Project:
We are seeking an experienced Infrastructure Developer to design and build a robust system for a high-volume web automation project. The goal is to create an infrastructure capable of handling up to 1 million form submissions, including email verification, within a 24-hour period once the target website goes live. Your role will be to set up and test the infrastructure in advance, ensuring it is fully operational and ready to deploy on short notice. We will use a mock up site to test on.
Key Responsibilities:
• Infrastructure Design & Setup: Design and develop a scalable, distributed system that can efficiently handle large-scale automated form submissions.
• Automation Integration: Collaborate with automation developers to ensure that the infrastructure supports and enhances the automated submission processes.
• Proxy Management: Implement a robust proxy rotation system to manage large volumes of requests without being blocked by the target site.
• Email Handling System: Develop or integrate with existing systems to manage the generation, receipt, and verification of large volumes of emails.
• Monitoring & Logging: Set up comprehensive monitoring and logging systems to track performance, identify issues, and ensure the system is ready for deployment.
• Pre-Launch Testing: Conduct thorough testing on a sample webpage to validate the infrastructure, making adjustments as needed to ensure reliability and scalability.
• Launch Support: Be on standby for the live launch to ensure a smooth transition and to address any issues that arise during the deployment.
Qualifications:
• Proven experience in designing and deploying scalable infrastructure for web automation projects.
• Strong background in distributed systems, cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure), and load balancing.
• Familiarity with web automation tools (Selenium, Puppeteer) and their infrastructure requirements.
• Experience with email automation and bulk email verification systems.
• Proficiency in proxy management and anti-bot measures.
• Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and optimize systems in real-time.
• Experience with Captcha Handling: If the form has Captcha, use an API like 2Captcha or DeathByCaptcha to solve them automatically.
• Knowledge of Proxy Management: Able to implement a rotating proxy system to avoid IP blocks by the website. This can be done using services like ScraperAPI, Bright Data, or self-hosted proxy solutions.
• Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team of developers.
• Ability to work flexibly and be available to provide support during the project launch.
Why Work With Us?
• Opportunity to work on a challenging and innovative project with real-world impact.
• Competitive compensation for your expertise and contributions.
• Flexibility in working hours, with a focus on project milestones.
• Potential for ongoing collaboration on future projects.
How to Apply:
If you have the experience and skills to design and deploy a high-performance infrastructure for a mission-critical project, we want to hear from you. Please send your resume and a brief overview of similar projects you have worked on. Highlight your approach to building scalable systems and how you’ve prepared infrastructure for high-demand scenarios.
Application Deadline: Rolling (Looking to fill this position promptly to begin development).

title: Data Processing Analyst
description:
We are seeking highly organised individuals who excel in compiling, processing, and analysing data. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and maintaining our Safety Data Sheet (SDS) database, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations, and providing support to our safety and compliance teams. The ideal candidate will be skilled in determining appropriate extraction and formatting techniques to produce meaningful results, identifying problems or sources of error in data reports, recognising opportunities for improvement or changes in methodologies, and achieving targets. This role requires excellent data management skills, strong attention to detail, effective communication skills, and a passion for solving problems and learning new technologies. 


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

SDS Management: 
- Maintain and update the Safety Data Sheet (SDS) database. 
- Ensure all SDSs are current and comply with local, state, and federal regulations. 
- Collect and review SDSs from suppliers and manufacturers. 

Compliance: 
- Ensure company compliance with OSHA Hazard Communication Standard (HCS), GHS, and other relevant regulations. 
- Monitor regulatory changes and update SDSs and safety protocols accordingly. 
- Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with SDS requirements. 

Documentation and Reporting: 
- Create and maintain accurate records of all SDS-related activities. 
- Generate reports and provide documentation as required by regulatory agencies. 
- Prepare and submit required regulatory reports. 
- Communicate findings and recommendations to the team. 

Support and Training: 
- Provide support to employees and departments regarding SDS access and information. 
- Develop and deliver training programs on SDS management and chemical safety. 
- Assist in the development and implementation of safety protocols and procedures. 

Vendor and Supplier Coordination: 
- Communicate with vendors and suppliers to obtain and verify SDS information. 
- Ensure timely and accurate receipt of SDSs from suppliers. 

Continuous Improvement: 
- Identify opportunities for improving SDS management processes. 
- Implement best practices and new technologies to enhance efficiency and compliance. 
- Stay informed about industry trends and regulatory changes. 

Octoparse: 
- Research, collect and analyse large sets of data to identify and create workflows using Octoparse 
- Create and maintain database of workflows created 
- Develop and implement data collection policies and procedures 
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve data-related problems 
- Ensuring data accuracy, completeness, and timeliness 
- Identifying and implementing process improvements to optimise data collection, management and analysis 
- Ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices 
- Continuously educate and train yourself on data extraction techniques and methodologies 


QUALIFICATIONS
- Strong organisational skills 
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills 
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment 
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets 
- Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in work 
- Proficiency in multitasking and time management 
- A continuous learning mindset, with a passion for staying updated on new data extraction techniques and methodologies 
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment 


If you’re ready to be a part of a dedicated team and are eager to pursue a path of continuous learning and career growth, we encourage you to apply and join us. Send your CV to contact@sevron.co.uk.

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling
description:
*** PLEASE DO NOT APPLY FOR THIS POSITION IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PREVIOUS WORK EXPERIENCE IN CONDUCTING KYC CHECKS WITHIN THE ONLINE GAMBLING INDUSTRY ***


We are a leading online sweepstakes casino offering an exciting array of games, including slots, table games, and more, exclusively to players in the USA. Our platform is designed to offer a thrilling gaming experience in a secure and responsible environment. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer service and a seamless gaming experience to all our players.

We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Risk Analyst to join the team. The Risk Analyst Specialist will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and maintaining the integrity of our customer verification processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of KYC principles and regulations, along with excellent communication and analytical skills.

Responsibilities:
• Conduct thorough customer due diligence checks to verify the identity of new and existing customers.
• Review and analyze customer documentation, including identification documents and proof of address, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
• Collaborate with internal teams to resolve KYC-related issues and escalate any compliance concerns.
• Stay up-to-date with changes in regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to KYC and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations.
• Maintain accurate records of KYC checks and related documentation in accordance with company policies and procedures.

Requirements:
• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading is a MUST
• Proven KYC experience, ideally in the online gambling industry is a MUST
• Strong understanding of KYC principles, AML regulations, and industry best practices
• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills
• Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
• A commitment to upholding the highest standards of privacy and confidentiality

Work Schedule:
• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.

TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "KYC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Graphic Design - Photoshop, Canva, Midjourney. Ecommerce Dropshipping. ++ FT & Bonuses
description:
Join Our High-Flying Team:
Hi! I’m Mitch, the founder of MSS Ecom. Over the past two years, we've transformed one of our brands into an 8-figure powerhouse, and now we're ready to take this winning formula to our new ventures.

We’re on the lookout for a Graphic Designer who knows how to create high-quality visuals that enhance Shopify eCommerce websites, engage customers through email flows, and drive conversions with eye-catching image ads. Bonus if you have experience using drag-and-drop Shopify page builders like Replo, GemPages, and Klaviyo!

If you’re someone who can blend creativity with strategy, leveraging tools like Canva, Photoshop, and Midjourney, we want you on our team!

What You’ll Be Doing:
As our Graphic Designer, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping the visual identity of our brands across various channels. You’ll work closely with our marketing and development teams to create stunning graphics that not only look amazing but also drive results.

Your role will involve:

Shopify eCommerce Website Graphics:
Design and create high-quality visuals for Shopify websites, optimized for both desktop and mobile.
Source and create custom images, banners, and product photos that align with our brand aesthetics and contribute to higher conversion rates.
Collaborate with the development team to ensure your visuals are seamlessly integrated into the website’s design.
Bonus: Use drag-and-drop Shopify page builders like Replo and GemPages to design and assemble pages, integrating your visuals directly.
 
Email Flow Assets:
Develop compelling graphics for email marketing campaigns, including newsletters, promotional emails, and automated flows.
Create cohesive visual themes for email sequences that resonate with our target audience and drive engagement.
Bonus: Utilize Klaviyo’s drag-and-drop editor to design and set up email templates with your assets.

High-Converting Image Ads:
Design eye-catching ads for Facebook, Instagram, and other social platforms that drive clicks and conversions.
Use your understanding of eCommerce best practices to create ads that stand out in a crowded digital space.

AI-Enhanced Design & Photo Editing:
Utilize tools like Midjourney and Photoshop to enhance images, remove backgrounds, and create AI-driven design elements.
Apply photo editing skills to ensure all visuals are polished, professional, and aligned with our brand.

Continuous Improvement:
Collaborate with the team to iterate on design elements based on performance data and feedback.
Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and tools, bringing fresh ideas to our creative process.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
Conversion Rate: Visuals should contribute to a significant increase in conversion rates on landing pages and ads.
User Engagement: Graphics should enhance user interaction across all platforms, reducing bounce rates and improving click-through rates.
Graphic Quality: Visuals should be of high quality, aligning with brand aesthetics and enhancing the user experience.
Efficiency: Ability to quickly turn around design requests without sacrificing quality.


What We’re Looking For:
You’ll excel in this role if you have:

Proven Experience:

A solid portfolio showcasing your ability to create high-quality visuals for eCommerce brands, including Shopify websites and social media ads.
1-2 years of experience in graphic design with a focus on eCommerce, email marketing, or related fields.
Bonus: Experience with Shopify page builders like Replo, GemPages, and Klaviyo.
Technical & Design Skills:

Expertise in Canva, Photoshop, and other design tools, with a knack for creating eye-catching visuals.
Experience using AI tools like Midjourney to enhance and streamline your design process.
Strong photo editing skills, including background removal, color correction, and image enhancement.
Creative & Strategic Thinking:

A deep understanding of eCommerce design best practices and the ability to implement strategies that drive conversions.
A growth mindset with a dedication to continuous improvement and smashing KPIs.
Bonus Points:

Experience with dropshipping or other eCommerce models.
Familiarity with video editing or motion graphics.

Working Hours:
This is a remote position with flexible working hours. However, you must be available for at least 2 hours daily during the 1PM - 3 PM Philippines time to coordinate with the team.

What’s In It for You:
Performance-Based Bonuses: Earn bonuses based on your contributions and the results your designs deliver.
Growth Opportunities: Engage long-term with a team that values innovation and excellence in the eCommerce space.
Flexible Work Environment: Work remotely with the freedom to manage your own time and tasks.

How to Apply:
Ready to create visuals that captivate and convert? Here’s how to apply:

Send a quick note explaining why you’re the ideal candidate for this role.
Highlight your experience with graphic design for eCommerce and your familiarity with Shopify.
Secret Word: Include the word "blue" in your application to show that you’ve read this job description carefully.

At MSS Ecom, we’re committed to excellence and accountability. If you’re ready to take on a challenge and create visuals that truly make an impact, we’d love to hear from you. If this role doesn’t seem like your fit, we appreciate your honesty.

title: LinkedIn Prospecting and Outreach Specialist
description:
We specialize in helping ambitious companies grow and thrive through strategic design, marketing, and social growth. Our team has a track record of delivering impactful design solutions that have helped clients secure over $1B in funding. We offer services ranging from branding and pitch decks to full digital marketing strategies, all tailored to meet the unique needs of startups and growing businesses. As we expand, we’re looking for a talented LinkedIn Prospecting and Outreach Specialist to join our team and help us connect with the right clients.

Role Overview: We are looking for a skilled LinkedIn Prospecting and Outreach Specialist to help us expand our network and generate leads. The ideal candidate will have experience in using LinkedIn to identify potential clients and reach out to them through personalized messages. Your responsibilities will include researching and identifying target industries and companies, sending connection requests and follow-up messages, and maintaining a record of all interactions. This position requires excellent communication and negotiation skills, as well as a strong understanding of lead generation strategies. If you have a proven track record of successful LinkedIn prospecting and outreach, we would love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

????????? Client Acquisition: Leverage LinkedIn to identify and engage with potential clients, focusing on early to mid-stage startups in tech, SaaS, fintech, and other high-growth industries.

???? Research & Analysis: Conduct thorough research to identify target industries, companies, and decision-makers. Develop a strategy for engaging with these leads in a meaningful way.

?? Outreach Execution: Send personalized connection requests, follow-up messages, and nurture relationships with potential clients. Utilize a strategic approach that includes the HLC Formula (Hook, Lesson, CTA) to craft compelling outreach messages.

???? Lead Management: Maintain a detailed record of all interactions, follow-ups, and outcomes in a structured format (e.g., Google Spreadsheet). Ensure a consistent and systematic approach to prospecting.

???? Content Engagement: Identify trending content and thought leaders in our industry. Engage with relevant discussions, share insights, and position NVGT as a leader in the startup growth space.

???? Data-Driven Insights: Track the performance of your outreach efforts. Continuously refine your approach based on analytics and feedback to optimize lead generation.


Ideal Candidate Profile:

???? Proven Experience: Demonstrated success in LinkedIn prospecting, lead generation, and outreach. Experience with startup founders and the tech industry is a plus.

????? Excellent Communicator: Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to craft compelling, personalized messages that resonate with startup founders and decision-makers.

???? Strategic Thinker: Ability to think critically and strategically about how to best reach and engage potential clients. Comfortable using data to inform decisions and improve outreach effectiveness.

???? Tech-Savvy: Familiar with tools and platforms like LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Crunchbase, and others that support prospecting and lead generation.

???? Goal-Oriented: Driven by results with a strong focus on achieving and exceeding targets. Proactive in following up and ensuring leads progress through the sales funnel.
If you're passionate about helping startups grow and have the skills to drive client acquisition through strategic LinkedIn outreach, we want to hear from you!

title: Klaviyo Email Marketing & Graphic Design Specialist
description:
Position Overview:

The Klaviyo Email Marketing & Design Specialist is a hybrid role responsible for crafting visually compelling email campaigns while optimizing for the best possible performance. This position requires a deep understanding of the Klaviyo platform, expertise in email marketing strategy, and a strong foundation in graphic design.

About Us: At our New Zealand-based company, we pride ourselves on being more than just a provider of home furniture and homeware. Our team is committed to enhancing living spaces throughout the country, prioritizing quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. We present a wide selection of products crafted to infuse comfort and elegance into our customers' homes.

Key Responsibilities:

- Email Campaign Management: Develop, execute, and manage email campaigns in Klaviyo, ensuring that campaigns are timely, relevant, and engaging.
- Design: Create visually compelling graphics and email layouts that resonate with our target audience while staying true to our brand guidelines.
- Segmentation: Utilize Klaviyo to segment email lists for more personalized targeting.
- A/B Testing: Run and analyze A/B tests to improve email performance and engagement.
- Analytics & Reporting: Monitor email campaign results, analyze key metrics, and provide actionable insights.
- Optimization: Ensure emails are mobile-responsive and optimize for deliverability and open rates.
- List Management: Oversee the email list, ensuring its health, growth, and compliance with anti-spam regulations.
- Trends & Best Practices: Stay updated with the latest trends in email marketing and graphic design, ensuring our campaigns utilize best practices.
- Collaboration: Work closely with other teams (content, sales, product, etc.) to ensure alignment in messaging and branding.
- Automations & Flows: Set up and optimize automated email flows such as welcome series, cart abandonment, post-purchase follow-ups, etc.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Graphic Design, or related field.
- Proven experience with Klaviyo and a solid understanding of its features and capabilities.
- At least 2+ years of experience in a hands-on eCommerce role, preferably with Shopify.
- Strong graphic design skills with proficiency in tools like Adobe Creative Suite.
- Knowledge of email best practices, including deliverability, and regulations such as CAN-SPAM.
- Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret email performance data.
- Exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Nice-to-Have:

- Good understanding of Google Ads and Meta Ads.
- Familiarity with Google Analytics 4 and strong Excel skills.

What's in it for you?

- Work from home.
- NZ shift 9 - 6 pm start time.
- No night shifts & weekend work.
- Enjoy NZ public holidays with pay.

********Click the link below to express your interest ONLY.********

***forms.gle/Dj9TjG1Ks3LNVE5o8***

title: Front End Website Developer
description:
Hey there, front-end wizards!

We’re on the hunt for a talented developer with 5+ years of hands-on experience in front-end development. 
If you’re ready to bring UI/UX designs to life with code that dazzles, we want to hear from you!

Here’s the scoop:

Start Date: ASAP! We’re ready when you are.
Hours: Full-time, 40 hours a week. Kick-off at 7 AM and wrap up by 4 PM, Philippines time (with a one-hour lunch break to recharge those brain cells).
Days: Monday to Friday—because weekends are for fun!
Salary: Between 35,000 PHP and 50,000 PHP per month, depending on how much you dazzle us with your skills.
Extras: Yep, there are additional benefits too!

What we need from you:

Build reusable and dynamic code and libraries: Ensure all websites pull correct and up-to-date information across the board, integrating content from the Hub. Your code should be clean, maintainable, and scalable.
Optimise for speed and scalability: Reduce load times and enhance performance to keep everything running smoothly.
Thorough testing and QA: Conduct rigorous testing of your work to ensure it’s error-free and meets our quality standards.
Stay current: Keep up with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our applications stay modern and competitive.
Participate in code reviews: Provide constructive feedback to peers and maintain a high standard of code quality across the team.
Effective communication: Stay in sync with your team leader and other teams, ensuring smooth information flow and addressing any potential issues quickly.
Time management: Provide accurate time estimates for tasks and projects, and consistently meet these deadlines.
Client communication: Respond to clients through Help Scout, manage your tickets, and follow the response time based on the client tier plan.
Team collaboration: Post concerns, requests, and relevant updates in the designated Teams channel for proper tracking and collaboration.
SEO best practices: Add and maintain SEO metadata, manage sitemaps, and ensure proper URL redirection to boost search engine visibility.
Regular maintenance: Keep the website functional and up-to-date, promptly addressing any issues to ensure optimal performance.

What Success Looks Like:

User Experience: The front-end applications are visually appealing, highly responsive, and provide a seamless user experience across all devices and platforms.
Code Quality: Code is clean, maintainable, and well-documented, with a high level of reusability for future projects. Bugs and errors are minimised through rigorous testing and self-QA processes.
Collaboration & Communication: Strong communication with your direct team leader and other teams ensures smooth project execution and timely delivery.
Performance Optimisation: Applications are optimised for performance, with fast load times, smooth transitions, and minimal downtime.
Time Management: Projects and tasks are completed within the estimated timeframes, demonstrating strong time management and reliability.
Continuous Improvement: The Front End Website Developer stays current with industry trends and continuously seeks to improve their skills and the application’s performance, usability, and visual appeal.


We’re a fast-paced and rapidly growing company—seriously, we’re not just saying that like everyone else. We really are growing quickly, and we need someone who can keep up with the momentum and help us continue to soar!

If you’re ready to join our fun and dynamic team, show us your front-end chops by detailing your experience with the above points. To make sure you’ve read this far, please include the code word “PixelMaster” in your subject line or reply. If you’ve got the goods, we’ll be in touch. If not, we might not be the right fit this time around.

Happy coding!

description:

title: Media and Marketing Coordinator
description:
Blockchain Founders Fund (BFF) is a leading early stage (seed and pre-seed) Web3 Venture Capital fund which invests in top-tier founders globally. Our backers include a strategic mix of the leading firms in the crypto and traditional finance world.

We invest in highly-promising startups taking a go-to-market focus and a hands-on approach to drive value. BFF helps curate strategic partnerships, hire talent, accelerate growth and ensure portfolio founders are well capitalized. Our team is comprised of builders and operators that have scaled many of the leading Blockchain startups and are on a mission to support all-star teams shaping the Web3 industry. *We’re always looking to connect with exceptional talent that wants to make an impact in Web3, infrastructure, Tooling, and DeFi.* 

We take our work seriously, but not so much ourselves. We dislike hierarchies and love initiative and innovation. If you love start-ups and blockchain as much as we do, we think you will like working with us.

About the Role:
As the Digital Media and Marketing Coordinator, you will be responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring our digital marketing campaigns across all digital networks. You will play a key role in driving our brand presence and engagement, ensuring that our messaging is consistent and impactful.

What You Will Do:
Digital Marketing Oversight: Design and manage all aspects of our digital marketing department, including our marketing database, email campaigns, and display advertising.
Social Media Management: Plan, manage, and maintain our social media platforms, ensuring consistent and strategic engagement.
Performance Reporting: Prepare accurate reports on the overall performance of our marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to optimize strategies.
Web Presence Enhancement: Evaluate key metrics affecting website traffic, service quotas, and target audience to improve our web presence.
Content Creation: Coordinate and manage the creation of all digital content, including websites, blogs, press releases, public appearances, podcasts, infographics, and videos.
Direct Marketing & Improvement: Suggest and implement direct marketing methods, continuously seeking ways to improve our digital strategies.
Competitor Analysis: Regularly track and gain insights into competitors' strategies for BFF and our portfolio companies.
ROI & KPI Development: Develop and monitor ROI and KPIs to ensure effective campaign execution and goal achievement.
Industry Trends: Stay up-to-date with digital media technologies and the latest trends to keep our strategies relevant and innovative.
Relationship Building: Develop and maintain strong, collaborative working relationships both internally and externally.
Characteristics We Value:
Grit / Grinder Mentality: Persistence in overcoming challenges and a strong work ethic.
Self-Starter / Autonomous: Ability to work independently, take initiative, and drive projects forward without constant supervision.
Relationship Builder: Eagerness to build and cultivate long-term relationships that benefit the company and its portfolio.
Willingness to Learn: A mindset open to absorbing new information and continuously improving.
Intellectual Curiosity: A deep commitment to discovering insights and opportunities that others may overlook.
Requirements:
Experience: 2+ years as a Digital Media Specialist, Digital Marketing Manager, Marketing Coordinator, or Social Media Manager.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in Photoshop, other editing software, email automation, social media automation, and B2B campaign execution.
Industry Knowledge: Deep understanding of the cryptocurrency space and its community.
Project Management: Exceptional project and time management skills, with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
Storytelling Ability: A natural storyteller who understands brand DNA, voice, and aesthetics.
Leadership & Interpersonal Skills: Strong leadership abilities and the capability to work well with others.
Language: Must be fluent in English.
Bonus: Substantial prior experience in venture capital, private equity, high-growth startups, or hedge funds.
How to Apply:
To begin the application process, please complete the questionnaire here https://www.rockstar.blockchainff.com/. The questionnaire will only take a few minutes to complete. If your profile aligns with our needs, you will receive further instructions via email.

title: Salesforce Developer
description:
Description
??Looking for Filipino (Philippines-based) candidates ????????

Job Role: Salesforce Developer
Work Schedule: Monday - Friday 9 AM - 5 PM (AU Time Zone)

Who We Are: At Hunt St we help Aussie companies directly hire top remote talent in the Philippines, Nepal, India, Pakistan and more. You will be hired directly by the client. We are not an outsourcing agency. All of our roles are 100% remote so you'll be able to work from home. Australia is only 2 hours ahead of the Philippines and 4 hours ahead of Nepal, so the working hours are typically much better than working for a European or North American company. 

Who The Client Is: The client is an Australian family law lending specialist.

Role Overview: We are seeking an experienced Salesforce Developer to join our client's team. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Salesforce development, customization, and integration, as well as experience in delivering high-quality solutions.
