title: WordPress backend developer
description:
We are a leading digital agency specializing in creating innovative and high-performing WordPress websites for our diverse clientele. Our mission is to deliver exceptional web solutions that drive results and enhance user experiences. We are currently looking for a skilled WordPress Backend Developer to join our team and help us build and maintain robust and scalable WordPress websites.

Job Description
As a WordPress Backend Developer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and enhancing the backend functionalities of our WordPress websites. You will work closely with our front-end developers, designers, and project managers to deliver seamless website experiences. This role requires a deep understanding of WordPress core, custom theme and plugin development, and best practices for scalability and performance.

Key Responsibilities
* Develop and maintain custom WordPress plugins and themes according to project requirements.
* Optimize website performance and ensure high availability and scalability of the WordPress websites.
* Integrate third-party APIs and services with WordPress.
* Implement and manage complex functionalities such as custom post types, taxonomies, and user roles.
* Troubleshoot and resolve backend issues related to the WordPress platform.
* Work with REST APIs and create custom endpoints as needed.
* Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
* Ensure the WordPress codebase is clean, organized, and follows best practices for security and performance.
* Perform code reviews and provide constructive feedback to other developers.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of development processes, codebases, and project details.

Qualifications
* Proven experience as a WordPress Backend Developer or similar role.
* Strong proficiency in PHP and MySQL.
* In-depth understanding of WordPress core and its architecture.
* Experience with custom theme and plugin development.
* Familiarity with the WordPress REST API and experience in creating custom endpoints.
* Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques.
* Understanding of WordPress security best practices and ability to implement them.
* Experience with integrating third-party APIs and services.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team.

Preferred Qualifications
* Experience with ACF, Crocoblocks (JetEngine) and a diverse array of builders (e.g. Elementor)
*Experience with WooCommerce and building e-commerce functionalities.
* Basic knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to collaborate effectively with front-end developers.

Benefits
* Competitive salary based on experience and skills.
* Flexible working hours.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* A supportive and collaborative team environment.

How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, a cover letter detailing their experience with WordPress backend development, and any relevant portfolio links.

title: Virtual Assistant for a Cosmetic Clinic
description:
We are looking for a versatile and proactive virtual assistant to support us with various tasks related to website management, marketing, and content creation for our cosmetic clinic. The ideal candidate will have experience with WordPress, basic coding skills, and graphic design capabilities. We also expect an affinity for AI and the ability to automate and optimize tasks independently.
Responsibilities:
1. Website Management: Maintain and optimize our WordPress website, including creating and editing new pages. Basic coding skills (HTML/CSS) are a plus.
2. Content Creation: Write blog posts, SEO-optimized texts, and website content using AI tools like ChatGPT.
3. Graphic Design: Edit and optimize photos and visuals for use on the website and social media platforms.
4. Digital Marketing: Assist in setting up and managing Google AdWords and Facebook Ads campaigns.
5. AI and Automation: Integrate AI tools for various applications, such as automating WhatsApp communication via chatbots.
6. SEO Optimization: Implement SEO strategies to improve our online visibility.
7. Social Media Management: Contribute to planning and executing content strategies on social media.
Requirements:
• Experience with WordPress and basic knowledge of HTML/CSS.
• Skills in graphic design and photo editing (e.g., Adobe Photoshop or Canva).
• Experience in copywriting and SEO.
• Knowledge of digital marketing, including Google AdWords and Facebook Ads.
• Affinity for AI and the ability to use technologies like ChatGPT.
• Excellent communication skills in English (and preferably Dutch).
• Proactive attitude and ability to work independently.
Preferences:
• Experience with AI chatbots and automation tools.
• Previous experience working for a cosmetic or medical practice.

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
We are a web company in Australia specialising in Website and Laravel application development. We are seeking out a senior full stack developer that can take ownership of projects to deliver quality solutions in a timely manner, to ultimately bring these projects to fruition and success.
As such, we're looking for a candidate that's a good fit as per below:
Competencies:
* At least 5 years experience in HTML, PHP or JavaScript development with at least 2 years experience in each of these disciplines
* Must be able to work autonomously and can troubleshoot and solve complex problems on their own
* Good attention to detail on a visual, code, technical and strategy level
* Solid JavaScript skills in a mobile or SPA development context with frameworks like Vue.js or React.js
* Skilled in writing and debugging complex SQL queries for data and performance optimisation
* Proficient in English with good written and oral communication skills
* Strong in writing and designing well structured code and can follow established coding conventions
* Experienced with WordPress/Shopify/SquareSpace development

Responsibilities include:
* Build various web based solutions (WordPress, Laravel, etc) with autonomy
* Assisting and training more junior developers

This role is open ONLY to Philippine locals.
Successful candidates that excel in this role will have a chance to be promoted to lead a development division subject to the success of projects.
Please submit your applications here and also let us know:
* Your current work availability
* What times of the day you are available for work
* What are some of your proudest web/tech projects that you have worked on?
Thank you for your time.

title: Full Time Search Fund Analyst
description:
Job Title: Full-Time Search Fund Analyst
Location: Remote
Salary: $750-$900/month depending on experience
Type: Full-Time
Website: Upgrade to see actual info
About Us:
Sunset Legacy Partners is a traditional search fund dedicated to identifying and acquiring a private company in niche sectors across North America. Our approach relies on proprietary sourcing and industry analysis. We are looking for a meticulous and driven Analyst to join our team. This role is essential in supporting our mission to identify and engage with owners of potential acquisition targets.
Job Description:
As an Analyst, your primary responsibility will be to conduct industry research and to build detailed lists of private companies within specific niche industries. You will use various databases and online research tools as well as conference lists to identify these companies. Additionally, you will need to visit each company’s website to assess it's quality extract the following:
1. 1-3 word descriptions that describe the specific industry or space the company operates in (e.g., if it's a cybersecurity provider do they specialize in endpoint or SIEM, etc.) You must learn to understand and speak like a customer of the business .
2. 1-3 Bullet Points summarizing what is unique about the company or its products/services. Customized and personalized information we use in a critical way in our outreach.
This information will be essential for our evaluation and outreach efforts.
There is room to grow for the right, motivated candidate. This opportunity could be a great launching point for a career in finance, private equity, entrepreneurship or email marketing.
Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct thorough online research to identify companies within specified niche sectors.
- Create and maintain detailed lists of potential acquisition targets. Adding 100-1000 companies per week.
- Analyze company websites and write 1-3 word descriptions of their space as well as 1-3 custom bullet points about them.
-Conduct industry research by generating lists of experts and contacting them.
- Work closely with the team to enhance research methodologies and sourcing efficiency.
Requirements:
- Strong research skills, particularly with online databases and search engines.
-Close attention to detail and ability to produce lists of 100-1000 new companies per week.
- Ability to analyze and summarize information from company websites.
-Ability to write and summarize high level understandings of what companies do into short sentences.
-High attention to detail and commitment to accuracy.
- Fluency in English, both written and verbal.
- Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
- Previous experience in a similar role or familiarity with search funds, private equity or cold email outreach is a plus.
How to Apply:
To apply, please submit your resume and a brief cover letter. In your cover letter, please include the year and type of company my grandfather founded. This will help us identify candidates who have carefully read the job description.
Next Steps in the Hiring Process:
After selecting from initial submissions, qualified candidates will be invited to complete a 4-5 hour case study project. This project will closely resemble the work you will be doing if hired. It is designed to give you a sense of the role and allow us to assess your work style and fit for the position.
We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: ** Digital Marketing Specialist (Real Estate )**
description:
We are seeking a creative, talented, and results-driven Marketing Specialist to join our team, and lead our marketing efforts across various platforms, and execute all aspects of our marketing strategy. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in digital marketing, print marketing, social media marketing and management, and content creation. You will be responsible for promoting our brand, generating leads, and driving engagement across multiple channels. If you are passionate about real estate and have a knack for digital marketing, this is the perfect opportunity for you!
**Basic Requirement:**
Minimum of 2 years in digital marketing, with real estate experience being heavily preferred.
**Qualifications:**
1. Proven experience in Digital Marketing, preferably within the Real Estate industry.
2. Proficiency in Google AdWords, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Search Console, etc., and the ability to interpret data.
3. Expert knowledge of Meta (Facebook & Instagram) ad creation, management.
4. Strong skills in Graphic Design. Design Software: Photoshop/Illustrator knowledge is a plus.
5. Strong ability to create and manage content for social media platforms.
6. Expert experience in using Canva for designing print and digital content.
7. Knowledge of creating and editing Video Content for Social Media.
8. Knowledge of Content Management System, Web hosting, Website management, particularly WordPress; familiarity with Elementor is a plus.
9. Ability to manage changes in website content, SEO development, and track analytics to ensure all content is up-to-date and relevant.
10. Knowledge in Zapier for automation and integration.
11. Experience in using Gsuite, Excel, and other basic softwares.
12. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to convey complex ideas clearly and effectively.
13. Strong ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, with a keen eye for detail.
14. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment and continuously learn and apply new marketing techniques.
15. Have great work ethics, ability to complete projects on time and reporting.
**Key Responsibilities:**
1. Digital Advertising & Campaign Management:
a) Create, manage, and optimize Google AdWords campaigns to drive traffic, generate leads, and maximize ROI.
b) Implement and monitor Google marketing strategies, including Google My Business, Google Products, Display ads, Search Engine Marketing (SEM), and Remarketing efforts.
2. Social Media Management:
a) Develop engaging content for social media platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, TikTok and YouTube.
b) Create and schedule posts, reels, and stories to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
c) Create short form and long form YouTube content.
d) Monitor social media channels, respond to comments and messages, and foster community engagement.
3. Email Marketing & Newsletters:
a) Design visually appealing newsletters to our client base, keeping them informed of the latest news, offers, and updates.
b) Design brochures, feature sheets, postcards and coordinate with printer.
4. Website Design and Management:
a) Oversee the design, content updates, and functionality of our company website, ensuring it is user-friendly and optimized for search engines (SEO).
b) Regularly track and analyze website performance, making necessary adjustments to improve user experience and conversion rates.
5. Analytics & Reporting:
a) Monitor and report on the performance of all marketing campaigns, using tools like Google Analytics, social media insights, and basic performance tracking.
b) Use data insights to refine marketing strategies, ensuring they align with business objectives and drive measurable results.
6. Collaboration & Communication:
a) Work closely with the sales and real estate teams to ensure marketing efforts are aligned with business goals.
b) Assist in communicating with clients about marketing initiatives, ensuring their needs and expectations are met.
**What We Offer:**
1. A competitive salary and benefits package.
2. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
3. Work in a creative and innovative environment where your ideas are valued.
4. Flexible working hours with the possibility of remote work.
5. Join a supportive and collaborative team committed to achieving excellence.
**Company Overview:**
We are a BC Canada-based dynamic and growing real estate and marketing company committed to providing exceptional service and innovative solutions to our clients. Our team is dedicated to excellence in the real estate market.
**How to Apply:**
If you are a driven marketer with a passion for real estate, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter to Upgrade to see actual info

title: Virtual Assistant for Amazon FBM (Dropshipping from China)
description:
Only apply if you met the criterias.
Note: Leave your contacts and link to your CV/ Resume/ Portfolio in an application for review:

I am seeking a highly motivated and experienced Amazon FBM Online Assistant to join just started company. In this role, you will be responsible for managing the entire dropshipping process, from sourcing profitable products on Chinese websites to listing them on Shopify and Amazon, and handling order processing and customer service. Main target is Amazon FBM via integration of Shopify and finding a winning product to build brand around it. I need someone who can build a team aroundthemself and run the business by themself. 

Starting pionts: 
-Amazon FBM
-Registered storefront brand: C*****LA
-GTIN exemption brand: G***C
-And you and me

Key Responsibilities:

Product Sourcing: Identify and research profitable products on Chinese e-commerce platforms such as Taobao, 1688.com, and CJ Dropshipping. Post sourcing requests and ensure the best quality and pricing. 

Supplier Communication: Engage with Chinese suppliers to negotiate terms, confirm product quality, and oversee the entire procurement process. Fluency in Mandarin or another Chinese language is a strong advantage.

Product Listing & Management: List products on Shopify and Amazon Seller Central, ensuring all product details, images, and descriptions are optimized for maximum visibility and sales. Experience with automation tools for product listing and order processing is essential.

Order Processing: Manage orders efficiently, including processing payments, coordinating shipping, and ensuring timely delivery. Knowledge of various shipping settings and options for international orders is required.

Shipping Methods: Knowledge of dropshipping methods for FBM outside of US. 

Customer Service: Provide top-notch customer service by addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Experience in managing customer relationships in an e-commerce setting is crucial.

Tool Proficiency: Utilize essential tools like CJ Dropshipping, Taobao, 1688.com, AliWangWang messenger, Shopify listing, and Amazon Seller Central to streamline operations and increase productivity. Already sat up chinese accoint is advantage but not mandatory. 

Qualifications:

Proven experience with Amazon FBM (Fulfillment by Merchant) and a strong understanding of the e-commerce ecosystem.
Familiarity with different shipping settings and procedures for products shipped from outside the US. Knowledge of requrements of shipping as a FBM dropshipper.
Knowledge of UPC, code requrements for listing on amazon, GTIN exemtion (GS1, Speedybarcode ets).
Proficiency in product research tools, supplier communication, and the tools mentioned above.
Automation and integration skills for efficient product listing, order processing, and overall workflow management.
Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.
Knowledge of the Chinese language is a significant advantage, especially for direct communication with suppliers.

Working Hours: Flexible, but availability during specific time zones may be required to coordinate with suppliers and customers globally.

Salary: 300USD and % from sales as negotiated and bonuses from performance of store.

title: Zoho CRM Subject Matter Expert
description:
We are seeking a seasoned CRM Expert with a strong focus on Zoho to help us streamline and enhance our lead management process. The ideal candidate will be responsible for seamlessly integrating our website contact forms with Zoho CRM, enabling us to categorize and better understand our leads. Your expertise will be crucial in designing, implementing, and optimizing the CRM workflow to significantly improve our sales funnel and conversion rates.

Key Responsibilities:

Integrate 20 +/- website contact forms into Zoho CRM for efficient lead capture.
Customize Zoho CRM to categorize leads based on user selections from forms.
Develop and optimize workflows and automation to enhance lead management.
Analyze lead data to generate insights into customer behavior and improve decision-making.
Collaborate closely with the sales and marketing teams to ensure CRM processes align with business objectives.
Provide training and support to staff on Zoho CRM best practices and usage.

Qualifications:

Demonstrated expertise in Zoho CRM, including setup, customization, and integration.
Strong understanding of lead management processes and CRM best practices.
Experience in web form integration, data mapping, and workflow automation.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Qualifications:

Extensive experience with API integration and custom coding within Zoho.
Background in sales, marketing, or customer relationship management.
Proven track record as a subject matter expert (SME) who can provide strategic advice on CRM best practices.
Experience in incorporating multiple domains into Zoho CRM.
Zoho CRM certification is highly desirable.

How to Apply:

Please share your resume and submit the following task requirement Zoho CRM, specifically highlighting your ability to improve lead management processes. We are looking for a subject matter expert who can advise us on best practices and help us optimize our CRM setup. If you meet the preferred qualifications, please include specific examples of previous Zoho CRM implementations.

Note: Please do not apply if you do not have experience with Zoho CRM.

Task Requirement:

As part of the application process to stand out, please draft a brief lead management process outline for a software licensing company using Zoho CRM. If you do not submit an outline, your chances of being a favorable applicant will be low. Your outline should cover:

Lead Categorization: How you would segment leads based on their source and readiness to purchase.
Workflow Automation: Your approach to automating lead nurturing, including follow-ups and stage transitions.
Reporting: Key metrics and reports you would set up to track lead performance and conversion rates.

Less Than 1000 Characters, please submit to this listing along with resume. If selected, we will reach out to schedule an interview. Interviews are subject to availability. 

We work with the best, because we are the best. Thank you for your interest.

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
Are you a skilled call center agent looking for the flexibility of working from home? We are hiring 2 full-time Customer Service Representatives (CSRs) to join our team, each working 40 hours per week. If you have a strong background in sales and customer service, a clear North American accent, and knowledge of the automotive industry, we’d love to hear from you! Interview will start tomorrow, September 3rd between 7 pm to 9 pm. Results will be announced Thursday, Sept 5th.


Requirements:
* Accent: A clear, neutral, or North American accent. Required
* Automotive Knowledge: Experience or passion for the automotive industry, including cars, trucks, or semi-trucks. Required.
* Customer Service Skills: Strong abilities in empathy, patience, and effective problem-solving is required.
* Sales Experience: Proven ability to close sales via phone or email. Required
* Technical Proficiency: Experience with Shopify, Gorgias, Aircall dialer, and CRM tools is a plus.
* Written Communication: Excellent English skills for email correspondence. Required
* Availability: Able to work 40 hours per week, including evening shifts (6 pm - 9 am EST) and weekends.
* Social Media Knowledge: Familiarity with social media platforms is a bonus, though not required.
* Sales and Retention: Experience with client retention, leveraging your sales experience to close deals and enhance customer loyalty. Required


Key Responsibilities:
* Customer Engagement: Serve as the first point of contact for customers during after-hours shifts, promptly addressing inquiries via phone.
* CRM Utilization: Efficiently use our CRM system, Gorgias, to log customer inquiries and tickets, ensuring accurate documentation.
* Email Communication: Professionally respond to customer emails, addressing concerns and providing relevant information.
* Tier 1 Support: Handle basic customer service requests, including order status inquiries, order tracking, cancellations, processing new orders in our Shopify store, and guiding customers to appropriate resources on our website.
* Technical Escalation: When faced with technical issues beyond your scope, create callback tickets in the CRM for Tier 2 representatives to address during regular business hours. Also someone who can be easily trained into Tier 2


Training & Working Hours:
* Training: 30 days during regular business hours (Mon-Fri, 9 am - 6 pm EST).
* Working Hours: Evening shifts on weekdays (6 pm - 9 am EST) and weekends.


Salary & Benefits:
* Salary: $8 to $10 per hour, depending on qualifications. Pay is bi-weekly via Wise.
Benefits: Paid sick days (2 per year to start), a 13th-month holiday bonus (eligible in 2025), and opportunities for career growth.


If you meet the requirements and are eager to join a dynamic team, apply today!


HOW TO APPLY:
Follow the instructions below religiously:
1. Apply to this job post with "I am your high level CSR" as the subject line or you may also send resume and video recording to neryza.pira@gmail.com .
2. Send a link of your resume include 2 character references with their phone number and email (invalid if no character reference).
3. Send a link of your one-minute video recording: Please introduce yourself, discuss your relevant work experiences related to the CSR position you're applying for, emphasize your proficiency with specific tools, highlight your knowledge and experience in automotive industry. (NO VIDEO, NO INTERVIEW)

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
We’re Hiring a Full-Stack Developer! 

Are you passionate about coding, programming, and technology? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and love tackling new challenges? If so, join UiSiY and come get wealthy with us!

IMMEDIATE INTERVIEWS! READ THE FULL POST! IF YOU KNOW PYTHON, YOU CAN BE HIRED SAME DAY! APPLY NOW!

Position: Full-Stack Developer 
Pay: $2/hr during a one-month onboarding period, increasing to $5/hr immediately after onboarding, then a one-dollar raise every month until you reach $9/hr. When you reach $9/hr, it becomes your base pay and you can make as much extra income as you want every paycheck! (average employee is making over $2,500 to $5,000 per month after 1 year)
Bonuses and Gifts: Offered as part of our reward program (we regularly award hard work to loyal employees) 
Work Schedule: Full-time. You can choose your schedule after onboarding. 
Immediate Hiring: Available for candidates who pass the application and interview process

About the Role:

We’re looking for a talented full-stack developer to join our team immediately. As our first hire for this department, you'll play a crucial role in shaping our development efforts and may occasionally handle regular VA tasks. If you're a tech enthusiast with extensive experience and a passion for coding, this is your opportunity to make a significant impact! This position is for a new part of our company which means as one of the first hires, you have a chance to make a lot more money!

What We Offer:
- Competitive Pay: $9/hr plus performance-based commissions. 
- Bonuses and Gifts: Additional rewards for exceptional work.
- Career Growth: Opportunity to grow and develop with regular performance-based raises. As one of the first hires for this new part of our company, you have a higher chance of becoming a manager once we add more people to this team.
- Immediate Start: If you pass the application and interview, you can start right away!

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain full-stack web applications.
- Work on coding and programming tasks with a focus on technology.

title: Figma Specialist + Web Developer
description:
Location: Remote
Type: Freelance/Contract

Overview
We are looking for a highly skilled Figma expert who is also a creative designer with a keen eye for detail. The ideal candidate will be adept at building efficient designs in Figma, capable of taking design direction and bringing it to life with precision. If you have experience with Webflow, that's a big plus!

Key Responsibilities
1. Client Design Process in Figma:
Design Direction Implementation:
Apply provided design direction, incorporating logos, colors, fonts, brand assets, and mood boards.
Master Figma Document Application:
Swap out core components like logos, brand assets, styles, and key wording across multiple pages of brand guidelines and templated designs (e.g., social media, website, mailer, collateral).
Final Details Customization:
Add custom wording or copy to tailor designs further.
Custom Design Creation:
Develop additional designs such as custom packaging, extra web pages, social media content, emails, and various digital/print collateral.
Final Touches:
Ensure all designs are pixel-perfect, aligned, and free from errors before finalizing.
Finals Delivery:
Save all final elements (e.g., logos, colors, fonts, PDFs) into Dropbox for easy access.

2. Customized Designs:
Create custom designs following the brand guidelines and mood board, such as packaging, web pages, social media content, emails, and specific collateral.

3. Internal Systems in Figma:
Master Document & Template Development:
Build and refine the master Figma document and templates for efficient component and style swapping.
Template Creation:
Develop layouts for social media, website pages, emails, pitch decks, and internal documents.

4. Ready for Final Production:
Prepare artworks for final production, ensuring they are ready for export into various templates (e.g., Canva, Adobe Illustrator, MailChimp, Webflow, Shopify).

5. Process Documentation:
Internal Process Documentation:
Create step-by-step documentation for onboarding new designers.
Client Documentation:
Record and create resources for clients to edit final templates
.
6. Ad Hoc Design Work:
Handle internal content creation (e.g., social media, website pages, emails, pitch decks).
Respond to client requests with quick turnarounds (e.g., packaging mockups, web page designs, social media content, collateral).

7. Webflow (Bonus):
Regular updates to the Webflow website, including new client case studies, weekly articles, resources, and ad hoc landing pages.

Skills Needed
Advanced proficiency in Figma with a deep understanding of its capabilities.
Strong design skills with an eye for detail, especially in colors and typography.
Ability to take design direction and build out complete projects.
Bonus: Proficiency in Webflow for website updates and maintenance.

Benefits:
NO graveyard shift
Hours may grow into Full time
Weekly Pay (every Tuesday via Wise)

Expected Hourly Rate

description:

As a Media Buyer, your mission is clear: drive substantial traffic for Our Buyer Agency Service. We help our clients buy luxury homes in Melbourne, Australia. You'll oversee all ad campaigns for this service, with an uncapped budget, as long as you maintain Cost per Acquisition within target KPIs. Your compensation will also include a percentage of the revenue generated, offering uncapped income potential for exceptional performance.

Paid Traffic Expert: Mastery of paid traffic structures across various platforms, including Meta Ads essential (primary source), Google Ads, TikTok ads, and other networks are non-essential. But will be looked upon favourably.
Direct Marketing Specialist: Proficiency in funnel architecture, ad copywriting, tracking structures, email automation to increase consultations and re-engage leads, along with retargeting strategies.
Lifelong Learner: Ability to integrate marketing efforts with other departments, understanding their impact and optimising overall output. Primarily working communicating with our video editor to acquire feedback on what’s performing and how they can be fine-tuned to decrease cost per acquisition and lower lead cost. 
Adaptable & Competitive: Thrives under pressure, adapts quickly, and stays ahead of industry trends.

Your Responsibilities:

Media Buying: Manage and optimize ad accounts on Facebook & Instagram (essential), Google Ads, TikTok Ads, additionally will be looked upon favourably.
Conversion Tracking: Ensure accurate conversion tracking for campaigns.
Copywriting: Craft high-performing ads, headlines, and scripts for various platforms.
Constant Optimization: Continuously test and improve campaign structures. 
Email Marketing Automation: High experience with creating marketing automation workflows to increase scheduled consultations for the business.
Team Collaboration: Participate in daily meetings to synchronize efforts and drive collective success.

Compensation Plan:

Base: $300 AUD per month
Bonus: 3% of revenue generated
Compensation Scenarios:
Hygiene Standard: $100k/pm in sales = $3k bonus, Total of $3,300/AUDmonth
Realistic Aim: $300k/pm in sales = $6k bonus, Total of $6,300/AUDmonth
High Performance: $500k/pm in sales = $9k bonus, Total of $9,300/AUDmonth

You Should Not Apply If:

You seek a standard 9-5 job; this role demands an all-in mentality and dedication beyond the ordinary.
You are easily offended or unable to handle stress and pressure.
You prioritize quick monetary gains over long-term success; this role requires a marathon mindset, not a sprint.
You do not align with our core values.
Join us if you're ready to drive impactful results, join a company that cares about its team and what to compensate you fairly for your expertise. Apply now and become part of a dynamic team committed to excellence!

title: Property Management and Airbnb Assistant
description:
Full job description

We are seeking a motivated and organised Service Accommodation (Airbnb) and Property Management Assistant to support our team in managing our portfolio of properties. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, excellent communication skills, and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. You will play a crucial role in ensuring that our properties are well-maintained, our guests have a seamless experience, and our operations run smoothly.

*Key Responsibilities:*

1. *Guest Relations:*

- Handle guest enquiries and bookings via phone, email, and online platforms.

- Assist with check-ins and check-outs, ensuring a smooth and welcoming experience for all guests.

- Address and resolve guest complaints or issues in a timely and professional manner.

2. *Property Management:*

- Coordinate property maintenance, including scheduling repairs, cleaning services, and inspections.

- Conduct regular property checks to ensure all accommodations meet quality and safety standards.

- Manage inventory of property supplies, linens, and other essential items.

- Assist with furnishing properties ready for listing

3. *Administrative Support:*

- Assist in the management of booking platforms, ensuring listings are accurate and up-to-date.

- Maintain records of bookings, maintenance requests, and other key operational data.

- Prepare reports on property performance, occupancy rates, and guest feedback.

4. *Marketing Support:*

- Assist in creating and updating property listings on various online platforms.

- Support marketing efforts, including social media posts, promotional materials, and special offers.

5. *Client Relations:*

- Act as a point of contact for property owners, providing updates on property status and any maintenance issues.

- Assist with onboarding new properties into the portfolio, including liaising with property owners and arranging necessary preparations.

*Qualifications:*

- Previous experience in property management, hospitality, or a related field is advantageous.

- Strong organisational and time management skills.

- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and property management software desirable

- Knowledge of online booking platforms (e.g., Airbnb, Booking.com) is a plus.



*How to Apply:*

If you are passionate about property management and hospitality, and you thrive in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Please send your resume outlining your experience and why you would be a great fit for this role to Maureen at info@clevarent.com

title: Data Quality Analyst

Our head office is in Washington State, USA, and we have a subsidiary in Canada.

You'll collaborate closely with the core operations team to ensure a seamless staffing marketplace experience and will own the success of the business on a daily basis. Ready to make an impact? Apply Now!

Responsibilities:
- Filling multiple shifts in real-time so they’re filled on an hourly basis each day by requesting for more workers, working with the clients, and answering last minute support questions.
- Supporting workers and addressing their needs so that they can fill the shifts they’ve been assigned.
- Collaborating with other internal operations team members for process improvement.
- Managing large worker cohorts with bulk-communication tools.
- Analyzing and enhancing workflows as you learn to fully take on the role.
- Processing worker payments and managing certifications/documents.
- Ensuring excellent customer experience through effective communication.
- Being enthusiastic and advocating for marketplace workers and hospitality.

Requirements:
- 5+ years in BPO Customer Support/Onboarding experience with US sales exposure
- 1 year WFH experience
- Team Lead or Subject Matter Expert experience preferred.
- Comfort with asking lots of questions as a way to learn and understand the role
- Ability to be trained quickly and to productively receive feedback on how to improve along the way.
- Strong writing, communication, and collaboration skills in a fast-paced environment.
- Attention to detail and interest/experience in HR, staffing, hospitality, or marketplaces.
- Proven operations experience in a role where you’ve consistently taken on more responsibility.
- Proficiency in English, multitasking, and using internal tools/CRMs.
- Experience with automation tools is a huge plus (Zapier, Airtable, Make, etc.).
- Available on weekends (this business is the busiest on the weekends).

When applying, please tell us about a time when you worked in a role that involved managing staffing, supporting customers, onboarding team members, or anything you've done in HR. Also, copy and paste this Job ID: rec2TgzRiQyKxOjt6 into your email response, along with this message: “I’m excited to be applying to Job #rec2TgzRiQyKxOjt6!” This will let us know what job you’re applying for as well as show us that you actually read this entire job description (attention to detail is everything). Thanks and hope to hear from you soon!

title: Zoho Developer’s Dream - The Most Creatively Fulfilling Job You’ve Ever Had
description:
Most Zoho developers end up working on the same boring projects with little room for creativity.

But what if your next role offered you the chance to design and automate systems that not only challenge you but also change lives? 

Well, you’ve just found your dream job—where creativity, innovation and problem-solving are valued, encouraged, and rewarded.

ABOUT US

First, let me introduce myself. 

My name is Trey, and I run a music school called The Talent House. We offer private music lessons in Houston, Texas.

We’ve helped thousands of students over the last 11 years skyrocket their music growth, and they’ve gone on to land record deals and music scholarships, gained tens of thousands of followers on social media, and toured the world as full-time performing musicians.

Music has changed my life, and it’s my mission to share my passion with the world so others can have their life changed by music, too. 

In addition to our lessons in Houston, one of my long-term goals is to build online music courses and donate instruments to orphanages in third-world countries around the world, providing them with free music education. 

You’ll get a better idea of me and what we do at The Talent House if you check out:

Website: www.thetalenthouse.net/
Youtube: www.youtube.com/@thetalenthousetx

REQUIREMENTS

If you like the sound of this, here’s what I’m looking for:

• At least 2-3 years of experience in developing custom apps in Zoho Creator
• Extreme proficiency with Deluge 
• You have a portfolio of previous work you can show me
• Strong understanding of Zoho CRM and its integrations
• Experience in building automations for repetitive tasks such as sending reminders, managing workflows, and more
• Great communication skills & quick response times 
• Ability to collaborate via video chat to brainstorm ideas and find the best solutions
• Strong attention to detail and a commitment to quality work

THE ROLE

So what’s the role?

I need someone who can help me bring my ideas to life with Zoho Creator. 

This involves: 

• Developing custom apps that align with our unique business needs 
• Building automations to streamline repetitive tasks 
• Providing insights and suggestions on how to implement these ideas best 
• Collaborating with me through video meetings 

If you’re reading this, please respond with “Zoho Wizard” in the subject of your application so I know you’ve read it.

I’m looking for a long-term collaboration. Someone who can grow with us. 

I want to start by building one custom app, but I’m interested in possibly morphing this into more projects/hours if we work well together—especially if you can help with other aspects of Zoho or business automation. 

HOW TO APPLY

If this sounds like the perfect role for you, here’s how to apply:

• Send examples of custom apps or automations you’ve built in Zoho Creator
• Let me know how long you’ve been developing in Zoho Creator 
• Share your availability and how much time you can dedicate to this project
• Let me know what you're looking to make in terms of compensation

If you have any other info you think I might find relevant or interesting, feel free to add that, too — I’d love to get to know you better.

Thanks!

Trey

title: Python and Django Developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Python and Django Developer who is able to work independently and professionally on making modifications to an existing eCommerce site. The site is https://ondine.mx.

• After a development environment has been setup, the person will proceed to make modifications as requested by the owner of the site. All changes must be thoroughly tested by the developer before they are handed to the owner for User Acceptance Testing.
• Once changes need to be moved to production, a production copy must be made in case the data/site need to be restored. Release to production will then require additional testing by the developer to ensure there are no issues/bug resulting from the production release. 
Requirements for the Job:
• Minimum 5 years or experience as Python and Django Developer
• Has worked on large projects of similar size as a lead developer or a senior developer
• Attention to details is paramount
• Ability to completely test code before moving to UAT
• Clean coding style with applicable comments and elegant solution to problems

This will be a part time job as needed (no set hours). The right person can expect to maintain the site for a long time.

title: Inbound sales acquisition agent
description:
Are you a skilled salesperson with a knack for building rapport and closing deals? We are looking for an Inbound Sales Acquisitions Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will be assigned a specific market along with the necessary list filters. Our advanced automation tools will handle the heavy lifting, from adding phone numbers to the leads to generating preliminary offers. These leads will then be added to our workflow, which handles the outbound outreach.

Once a lead is prequalified by our AI to ensure they are looking to sell, the call will be transferred to you. Your primary responsibility will be to use your sales skills to build a strong relationship with the lead and close the deal.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Receive prequalified inbound leads and build rapport with potential sellers.
- Utilize your sales expertise to close deals and achieve sales targets.
- Work closely with our automation tools and AI to streamline the sales process.
- Follow up with leads to maintain engagement and secure commitments.
- Report sales activities and outcomes in the CRM system.

Link to test https://www.16personalities.com/?gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAjwodC2BhAHEiwAE67hJC8IBTtK3fSVRTH52X5vK8b3vnn-YG05BIp38ARKdjcp8jG_muFGrhoCEoEQAvD_BwE

description:

About the role:

Key Responsibilities:

1. Promoting Stories
- Collaboration: Work closely with the Interview Editor to identify and promote blockbuster, and defining stories.
- Strategy Development: Create and execute strategies to maximize the reach and impact of key stories through various channels, including social media, newsletters, and site design.

2. Launching or Relaunching Sites

- Site Management: Oversee the process of getting new sites live, ensuring they are filled with content, indexed on Google News, and successfully launched.
- Market Expansion: Utilise our database to establish introductions in new markets, including our international regions of the UK & India, plus the prospective markets of the US & Canada.
- AI Utilization: Use AI tools to research and establish new contacts in existing and new markets.

title: Automation Developer
description:
We're excited to announce that our team is expanding with the addition of three new associate developers.


Step 1-Paid Training. We will provide a 20 hour training that goes in depth with automation tools we are looking for. 

Step 2-You'll initially join us on a project-by-project basis. We’ll assign you tasks through Asana, which you’ll complete and submit for review. After our joint review, the project will be either approved or sent back for revisions. Once approved, you’ll receive payment for the project. Upon successfully completing 2 projects, you’ll have the opportunity to transition to a full-time role with us which is hourly. These projects will be creating automations using the principles learned in training.

Step 3- Full time working. You will work with associates & clients to complete automation tasks.

Our Core Focus Areas:

1.) Crafting Tailored Automation Solutions
2.) Developing Custom API Tools
3.) Offering Subscription-Based Tools

Key Responsibilities:
Create automation scripts using Make.com and Python. 
Make.com experience required 
Work closely with the team to uncover automation opportunities.
Design and deploy automation frameworks.
Diagnose and resolve automation issues.
Document automation processes and workflows comprehensively.

Tool Skills Needed

Make.com

Architect and Implement Advanced Automation Solutions: Design and build complex automation scenarios using Make.com, integrating multiple systems and APIs to streamline business processes.

Optimize Existing Automations: Evaluate and enhance current automation workflows to improve efficiency, reliability, and scalability.

Lead Automation Strategy Development: Collaborate with stakeholders to identify high-impact automation opportunities and develop strategic automation roadmaps.

Mentor and Train Team Members: Provide guidance and training to less experienced team members on best practices and advanced techniques in Make.com.

Ensure Best Practices in Automation Design: Establish and enforce best practices for automation design, including error handling, logging, and performance optimization.

Stay Updated on Platform Enhancements: Keep up with the latest updates, features, and capabilities of Make.com to leverage new tools and functionalities effectively.

Troubleshoot and Resolve Complex Issues: Quickly diagnose and resolve technical issues that arise within automated workflows, ensuring minimal downtime and disruption.

Document Advanced Automation Workflows: Create detailed documentation for complex scenarios, including flow diagrams, integration points, and step-by-step guides.

Airtable 

Database Design and Structuring: Proficient in designing and organizing databases, including setting up tables, fields, and relationships to optimize data flow.

Automation and Integration:Skilled in creating automations within Airtable, such as using Airtable Automations and integrating with external tools like Zapier, Make.com, or APIs to streamline workflows.

Advanced Formula Writing: Expertise in crafting complex formulas to perform calculations, conditional logic, and data manipulation within Airtable.

Custom Views and Filters: Ability to create custom views, filters, and groupings to visualize data effectively for different stakeholders.

Collaboration and Permissions Management: Experienced in setting up collaboration environments, managing user permissions, and ensuring secure data sharing within teams.

Reporting and Dashboards: Proficient in building dashboards and generating reports that summarize key metrics and insights directly within Airtable or through connected tools.

Scripting and Extensions: Ability to write custom scripts using Airtable's scripting block to extend functionality, automate complex tasks, or create custom apps.

Data Import/Export:Skilled in importing and exporting data between Airtable and other platforms, ensuring data integrity and consistency.

API Integration:Experienced in working with the Airtable API for custom integrations, enabling seamless data flow between Airtable and other systems.

Project Management and Templates: Knowledgeable in setting up project management workflows, using Airtable templates, and customizing them to fit specific project needs.

ChatGPT Prompt

Crafting Effective Prompts: Skilled in designing clear, concise, and targeted prompts that elicit desired responses from ChatGPT, ensuring relevance and accuracy in outputs.

Understanding Context and Intent: Expertise in analyzing user intent and context to create prompts that align with the specific goals of the interaction, whether it's for customer support, content creation, or data analysis.

Iterative Prompt Refinement: Proficient in refining and optimizing prompts through iterative testing and adjustments to improve the quality and consistency of ChatGPT's responses.

title: Technical Engineer and Solution Architect for SaaS Integration
description:
Company Overview: We are a dynamic digital marketing and technology company specializing in innovative lead generation systems. We’re seeking a highly skilled Technical Engineer and Solution Architect with experience in integrating SaaS platforms like Trigify.io, Clay.com, and Smartlead.ai. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in API integrations, CRM systems, email automation, and data enrichment processes.

Job Description: As a Technical Engineer and Solution Architect, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing the integration of our lead generation system using Trigify.io, Clay.com, and Smartlead.ai. You will work closely with our internal teams to ensure seamless data flow, automation, and synchronization between these platforms, optimizing our lead generation and follow-up processes.

Key Responsibilities:

Integration Design and Implementation: Architect and implement the integration between Trigify.io, Clay.com, and Smartlead.ai to automate lead generation and data enrichment workflows.
API Management: Set up and manage API connections between the platforms, ensuring reliable data transmission and synchronization.
Data Enrichment: Use Clay.com to enrich lead data and ensure the accuracy and relevance of information passed to Smartlead.ai for email campaigns.
Automation Workflows: Develop and maintain automation workflows within Smartlead.ai to optimize email delivery and follow-up sequences.
CRM Integration: Integrate the lead generation system with CRM and call center software to streamline lead management and follow-up processes.
Troubleshooting and Optimization: Continuously monitor the integration and workflow performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize processes for efficiency and effectiveness.
Documentation: Create and maintain detailed documentation of the integration process, configurations, and workflows.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in integrating SaaS platforms, particularly Trigify.io, Clay.com, and Smartlead.ai.
Strong understanding of API integration, data flows, and automation tools.
Experience with CRM systems and email marketing platforms.
Familiarity with data enrichment processes and tools.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in digital marketing, lead generation, or similar fields.
Knowledge of call center software and integration with CRM systems.
Prior experience in a solution architect or technical consultant role.
Compensation: Competitive, based on experience and project scope.

How to Apply: Interested candidates should submit their resume and a brief cover letter outlining their experience with similar integrations. Please include any relevant work samples or case studies. https://api.leadconnectorhq.com/widget/form/kSQiRfrvpDgKidD51nMj

title: IT Automation Developer
description:

Automation Developer – Striving for Mastery and Expertise in IT Automation

Do you prefer to solve problems one time with automation instead of manually fixing it repeatedly? Are you looking for a chance to grow in mastery and expertise in IT systems automation? Do you know the value of good analysis of data and drawing down conclusions on how to proceed?

Do you have excellent attention to detail? Do you have the patience to see a problem through to complete resolution?

We are looking for talented, motivated, and driven problem-solvers that understand IT automation. We work in the areas of IT scripting, systems automation, and RPA. Our focus is helping IT companies, IT departments solve the repetitive and mundane IT tasks they face with automation. We are looking for individuals who collaborate well with various departments, handle proactive monitoring, can troubleshoot automation workflows, have excellent communication skills (written and oral), and have a strong desire to gain in knowledge and mastery.

What will you do?

-Design and implementation of automation solutions using PowerShell, Jinja, RPA, or RMM tools.
-Streamline business operations, reduce repetitive tasks, and improve service delivery through effective automation.
-Analyze existing processes across all departments while identifying areas for automation and improvement on a consultative basis for our customers.

-Develop and prioritize a list of automation tasks while ensuring alignment with Leadership and company objectives.

-Engage in technical training and personal development activities aligned with career goals and future positions within Client’s Automation.

-Ensure comprehensive documentation of service tickets in our PSA.
-Ensure all time is entered into the PSA in real time to accurately capture the work performed, resolution achieved, and any next steps as applicable.
-Maintain consistent communication with all stakeholders through non-technical language.

Qualifications and Skill Requirements:

-Relevant Work Experience: 5+ Years 
-Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
-Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell or Jinja
-Familiarity and expertise with RMM, PSA, and RPA tools.
-Solid understanding of APIs, JSON, and integration of systems and applications.
-Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
-Strong documentation and communication skills with the ability to convey technical details to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

1. Updated Resume
2. 1-2 minute Voice recording detailing your experience related to the Job using VOCAROO

title: software web platform development Team
description:
Business and Hiring Plan for InvestoVerse Virtual Reality and Interactive Investors Club
Executive Summary
Project Name: InvestoVerse Virtual Reality and Interactive Investors Club
Purpose: InvestoVerse Virtual Reality and Interactive Investors Club is an innovative web platform designed to connect capital investors with real estate and business investment opportunities. The platform will provide a legally compliant way for investors to earn returns on their capital while offering real estate and business investors an engaging, interactive method to raise capital. The platform will feature a fun, interactive approach, including an optional gamified investment environment for users who enjoy gaming.
Vision: To create the leading investment platform that combines social networking with an interactive and gamified investment experience, allowing capital investors and investment seekers to connect and transact in a dynamic, user-friendly, and secure environment.
Unique Selling Proposition (USP): Merges serious investment opportunities with an interactive, gamified experience, making capital investment accessible and engaging for a new generation of investors.
________________________________________
Project Goals
1. Develop a Web Platform:
o Build a large-scale web platform that integrates user profiles, secure financial transactions, portfolio management, and social networking features.
2. Interactive and Gamified Experience:
o Introduce a gaming option where investors can engage in a virtual world, making investments in real estate and businesses in a fun, interactive way.
3. Legal Compliance and Security:
o Implement a legal structure that allows raising capital without a traditional securities license, ensuring compliance with KYC, AML, GDPR, and other relevant regulations.
4. Launch and Scale:
o Develop and execute a marketing strategy to drive user acquisition and establish InvestoVerse as the leading platform for capital investment, with plans for international expansion.
________________________________________
Team Structure and Roles
To achieve these goals, a highly skilled team will be assembled, led by an experienced Team Lead/Project Manager. Below are the roles and responsibilities required for this project:
1. Team Lead/Project Manager
• Responsibilities:
o Oversee the entire project lifecycle from concept to launch.
o Coordinate between development, design, marketing, and legal teams.
o Ensure the project stays on track with timelines and budget.
o Manage stakeholder communications and provide regular updates.
• Qualifications:
o Proven experience managing large-scale tech projects, particularly in fintech, real estate, or interactive platforms.
o Strong leadership, organizational, and communication skills.
o Familiarity with agile project management methodologies.
2. Full-Stack Development Team
Frontend Developer:
• Responsibilities:
o Develop responsive, interactive user interfaces using React.js or Angular.
o Implement UX/UI designs, ensuring seamless navigation and user experience.
o Integrate interactive features like investment dashboards, profile management, and social networking functionalities.
• Qualifications:
o Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks.
o Experience with responsive design and mobile-first development.
o Strong understanding of SEO best practices for frontend development.
Backend Developer:
• Responsibilities:
o Develop and maintain server-side logic using Node.js with Express or Django.
o Implement secure APIs, database management (PostgreSQL or MongoDB), and user account management.
o Ensure scalability, performance optimization, and data security.
• Qualifications:
o Expertise in server-side programming, API development, and database management.
o Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure) and microservices architecture.
o Strong understanding of financial transactions, payment processing, and encryption methods.
3. Virtual Reality (VR) Developer / Gamification Specialist
• Responsibilities:
o Develop the VR environment for the optional gamified investment experience using Unity or Unreal Engine.
o Ensure compatibility with popular VR devices and web-based VR platforms.
o Integrate gamification features, such as virtual badges, leaderboards, and interactive investment challenges.
• Qualifications:
o Proficiency in VR development and gamification, including experience with Unity or Unreal Engine.
o Familiarity with VR device compatibility and web-based VR frameworks.
o Strong understanding of interactive design and user experience in gaming environments.
4. UX/UI Designer
• Responsibilities:
o Design user interfaces that are visually appealing, intuitive, and user-friendly.
o Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups using tools like Figma or Adobe XD.
o Work closely with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately.
• Qualifications:
o Strong portfolio showcasing expertise in web and mobile UI/UX design.
o Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and responsive design.
o Understanding of user behavior, accessibility, and best practices in UX design.
5. Legal and Compliance Specialist
• Responsibilities:
o Ensure the platform complies with financial regulations like KYC, AML, and GDPR.
o Structure legal investment options such as Regulation Crowdfunding, revenue-sharing agreements, and joint ventures.
o Handle any legal documentation, user agreements, and terms of service.
• Qualifications:
o Extensive knowledge of securities law, financial regulations, and compliance.
o Experience working with fintech platforms or real estate investment firms.
o Strong understanding of international regulations if planning for global expansion.
6. Marketing and Growth Manager
• Responsibilities:
o Develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy, including SEO, content marketing, social media, and paid advertising.
o Manage influencer partnerships, referral programs, and community-building initiatives.
o Analyze user behavior and marketing metrics to optimize campaigns and drive growth.
• Qualifications:
o Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably in fintech or real estate sectors.
o Strong knowledge of SEO, SEM, content marketing, and social media strategies.
o Familiarity with tools like Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.
7. Security Specialist
• Responsibilities:
o Implement and maintain robust security protocols, including SSL/TLS encryption, two-factor authentication, and data protection measures.
o Conduct regular security audits and penetration testing to identify and fix vulnerabilities.
o Ensure compliance with data security regulations and standards.
• Qualifications:
o Strong background in cybersecurity, with experience in securing financial platforms.
o Familiarity with encryption methods, authentication systems, and regulatory compliance.
o Experience in conducting security audits, penetration testing, and vulnerability assessments.
8. Customer Support and Community Manager
• Responsibilities:
o Provide responsive customer support to users, addressing issues related to accounts, transactions, and platform usage.
o Manage online forums, social media groups, and community events to foster user engagement.
o Gather user feedback and communicate it to the development and design teams for continuous improvement.
• Qualifications:
o Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
o Experience in customer support, community management, or a related field.
o Familiarity with the fintech or real estate investment sectors is a plus.
________________________________________
Hiring Plan and Timeline
Phase 1: Initial Setup (Month 1-2)
• Team Lead/Project Manager: Hire a Project Manager to oversee the project and coordinate the hiring process.
• Full-Stack Development Team: Recruit Frontend and Backend Developers to start building the core platform.
Phase 2: Design and VR Development (Month 2-4)
• UX/UI Designer: Bring on a UX/UI Designer to create the platform's user interface and experience.
• VR Developer / Gamification Specialist: Hire a VR Developer to work on the gamified investment components of the platform.
Phase 3: Legal and Marketing Setup (Month 4-6)
• Legal and Compliance Specialist: Onboard a Legal and Compliance Specialist to ensure all investment offerings and platform operations are legally sound.
• Marketing and Growth Manager: Hire a Marketing and Growth Manager to begin work on user acquisition strategies.
Phase 4: Security and Support (Month 6-8)
• Security Specialist: Bring in a Security Specialist to implement security protocols and conduct testing.
• Customer Support and Community Manager: Hire a Customer Support and Community Manager to handle user interactions and build the platform’s community.
________________________________________
Budget and Compensation
Budget Allocation:
• Compensation: Negotiable 
• Full-Stack Developers Front end and back end 
• VR Developer / Gamification Specialist
• UX/UI Designer
• Legal and Compliance Specialist
• Marketing and Growth Manager
• Security Specialist
• Customer Support and Community Manager
• Compensation Structure:

________________________________________
Next Steps

Please include examples of similar projects or platforms you’ve worked on, particularly those in fintech, real estate, or interactive/gaming platforms, experience working for companies like google, facebook, X, IG, Tinder, Robinhood, webull etc… 
2. Interview Process:
o Selected candidates or teams will be invited for interviews to discuss the project further and ensure alignment on vision and execution.
3. Start Date: ASAP

title: Full-Time Search Fund VA / Analyst
description:
Job Title: Full-Time Search Fund Analyst
Location: Remote
Salary: $750-$900/month depending on experience
Type: Full-Time Only
Website: https://www.sunset-legacy.com/

About Us:
Sunset Legacy Partners is a traditional search fund dedicated to identifying and acquiring a private company in niche sectors across North America. A search fund is a unique model similar to private equity in which we seek a singe private business to acquire and run. Our approach relies on proprietary sourcing and industry analysis. We are looking for a meticulous and driven Analyst to join our team. This role is essential in supporting our mission to identify and engage with owners of potential acquisition targets.

Job Description:
As an Analyst, your primary responsibility will be to conduct industry research and to build detailed lists of private companies within specific niche industries. You will use various databases and online research tools as well as conference lists to identify these companies. Additionally, you will need to visit each company’s website to assess it's quality and extract the following:

1. 1-3 word descriptions that describe the specific industry or space the company operates in (e.g., if it's a cybersecurity provider do they specialize in endpoint or SIEM, etc.) You must learn to understand and speak like a customer of the business.
2. 1-3 Bullet Points summarizing what is unique about the company or its products/services. Customized and personalized information we use in a critical way in our outreach.

This information will be essential for our evaluation and outreach efforts.

There is room to grow for the right, motivated candidate. This opportunity could be a great launching point for a career in finance, private equity, entrepreneurship or email marketing.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct thorough online research to identify companies within specified niche sectors.
- Create and maintain detailed lists of potential acquisition targets. Adding 100-1000 companies per week.
- Analyze company websites and write 1-3 word descriptions of their space as well as 1-3 custom bullet points about them.
-Conduct industry research by generating lists of experts and contacting them.
- Work closely with the team to enhance research methodologies and sourcing efficiency.

Requirements:
- Strong research skills, particularly with online databases and search engines.
-Close attention to detail and ability to produce lists of 100-1000 new companies per week.
- Ability to analyze and summarize information from company websites.
-Ability to write and summarize high level understandings of what companies do into short sentences.
-High attention to detail and commitment to accuracy.
- Fluency in English, both written and verbal.
- Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
- Previous experience in a similar role or familiarity with search funds, private equity or cold email outreach is a plus.

How to Apply:
To apply, please submit your resume and a brief cover letter. In your cover letter, please include why you want to work with Sunset Legacy Partners as well as the year and type of company my grandfather founded. This will help us identify candidates who have carefully read the job description. Applications written with ChatGPT or other LLMs will not be considered. Please note we are only hiring full-time candidates. 

Next Steps in the Hiring Process:
After selecting from initial submissions, qualified candidates will be invited to complete a 4-5 hour case study project. This project will closely resemble the work you will be doing if hired. It is designed to give you a sense of the role and allow us to assess your work style and fit for the position.

We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Experienced Appointment Setter (4+ years experience)
description:
Join Huzzle’s Talent Pool as an Appointment Setter! 

At Huzzle, we connect top-tier Appointment Setters & SDRs with leading companies across the UK, US, and Europe. Whether it’s a startup, scale-up, agency, or enterprise, our clients trust us to find the best talent. We only admit the top 3% of candidates into our talent pool, ensuring they are matched with exclusive, long-term opportunities. Unlike an outsourcing agency, we place you directly with a client where you’re hired in-house to work full-time as a valued member of their team.

WHO THIS IS FOR:
You're looking to:
• Work with top-tier clients in the industry and secure long-term, stable opportunities.
• Advance your career through access to exclusive roles and ongoing professional development.
• Be valued and respected for your skills and contributions in a supportive work environment.
• Earn a competitive salary with regular pay increases and success-based bonuses.
• Stop fighting for opportunities across different platforms, and let us match you with roles where we believe you'll excel.

And if you're:
• Tired of job-hopping and want a stable, long-term position.
• Frustrated by lack of support or training in previous roles.
• Looking for meaningful work where your contributions are recognized and rewarded.
• Eager to work full-time for a reputable company that values your expertise.

What We Offer:
Competitive Pay: Starting at 37K PHP/month with regular pay raises and success-based bonuses:
• Month 1: 37K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 3: 40.7K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 6: 44.4K PHP/month + bonus
• Month 9: 46.25K PHP/month + bonus 
Exclusive Access: Work with top companies and enjoy long-term client relationships.
Work from Anywhere: Enjoy the flexibility of working remotely, from the comfort of your home.

Your Role as an Appointment Setter:
• Proactive Outreach: Engage potential clients and partners through phone, email, and social media platforms.
• Seamless Scheduling: Coordinate meetings and manage calendars for the sales teams, ensuring a smooth experience for both the team and potential clients.
• CRM Mastery: Keep meticulous records of all interactions, appointments, and follow-up activities in a CRM system.
• Database Management: Regularly update and review the contact database to maintain accuracy and relevancy.
• Active Communication: Collaborate with sales and marketing to understand offerings and effectively communicate the value proposition.
• Optimize & Succeed: Monitor appointment success rates and work closely with the team to refine strategies for higher conversions.
• Industry Savvy: Stay updated on industry trends to engage clients effectively and address their needs.


Who We're Looking For:
• Experience: At least 4 years of experience with Appointment Setting, Cold Calling, and Outbound Messaging (LinkedIn, Cold Emails).
• Sales Tools Proficiency: Familiarity with relevant sales and outreach tools (CRMs, Prospecting Tools, Automation Tools, etc).
• Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients.
• Organizational Skills: Excellent time management and the ability to juggle multiple schedules.
• Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in Google Docs, Google Sheets, CRM systems, and communication tools like Slack, ChatGPT, Zoom, and LinkedIn.
• Remote Ready: Able to work effectively in a remote environment with a reliable laptop and internet connection.
• Detail-Oriented: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to maintaining high-quality data in systems.

Our Hiring Process:
• Step 1: Screening Interview
• Step 2: Take-home Task
• Step 3: Successful candidates are admitted to our talent pool, gaining access to exclusive opportunities.
• Step 4: We match you with a client for a final interview.


Application Requirements:
1. Make sure the Subject of the application is the name of the Capital City of Canada otherwise your application won't be reviewed.
2. Share your Resume/CV and any relevant experience / projects you've worked on.
3. Send anything else that can set you apart!

title: Support VA
description:

title: MSP Helpdesk Specialist
description:
IMPORTANT: Please copy and paste the link below into your browser in order to submit your application. We will only be considering applications submitted via the link. We will not be reviewing applications submitted directly through OnlineJobs.

Application Link: jobs.griffin-cloud.com/apply-j2s1

Griffin Cloud is a marketing and software development company specializing in ERP, CRM, and social media solutions. We Provide software, services, and support to our 5 internal brands and externally to our customers as well. We provide SAAS platforms as well as the staff to do customizations and resources to use the platforms if necessary.

We are looking for a skilled MSP Helpdesk Specialist to join our team, providing essential technical assistance to our clients. Your role will involve troubleshooting, repairing, and configuring various systems remotely, including computers, servers, email platforms, and applications like Microsoft 365. You will also handle regular maintenance tasks, monitor system performance, and deliver user-friendly solutions to end-user requests. This position requires you to be on the phone and work remotely with clients.

The ideal candidate has at least 3 years of relevant experience, a degree in Information Technology, and proficiency in tools such as Ninja RMM and Microsoft 365 Admin Portals. Excellent communication, organizational, and time-management skills are essential, along with the ability to work independently and in a team environment.

Wage/Salary Per Month: $200 - $800/month

Desired No. Of Hours Per Week: 10 hours a week, up to full-time

Responsibilities:
- Provide remote technical assistance to troubleshoot, repair, and configure computers, laptops, servers, email platforms, passwords, and various applications like Microsoft 365.
- Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to hardware, software, and network connectivity for clients.
- Perform regular maintenance tasks, including monitoring, patching, and backup procedures, to ensure the smooth functioning of systems.
- Administer and maintain cloud-based services, particularly Microsoft 365, to ensure optimal performance and security.
- Monitor system performance and respond promptly to alerts generated from monitoring software to minimize downtime and ensure system reliability.
- Engage with clients via phone to understand their technical needs and provide appropriate solutions in a professional and timely manner.
- Maintain accurate records of support interactions and time spent using Clockify, ensuring thorough documentation of all activities.
- Collaborate with team members to address helpdesk tickets, undertake projects, manage active directory, and implement automation solutions to enhance efficiency.
- Deliver technical, user-friendly solutions to end-user requests, including PC troubleshooting, printer and scanning issues, email problems, password resets, and Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) setup.

Qualifications:
- 3+ years of job-related experience, preferably in MSP service
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- Ability to prioritize multiple tasks effectively
- Ability to work independently and in a team environment
- Attention to detail and ability to follow instructions precisely
- In-depth understanding of diverse computer systems and networking
- Good knowledge of Internet security and data privacy principles
- Experience with Active Directory, Microsoft 365 (including Exchange, SharePoint, & MS Teams), and Ninja RMM is required

Preferred Skills:
- 2-4 years of Technical Support experience
- Experience with Microsoft 365 Admin Centers (MS Teams, Compliance, Intune)
- Previous experience with Ninja RMM is a major plus
- Experience with IT documentation platforms
- Experience working with Fortinet Firewalls
- Experience with PowerShell and other scripting languages is a plus

Education & Certifications:
- A degree in Information Technology is required.
- Microsoft (CompTIA Security+, MCSA, CCNA) and other IT vendor certifications are desirable.

Tools and Technologies/You will utilize a variety of tools and technologies to perform your job efficiently, including but not limited to:
- Ninja RMM for endpoint monitoring and management
- Microsoft 365 Admin Portals
- Microsoft Teams
- Avanan Cloud Email Security
- Checkpoint Security Appliances
- PasswordBoss password management solution
- Clockify Time Tracking
- Make.com
- Smartsheet's
- High Level CRM
- Fog Server
- Vendor-Specific Portals (Email Filter, Backup, VoIP, Firewalls, etc.)

Home Office Requirements/To effectively perform your duties, you must have:
- Dedicated, quiet area to work from
- Newer PC hardware with at least 8GB RAM and an i5 processor
- PC running Windows 10 or 11 PRO version (for Intune join)
- Noise-canceling headset
- Webcam
- Reliable internet speed of minimum 10Mbps
- Mobile phone for Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
