title: Reverse engineering public APIs for data scraping
description:
I'm looking for a skilled freelancer to assist in reverse engineering a number of public APIs for a project I'm working on.

Project Overview:

Your primary task will be to:

Identify the questions asked by the API.
Capture what the answers look like in the API requests.
This is an ongoing project that involves reverse engineering approximately 20 different APIs. Additionally, the project includes implementing screen scraping for websites that do not have APIs.

Initial Task:

To start, I'd like to offer a paid test task where you'll document the structure and behavior of one specific API. We're currently focusing only on comprehensive coverage and scenarios for users who know their vehicle's number plate. Additional options will be added later.

Skills Required:

Experience with API reverse engineering.
Familiarity with screen scraping techniques.
Attention to detail in documenting API structures.
If this sounds like something you're interested in, I’d love to discuss further and potentially collaborate on this project.

title: Sr HRIS Analyst
description:
We’re Hiring: Sr HRIS Analyst!

Are you looking for a rewarding career that offers flexibility to work from the comfort of your home? 

We are searching for a new Sr. HRIS Analyst to join our team at Cloudstaff, the #1 workplace everywhere! Get hired from now until December 2024 and get 2 tickets for you and your loved one to this year's year-end party at The Philippine Arena featuring global musicians, Air Supply. 

Think you qualify for the role? Attach a 1-2 minute video intro and introduce yourself to us so we can meet you virtually. Attach this together with your updated CV to become a priority applicant! 

Send your application here : https://jobs.cloudstaff.com/job-preview/14335

Role : Sr HRIS Analyst
Work Arrangement : Work From Home
Schedule : Night Shift

Job Description : 

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior HRIS Analyst with deep expertise in ADP and BambooHR systems. This role is pivotal in optimizing our HR systems by identifying inefficiencies and driving improvements. If you thrive in environments where systems are far from perfect and enjoy the challenge of transforming them into reliable and efficient tools, this is the opportunity for you. 

Key Responsibilities: 

HRIS Assessment & Management: Conduct thorough assessments of existing HRIS systems (ADP and BambooHR), providing a detailed "grade" and actionable recommendations to optimize performance, compliance, and user experience. 

System Optimization & Troubleshooting: Lead the administration, configuration, and optimization of ADP and BambooHR platforms, identifying and resolving complex system issues to ensure data integrity and reliability. 

Strategic Process Improvement: Collaborate with HR, and CEOs to identify gaps and inefficiencies in current systems, developing and implementing solutions that enhance overall functionality and user satisfaction. 

Data Analytics & Reporting: Generate, analyze, and interpret complex HR data reports, delivering actionable insights that inform HR strategy and decision-making. 

System Implementation & Upgrades: Lead or support the implementation of new HRIS modules, upgrades, or integrations, ensuring smooth transitions with minimal disruption to the business. 

User Training & Support: Develop comprehensive training materials and conduct sessions to ensure effective utilization of HRIS systems across all user levels. 

Compliance & Continuous Improvement: Ensure all HRIS systems to ensure they comply with relevant state and federal regulations, supporting accurate and timely reporting, and continuously monitoring and improving system performance. 

Requirements : 

Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in HRIS roles, with strong experience with start-ups and previous experience with ADP and BambooHR is a plus. 

Technical & Analytical Skills: Advanced proficiency in configuring, managing, and optimizing ADP and BambooHR systems, with a strong ability to analyze data and generate actionable reports. 

Strategic Problem-Solving: Proven ability to diagnose complex system issues and develop strategic solutions that enhance system performance and user experience. 

Project Management & Collaboration: Experience managing HRIS projects from conception through to completion, with strong collaboration skills to work effectively with Project Managers and uninformed CEOs. 

Communication & Training: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, capable of translating complex technical information into user-friendly language and delivering impactful training. 

Adaptability & Initiative: Highly adaptable, with a proactive approach to managing and improving HRIS systems in dynamic, fast-paced environments. 

Perks & Benefits (Work From Home) : 

- Comprehensive health and life insurance on your 16th day of employment, covering 1 free dependent on the 16th day of employment 
- Flexible leave credits which may be used for vacation, emergency and sick leaves 
- Quarterly perks boxes for WFH staff, offering groceries and snacks to keep you fueled

Cloudstaff : Build Your Career, Anywhere 

Established in 2005, Cloudstaff is a leading outsourcing company that empowers businesses to thrive through smarter talent solutions. We're passionate about creating a work environment that fosters your professional growth and overall well-being. 

Why Cloudstaff is the #1 Workplace?

title: Full Stack Developer (C#, Entity Framework, Azure, JavaScript, HTML, CSS) - Must have 5+ years of QA Experience
description:
About Offshore Launch

Offshore Launch is a staffing agency that specializes in helping small business owners scale their operations with the top 1% of global remote talent. We are a people-centered agency with a passion for leaving every person and business in a better position than we found them.

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Impact the growth and success of small and medium-sized businesses.
- Work in a people-first, remote environment that values growth and ongoing development.
- Access comprehensive benefits that include HMO, PTO, professional development, and an overall emphasis on teamwork and collaboration.
- Contribute to a culture that values partnership, service, and excellence.

Your Role

As an employee of Offshore Launch, you are being hired for a unique role within a target Client’s company. We value long-term partnerships, and seek to recruit talent that will serve an individual Client’s business for multiple years.

You will work full-time with the Client company. However, the Agency provides ongoing support to ensure your continued success. As such, we create space for ongoing check-ins, feedback and development through:

- Membership in the Offshore Launch Slack workspace
- Bi-weekly All Team meetings
- Monthly reviews

Your job is to help the Client succeed.

Our job is to help you succeed.

About the Client:

Is a cloud-based software solution for nonprofit fundraising that brings together best of breed technology with best practice fundraising methodology. Utilizing smart business strategies to create sustainable, robust and mission-driven nonprofits.

We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented QA & L2 Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be instrumental in ensuring the quality and reliability of our innovative platform that serves the nonprofit and fundraising industry. You will be responsible for performing rigorous testing, providing advanced technical support, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve complex issues. Your primary goal will be to maintain the highest standards of software quality and client satisfaction, contributing to the continued success and growth.

Responsibilities:

- Quality Assurance (QA):
- Develop, execute, and maintain test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Identify, document, and track defects and inconsistencies in software.
- Perform various types of testing including functional, regression, and integration testing.
- Design and implement automated test scripts.
- Continuously improve QA processes, methodologies, and tools.

Level 2 (L2) Support:

- Provide advanced technical support to users, resolving complex issues related to the platform.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve software issues reported by customers.
- Collaborate with the team to escalate and resolve issues.
- Maintain detailed documentation of support cases and solutions.
- Develop and maintain knowledge base articles and user guides.
- Analyze and resolve customer support tickets; communicate directly with the customer

Technical:

- Utilize expertise in C#, Microsoft Stack, and Microsoft SQL to perform code analysis and debug software.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand system architecture and design.
- Assist in the deployment of software releases and perform post-release testing.
- Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting systems.

General:

- Work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail.
- Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and customers.
- Contribute to a positive and productive work environment.

Requirements:

- Strong expertise in C#, Microsoft Stack, and Microsoft SQL.
- 5+ years QA experience in developing and executing test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Proficiency in various testing methodologies including functional, regression, and integration testing.
- Ability to design and implement automated test scripts.
- 3+ years experience in providing advanced technical support and resolving complex software issues.
- Strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities with a keen attention to detail.
- Strong English communication skills to interact effectively with team members, stakeholders, and customers.
- Ability to work independently and manage tasks in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
- Experience in maintaining detailed documentation of support cases and solutions.
- Passion for nonprofits and mission-based work

Compensation & Benefits (to be provided by Offshore Launch):

- $1000-$1200 depending on experience
- 13th month pay
- Performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive HMO policy, including dependents.

title: Full Stack Developer (C#, Entity Framework, Azure, JavaScript, HTML, CSS) - Must have 5+ years of QA Experience
description:
About Offshore Launch

Offshore Launch is a staffing agency that specializes in helping small business owners scale their operations with the top 1% of global remote talent. We are a people-centered agency with a passion for leaving every person and business in a better position than we found them. 

Why Join Offshore Launch?

- Impact the growth and success of small and medium-sized businesses.
- Work in a people-first, remote environment that values growth and ongoing development.
- Access comprehensive benefits that include HMO, PTO, professional development, and an overall emphasis on teamwork and collaboration.
- Contribute to a culture that values partnership, service, and excellence.

Your Role

As an employee of Offshore Launch, you are being hired for a unique role within a target Client’s company. We value long-term partnerships, and seek to recruit talent that will serve an individual Client’s business for multiple years. 

You will work full-time with the Client company. However, the Agency provides ongoing support to ensure your continued success. As such, we create space for ongoing check-ins, feedback and development through: 

- Membership in the Offshore Launch Slack workspace
- Bi-weekly All Team meetings
- Monthly reviews

Your job is to help the Client succeed. 

Our job is to help you succeed. 

About the Client:

Is a cloud-based software solution for nonprofit fundraising that brings together best of breed technology with best practice fundraising methodology. Utilizing smart business strategies to create sustainable, robust and mission-driven nonprofits.

We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented QA & L2 Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will be instrumental in ensuring the quality and reliability of our innovative platform that serves the nonprofit and fundraising industry. You will be responsible for performing rigorous testing, providing advanced technical support, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to resolve complex issues. Your primary goal will be to maintain the highest standards of software quality and client satisfaction, contributing to the continued success and growth.

Responsibilities:

- Quality Assurance (QA):
- Develop, execute, and maintain test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Identify, document, and track defects and inconsistencies in software.
- Perform various types of testing including functional, regression, and integration testing.
- Design and implement automated test scripts.
- Continuously improve QA processes, methodologies, and tools.

Level 2 (L2) Support:

- Provide advanced technical support to users, resolving complex issues related to the platform.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve software issues reported by customers.
- Collaborate with the team to escalate and resolve issues.
- Maintain detailed documentation of support cases and solutions.
- Develop and maintain knowledge base articles and user guides.
- Analyze and resolve customer support tickets; communicate directly with the customer

Technical:

- Utilize expertise in C#, Microsoft Stack, and Microsoft SQL to perform code analysis and debug software.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand system architecture and design.
- Assist in the deployment of software releases and perform post-release testing.
- Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting systems.

General:

- Work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail.
- Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and customers.
- Contribute to a positive and productive work environment.

Requirements:

- Strong expertise in C#, Microsoft Stack, and Microsoft SQL.
- 5+ years QA experience in developing and executing test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Proficiency in various testing methodologies including functional, regression, and integration testing.
- Ability to design and implement automated test scripts.
- 3+ years experience in providing advanced technical support and resolving complex software issues.
- Strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills.
- Excellent problem-solving abilities with a keen attention to detail.
- Strong English communication skills to interact effectively with team members, stakeholders, and customers.
- Ability to work independently and manage tasks in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
- Experience in maintaining detailed documentation of support cases and solutions.
- Passion for nonprofits and mission-based work 

Compensation & Benefits (to be provided by Offshore Launch):

- $1000-$1200 depending on experience
- 13th month pay
- Performance-based bonuses
- Comprehensive HMO policy, including dependents.
- Annual continuing education budget to support professional development

Note: The Client is not involved in compensation or benefits. As an employee of Offshore Launch, all compensation and benefits are to be provided by the Agency. 

*Please note that we anticipate a response from candidates within 24 hours of our outreach. If we do not receive a reply within this timeframe, we will assume that you are no longer interested in pursuing this opportunity.

title: Experienced Executive Assistant / Operations Supervisor
description:
Are you a powerhouse of organisation and leadership, with a proven track record in executive support and operations management? As a trailblazer in the digital marketing industry, we are on the hunt for an outstanding Executive Assistant / Operations Supervisor to become a key player in our forward-thinking team. If you thrive on driving efficiency, mastering special projects, and delivering unparalleled executive support, we’re eager to meet you!

We're driven by one mission: to propel businesses to new heights through cutting-edge digital marketing solutions. From website design and automation to copywriting and graphic design, we craft strategies that make brands shine. Our remote team of innovators is dedicated to delivering excellence every day, ensuring our clients not only succeed but dominate in a competitive market.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
>Executive Support: 
Manage the executive’s calendar, coordinate meetings, and follow up on delegated tasks. Prepare and edit correspondence, presentations, and reports, ensuring the executive's time is efficiently managed.

>Operations Management: 
Oversee daily operations, develop and maintain Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), and ensure that key projects are completed on time.

>Project Management: 
Lead the management of the CEO’s special projects, and manage ClickUp at an advanced level to enhance productivity. Create dashboards and reports for the executive team.

>Team Coordination: 
Act as the point of contact between the executive and the team, ensuring effective communication and alignment. Onboard new team members and provide ongoing support.

>Process Improvement: 
Identify and implement strategies to improve operational efficiency and productivity.

>Reporting & Dashboard Creation: 
Develop and maintain dashboards and reports that provide the executive team with clear visibility into key metrics and project statuses.

>Administrative Tasks: 
Handle various administrative duties such as document management, data entry, and email communication.

>Vendor and Client Liaison: 
Manage relationships with vendors and clients, addressing any operational concerns.

REQUIREMENTS:
* Minimum of 5 years of experience in an executive assistant or operations management role.
* Proven experience in supporting senior executives and managing operational processes.
* Strong organisational and multitasking skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines.
* Advanced proficiency in ClickUp, including setting up boards, automations, and workflows.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Leadership experience, including the ability to onboard and support new team members.
* Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to operational issues.
* Advanced digital marketing knowledge and experience, including sales funnels, websites, automations, paid marketing.

CRITICAL POINT: 85% of our clients are USA based. You MUST be able to work full time from 2pm USA EST to 11pm EST Monday to Friday.

If you’re ready to take the next step in your career and contribute to a fast-paced, innovative company, apply today! We’re excited to see how your skills and experience can help drive our operations forward.

title: Risk Analyst for Online Gambling Company
description:
The company is a leading online sweepstakes casino offering an exciting array of games, including slots, table games, and more, exclusively to players in the USA. Our platform is designed to offer a thrilling gaming experience in a secure and responsible environment. We're committed to delivering exceptional customer service and a seamless gaming experience to all our players.

About the Position:
We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Risk Analyst to join our team. The Risk Analyst will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and maintaining the integrity of our customer verification processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of KYC principles and regulations, along with excellent communication and analytical skills.

Responsibilities:
• Conduct thorough customer due diligence checks to verify the identity of new and existing customers.
• Review and analyze customer documentation, including identification documents and proof of address, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
• Collaborate with internal teams to resolve KYC-related issues and escalate any compliance concerns.
• Stay up-to-date with changes in regulatory requirements and industry best practices related to KYC and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) regulations.
• Maintain accurate records of KYC checks and related documentation in accordance with company policies and procedures.

Requirements:
• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading is a MUST
• Proven KYC experience, ideally in the online gambling or financial industry is a MUST
• Strong understanding of KYC principles, AML regulations, and industry best practices
• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills
• Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
• A commitment to upholding the highest standards of privacy and confidentiality

Work Schedule:
• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8 hours a day, 5 days a week.


TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:
1. Include the phrase "KYC" in your SUBJECT.
2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume.

***APPLICATIONS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

Reporting & Visualization: Develop insightful reports & dashboards (from scratch or templates) to communicate key marketing insights

Excellent communication skills (written & verbal)
Willingness to work in Pacific Time
Recent experience working in the US timezone

Familiarity with Gmail and Slack for internal communication

title: Backend Developer/Data Engineer for CRM Data Migration & Automation's
description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled backend developer/data engineer with expertise in data management and CRM platforms. The primary responsibility will be to manage and execute the data migration process from our existing CRM to Go High Level (GHL). The ideal candidate will have experience in cleaning and normalizing data, optimizing fields, and ensuring all data relationships are accurately maintained in the new system. Additionally, the role will involve creating and integrating APIs and third-party automations within the new CRM.

Key Responsibilities:

- Lead the data migration process from the existing CRM to Go High Level (GHL).
- Clean, normalize, and map data to ensure a smooth transition.
- Create, optimize, and configure all new/existing fields in the new CRM.
- Ensure all related fields are correctly linked to maintain data integrity.
- Develop and integrate additional APIs and third-party automations into the new CRM platform.
- Collaborate with other teams to understand data requirements and implement solutions that meet business needs.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience in data migration projects, particularly involving CRM platforms.
- Strong understanding of data management principles, including data cleaning, normalization, and field mapping.
- Expertise in backend development with proficiency in [mention relevant programming languages and tools].
- Experience with Go High Level (GHL) or similar CRM platforms is a significant advantage.
- Experience with API development and third-party integrations.

title: Creative Designer
description:
Inc. 500 Company needs a Creative Designer who is Extremely Detail-Oriented, Results-Driven, Quick, Dedicated, Driven, and Creative with Impeccable Organization and Communications Skills to Help Grow the Business.

Company: Rhythm Engineering is all about making a difference—saving lives, time, and the environment with innovative traffic solutions. Our flagship product, In|Sync, is a leading real-time adaptive traffic control system, helping communities across the U.S. save fuel, time, and reduce accidents.

Why Join Us?

Be Proud: Working for an Inc. 500 company means you’re part of one of the fastest-growing businesses recognized globally.

Continuous Income: For the right person who can deliver results, this role offers stability and continuous income with opportunities for growth.

Visibility: Your work will be published as part of the company’s key materials, including ads, eBooks, social media content, and more, and will be seen by other major companies and industry leaders.

What You’ll Do:

- Design visually compelling ads for journals.
- Create engaging eBooks and other marketing materials.
- Develop graphics for social media, website, and print materials.
- Edit videos for various marketing campaigns.
- Design intuitive and user-friendly UX interfaces for digital platforms.
- Implement basic automation in GHL (GoHighLevel) or any email marketing software (not necessary but a plus).

Key Skills:

- Proficiency in design software (Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, etc.).
- Strong understanding of typography, layout, and visual hierarchy.
- Experience in both digital and print design.
- Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere, CapCut).
- Experience in UX design with a focus on creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
- Basic knowledge of automation tools in GHL or other email marketing platforms (not necessary but a plus).

Time Tracking:

- You will be required to use Time Doctor to track your work hours accurately. This is a full-time position, and once accepted, you cannot apply for or work in any other full-time roles.

How to Apply:

- To ensure you've read the entire job post, please start your email subject line with the phrase "I’m Your Next Creative Designer - [Your Name]."
- Send your CV along with samples of your design work, including ads, eBooks, social media graphics, UX designs, or videos. This will help us assess your qualifications and fit for the role.

BOTTOM LINE: IF YOU CAN’T DESIGN OR EDIT WELL AND IF YOUR ATTENTION TO DETAIL ISN’T OUTSTANDING, THIS ISN’T THE JOB FOR YOU.

Hours Required:

- 40+ per week; full-time

Time Required for Availability:

- We mostly operate out of Arizona, Kansas City, and Orlando.
- Most communication will be through WhatsApp, Email, and other online tools.

title: Amazon Product Performance Analyst
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating across various European markets. We are looking for a detail-oriented and data-driven E-commerce Product Performance Analyst to join our team. In this role, you will analyze the performance of our product assortment using key performance indicators (KPIs) and identify high and low-performing products. Your insights will be critical in driving optimization strategies across various teams to improve our overall product success.
Responsibilities:
- Analyze product performance using KPIs to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges within our product assortment.
- Monitor product sales, conversion rates, and other key metrics to determine the health of the assortment.
- Provide actionable insights and recommendations for both underperforming and top-performing products.
- Collaborate with relevant teams (such as Marketing, PPC, and Inventory Management) to communicate findings and assist in
implementing optimization strategies.
- Regularly track and report on the effectiveness of optimization efforts and make data-driven suggestions for further improvements.
- Stay updated on industry trends and best practices related to e-commerce performance metrics.
Required Skills:
- Strong analytical skills and experience working with KPIs related to product performance.
- Ability to work with data analysis tools such as Excel, Google Analytics, or other business intelligence tools.
- Excellent communication skills to effectively relay insights and strategies to various teams.
- A detail-oriented mindset with a passion for continuous improvement.
- Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.
- Preferred: Experience in e-commerce or retail environments, especially within European markets.
Qualifications:
- Proven experience in product performance analysis for Amazon, or a related field.
- Strong organizational skills and a proactive attitude.
- Experience working cross-functionally with teams to drive results based on data insights.
How to Apply: Change the subject line to "Amazon Product Performance Analyst Application" followed by your years of experience in product performance analysis.
At the top of your message, write 2-3 sentences explaining why you're interested in this position and why you're a good fit. Be concise – messages longer than 3 sentences will not be considered.
Please also provide the following in your message under the labels a, b, c, d, e, f:
a. A brief overview of a previous product performance analysis project you’ve worked on.
b. The tools and methods you use to track product KPIs and measure success.
c. An example of how you helped optimize a product based on your analysis and the impact it had.
d. A screenshot of your internet speed.
e. A photo of your work set up.
f. Perform this test and provide a screenshot of the results: Upgrade to see actual infoUpgrade to see actual info

title: AI Developer for Personalized Content Recommendation System
description:
We are looking for a skilled and innovative AI Developer to join our team. Your primary task will be to design and implement an AI-driven content recommendation engine tailored for our educational website, which serves children aged 2-5 years. This system will dynamically deliver personalized content based on data provided by parents, enhancing the learning experience for young children.

• Develop an AI-based recommendation engine: Create and implement algorithms that select and prioritize content based on questionnaire responses from parents.
• Content categorization: Assist in tagging and organizing our current content library according to age appropriateness, learning objectives, engagement level, and other relevant criteria.
• Questionnaire integration: Design and integrate a user-friendly questionnaire to gather relevant data from parents about their child’s interests and learning needs.
• Personalization: Ensure that the recommendation engine can tailor content based on individual user profiles, learning goals, and preferences.
• Testing and optimization: Regularly test and refine the AI system to improve accuracy and user experience.
• Collaborate with the web development team: Work closely with front-end developers to integrate the recommendation engine into the website seamlessly.
• Data protection: Ensure the AI system complies with data protection regulations, especially concerning child data privacy.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in AI/ML development, preferably with recommendation systems.
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and familiarity with AI/ML frameworks like TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, or PyTorch.
• Strong understanding of content management systems and how to work with metadata and tagging.
• Experience with natural language processing (NLP) is a plus.
• Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including web developers and content creators.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Experience working with child-focused digital content is a plus but not required.

Why Join Us?

• Work on a meaningful project that positively impacts young children’s education and development.
• Flexible working hours and the opportunity to work remotely.
• A collaborative and supportive team environment.
• Competitive salary and potential for growth within the company.

How to Apply:

If you’re passionate about using AI to enhance educational content for children and meet the above qualifications, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter explaining your experience with AI recommendation systems, and examples of relevant projects you’ve worked on.

title: E-Commerce Product Manager with Expertise in Bulk Product Edit and Imports
description:
We are a growing company with 3 eCommerce stores seeking an experienced and tech-savvy Product Manager to join our dynamic team and contribute to our growing businesses. This is a full-time position.

PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION AND ANSWER ALL QUESTIONS FOR YOUR APPLICATION TO BE CONSIDERED.

This role demands extremely high attention to detail, a patient demeanor, and a meticulous approach. The ideal candidate must also have proficient English writing and speaking skills as occasional communication with vendors via email, chat, or phone will be required.

Work hours will align with U.S. business hours. Training is provided and compensated. There will be an initial 1-month trial period.

The candidate will be expected to handle the following tasks:

• Manage and Maintain Product Information:
- Uploading new products
- Updating existing product listings with accurate information
- Coordinating with new and existing vendors for product details, ordering processes, lead times, etc.
-Maintaining accurate product and vendor databases

• Research, Analysis, and Optimization:
- Researching new and relevant products/brands
- Monitoring product performance, sales metrics, and customer feedback
- Using data insights to make recommendations for listing optimizations and business strategies

• Technical Expertise and Enhancement:
- Making mass uploads and changes to products on Shopify (e.g., pricing, descriptions)
- Optimize listings for product rankings, conversion rates, and sales growth.
- Quality-checking images, titles, and descriptions for accuracy
- Website coding experience (advantageous)

• Collaboration and Communication:
- Manage 3 stores, and lead a team of 1-2 VAs.
- Collaborate with the team to resolve product and website issues.
- Work directly with manufacturers/vendors for product issues/questions

• Inventory Management and Operations:
- Overseeing inventory reconciliation and efficient tracking of stock levels
- Documentation and Record-Keeping:
- Creating and maintaining up-to-date records of SOPs, listing performance, and product details

• Other basic operations and administrative tasks

Qualifications:
• Work experience as a Product Manager
• Minimum of 2 years’ Product Management experience in an E-commerce company
• Proven expertise in Shopify. Being a Shopify Certified Developer will be an advantage.
• Advanced knowledge of MS Excel and Google Suite software (Google Sheets, Google Docs, etc.)
• Write mushroom in your application to show your attention to detail
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and good analytical skills with an ability to meet deadlines

Other preferred experience includes:
• Airtable
• ClickUp
• Website scraping tools

Communication and meetings will be primarily conducted through voice chat (Google Meet) and Slack.

Before we proceed, here are a few things we'd like to confirm:
• Payments will be made weekly for the first four weeks starting from the third week of employment, and then bi-monthly every other Tuesday.
• Your work schedule will consist of 40 hours per week
• Your working hours will be from 9 PM to 6 AM (or 10 PM to 7 PM), PHT, with a 1-hour break, five days a week
• You’ll need to send an End of Shift (EOS) report every day, covering the following:
a. What did you do today? (detailed description)
b. What issues did you run into?
c. Is there anything I can help you with?

If you're okay with the above, please reply with "I AGREE TO ALL TERMS" and answer the following questions in complete sentences, using proper grammar and punctuation (please answer in number format instead of in paragraphs):

1. What is your previous experience with managing products for E-commerce companies?
2. Please provide a list of tools or software you have utilized in previous roles for product management. For each tool, include details on its specific functions (such as web scraping or bulk upload) and briefly describe how you applied it in your work.
3. How large of a team have you managed before?
4. Have you worked with Shopify before?
5. Are you currently engaged in another job or commitment?
6. How fast is your internet?
7. Do you have a reliable computer?
8. How often do you experience power outages and internet issues?
9. What backups do you have in case of power outages?
10. What backups do you have in case of internet outages?

Please carefully review the entire job description and also use this format as your subject line when replying to this post: “Your First Name + I Am Your Product Manager" (e.g. Kevin - I Am Your Product Manager). Please also include your resume.

AI-generated responses will not be considered.

Today, we stand as a beacon of innovation and adaptability, dedicated to empowering small businesses with the resources and insights needed for sustainable growth.
